original: Idle
translation: 空闲

original: Is not wicked
translation: 非邪恶的

original: Is wicked
translation: 邪恶的

original: Is not virtuous
translation: 不善良的

original: Is virtuous
translation: 善良的

original: Is not neutral
translation: 非中立的

original: Is neutral
translation: 中立的

original: Effect
translation: 音效

original: Master
translation: 主音量

original: Music
translation: 音乐

original: Death Sounds
translation: 角色死亡音效

original: The Reaper's Due
translation: 死神索命

original: Release Tributary
translation: 释放朝贡国

original: You can choose to stop protecting Tributary Realms sworn to you. Doing so will hurt your prestige, but will make you able to attack them again
translation: 你可以选择不再保护你的朝贡国。这会降低你的威望，但你将能够再次攻打他们

original: Recruit Court Physician
translation: 雇佣宫廷医师

original: Send out messengers in order to find a candidate for the position of §YCourt Physician§!. You will likely have to pay the candidate in order to entice them to your court. If you already have a §YCourt Physician§! and choose to employ a new one, the old one will be resigned from his or her post.
translation: 下令派出信使寻找§Y宫廷医师§!的候选人。你或许不得不花费一些钱财来劝诱他们到你的宫廷。如果你已经有了一位§Y宫廷医师§!并且选择雇佣一个新的医生，那么原宫廷医师会辞去职务。

original: Ensure the entire realm knows you are looking for a candidate for the position of Court Physician.\n
translation: 让全国范围内都知道你在寻找宫廷医师的候选人。\n

original: You have sent messengers and scouts out in all directions to scour the realm for skilled physicians that would be willing to take up residence in your court. Word should reach you shortly if they manage to find a suitable candidate. Hopefully they will not bring back a quacksalver...
translation: 你派出了许多信使和探子，在领地各处寻找愿意在宫内服务的名医。如有收获，立即禀报。但希望他们不会带回来庸医……

original: I hope I do not have to wait long.
translation: 我希望我不用等太长时间。

original: I have changed my mind, I do not require [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] services.
translation: 我改主意了，我不需要[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis]服务了。

original: Your scouts inform you of a most skilled physician residing in a nearby village. Even though [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] lacks any formal schooling and supposedly is a raging alcoholic, the villagers swear that [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] has been able to cure any ailment afflicting them. This '[recruited_physician_target.GetFullName]' could easily be persuaded to come take up residence in your court.
translation: 你的探子禀报说一位医术高超的医生住在临近的村子里。尽管[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]没有正规学习过医术而且还是一个酒鬼，但农民们都发誓说[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]能治百病。这位「[recruited_physician_target.GetFullName]」很容易就能被说服去你的宫廷里任职。

original: I'm willing to take the risk.
translation: 我愿意冒这个险。

original: Reports reach you about a ship that just docked in [physician_port_target.GetName]. The ship is called 'Storm of [recruited_physician_target.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]' and on board resides the renowned physician [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstNameWithNick], who is currently in the employ of the ship's captain. If you were to offer a large sum of gold to the greedy physician, [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] would surely be willing to take up residence in your court instead!
translation: 一份报告称一艘船刚刚停泊在[physician_port_target.GetName]。这艘船被称为「[recruited_physician_target.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]之风暴」，并且在船上有一位医术高超的医生，名为[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstNameWithNick]，目前受雇于此船的船长。如果你赠予贪婪的医生大量的黄金，[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]就必定会转而到你的宫廷任职！

original: I'd pay any price for good health.
translation: 为了健康花再多钱我也愿意。

original: Your rangers report that a brilliant physician is supposedly residing deep in the forests of [physician_forest_target.GetName]. The physician, a dwarf named [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], only ever leaves the forest in order to heal the sick children of nearby villages. With the right amount of coercion and praise [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] would reluctantly agree to take up residence at your court.
translation: 你的探子禀报说有一位医术高超的医生可能住在[physician_forest_target.GetName]的深林中。这位医生是一个叫[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]的侏儒，只会在治疗附近村子里的孩子时才会出山。在恩威并施之下，[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]会不情愿地答应来到你的宫廷任职。

original: A strange little [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman], but very skilled! Bring [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] to my court.
translation: [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman]是一个奇怪的侏儒，但是医术高明！把[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]带到我的宫廷里。

original: I accept your generous offer!
translation: 我接受你慷慨的提议！

original: Your [Root.GetSpymasterName], [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName], reports that a heretical sorcerer has been caught and jailed in the city of [sorcerer_city_target.GetName]. This 'sorcerer' has apparently healed various ailments afflicting the other prisoners. Although [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] is scheduled for execution at noon, you could pardon [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] and bring [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] into your employ.
translation: 你的[Root.GetSpymasterName]，[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]，报告说一个异端术士在[sorcerer_city_target.GetName]被抓住关进了牢里。这个「术士」看上去治好了其他的囚犯。尽管[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]将于午时斩首，但你可以赦免[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]并且雇佣[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]。

original: Most unorthodox... but I do need a physician!
translation: 虽然他是一个叛经离道的异端……但我确实需要一位医生！

original: A while after you spread the word that you are seeking the employ of a court physician one of the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s from [clergyman_temple_target.GetName] arrived at your court. The cynical [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] introduced [recruited_physician_target.GetHerselfHimself] as [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstNameWithNick] and expressed a wish to serve you. Although, seeing as this individual is shunned by the rest of the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s the religious authorities are unlikely to approve...
translation: 在你放出消息，希望招募一名宫廷医师不久后，一位来自[clergyman_temple_target.GetName]的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]来到了你的宫廷。这位愤世嫉俗的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]自称[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstNameWithNick]，表达了希望侍奉你的愿望。然而，其他[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]都对此人唯恐避之不及，宗教当局恐怕不会满意……

original: Leave your dusty old tomes and join me at my court!
translation: 离开你布满尘土的旧书卷，来我的宫廷！

original: While scouring the silk road market in [chinese_silk_road_target.GetName] your scouts came across a Chinese traveler. This traveler, named [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], claims to be a traveling surgeon-poet of renowned skill - a claim the scouts were unable to verify. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] offers to join your court in return for adequate compensation.
translation: 你的探子在[chinese_silk_road_target.GetName]的丝绸之路市场上打探时，遇到一位中国旅行者。这个旅人叫[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]，声称自己是位云游四方的医生兼诗人，拥有远近闻名的医术——但这些都无法查证。如果你适当给予些报酬，[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap]就会到你的宫廷。

original: A surgeon-poet is just what I need!
translation: 一位外科医生正是我所需要的！

original: News reaches you of a traveling Arabic scholar who just arrived on a ship in the harbor of [arab_scholar_trade_post_target.GetName]. The scholar, named [recruited_physician_target.GetFullName], is rumored to be working on a compendium of medical treatments - this likely makes [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] a willing candidate for the position of physician, as [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] would be able to continue [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] work at your court!
translation: 你最近听到消息，一名云游四方的阿拉伯学者刚刚乘船来到[arab_scholar_trade_post_target.GetName]的港口。这名学者名叫[recruited_physician_target.GetFullName]，人皆盛传其正致力于完成一部医疗方法的汇编著作——这或许意味着[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]会愿意接受医师一职，因为[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]将有机会在你宫廷继续[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis]事业！

original: Bring [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] to me!
translation: 把[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]带来见我！

original: Word has reached you of a much beloved old [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman] named [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName] that resides in a nearby village. The old [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman] spends [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] days freely helping the villagers with various medical matters, such as concocting herbal remedies and amputating infected limbs. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] agrees to take up residence at your court if you donate a large sum of gold to the village.
translation: 有消息说，一位受人爱戴的年老[recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman]，名叫[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]住在附近的村子里。这位年老[recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman]自愿花费[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis]时光帮助村民解决各种医疗问题，例如调制草药治病以及切除感染的肢体。[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap]同意在你的宫廷任职，但你需要给村庄捐助一大笔钱。

original: A fair exchange!
translation: 公平的交易！

original: Your scouts report of a one-eyed [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman] that recently arrived in [Root.Capital.GetName]. The [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman], referred to as [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstNameWithNick] by the commoners, is apparently blessed with immense wisdom that [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] uses to both impress and help wherever [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] passes by. By offering a significant sum of gold to this [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman] [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] would be willing to cease [recruited_physician_target.GetHersHis] wandering and take up residence in your court!
translation: 你的探子回报说，一名独眼的[recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman]最近来到了[Root.Capital.GetName]。平民都称这个[recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman]为[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstNameWithNick]，[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]帮助任何一处[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]路过的地方，明显给人以学问广博的印象。若能拿出一大笔金钱给这个[recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman]，[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]将愿意停止[recruited_physician_target.GetHersHis]云游并在你的宫廷任职！

original: Make [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] a generous offer.
translation: 给[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]一个慷慨的报价。

original: Your rangers report of an erudite herbalist that resides in a hut in the outskirts of a nearby town. The herbalist, named [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], seems eager to accept the offer of becoming your personal physician, and has prepared an immense bundle of strange herbs to be delivered to the court should [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] be accepted.
translation: 你的探子回报说，一名博学的草药医生就住在附近小镇郊外的茅屋里。这名草药医生名叫[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]，似乎很期待成为你的私人医师，并且已为宫廷准备了一大堆奇特药草，只待[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]被接纳。

original: Ah yes, herbal remedies sound good. Bring [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] to court!
translation: 太棒了，草药治病听起来不错。把[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]带到宫廷来！

original: There reportedly lives a [recruited_physician_target.Religion.GetName] Mystic not far from our borders. Even though [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] is a heathen the locals respect [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] and turn to [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] in times of need. Rumors say that the Mystic, named [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], is able to call healing spirits into the bodies of [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] patients. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] would be willing to take up residence at your court for a small fee.
translation: 据传闻，在边境的不远处住着一位[recruited_physician_target.Religion.GetName]的神秘主义者。虽然[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]是个异教徒，但当地人很尊敬[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]，一旦有需要他们就会求助[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]。有传言称那个神秘主义者叫[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]，他能招来治愈的灵魂注入[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis]病人体内。花点小钱就能把[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap]请到宫廷里来。

original: [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] will do just fine!
translation: [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap]会胜任的！

original: A messenger brings you word from [zealot_temple_target.GetName], one of the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s residing there is willing to serve as your personal physician! The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle], named [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], is schooled in formal medicine and has served in several sick houses. Though it appears as if the other [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s are happy to see [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] go, as [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] is renowned for being a tad overzealous and frankly - insane.
translation: 来自[zealot_temple_target.GetName]的信使带来了消息，一名居住在那的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]愿意作为私人医师侍奉你！这名[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]名叫[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]，学习过正规的医学，并曾在数个医院工作过。但看上去似乎其他[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]很高兴见到[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]离开，因为[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]是出了名的有点太过狂热，不好听的说法就是——疯疯癫癫的。

original: What is the worst that could happen?
translation: 那么最坏的情况是怎样的？

original: One of your scouts report of a pilgrim who just arrived in [Root.Capital.GetName]. The pilgrim, known as [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], has been on a pious quest to visit all the [recruited_physician_target.Religion.GetName] holy sites and is now ending [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] journey here. During [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] travels [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] has accumulated a vast knowledge regarding medicine and is seeking to put [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] skills to use.
translation: 你的一个探子回报说，一名朝圣者刚刚来到[Root.Capital.GetName]。这名朝圣者，人称[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]，一直在进行虔诚的任务，拜访所有[recruited_physician_target.Religion.GetName]的圣地，现在要在此结束[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis]旅程。在[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis]旅途中，[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]积累了广博的医学知识，并且现在正希望发挥[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis]作用。

original: I will recruit this pilgrim!
translation: 我要招募这个朝圣者！

original: An envoy from the city of [student_city_target.GetName] arrived with news regarding your search for a physician. The envoy told you of a promising medical student, named [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]. The young [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman] managed to save the life of one of the daughters of an important local trader not long ago, and apparently she only lost an eye in the process! Coercing [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] to join your court would be an easy task.
translation: 一位来自[student_city_target.GetName]城市的使者带来了有关于你搜寻医师的消息。使者告诉你说，那里有一名潜力很大的医师学徒名叫[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]。年轻的[recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman]前不久治好了当地一位大商人的女儿，代价仅仅是过程中失去一只眼睛！强迫[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]加入你的宫廷是十分容易的。

original: Young but skilled, bring [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] to court!
translation: 年轻且训练有素，把[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]带到宫廷来！

original: Scouts bring word of a mystic blind [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman] that supposedly works miracles! [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] appears around the villages and cures all manner of ailments afflicting the peasants. There are even rumors that [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] made a lame man able to walk again! The peasants call [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstNameWithNick]. A gift of gold would convince [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] to come to your court.
translation: 探子带来消息说，有一个神秘的瞎眼[recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman]，似乎会创造奇迹！[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap]出现在附近的村子，治好了农民们所有的疾病。甚至有传言说[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]治好了一个瘸子！村民们称[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]为[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstNameWithNick]。送一些金子作为礼物可以说服[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]到你的宫廷。

original: He will work miracles at my court!
translation: 他将在我的宫廷里创造奇迹！

original: Your messengers tell you of a mercenary band that just arrived in [Root.Capital.GetName]. Along with them is the field surgeon [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], known for [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] ability to rapidly amputate limbs and save the lives of gravely wounded soldiers. Despite the reputation of mercenaries often being greedy, hiring [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] seems comparatively cheap!
translation: 你的探子说有一伙佣兵团抵达了[Root.Capital.GetName]。和他们在一起的战地医生[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]久负盛名，因为[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis]医疗实力高超，能迅速的给重伤的士兵截肢并救活他们。尽管佣兵们总是贪婪的，但雇佣[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]相较起来好像很便宜！

original: Perfect, [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] will serve me well!
translation: 太棒了！[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]能很好的为我服务！

original: One of your scouts report of a cunning eunuch who has taken up residence in a nearby tavern. The eunuch spends his time drinking wine, eating and sharing stories with the guests. Apparently he is very well-schooled and has vast knowledge of medicinal mixtures. An offer of gold and food would definitely convince him to take up residence at your court as physician!
translation: 你的一个探子回报，一名狡猾的阉人住在附近的酒馆。这个阉人整天大吃大喝，还喜欢和其他客人们讲故事。显然他受过正规训练并且对混合药物有着深刻理解。大块的黄金和大块的肉肯定能够说服他到你的宫廷来任职。

original: Load up a cart with cheese and wine!
translation: 运一马车奶酪和美酒过去！

original: One of your messengers return with news of an old nun residing in the convent of [nun_temple_target.GetName]. The pious woman has worked for years in the leper colonies of [nun_temple_target.GetName] where she licks away the pus in the patients' wounds and eats their scabs, something for which she has earned the name [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstNameWithNick]. If you were to donate a tidy sum to the convent she would come work for you.
translation: 你的一个信使回报说，一名老修女住在[nun_temple_target.GetName]的修道院。这位虔诚的修女已经在[nun_temple_target.GetName]的麻风隔离区工作多年，她舔光病人伤口的脓水、吃掉他们的痂，由此她挣得了[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstNameWithNick]的名号。如果你能为修道院捐一大笔钱，她就会为你效命。

original: A remarkable woman. I will make this donation!
translation: 真是个了不起的女人。我会捐赠的！

original: Your rangers report of a suspected witch living in the outskirts of the realm. They have never been able to prove that the woman practices sorcery, although the villagers do not trust her. She is willing to put her medical mixology skills to good use in your court and offers to become your physician in exchange for naught but a small vial of your blood. A most strange offer.
translation: 你的探子禀报说有一个被怀疑是女巫的人住在领地的边境。尽管农民们没见过这个女人施展过巫术，但他们还是不相信她。她愿意为你的宫廷献上自己医学调制的技艺并成为你的医师，作为交换，需要你的一小瓶血。真是个再奇怪不过的提议了。

original: A small vial of my blood? I see nothing wrong with that!
translation: 一小瓶我的血？我并不觉得有什么不妥！

original: As you lie sleeping in the courtyard you are suddenly awakened by the sound of hooves. You rise to see a man dismount and bow at you. He explains that he is a court physician of renowned skill that has left his home and traveled here from a far away land only to serve you! You have already made up your mind though...
translation: 当你在庭院里睡觉时，突然你被一阵马蹄声惊醒。你起身看见一个男人从马上下来向你鞠躬。他解释说他是一名久负盛名的宫廷医师，离开了自己的家乡，从远方行游至此，只为了侍奉你！不过你早已有了决定……

original: That horse is magnificent! Join me at my court!
translation: 那匹马真健壮！让它加入我的宫廷！

original: Can only look for a Physician once every §Y3§! years
translation: 每隔§Y3§!年才能寻访一次医生

original: Is an educated Court Physician\n
translation: 是一个训练有素的宫廷医师\n

original: Accursed Heathens!
translation: 受诅咒的异教徒！

original: Become Vaishya Caste
translation: 变为吠舍种姓

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] ascended to the Vaishya caste, claiming new prestige for [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty among [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers.
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]上升到吠舍种姓，在[Root.Religion.GetName]的统治者中为[Root.GetHerHis]家族赢得新的威望。

original: Camp Fever
translation: 露营热

original: Slow Fever
translation: 慢性热

original: Dancing Plague
translation: 舞蹈瘟疫

original: This character is suffering from the Dancing Plague and is unable to stop moving. A very exhausting condition.
translation: 此角色感染了舞蹈瘟疫，跳舞跳得停不下来。这是个令人筋疲力尽的状态。

original: dancing into oblivion
translation: 舞至毁灭

original: The Dancing Plague, also known as Saint Vitus' dance, is spreading like wildfire amongst the populace. The ailment is possibly caused by ergot poisoning.
translation: 舞蹈瘟疫，也被称为圣维达斯之舞，是一种在人群中如野火般传播的瘟疫。这种疾病可能是由于麦角碱中毒而引起的。

original: The Dancing Plague
translation: 舞蹈瘟疫

original: Something very strange is happening in the county of [dancing_plague_outbreak_location.GetName]. It all started with one peasant dancing in the streets, but soon there were dozens of them, and now there are hundreds - men, women and children alike! Musicians are playing joyous tunes all day and all night and the peasants barely have time to eat or sleep. The dancing has gone on for days and people have started to collapse from exhaustion.\n\nIt seems as if the dancing is spreading at an alarming rate, with groups of dancing people setting off in the direction of other towns.
translation: 在[dancing_plague_outbreak_location.GetName]发生了一些很奇怪的事情。一开始，一个平民在大街上跳起舞，然后几十个、上百个人都跳起舞来——不论男女老少！乐手日夜奏响欢快的曲子，农民废寝忘食地跳舞。许多天的舞蹈之后，人群开始因疲惫崩溃。\n\n似乎跳舞的人数以惊人的速度增长，并且迅速朝其他城镇扩散。

original: This is truly an unprecedented situation!
translation: 这真是前所未有的局面！

original: After enjoying a hearty meal you look out the window at the dancing peasants. The music is tantalizingly inviting, and you have felt a bit restless as of late...
translation: 享用过一顿丰盛的大餐后，你看向窗外正在跳舞的农民。音乐挑逗着发出邀请，而你近来也感到有一点停不下来……

original: Perhaps I should join in their joyous cavorting!
translation: 也许我应该加入他们的狂欢！

original: No, I should get some rest instead.
translation: 不，我应该歇一会。

original: Join the peasant's dance!\n
translation: 加入农民的舞蹈中！\n

original: Get some rest\n
translation: 休息一会\n

original: Right as you are about to leave, your court physician grabs hold of your arm. [target_physician.GetFirstName] tells you that it is not a good idea to join the dance, lest you too should collapse from exhaustion! Instead [target_physician.GetSheHe] recommends that you rest.
translation: 当你准备离开的时候，你的宫廷医师抓住了你的胳膊。[target_physician.GetFirstName]告诉你加入舞会不是一个好主意，你有可能会筋疲力竭！[target_physician.GetSheHe]建议你在一旁休息。

original: Oh well, if you say so!
translation: 好吧，如果你这样说的话！

original: No! I must dance!
translation: 不！我还要跳！

original: Dancing Queen
translation: 舞蹈女王

original: Dancing King
translation: 舞蹈之王

original: This character has impressed the peasants with [GetHerHis] graceful dancing!
translation: 这个角色以[GetHerHis]优美舞蹈打动了农民们！

original: This character has impressed the peasants with [GetHerHis] graceful dancing!
translation: 这个角色以[GetHerHis]优美舞蹈打动了农民们！

original: You spend hours dancing with the peasants, and they are clearly impressed! They would never have expected their [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] to join in their revelry. This is a moment they will remember for years to come!
translation: 你和农民们共舞数小时，他们被你的舞姿深深打动了！他们从没想过他们的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]会参加他们的狂欢。这段时光他们会铭记好几年！

original: I have never had this much fun!
translation: 我从没这么开心过！

original: Can't Stop Dancing
translation: 跳到停不下来

original: This character can't stop moving [GetHerHis] arms and legs! Unable to eat or sleep, this character is close to death.
translation: 此角色无法停止摆动[GetHerHis]胳膊和双腿！不能进食也不能入睡，此角色濒临死亡。

original: While it was pleasant to dance with the peasants at first, it has quickly become tiring. You have no desire to stop though, and when your servants plead for you to return back home for dinner you choose to ignore them. You simply MUST dance!
translation: 一开始和这些农民们跳舞还是件乐事，然而很快就感到了厌烦。你没有停下来的意思，当你的仆人请求你回家吃晚饭的时候，你也选择无视他们。你只是简简单单地必须跳下去！

original: You lie down to rest but are unable to fall asleep. All you can think of is the music and the dancing... oh, how enjoyable it would be to join them out on the streets! After a while you feel yourself unable to resist the urge and bolt outside to join the peasants in their revelry.
translation: 你躺下来休息，但却无法入睡。你满脑子想的都是音乐和舞蹈……噢，如果能和他们在大街小巷上跳舞那该多欢乐啊！过了一会，你发现自己抑制不住冲动，冲了出去加入了农民们的狂欢中。

original: I will dance forever!
translation: 我要跳到永远！

original: Months have passed since you first joined the dance. The dancing peasants have dropped like flies around you, from exhaustion, starvation or broken bones. Suddenly your feet stop moving and your arms stop flailing.
translation: 自从你开始参与跳舞已经过去了几个月了。跳舞的农民在你周围如死苍蝇一样躺了一片，他们多是死于疲惫、饥饿甚至骨折。突然间你的双脚停止了移动，双臂也不再乱摆。

original: Finally, [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] no longer controls my arms and legs!
translation: 最后，[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]不再控制我的四肢了！

original: It never ceases! Where at first you were able to take breaks to eat and sleep, you now cannot do even that! Your legs will not let you rest, your arms will not let you hold food and your mind will not let you focus on anything but the music.
translation: 这好像永远不会停下来！一开始你还有时间进食和睡觉，但现在你什么都不能做！你的双腿不会让你休息，你的双臂让你无法拿住食物，你的精神只能集中在音乐上。

original: Do not stop me now, I am having such a good time!
translation: 别打扰我，我现在很开心！

original: After several days of continuous dancing the strain in your legs is becoming unbearable. Suddenly something snaps! You fall to the ground, unable to take another step. It looks as if your dancing days are over.
translation: 连续跳了几天舞后，你腿的酸疼已经无法忍耐。突然好像有什么东西断掉了！你倒在地上，一步都走不了。看起来你跳舞的时光彻底结束了。

original: Aaargh!
translation: 啊啊啊！

original: Disallows female commanders\n
translation: 不允许女性指挥官\n

original: Allows female commanders\n
translation: 允许女性指挥官\n

original: Give Sadaqa for my Sins
translation: 给予救济以赎罪

original: Hospital
translation: 医院

original: Nomad Agitation
translation: 游牧骚动

original: This county used to belong to free-spirited nomads. The formerly nomadic population of the county is displeased with having to stay in one place.
translation: 这片领地曾属于独立的游牧部落。原先的游牧民对于不得不定居在一块土地上感到不满。

original: As your predecessor was unable to construct enough holdings to rein in the nomadic population of [new_nomad_province.GetName], you had no choice but to see them secede from your realm. [new_nomad.GetFirstName] and [new_nomad.GetHerHis] [new_nomad_province.Culture.GetName]s now rule the area.
translation: 你的前人没能建设足够多的地产来驾驭[new_nomad_province.GetName]的游牧民们，你别无他法只能看着他们从你的领地中脱离。[new_nomad.GetFirstName]和[new_nomad.GetHerHis][new_nomad_province.Culture.GetName]人现在统治这片区域。

original: The settled weaklings that used to hold [new_nomad_province.GetName] have been unable to rein in the free-spirited nomadic people living there. Clan Chief [new_nomad.GetFirstName] and [new_nomad.GetHerHis] [new_nomad_province.Culture.GetName]s have decided to join your realm, bending knee to you instead!
translation: 一直拥有[new_nomad_province.GetName]的定居者太过软弱，无法约束天性自由的游牧人民继续居住在那里。部族首领[new_nomad.GetFirstName]和[new_nomad.GetHerHis][new_nomad_province.Culture.GetName]已决定加入你的领地，转而向你屈膝！

original: Rebellious [new_nomad_province.Culture.GetName]s
translation: 反叛的[new_nomad_province.Culture.GetName]人

original: Has not performed a sacrifice to the ancestors in the last 10 years.
translation: 过去10年内未向先祖献祭。

original: [Root.Capital.County.GetName]
translation: [Root.Capital.County.GetName]

original: Culture Conversion
translation: 文化转变

original: Faster Melting Pots
translation: 文化熔炉加快

original: Slower Conversion
translation: 减慢文化转变速度

original: Combination
translation: 综合

original: Culture will convert at the default rate.
translation: 文化会以默认速率转变。

original: Culture will not spread into counties which do not border a county of the same culture, unless it is a port.
translation: 除非沿海，否则不相邻的文化不会传播。

original: Melting Pot cultures will appear at an increased rate, i.e. English, Swedish and Russian.
translation: 大熔炉文化出现的速度会增快，例如英格兰、瑞典和罗斯。

original: Base Culture Conversion chance is reduced by a factor of three.
translation: 基础文化转变几率减慢为三分之一

original: Melting Pot cultures will appear at an increased rate, spread is restricted AND base Culture Conversion chance is reduced.
translation: 大熔炉文化将以更高的速率出现，但扩散收到限制，并且，基本文化转换概率下降。

original: Religious Conversion Speed
translation: 宗教转变速度

original: Slower
translation: 减慢

original: The speed at which counties are converted by means of using the 'Proselytize' job action is unchanged.
translation: 省份通过传教行为转化宗教的速度不变。

original: The speed at which counties are converted by means of using the 'Proselytize' job action is reduced by a factor of three.
translation: 省份通过传教行为转化宗教的速度减慢为三分之一。

original: §BCharlemagne:§! Story Events
translation: §B「查理曼」：§!剧情事件

original: The various story events surrounding Charlemagne and his brother Karloman will be enabled.
translation: 开启有关查理曼和他弟弟卡洛曼的相关事件

original: The various story events surrounding Charlemagne and his brother Karloman will be disabled.
translation: 关闭有关查理曼和他弟弟卡洛曼的相关事件

original: You begin to feel unwell
translation: 你感觉不舒服

original: You can no longer ignore the irritation in your throat, you begin to violently cough.
translation: 你不得不重视你疼痛的嗓子了，你开始剧烈地咳嗽。

original: One moment you are shivering, the next you are sweating, and overall you feel awful.
translation: 突然你开始抖起来，然后全身开始冒冷汗，你感觉十分糟糕。

original: A sudden gurgling and feeling of pressure in your gut is all the warning you have before you are forced to make a dash for the privy.
translation: 你的肚子突然响了起来，疼起来的肚子迫使你冲向厕所。

original: A queasy feeling overcomes you and you feel an immediate urge to vomit.
translation: 突然你感觉到恶心反胃，想马上吐出来。

original: A dull pain begins to throb behind your eyes.
translation: 你的眼后隐隐作痛。

original: A sudden shooting pain strikes your chest. After a moment of agony it passes... for now.
translation: 突然你胸口一阵剧痛。疼痛不久就消失了……暂时如此。

original: You double over in pain as you are suddenly beset by painful cramps.
translation: 腹部突然的剧痛使你疼得蜷缩起来。

original: Alerted by a growing feeling of itchiness, you are appalled to notice the appearance of a bright red rash on your body.
translation: 随着身体越来越痒，你惊骇地发现身上出现了许多红疹。

original: Sharp pains in your abdomen cause you to clutch at your stomach.
translation: 腹部的一阵剧痛让你抓紧了你的肚子。

original: As the day drags on, seemingly never ending, you can barely keep your eyes open. You seem to have no energy at all.
translation: 日子一天天过去，好似永不停休。你几乎睁不开双眼了。你似乎完全没有一丝精神。

original: Although you can't quite put your finger on what's wrong, you don't feel quite right.
translation: 虽然你不能肯定哪里出了问题，但你觉得不太对。

original: Minor Symptom Treatment
translation: 轻微的病症治疗

original: Medical treatment can reduce or remove the effects of illnesses.
translation: 医疗可以减轻或移除疾病的影响。

original: Decent Symptom Treatment
translation: 有效的病症治疗

original: Medical treatment can reduce or remove the effects of illnesses.
translation: 医疗可以减轻或移除疾病的影响。

original: Good Symptom Treatment
translation: 良好的病症治疗

original: Medical treatment can reduce or remove the effects of illnesses.
translation: 医疗可以减轻或移除疾病的影响。

original: Excellent Symptom Treatment
translation: 极佳的病症治疗

original: Medical treatment can reduce or remove the effects of illnesses.
translation: 医疗可以减轻或移除疾病的影响。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] affixed a small bag filled with oats to your face and advised you to eat them all.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把一小袋燕麦贴到你面前，建议你把它吃光。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] rubbed a liniment all over your body. After an initially painful warmth, it felt quite soothing.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]用药剂擦边了你的全身。起初又疼又热，但之后感觉非常舒适。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] turned [FromFrom.GetHerHis] back and suddenly kicked you full in the chest.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把[FromFrom.GetHerHis]背后对着你，然后突然一脚踹在你的胸口。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] took you out to a meadow and had you roll on your back in the grass.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]带你到一个草场，让你在草地上打滚。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] spent several hours brushing your hair, it was very relaxing.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]用了几小时来梳理你的头发，真是令人惬意。

original: Remaining Food
translation: 剩余的食物

original: Life in Seclusion isn't so bad.
translation: 隔离的日子不是很糟。

original: After finishing a hearty breakfast you belch contentedly and remark upon your foresightedness in ensuring [Root.Capital.GetName]'s larders were well stocked. However, as soon as the words leave your lips you notice the suddenly panicked look on your servant's face. "My [Root.GetTitle], you just ate the very last pickled boar's head, and almost all our other food stocks are nearing exhaustion. Furthermore-". Your servant continues to drone on, but you are too aghast to listen. No more pickled boar's heads?!
translation: 吃过丰盛的早餐后，你满足地打了个嗝，然后说起自己颇具先见之明，确保了[Root.Capital.GetName]粮仓的存货丰富。然而话音刚落，你就注意到仆人的脸上露出骇人的表情。「我的[Root.GetTitle]，你刚刚把最后的盐渍野猪头吃掉了，其他的粮仓也快空了。不仅如此——」你的仆人还在说，但你已经不敢再听下去了。没有盐渍野猪头了？

original: My garden can provide some food
translation: 我的花园可以提供一些食物

original: This isn't good
translation: 这可不妙

original: You have searched [Root.Capital.GetName] from top to bottom and have come to realize there really are no more pickled boar's heads. Not only that, but all other food stocks are nearing exhaustion. Your servant really should have mentioned that!
translation: 你把[Root.Capital.GetName]搜了个底朝天，发现真的连一点盐渍野猪头都没有了。不仅如此，其他粮仓也快空了。你的仆人真应该早点说这件事！

original: I'll implement a system of rationing!
translation: 我将建立定量配给的制度！

original: I'll convince people they don't need food!
translation: 我会使人们明白他们不需要食物！

original: I should eat my fill while I still can...
translation: 趁现在还有东西吃，我应该吃掉自己的那份供应……

original: Tough times ahead for us all.
translation: 我们所有人都将艰难度日。

original: With food supplies dwindling, it has been brought to your attention that the basements of [Root.Capital.GetName] contain a large number of rats which could be caught and eaten...
translation: 随着食物供应逐渐减少，你觉得[Root.Capital.GetName]的地下室还居住着一大堆老鼠，也许可以抓它们来吃……

original: Yum!
translation: 真香！

original: Ugh, never!
translation: 呃，绝不！

original: Disaster! [Root.Capital.GetName]'s rats have managed to find your meager remaining food supplies and have eaten much of what remained.
translation: 灾难发生了！[Root.Capital.GetName]的老鼠成功找到了你所剩不多的食物，并且把大部分剩下的食物都吃了。

original: A sudden clatter sends you running to check on your food supplies. You arrive at the storeroom just in time to see [target_greedy_courtier.GetTitledFirstName] emerge, wiping at [target_greedy_courtier.GetHerHis] mouth.
translation: 突如其来的撞击声让你冲去检查你的食物补给。你到达储藏室时正好看见[target_greedy_courtier.GetTitledFirstName]从里面冒出头来，一边还擦着[target_greedy_courtier.GetHerHis]嘴。

original: How could you do this, [target_greedy_courtier.GetFirstName]?
translation: 你怎么能做出这种事，[target_greedy_courtier.GetFirstName]？

original: You've outstayed your welcome, [target_greedy_courtier.GetFirstName]!
translation: 你在这呆得太久了，[target_greedy_courtier.GetFirstName]！

original: As your stomach groans and gurgles, you try to remember when you last had a decent meal. It has gotten to the point when you can hardly look at a courtier without wondering how they would taste. Probably delicious...
translation: 听到你胃部咕咕叫的呻吟，你努力回想自己上次吃到的还过得去的那餐。现在你已经饿到当你看见一名廷臣时，很难不去猜测他们尝起来会是什么味道的程度了。也许很美味……

original: Looks like meat is back on the menu!
translation: 看来肉又回到菜单上了！

original: No, it's wrong!
translation: 不行，这是错的！

original: Your food supplies are exhausted. While you may be able to scavenge enough food to survive for a while longer, staying in [Root.Capital.GetName] is clearly not a long term solution.
translation: 你的食物已经吃完了。尽管你也许能从垃圾里找出一些吃的，从而活得久一点，但继续留在[Root.Capital.GetName]很明显算不上一个长远的打算。

original: It's no picnic out there either
translation: 这也不是一件轻松的事

original: Trivial Food Shortage
translation: 些许食物短缺

original: Minor Food Shortage
translation: 轻度食物短缺

original: Food Shortage
translation: 食物短缺

original: Starving!
translation: 饥饿！

original: Greedy
translation: 贪婪

original: This character is suffering slightly due to a lack of food.
translation: 这名角色因食物短缺而稍微受苦。

original: This character is suffering due to a lack of food.
translation: 这名角色因食物短缺而受苦。

original: This character is suffering heavily due to a lack of food.
translation: 这名角色因食物短缺而严重受苦。

original: This character is starving.
translation: 这名角色快饿死了。

original: This character has eaten more than their fair share of food.
translation: 这名角色吃下的食物比他分到的食物要多。

original: Sick House
translation: 病患小屋

original: A basic building to house the sick.
translation: 容纳病患的基础建筑。

original: Expanded Sick House
translation: 扩展病患小屋

original: An expanded building to house more patients.
translation: 容纳更多病人的扩展建筑。

original: Separated Wards
translation: 隔离病房

original: Treatment can be made more efficient by separating the sick based on their type of ailment.
translation: 如果根据疾病的种类将病患隔离，治疗可更为有效。

original: Extended Wards
translation: 扩展病房

original: Larger wards to treat more patients.
translation: 更大的病房，可治疗更多病人。

original: Extensive Hospital Complex
translation: 大型医院建筑群

original: An extensive project of rebuilding to expand and rationalize the layout of the hospital.
translation: 大兴土木，重建和扩建医院，并合理安排布局。

original: Leper Colony
translation: 麻风病人隔离区

original: By isolating the sick the general population feels safer. Out of sight, out of mind.
translation: 将病患分隔开，大众会感到更安全。眼不见为净。

original: Odin, hear my call!
translation: 奥丁，请听取我的呼唤！

original: Valhalla Bound
translation: 瓦尔哈拉之约

original: By winning great victories for the Norse faith this character is assured a place at Odin's table in Valhalla!
translation: 这个角色为诺斯信仰赢得了无数伟大的胜利，一定能在瓦尔哈拉中的奥丁餐桌上获得一个席位！

original: Ravager
translation: 劫掠者

original: Sea King
translation: 海盗王

original: This character is known and feared far and wide. Wherever salt water can be found, there is terror of the Sea King.
translation: 这名角色的恐怖声名连遥远之地都有所耳闻。凡见咸水之处，皆有对海盗之王的恐惧。

original: Few alive have a more fearsome reputation than you. Where many Vikings merely raid you destroy entire towns and castles, leaving none alive besides one to spread the tale of [Root.GetFirstName] the Ravager.
translation: 少有在世的人具有比你更恐怖的声名。其他维京海盗仅仅只是劫掠，你却摧毁整个市镇和城堡，只留下一个幸存者去传播劫掠者[Root.GetFirstName]的威名。

original: There's yet more work to be done.
translation: 还有更多工作要做。

original: I do not sow.
translation: 我不耕种。

original: Although not especially blessed, we hope [GetFirstName] will find peace in the afterlife
translation: 虽然并非特别有福，我们仍祝福[GetFirstName]在死后获得安宁

original: Although not especially blessed, we hope [GetFirstName] will find peace in the afterlife
translation: 虽然并非特别有福，我们仍祝福[GetFirstName]在死后获得安宁

original: Well-known to be prone to carnal sins, [GetSheHe] was often unfaithful to [GetHerHis] [GetHusbandWifeOpp]. A wicked [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] will surely pay for [GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
translation: [GetSheHe]以特别容易堕入肉欲的罪恶而声名在外，生前常常不能对[GetHerHis][GetHusbandWifeOpp]忠贞。作为一个堕落的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]定然会在死后为[GetHerHis]罪付出代价

original: A Greedy [GetManWoman], [GetSheHe] often remarked on the need to tax [GetHerHis] people into space. A wicked [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] will surely pay for [GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
translation: [GetSheHe]是一个贪婪的[GetManWoman]，生前常常强调把[GetHerHis]人民课税到天上的需要。作为一个堕落的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]定然会在死后为[GetHerHis]罪付出代价

original: Prone to Sloth, [GetSheHe] never did anything [GetSheHe] did not have to. A wicked [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] will surely pay for [GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
translation: [GetSheHe]太容易犯懒，生前从不做任何事情，除非是[GetSheHe]不得不做的。作为一个堕落的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]定然会在死后为[GetHerHis]罪付出代价

original: Ever Envious, [GetSheHe] always wanted what other people had. A wicked [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] will surely pay for [GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
translation: [GetSheHe]嫉妒永无止尽，生前总想要获得其他人拥有的东西。作为一个堕落的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]定然会在死后为[GetHerHis]罪付出代价

original: A Wroth [GetManWoman], people feared to cross [GetHerHim] - or even bring bad news. A wicked [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] will surely pay for [GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
translation: 易怒的[GetManWoman]，人们害怕遇到[GetHerHim]——更不用说带来坏消息了。作为一个堕落的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]定然会在死后为[GetHerHis]罪付出代价

original: Guilty of the sin of Pride, [GetSheHe] wanted everyone to know of [GetHerHis] greatness. A wicked [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] will surely pay for [GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
translation: [GetSheHe]犯下了骄傲的罪孽，生前总希望所有人知道[GetHerHis]伟大。作为一个堕落的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]定然会在死后为[GetHerHis]罪付出代价

original: A Chaste [GetManWoman], [GetHerHis] honor was beyond refute. A godly [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] is with [Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
translation: 作为一位忠贞的[GetManWoman]，[GetHerHis]荣誉无可置疑。作为一位虔诚敬神的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]现在定然已到了[Religion.GetRandomGodName]身边

original: Ever Temperate, [GetSheHe] never let [GetHerHis] base urges get the better of [GetHerHim]. A godly [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] is with [Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
translation: [GetSheHe]始终节制自己，从未让[GetHerHis]低等欲望控制[GetHerHim]。作为一位虔诚敬神的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]现在定然已到了[Religion.GetRandomGodName]身边

original: Well-known to be Charitable, [GetSheHe] freely gave money to [GetHerHis] friends and family. A godly [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] is with [Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
translation: 人皆知其慷慨，[GetSheHe]生前慷慨地给予[GetHerHis]亲朋好友钱财。作为一位虔诚敬神的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]现在定然已到了[Religion.GetRandomGodName]身边

original: A shining example of Diligence, [GetHerHis] duty was never neglected. A godly [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] is with [Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
translation: 身为勤奋的光辉模范，[GetHerHis]职责从未受忽视。作为一位虔诚敬神的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]现在定然已到了[Religion.GetRandomGodName]身边

original: Known to be Kind, few had a bad word to say about [GetHerHim]. A godly [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] is with [Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
translation: 人皆知其仁慈，少有恶言论及[GetHerHim]。作为一位虔诚敬神的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]现在定然已到了[Religion.GetRandomGodName]身边

original: Always Patient, [GetSheHe] never lost [GetHerHis] temper. A godly [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] is with [Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
translation: [GetSheHe]始终耐心，情绪从不失控。作为一位虔诚敬神的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]现在定然已到了[Religion.GetRandomGodName]身边

original: A humble [GetManWoman], [GetSheHe] never wanted anyone to make a fuss over [GetHerHis] accomplishments. A godly [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] is with [Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
translation: [GetSheHe]是一位谦卑的[GetManWoman]，从不让任何人吹捧[GetHerHis]成就。作为一位虔诚敬神的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]现在定然已到了[Religion.GetRandomGodName]身边

original: The peasants in my realm are becoming convinced that Jews are behind the recent epidemic. I'm under increasing pressure from some to condemn the Jews, and from others to protect them.
translation: 我领地内的农民开始相信犹太人是最近瘟疫的幕后黑手。一些人要求谴责犹太人，另一些人则希望保护他们，两方面给我的压力都越来越大。

original: Something must be done!
translation: 必须做些什么！

original: ...but I don't really care
translation: ……但我真的不在乎

original: There is unrest in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], the peasants are up in arms over the possibility that the Jews caused the recent epidemic there. If left unchecked they may take matters into their own hands and start killing them.
translation: [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]爆发了骚乱，农民集体武装起来，只因为犹太人有可能造成了近来在那暴发的瘟疫。如果放任不管，他们或许能控制一切，并开始屠杀犹太人。

original: Only followers of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] could believe that!
translation: 只有[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]的追随者才会相信这些！

original: The Jews did cause it, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] has told me!
translation: 犹太人确实造成了瘟疫，这可是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]告诉我的！

original: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. I have heard of the trouble in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] and I must ask that you ensure the safety of the Jews, they are not to blame for the Epidemics.
translation: 致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，来自[From.GetTitledFirstName]。我已听闻[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的麻烦，而我必须要求你保障犹太人的安全，不能将瘟疫归咎于他们。

original: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. I have heard of the trouble in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and I fully agree that the Jews are to blame for your problems. Drive them out or kill them, I care not.
translation: 致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，来自[From.GetTitledFirstName]。我已听闻[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的麻烦，而我完全同意犹太人就是你的问题的根源。将他们驱逐出境或者杀掉吧，我不在乎。

original: [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has made it clear he does not want the Jews to be blamed for these diseases, but not everyone is listening to him. I still need to decide what to do.
translation: [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]已明确表示他不希望将疾病归咎于犹太人，但并非所有人都会听从他。我仍需自己决定如何行动。

original: Although [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has joined the condemnation of the Jews, I am still not sure it is the right thing to do. I am [Root.GetTitle] here after all.
translation: 尽管[Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]也加入了谴责犹太人的行列，我仍不清楚这样做是否正确。但不论如何，我是这里的[Root.GetTitle]。

original: No, the Jews are not to blame.
translation: 不行，犹太人是无辜的。

original: The Jews did this, expel them!
translation: 就是犹太人干的，驱逐他们！

original: All realm provinces
translation: 所有领地内的省份

original: There are rumors that a pogrom is going to take place in [pogrom_city_target.GetName], despite my decree that the Jews are not to blame for the epidemic.
translation: 有传言说，[pogrom_city_target.GetName]将发生一场大屠杀，尽管我已下令不可将瘟疫归咎于犹太人。

original: There are rumors that a pogrom is going to take place in a nearby village, despite my decree that the Jews are not to blame for the epidemic.
translation: 有传言说，附近的村庄将发生一场大屠杀，尽管我已下令不可将瘟疫归咎于犹太人。

original: Send troops to stop them.
translation: 派军队去阻止他们。

original: Let them do it.
translation: 随他们去吧。

original: I am pleased to hear that after a period of peace and shrewd management the county of [From.GetName] is doing very well. People are happy and the tax collectors are reporting record intakes.
translation: 我很高兴地听闻，经过一段时期的和平局势与严明管理，省份[From.GetName]发展良好。人民安居乐业，税收官员也汇报了收入新纪录。

original: [From.GetName] prospers!
translation: [From.GetName]正在繁荣发展！

original: Prospering
translation: 繁荣

original: Flourishing
translation: 兴旺

original: Booming
translation: 昌盛

original: As commerce in [Root.GetName] grows, a number of Jewish merchants have requested permission to settle their families in one of the towns so they can manage their business more effectively. This would likely lead to increased tax revenues, but local religious authorities will disapprove.
translation: 随着[Root.GetName]的商业增长，一些犹太商人要求获得许可，以便他们的家族定居在其中一个市镇，更好的管理他们的业务。这样做很可能获得更多税收，但当地宗教当局会不满意。

original: Invite them in!
translation: 邀请他们进来！

original: Begone!
translation: 走开！

original: As the prosperity of [Root.GetName] increases, land which was previously considered marginal is increasing in value. With the proper incentives, it should be possible to clear enough land to found a new holding upon.
translation: 随着[Root.GetName]的繁荣继续增长，过去被视为边角废料的土地价值得到提升。如果有适当的激励，有可能清理出建设新地产所需的土地。

original: I know a good deal when I see one!
translation: 我一看就知道这是笔好买卖！

original: It's too expensive
translation: 太贵了！

original: The workshops of [Root.GetName] have a need for large numbers of new workers. By offering a bonus, it would be possible to make sure these workers are [Root.Holder.Culture.GetName].
translation: [Root.GetName]的工坊需要很多新工人。如果提供福利，有可能保证这些工人都是[Root.Holder.Culture.GetName]人。

original: Make it so
translation: 就这么办

original: Leave it to chance
translation: 听任命运，顺其自然

original: People are flocking to [Root.GetName], and they should know your name! By constructing a great monument there, you can be assured that everyone will know who to credit.
translation: 人民涌向[Root.GetName]，他们应该知道你的名字！若建造一座巨大的纪念碑，你可以确信所有人都知道他们应该感谢谁。

original: I am great!
translation: 我很了不起！

original: Don't make a fuss
translation: 别大惊小怪

original: Due to the great number of merchant ships docking in the ports of [Root.GetName], there is increased demand for expanded harbor space. Of course, larger harbors could also service more warships...
translation: 由于大量商船停靠在[Root.GetName]的码头，扩展港口空间的需求不断增长。当然了，更大的港口也能为更多战船服务……

original: Indeed they could!
translation: 他们还真做得到！

original: [Root.Owner.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is a land power!
translation: [Root.Owner.PrimaryTitle.GetName]是陆地霸权！

original: The prosperity of [Root.GetName] has attracted a number of scholars who are now looking for a patron. Organizing them into a foundation for learning could result in useful new discoveries.
translation: [Root.GetName]的繁荣吸引了许多寻找赞助人的学者。将他们组织起来成立一个学术团体可以促进新的实用发现。

original: Knowledge is power!
translation: 知识就是力量！

original: Money is power!
translation: 金钱才是力量！

original: The prosperity of [Root.GetName] has prompted an increasing desire for a Great Library in the country so that learned people there can always find entertainment.
translation: [Root.GetName]的繁荣引出了不断增长的精神需求，一座大图书馆可以让有学识的人娱乐灵魂。

original: As people flock to [Root.GetName], so too do the clergy. In fact, so many have arrived that with a donation to get them started, [Root.GetName] could become a notable center of worship.
translation: 随着人们涌向[Root.GetName]，神职人员也随之而来。事实上，来的人非常多，如果有捐款作为启动资金，[Root.GetName]可以成为一个引人注目的崇拜中心。

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] wills it!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]的意志！

original: Will [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] pay for it?
translation: 能让[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]付钱吗？

original: Jewish Settlement
translation: 犹太定居点

original: Glorious Monument
translation: 光荣的丰碑

original: Merchant Harbor
translation: 商贾避风港

original: Scholar's Foundation
translation: 学者基金会

original: Great Library
translation: 大图书馆

original: Center of Worship
translation: 崇拜的中心

original: Some buffoon has built a big statue of themselves here. Tearing it down and selling the gold-plating should fetch a few coins.
translation: 愚民们在这里建造了一个巨大的雕像。拆了它，并且把它的镀金层拿去卖了，应该能得到几枚硬币。

original: Enforcing Realm Peace will end all internal wars between your direct vassals. The peace will take effect 3 months after it has been decreed, and will last for five years. Use this ability to keep your vassals from growing too strong within your realm.
translation: 执行全境和平将强制结束你直属封臣之间的所有战争。和平会在命令颁布三个月后生效，并持续五年。通过使用这个权力，可以让封臣不会在你的领地内过于壮大。

original: the Nun
translation: 修女

original: was mauled to death by a lion on the order of $KILLER$
translation: 因$KILLER$的命令被狮子撕成碎片

original: was mauled to death by a lion
translation: 被狮子撕成碎片

original: Your adorable cat purrs softly when you are close and is always there to comfort you and keep you warm.
translation: 你可爱的猫咪在你走近时轻柔地咕噜咕噜叫唤，它总是待在你身边，让你宽慰和温暖。

original: Devour Imprisoned
translation: 吃掉囚徒

original: As [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is your prisoner you can do as you please with [Root.GetHerHim]. Why not invite [Root.GetHerHim] to dinner...
translation: 因为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]是你的囚犯，你可以随你高兴对[Root.GetHerHim]做任何事情。何不邀请[Root.GetHerHim]赴宴……

original: was voraciously devoured by $KILLER$
translation: 被$KILLER$大口吞食

original: was devoured
translation: 被吞食

original: By consuming the very life force of [From.GetTitledFirstName], I've also gained a part of [From.GetHerHis] personality and strength!
translation: 吸收了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的生命之力，我亦获得了[From.GetHerHis]一部分人格和力量！

original: Unlimited power!
translation: 无限的力量！

original: I've just received word that the mad cannibal [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has eaten my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]! By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]! How could one do such a thing?!
translation: 我刚收到消息，疯狂的食人者[FromFrom.GetTitledName]吃掉了我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]！[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]啊！这是人干的事？

original: This is outrageous!
translation: 是可忍孰不可忍！

original: Crazy Cannibal
translation: 疯狂的食人者

original: This depraved character is known to be a vicious cannibal and doesn't even try to hide it!
translation: 这个堕落的角色被认为是一个恶毒的食人魔，这家伙甚至不试图隐藏事实！

original: §BWay of Life:§! AI Intrigue
translation: §B「生活之道」：§! AI密谋

original: AI rulers with the Intrigue Focus will scheme and attempt to kidnap or murder other characters.
translation: AI统治者若开启密谋生活重心，他们会进行阴谋并尝试绑架或谋杀其他角色。

original: AI rulers will never pick the Intrigue Focus.
translation: AI统治者绝不会选择密谋生活重心

original: $VICTIM|Y$ has $SYMPTOM|Y$
translation: $VICTIM|Y$患有$SYMPTOM|Y$

original: $VICTIM|Y$ doesn't have $SYMPTOM|Y$
translation: $VICTIM|Y$没有$SYMPTOM|Y$

original: $VICTIM|Y$ has any symptom
translation: $VICTIM|Y$有病症

original: $VICTIM|Y$ doesn't have any symptom
translation: $VICTIM|Y$没有任何病症

original: Is currently suffering epidemics of:
translation: 正在肆虐的瘟疫：

original: Has $VALUE|G$% epidemics resistance
translation: 有$VALUE|G$%的瘟疫抗性

original: Might get the following diseases:
translation: 可能感染下列疾病：

original: - $VALUE|Y$ chances of getting $DISEASE|Y$
translation: 感染$DISEASE|Y$的几率 - $VALUE|Y$

original: §YEpidemics§!
translation: §Y瘟疫§!

original: The world is currently ravaged by $VALUE|Y$ epidemics, including $MAJOR|R$ MAJOR epidemics.
translation: 世界正受到$VALUE|Y$个瘟疫肆虐，包括$MAJOR|R$主要瘟疫。

original: The world is currently ravaged by $MAJOR|R$ MAJOR epidemics.
translation: 世界正受$MAJOR|R$主要瘟疫肆虐。

original: The world is currently ravaged by $VALUE|Y$ epidemics.
translation: 世界正受$VALUE|Y$个瘟疫肆虐。

original: Your own realm is ravaged by $MAJOR|R$ MAJOR epidemics and $MINOR|Y$ others
translation: 你的领地正受$MAJOR|R$主要瘟疫和$MINOR|Y$其他瘟疫肆虐

original: Your own realm is ravaged by $MAJOR|R$ MAJOR epidemics
translation: 你的领地正受$MAJOR|R$主要瘟疫肆虐

original: Your own realm is ravaged by $MINOR|Y$ epidemics
translation: 你的领地正受$MINOR|Y$瘟疫肆虐

original: The epidemics currently in your realm:
translation: 现在在你领地内的瘟疫：

original: - $DISEASE$ started in $PROVINCE|Y$ in $START_DATE|Y$
translation: - $DISEASE$开始于$PROVINCE|Y$，$START_DATE|Y$

original: Other epidemics in the world:
translation: 世界其他瘟疫：

original: Epidemics currently ravaging  the world:
translation: 全世界正在肆虐的瘟疫：

original: $VICTIM|Y$ has less than $VALUE$ symptom(s)
translation: $VICTIM|Y$有少于$VALUE$个病症

original: $VICTIM|Y$ has $VALUE$ symptom(s) or more
translation: $VICTIM|Y$有$VALUE$个或以上病症

original: §YEpidemics§!
translation: §Y瘟疫地图§!

original: This map mode shows all counties ravaged by epidemics.
translation: 该地图模式展示所有受瘟疫肆虐的省份。

original: The game has lasted less than $VALUE|Y$ years
translation: 此局游戏持续时间少于$VALUE|Y$年

original: The game has lasted at least $VALUE|Y$ years
translation: 此局游戏持续时间至少$VALUE|Y$年

original: No Region
translation: 无区域

original: Alliance-Breaker
translation: 背盟者

original: Alliance-Breaker
translation: 背盟者

original: Untrustworthy §YAlliance-Breaker§!
translation: 靠不住的§Y背盟者§!

original: Hospital
translation: 医院

original: Hospital of $PROV$
translation: $PROV$的医院

original: Any Hospital
translation: 任何医院

original: Hospital technology is available, or the Knights Hospitalier are present in the county
translation: 医院科技可用，或医院骑士团存在于此省份

original: Hospital Tax
translation: 医院税

original: Hospital Levy Size
translation: 医院征召兵规模

original: Hospital Level
translation: 医院等级

original: Hospitals can be built in all counties you control, if you have the required technology or the Knights Hospitaliers are present in the county. Hospitals cost §Y$COST$§! to construct. Hospitals reduce the chance of provinces getting infected during epidemics, and also reduce the effects of depopulation.
translation: 医院可以建造在你控制的任意省份上，只要你有所需的科技或医院骑士团存在于省份内。医院需要§Y$COST$§!去建造。医院减少省份在瘟疫流行期间受感染的概率，并缓解人口减少的效果。

original: The §YHospital Level§! in the county is less than $VALUE|Y$
translation: §Y医院等级§!在此省份低于$VALUE|Y$

original: The §YHospital Level§! in the county is at least $VALUE|Y$
translation: §Y医院等级§!在此省份至少有$VALUE|Y$

original: This county has a §YHospital Level§! of $VALUE|G$
translation: 此省份的§Y医院等级§!是$VALUE|G$

original: This county has a §YDisease Defense§! value inferior to $VALUE|Y$
translation: 此省份的§Y防疫能力§!值低于$VALUE|Y$

original: This county has a §YDisease Defense§! value at least equal to $VALUE|Y$
translation: 此省份的§Y防疫能力§!值至少等于$VALUE|Y$

original: Achievements: §GEnabled§!
translation: 成就：§G开启§!

original: Achievements: §RDisabled§!
translation: 成就： §R关闭§!

original: Game Rules
translation: 游戏规则

original: Shattered Retreat
translation: 溃退

original: §BSunset Invasion:§! Aztec Invasion
translation: §B「日落入侵」：§!阿兹特克入侵

original: Defensive Pacts
translation: 共同防御协定

original: On
translation: 启用

original: Off
translation: 关闭

original: 13th Century
translation: 13世纪

original: Random
translation: 随机

original: Gender Equality
translation: 性别平等

original: Default
translation: 默认

original: Historical
translation: 历史

original: All
translation: 所有

original: Mongol Invasion
translation: 蒙古入侵

original: Raiding
translation: 劫掠

original: Unrestricted
translation: 无限制

original: §BThe Reaper's Due:§! Major Epidemics
translation: §B「死神索命」：§!大型瘟疫

original: Dynamic
translation: 动态

original: Deadly
translation: 致命

original: Supernatural Events
translation: 超自然事件

original: Adventurers
translation: 冒险者

original: Normal
translation: 普通

original: Rare
translation: 稀有

original: None
translation: 无

original: Provincial Revolts
translation: 省份叛乱

original: Regencies
translation: 摄政

original: Dynamic De Jure Drift
translation: 动态法理转移

original: §BCharlemagne:§! Custom Realms
translation: §B「查理曼」：§!自定义国家

original: Diplomatic Range
translation: 外交距离

original: §RThis setting disables achievements!§!
translation: §R此项设置将导致成就无效！§!

original: Armies will try to retreat into friendly or otherwise safe territory. Retreating armies cannot be engaged by enemy forces. Movement Speed and Morale Regain Rate is increased for retreating armies.
translation: 军队将尽力撤退至友方或其他安全的地区。正在撤退的军队将不会与敌军交战。撤退中的军队移动速度和士气回复速率会增加。

original: Retreating armies will move into a neighboring county. This tends to make the game easier.
translation: 撤退中的军队会移动至相邻的省份，这一般会使得游戏变得更简单。

original: The Aztec Invasion will occur at the very earliest in the 13th century.
translation: 阿兹特克入侵最早会在13世纪发生。

original: The Aztec Invasion will occur at a random date, though at the earliest 50 years after the game is started.
translation: 阿兹特克入侵会在游戏开始后随机发生，但最早在游戏开始50年后。

original: The Aztec Invasion will not occur.
translation: 阿兹特克入侵将不会发生。

original: Characters are allowed to join Defensive Pacts against realms who are Threatening. If a member is attacked by the target, all other members will defend them.
translation: 角色可以加入防御协定以对抗极具威胁的势力。如果盟约内的一名成员遭到目标的进攻，其他成员将加入战争一同对抗。

original: Characters are not allowed to join Defensive Pacts against realms who are Threatening. This tends to make the game easier.
translation: 角色将不能加入共同防御协定以对抗极具威胁的势力。这一般会使得游戏更为简单。

original: The various Gender Laws are enabled as per default. Specific cultures and religions may allow/disallow Gender Laws. The Conclave 'Status of Women' set of laws is available.
translation: 各种性别法是否可选将与默认一致，一些特定的文化与信仰或许会允许或禁止某些性别法。御前会议DLC中的「女性地位」系列法案都可用。

original: The various Gender Laws are enabled as per default. Specific cultures and religions may allow/disallow Gender Laws. The Conclave 'Status of Women' set of laws is not available.
translation: 各种性别法是否可选将与默认一致，一些特定的文化与信仰或许会允许或禁止某些性别法。御前会议DLC中的「女性地位」系列法案都将禁用。

original: The game will play as if the 'Status of Women' law would be maxed out for everyone. The Conclave 'Status of Women' set of laws is unavailable for everyone.
translation: 游戏中，「女性地位」法将对所有人开启至最大，而御前会议DLC中的「女性地位」系列法案对所有人都不可用。

original: The Mongol Horde will invade between the years of 1210 and 1218.
translation: 蒙古部落将于1210至1218年间发动入侵。

original: The Mongol Horde will invade at a random date, though at the earliest 50 years after the game is started.
translation: 蒙古部落将于随机的日期发动入侵，但最早会在游戏开始50年后。

original: The Mongol Horde will not invade, but it can still be formed through the decision.
translation: 蒙古部落将不会发动入侵，但这依旧可以通过选择决议来开启。

original: A character can raid if the Government, Culture and/or Religion of the character allows it.
translation: 在政体、文化和/或信仰允许的情况下，角色可以发动劫掠。

original: All characters can raid, regardless of Government, Culture and/or Religion.
translation: 所有角色都能发动劫掠，不受政体、文化和/或信仰的限制。

original: No character is allowed to raid, with the sole exception of Raiding Adventurers. §RWARNING: This also prevents Viking raids!§!
translation: 所有角色都不能发动掠夺，唯一的例外即是劫掠冒险者。§R警告：这将同样阻止维京入侵！§!

original: The Bubonic Plague will appear frequently and be extraordinarily deadly. §RWARNING: This setting is not recommended for a normal game!§!
translation: 腺鼠疫将频繁出现并伴有极高的致死性。§R警告：常规游戏不推荐选择本项！§!

original: Events that can be interpreted as supernatural may appear during the game.
translation: 可被视为超自然现象的事件会出现在游戏中。

original: No events that can be interpreted as supernatural may appear during the game.
translation: 可被视为超自然现象的事件不会出现在游戏中。

original: Flanders is part of the Holy Roman Empire's De Jure territory.
translation: 佛兰德斯是神圣罗马帝国的法理领土。

original: Claimant and Raiding Adventurers will appear as per default.
translation: 默认会出现宣称者与劫掠冒险者。

original: Claimant and Raiding Adventurers will appear with less frequency.
translation: 宣称者与劫掠冒险者的出现频率会下降。

original: No Claimant or Raiding Adventurers will appear, with the exception of landless Nomads and specific event-spawned Adventurers.
translation: 除了没有领地的游牧民和特殊事件产生的冒险者之外，宣称者与劫掠冒险者将不会出现。

original: Random Provincial Revolts will occur at a normal rate.
translation: 随机省份叛乱将以正常的频率暴发。

original: Random Provincial Revolts will be less frequent.
translation: 随机省份叛乱将以较低的频率暴发。

original: Random Provincial Revolts will be disabled.
translation: 禁止随机省份叛乱。

original: Underage, incapable or otherwise unavailable characters will be assigned a Regent.
translation: 未成年、无能或其他不能自主行动的角色将被分配一名摄政。

original: Underage, incapable or otherwise unavailable characters will not be assigned a Regent.
translation: 未成年、无能或其他不能自主行动的角色将不会被分配摄政。

original: The dynamic De Jure drift of titles is allowed and unrestricted.
translation: 头衔的动态法理转移将会发生且不受限制。

original: The dynamic De Jure drift of titles is allowed, but restricted. Drift can only happen if titles border each other.
translation: 头衔的动态法理转移将会发生，但会受到限制。这一转移仅在头衔的领地相互接壤时发生。

original: Dynamic De Jure drift is disabled.
translation: 头衔的动态法理转移将不会发生。

original: The creation of custom non-historical Kingdoms and Empires is allowed.
translation: 可以创建历史上并不存在的自定义王国及帝国。

original: The creation of custom non-historical Kingdoms and Empires is disallowed.
translation: 不可创建历史上并不存在的自定义王国及帝国。

original: Diplomatic Range will be enforced, limiting the distance in which characters might interact.
translation: 执行外交范围限制，限制角色可以互动的距离。

original: Diplomatic Range will not be enforced, allowing characters to interact fully regardless of their distance to each other.
translation: 不执行外交范围限制，角色可以完全无视距离地与他人互动。

original: Game Rule §Y$RULE$§! has value: §Y$OPTION$§!\n
translation: 游戏规则§Y$RULE$§!已设为：§Y$OPTION$§!\n

original: Game Rule §Y$RULE$§! doesn't have value: §Y$OPTION$§!\n
translation: 游戏规则§Y$RULE$§!未设为：§Y$OPTION$§!\n

original: Diplomatic Range will be further restricted, halving the distance in which characters can interact.
translation: 外交行动范围将被进一步限制，角色可以互动的范围将被减半。

original: §YNomad Agitation§!
translation: §Y游牧民骚动§!

original: Nomad Agitation
translation: 游牧民骚动

original: Unless we construct a §YCastle§! or §YCity§! in the following Counties, they will revert to Nomad control on Succession:\n$LIST$
translation: 除非我们在下列的省份中建造一座§Y城堡§!或§Y城市§!，否则他们将于继承后转变回游牧民控制：\n$LIST$

original: Unless we have at least §Y$NUM$§! Buildings in the Tribal Holdings of the following Counties, they will revert to Nomad control on Succession:\n$LIST$
translation: 除非我们在下列各省份的部落地产中拥有至少§Y$NUM$§!座建筑，否则其将于继承后转变回游牧民控制：\n$LIST$

original: §RNo Valid Candidates§!
translation: §R没有合适的候选人§!

original: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§!'s Rival
translation: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§!的仇敌

original: Open
translation: 开启

original: Interfaith Marriages
translation: 跨信仰婚姻

original: Rulers of unrelated religions will never agree to marriage offers.
translation: 非相关宗教的统治者永远不会同意婚姻请求。

original: Even rulers of hostile and unrelated religions will consider marriage offers.
translation: 即使是敌对或非相关宗教的统治者也会考虑婚姻请求。

original: Matrilineal Marriages
translation: 入赘婚姻

original: Matrilineal Marriages are allowed if the religion and government type so permit.
translation: 在信仰和政体允许的情况下，可以发生入赘婚姻。

original: Matrilineal Marriages are never allowed. §RWARNING: As a female ruler it might be very hard to avoid Game Over and produce an heir of your own dynasty!§!
translation: 入赘婚姻永远不被允许。§R警告：§R作为一名女性统治者，生育一名本家族的继承人以避免游戏结束将变得非常困难！§!

original: Assassination
translation: 暗杀

original: Plots Only
translation: 关闭，仅可通过阴谋

original: You can only assassinate people through Plots.
translation: 你仅可通过阴谋来暗杀他人。

original: Direct Action
translation: 直接行为

original: In addition to murder plots, there is also a diplomatic action to have people assassinated.
translation: 除谋杀阴谋外，也可通过一项外交行动来暗杀他人。

original: §BWay of Life:§! AI Seduction
translation: §B「生活之道」：§!AI勾引

original: AI rulers with the Seduction Focus will attempt to seduce other characters.
translation: 开启勾引重心的AI统治者将尝试勾引其他角色。

original: AI rulers will never pick the Seduction Focus.
translation: AI统治者将永远不会选择勾引重心。

original: Defensive Attrition
translation: 防御损耗

original: Invaders suffer harsh attrition in the lands of many Pagan religions if their Military Organization tech level is too low.
translation: 若「军事组织」科技等级太低，入侵者在许多原始宗教地区将遭受严重的损耗。

original: Tribal Only
translation: 仅限部落

original: Invaders suffer harsh attrition in the lands of many Pagan religions, but only if they are also Tribal.
translation: 同为部落制的入侵者将在许多原始宗教地区遭受严重的损耗。

original: There is no special defensive attrition in Pagan lands.
translation: 在原始宗教地区将不再有特殊的防御损耗。

original: Invitation to Court
translation: 邀请至宫廷

original: Characters in other courts will only accept invitations to work for you under very special conditions.
translation: 其他宫廷的角色仅在非常特殊的情况下会接受为你服务的邀请。

original: Characters in other courts will accept invitations to come work for you if they like you enough, and don't like their current liege.
translation: 其他宫廷的角色如果足够喜欢你，且不喜欢他们现在的君主，他们就会接受你的工作邀请。

original: Vassal Republics
translation: 共和制封臣

original: You are limited to a small proportion of Republics among your vassals.
translation: 你仅能保有小比例的共和制封臣。

original: You can have any number of vassal Republics.
translation: 你可以拥有任意数量的共和制封臣。

original: Vassal Theocracies
translation: 神权制封臣

original: You are limited to a small proportion of Theocracies among your vassals.
translation: 你仅能保有小比例的神权制封臣。

original: You can have any number of vassal Theocracies.
translation: 你可以拥有任意数量的神权制封臣。

original: Pagan Reformation
translation: 原始信仰改革

original: Allowed
translation: 允许

original: Pagan religions can be reformed when controlling enough Holy Sites.
translation: 在控制了足够数量的圣地之后，原始信仰可以进行改革。

original: Disallowed
translation: 禁止

original: Pagan religions cannot be reformed.
translation: 原始信仰不可进行改革。

original: Players Only
translation: 仅限玩家

original: Only players are allowed to reform Pagan religions.
translation: 仅有玩家被允许对异教信仰进行改革。

original: §Y$CHAR$§! is NOT the multiplayer host character.\n
translation: §Y$CHAR$§!并非多人游戏玩家控制的角色。\n

original: §Y$CHAR$§! is the multiplayer host character.\n
translation: §Y$CHAR$§!是多人游戏玩家控制的角色。\n

original: The current game version is supported by the active mods.\n
translation: 当前游戏版本受启用的mod支持。\n

original: The current game version is NOT supported by the active mods.\n
translation: 当前游戏版本不受启用的mod支持。\n

original: Monthly prestige gain less than $VALUE|Y$.
translation: 每月获得的威望少于$VALUE|Y$。

original: Monthly prestige gain greater than $VALUE|Y$.
translation: 每月获得的威望多于$VALUE|Y$。

original: Monthly piety gain less than $VALUE|Y$.
translation: 每月获得的虔诚少于$VALUE|Y$。

original: Monthly piety gain greater than $VALUE|Y$.
translation: 每月获得的虔诚多于$VALUE|Y$。

original: $CHAR|Y$ gains $VALUE|G$ prestige.
translation: $CHAR|Y$获得$VALUE|G$威望。

original: $CHAR|Y$ loses $VALUE|R$ prestige.
translation: $CHAR|Y$失去$VALUE|R$威望。

original: $CHAR|Y$ gains $VALUE|G$ piety.
translation: $CHAR|Y$获得$VALUE|G$虔诚。

original: $CHAR|Y$ loses $VALUE|R$ piety.
translation: $CHAR|Y$失去$VALUE|R$虔诚。

original: $PENTARCH_TITLE|Y$ will be considered the Pentarch authority over $TITLE|Y$.
translation: $PENTARCH_TITLE|Y$将被视为五大牧首之一领有$TITLE|Y$。

original: $AMOUNT|Y$ instances of $MODIFIER|Y$ will be removed from $OBJECT|Y$.
translation: $AMOUNT|Y$项的$MODIFIER|Y$将自$OBJECT|Y$中移去。

original: Has at least $AMOUNT|Y$ instances of $MODIFIER|Y$.
translation: 拥有至少$AMOUNT|Y$项$MODIFIER|Y$。

original: Does NOT have $AMOUNT|Y$ or more instances of $MODIFIER|Y$.
translation: 未拥有$AMOUNT|Y$或更多的$MODIFIER|Y$。

original: Your guests enjoyed the feast, increasing §YOpinion§! by §G5§! for §Y2§! years\n
translation: 你的宾客享受了盛宴，在§Y2§!年内增加了§G5§!点§Y好感§!\n

original: Your combatants enjoyed the tournament, increasing §YOpinion§! by §G5§! for §Y5§! years\n
translation: 你的战士们享受了这次比武大会，在 §Y5§! 年内增加了 §G5§! 点§Y好感§!\n

original: Word of an Epidemic
translation: 瘟疫的传言

original: We have received news of an epidemic in [plague_outbreak_location.Realm.GetName]. The information is vague, but word is people are dying like flies and the fear of the disease is spreading as fast as the affliction itself. Furthermore, the condition is reported irreversible as well as incurable, and the scattered records of the events are worrisome. With no source of evil revealed people are turning to their gods and on each other, to protect themselves from contagion. Many call it a new plague.
translation: 我们收到了[plague_outbreak_location.Realm.GetName]爆发瘟疫的消息。这一情报很模糊，但有消息称当地尸横遍野，对疫病的恐惧在人群中散播的速度不亚疫病本身。此外，报告称疫病的情况已不可挽回且无法治愈，散乱不清的事件记录也令人感到不安。鉴于罪恶的源头未能探清，人们向神灵祈祷并开始自相残杀，以保护自己不被传染。许多人称此为一次新的大瘟疫。

original: We have received news of a horrible epidemic in [plague_outbreak_location.GetName], part of [plague_outbreak_location.Realm.GetName]. At first the rumors were thought to be exaggerated, but ever since the disorderly arrival of inconsolable refugees at our gates, it has been difficult to ignore what is happening. They tell of various symptoms, and our couriers from the area report seeing large buboes, people vomiting blood before dying, while others have their extremities turn black, rotting off their bodies. Terror is spreading as rapidly as the disease and so far there has been no mention of a cure... Only mass graves. Is this the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
translation: 我们收到消息称在[plague_outbreak_location.Realm.GetName]的[plague_outbreak_location.GetName]爆发了一场严重的瘟疫。起初的流言被认为是夸大其词，但当惶惶不可终日的难民们蜂拥抵达我们的城门口之后，我们很难再去无视正在发生的一切。他们讲述了各种各样的症状，而我们在这一地区的斥候则回报称目击了巨大的横痃，人们死前口吐鲜血，另有人手足变黑、自身体上朽落。恐惧与疾病一同迅速在人群中散播，而至今尚未听闻一例痊愈的病患……仅有无数荒冢。这是来自[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的旨意吗？

original: Our people in [plague_outbreak_location.GetName] are suffering from a frightening epidemic. Those afflicted by the disease display large buboes and high fever before vomiting blood and dying, some in the middle of the streets, healthy only a few days earlier. Dread is spreading, seeping into the heart of the realm while our healers are at a loss - there is no cure to the horror wreaking havoc among the populace. The cause of the disease is unknown and those trying to protect themselves are left to their own devices. Bodies are piling up, ridden with black and rotting limbs... The plague is at our doorstep.
translation: 我们在[plague_outbreak_location.GetName]的子民正在一场恐怖的瘟疫中煎熬。那些备受疫病之苦的人们身上出现了巨大的横痃，高烧不退，最终吐血身亡。一些人横尸街头，而仅仅数天前还康健如常。恐惧正在蔓延，深入我们领土的腹地，而我们的医生依旧对此茫然无措——对于这一肆虐民间的恐怖浩劫，没有任何的治疗手段。这场疫病爆发的原因依旧未知，而那些意图自救者逃亡他处。尸体堆积成垛，充斥着腐烂的肢体……大瘟疫已来到了我们门前。

original: All those poor people.
translation: 这些可怜人。

original: We must prepare.
translation: 我们必须未雨绸缪。

original: May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] make all heathens suffer.
translation: 愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]让所有的异教徒受苦。

original: If I get a chance to help, I will.
translation: 如果可以，我会尽力帮助。

original: Plague only gets the weak.
translation: 只有弱者才会被病死。

original: I knew this would happen!
translation: 我早知道这会发生！

original: [plague_outbreak_location.GetName] is not that far away.
translation: [plague_outbreak_location.GetName]并没有那么遥远。

original: A Horrible Affliction
translation: 可怕的苦难

original: May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] help us.
translation: 愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]拯救我们。

original: The Plague Approaches
translation: 瘟疫正在逼近

original: Mobs of new people are arriving in [bordering_province.GetName]. Most of the newly arrived are commoners fleeing the plague that has reached [infected_province.GetName] just beyond the borders of our realm. Some have lost their whole families, some are trying to protect theirs and a few are travelers or merchants that had an easier time moving. All of them seem to have witnessed indescribable horrors, hardly any will talk about it at all. The ones that do talk, warn others of the coming plague and urge them stay inside or pack their things and flee.
translation: 一批新的流民抵达了[bordering_province.GetName]，大多数都是从[infected_province.GetName]边界逃离而来的平民，听说那里开始出现了疫情。平民中一些人已经失去了所有的家人，另一些则正在努力保护他们仅存的家人。还有一少部分人是旅行者和商人，逃难起来更为方便。似乎所有人都目见了难以言喻的惨状，但几乎没人愿意谈论那些事。他们唯一愿意讲的就只有警告他人大疫将至，奉劝他们留在家里或者打包行囊逃离这里。

original: We must survive this.
translation: 我们必须渡过难关。

original: Hospitals will be needed.
translation: 我们需要医院。

original: Heathen filth are bringing the plague here!
translation: 一定是肮脏的异教徒把瘟疫带到了这里！

original: I hope we can treat these people.
translation: 我希望我们能治疗这些人。

original: Let the plague come.
translation: 瘟疫尽管来吧。

original: The plague is here to take me!
translation: 这场瘟疫是来收我的！

original: Court Physician
translation: 宫廷医师

original: Responsible for the well-being of your courtiers, the Court Physician will attempt to diagnose and cure any ailments which affect your court. Court Physicians are typically learned individuals with education in medicinal arts.
translation: 为你廷臣的福祉负责，你的宫廷医师会尝试诊断并治疗任何可能影响到你的宫廷的疾病。宫廷医师是一些专门接受了医学教育的学者。

original: Cough
translation: 咳嗽

original: This character is suffering from a bad cough - an annoying and sometimes painful ailment.
translation: 这个角色咳嗽得厉害——这是一种很烦人、有时十分痛苦的疾病。

original: Fever
translation: 发热

original: This character has a fever - a very serious condition if ignored.
translation: 这个角色正在发热——如果无视的话会变成非常糟糕的状况。

original: Diarrhea
translation: 腹泻

original: This character has diarrhea - causing dehydration which can often be fatal.
translation: 这个角色患有严重腹泻——通常这可能会导致脱水致死。

original: Vomiting
translation: 呕吐

original: This character is vomiting periodically - inability to keep food and drink down will drain their energy.
translation: 这个角色间歇性呕吐——无法正常饮食会耗尽他们的精力。

original: Chest Pains
translation: 胸痛

original: This character is experiencing chest pains - whether the reason is stress, eating too much, or something else, they may be dead before anyone knows for sure.
translation: 这个角色经常胸口疼痛——可能是由于压力太大，吃太多或是其他原因，有的人可能在搞清楚病因之前就死了。

original: Cramps
translation: 抽筋

original: This character is having cramps periodically - a very unpleasant experience and a dangerous ailment when occurring at the wrong place at the wrong time.
translation: 这个角色有间歇性的抽筋——令人非常不快的体验，如果在错误的地点错误的时间突然发病，将会非常危险。

original: Rash
translation: 皮疹

original: This character has a rash - itching and causing pain, a rash is usually considered very unattractive and could be the sign of something worse.
translation: 这个角色身患皮疹——瘙痒而且会引发疼痛，身患皮疹者被认为是不受欢迎的，且皮疹可能是一些更严重的病情的迹象。

original: Headache
translation: 头痛

original: This character has a persistent headache - a sharp pain in the head, probably nothing...
translation: 这个角色患有持续性的头痛——颅内的剧痛，也许没什么事……

original: One-Legged
translation: 独腿

original: This character is missing a leg - a real disability when it comes to the battlefield or chasing youngsters.
translation: 这个角色少了一条腿——真正的残疾，尤其是在战场上或者与孩童追逐玩闹的时候。

original: One-Handed
translation: 独手

original: This character is missing a hand - having only one hand causes problems in combat but makes it easier to escape chores.
translation: 这个角色少了一只手——虽然缺少一只手在战斗中会导致一些问题，但起码不用做家务了。

original: One-Eyed
translation: 独眼

original: This character is missing an eye - not something you see every day.
translation: 这个角色少了一只眼——这可不是你每天都能见到的。

original: Disfigured
translation: 毁容

original: This character is disfigured - a face few could love.
translation: 这个角色被毁容了——很少有人会爱上这样一张脸。

original: Abdominal Pain
translation: 腹痛

original: This character experiences abdominal pains - perhaps due to eating something bad, what else could it be?
translation: 这个角色身患腹痛——大概是吃了什么不好的东西，还能是什么其他原因吗？

original: Fatigue
translation: 疲乏

original: This character is fatigued - every little effort just makes them exhausted.
translation: 这个角色非常疲乏——任何微小的工作都会使他精疲力尽。

original: Malaise
translation: 不适

original: This character experiences malaise - hard to say what is wrong, they just don't feel well.
translation: 这个角色身体不适——很难说身体哪里不对劲，就是感觉不舒服。

original: Infection
translation: 感染

original: This character has an infection - it looks and smells bad, but it feels even worse.
translation: 这个角色伤口感染了——看起来、闻起来都很糟糕，感觉起来还要更糟。

original: Flu
translation: 流感

original: This character has the flu - fever, headaches and chills.
translation: 这个角色感染了流感——发热，头痛而且寒颤。

original: Dysentery
translation: 痢疾

original: This character has dysentery - a bad case of bloody diarrhea caused by inflamed bowels.
translation: 这个角色身患痢疾——因消化道发炎而引起的严重腹泻。

original: Gout
translation: 痛风

original: This character has gout - swelling and joint pain accompanied by fever and fatigue.
translation: 这个角色患有痛风——水肿、关节疼痛伴随着发热和疲乏。

original: Food Poisoning
translation: 食物中毒

original: This character suffers from food poisoning - intense vomiting and diarrhea, a very bad condition but usually not very long lasting.
translation: 这个角色食物中毒了——严重的上吐下泻，情况很糟但一般不会持续很久。

original: Rabies
translation: 狂犬病

original: This character has rabies - swelling and inflammation of the brain causes very strange and aggressive behavior.
translation: 这个角色患有狂犬病——脑部发炎肿胀，导致了极为怪异且富有攻击性的举止。

original: from a bad case of the Flu
translation: 一次严重的流感

original: attending to 'chamber business'
translation: 处理「卧室事务（腹泻）」

original: of complications related to Gout
translation: 因痛风引发的并发症

original: after a disagreement with a meal
translation: 食物中毒

original: frothing at the mouth
translation: 口吐白沫

original: of Cancer
translation: 癌症

original: coughing [Root.GetHerHis] lungs up
translation: 把[Root.GetHerHis]肺都咳了出来

original: feverish and sweating
translation: 高烧不退，大汗淋漓

original: of dehydration from Diarrhea
translation: 因腹泻导致的脱水

original: explosively vomiting
translation: 喷射性呕吐

original: clutching at [Root.GetHerHis] heart
translation: 心绞痛

original: convulsing in a cramp
translation: 痉挛抽搐

original: scratching [GetHerHis] skin bloody
translation: 把[GetHerHis]自己的皮肤抓得血肉模糊

original: bleeding from the eyes and ears
translation: 眼耳流血

original: clutching at [Root.GetHerHis] gut
translation: 紧抓着[Root.GetHerHis]肚子

original: exhausted, unable to do anything
translation: 精疲力竭，动弹不得

original: not knowing quite what was wrong with them
translation: 不知道身体哪里出的问题

original: of an infected wound
translation: 伤口感染

original: Severely Injured
translation: 身受重伤

original: This character was recently maimed resulting in serious injury, a life threatening condition. Once the wound heals their health will recover, but the damage dealt will never fully heal.
translation: 这个角色伤重致残，生命垂危。如能伤愈，他将恢复健康，但已造成的伤害永远不能彻底治愈。

original: succumbing to severe injuries
translation: 被重伤压垮

original: Mangled
translation: 血肉模糊

original: This character has been horribly wounded and now lives with a mangled body.
translation: 这个角色曾身受恐怖的重伤，而今拖着残破的身躯生活。

original: a mangled mess
translation: 身体血肉模糊

original: §Y[This.GetBestName]§! will be §YMaimed§!\n
translation: §Y[This.GetBestName]§!将会§Y残废§!\n

original: Minor Depopulation
translation: 人口数量小幅下降

original: This county has been depopulated to a minor extent as a result of an epidemic. When diseases clear out of this county it will repopulate quickly.
translation: 此省份因为疫病而有少量人口数量下降。若此省份疫情得到控制，人口又会快速恢复。

original: Significant Depopulation
translation: 人口数量显著下降

original: This county has been significantly depopulated as a result of an epidemic. When diseases clear out of this county it will repopulate over several years.
translation: 此省份因为疫病而出现显著的人口数量下降。若此省份疫情得到控制，需要数年时间恢复人口。

original: Severe Depopulation
translation: 人口数量急剧下降

original: This county has been depopulated to a severe extent as a result of an epidemic. When diseases clear out of this county it will take many years to repopulate.
translation: 此省份因为疫病而出现人口数量急剧下降。若此省份疫情得到控制，需要很多年时间恢复人口。

original: India Ravaged by Plague
translation: 印度瘟疫肆虐

original: When will it end?
translation: 什么时候是个头啊？

original: Persia Ravaged by Plague
translation: 波斯瘟疫肆虐

original: Middle East Ravaged by Plague
translation: 中东瘟疫肆虐

original: Africa Ravaged by Plague
translation: 非洲瘟疫肆虐

original: Asia Minor Ravaged by Plague
translation: 小亚细亚瘟疫肆虐

original: Eastern Europe Ravaged by Plague
translation: 东欧瘟疫肆虐

original: Southern Europe Ravaged by Plague
translation: 南欧瘟疫肆虐
