original: Western Europe Ravaged by Plague
translation: 西欧瘟疫肆虐

original: Northern Europe Ravaged by Plague
translation: 北欧瘟疫肆虐

original: The Steppe Ravaged by Plague
translation: 大草原瘟疫肆虐

original: After what seems like forever, the wound from your maiming has completely healed.
translation: 经过永恒般漫长的时间，你的伤残留下的伤口终于完全愈合了。

original: Finally
translation: 终于

original: The horrific wound from your maiming is now stinking and oozing pus. The pain is debilitating and the courtiers are avoiding you like death itself.
translation: 你伤残留下的可怖伤口现在正发出恶臭还不断流脓。你痛不欲生，而你的廷臣却避你如死神。

original: That's not good.
translation: 这可不妙。

original: Your Infection has put you in grave danger on multiple occasions. The pain and foul smell have finally subsided and your wound looks clean.
translation: 你的伤口感染多次让你危在旦夕。但疼痛最终得到缓解，恶臭减少，你的伤口也清洁了。

original: I feel better.
translation: 我感觉好多了。

original: You realize you have been free from your Cough for a few days now. Being able to sleep at night without waking up coughing is a blessing.
translation: 你意识到现在你已经好几天没咳嗽了。晚上能够安眠，而不是起来咳嗽，这原来也是一种福分啊。

original: Your Fever has passed and you regain some strength and focus in your daily routine.
translation: 你的烧已经退了，而且也恢复了一些体力，现在你可以专注于你的日常事务了。

original: After a very troublesome period, your Diarrhea has finally stopped.
translation: 在一段痛苦的时光之后，你现在总算不再腹泻了。

original: Your Vomiting has finally stopped and you can start eating regular meals again.
translation: 你终于不再呕吐了，现在你又可以正常进食了。

original: The Chest Pains you have been experiencing lately seem to have stopped. The Pains have been occurring less frequently, until recently they just disappeared.
translation: 不久前一直困扰你的胸痛似乎消失了。先是疼痛的发作次数不断减少，最近完全就没有疼痛感了。

original: You haven't had any severe Cramps for some time now, whatever caused them must have been dealt with.
translation: 现在你不再严重抽筋了，一定是病根消除了。

original: Whatever was left of your Rash is no longer visible, and the spot where it was is no longer itching or causing pain.
translation: 你身上的皮疹留下的疤痕已经消失，原先皮疹发作的部位也不再发痒和疼痛。

original: Your pressing Headache has gone away, and you can focus your mind of things again.
translation: 你头部的剧痛已消失，现在你又可以集中精力思考了。

original: Excruciating Abdominal Pains have been disabling you lately, but now that you come to think of it, they are no longer there.
translation: 前阵子你腹部的剧痛让你无法行动，但现在回头想想，这些疼痛已经消失了。

original: The sense of Fatigue that has been present lately now seems to have disappeared, and you once again have the energy to carry out your duties.
translation: 前阵子挥之不去的疲劳感现在已经消失了，现在你又有精力履行你的职责了。

original: Your Malaise is no more. If it wasn't just imagination then whatever caused it must have disappeared.
translation: 现在你的不适感已经消失。如果这种不适感不是你想象出来的话，那么病根现在应该消除了。

original: You have recovered well from the Flu, now the coughing, fever, and headache are just unpleasant memories.
translation: 你已经从流感中痊愈了，咳嗽、发烧、头痛现在也只是不快的回忆罢了。

original: After some very worrying dehydration and abdominal pains, your Dysentery has finally ended.
translation: 严重脱水和腹部剧痛的症状已不再发作，你总算从痢疾中痊愈了。

original: Excruciating pain and stiff joints have been tormenting you, but they are now much less severe. Gout is no longer a problem.
translation: 剧痛和关节僵硬曾折磨着你，但现在已经没那么严重了。痛风不再是个问题。

original: Your violent vomiting and diarrhea have gone away, you have recovered from what must have been Food Poisoning.
translation: 你的剧烈呕吐和腹泻已经消失了，你已经从食物中毒中恢复过来了。

original: The violent outbursts coupled with losses of consciousness, which seemed like a nightmare, is now just a memory. You have survived Rabies.
translation: 狂躁不安，丧失意识的症状如同梦靥，但现在已只是回忆。你总算从狂犬病中幸存了下来。

original: Your tumors are no more, and it seems the disease is no longer spreading. It will be a while until you are completely back to normal but the Cancer is gone.
translation: 你的肿瘤消失了，癌症似乎也不再扩散了。完全康复还得等一段时间，但是癌症已经消失了。

original: Briefly, you could see it coming. Perhaps you could have acted differently to avoid this. You are now One-Eyed.
translation: 简而言之，你的眼睛目睹了一场灾难。也许你觉得当时可以采取不同的行动来避免这件事发生。但现在你已经是独眼龙了。

original: Hindsight is fifty-fifty.
translation: 后见之明于事无补。

original: There is only a stump where your hand used to be, you are now One-Handed.
translation: 你的一只手臂只剩下残肢，现在你是独臂人了。

original: I have to deal with this.
translation: 我必须得处理这件事。

original: Excruciating pain is shooting through your whole body, originating from the stump where your leg used to be. You are now One-Legged.
translation: 剧痛穿透你的全身。剧痛的来源则是你的残肢——你原先那条腿所在的位置。现在你只剩下一条腿了。

original: Not good.
translation: 不妙。

original: Your formerly smooth face is now a torn, disgusting mess. You are Disfigured.
translation: 你曾经滑如凝脂的脸庞现在成了一团恶心的烂肉。你被毁容了。

original: I can't show my face any more.
translation: 我「没脸」见人了。

original: The shape of your body has changed forever, crushed bones and damage to your internal organs cause others to turn their heads away in disgust. You are Mangled.
translation: 你的身体已成畸形，无法再恢复。被压碎的骨头以及受损的内脏让他人作呕。你的身体已经支离破碎。

original: I will never be the same.
translation: 我不再是原来的我了。

original: Your cough has subsided and the ill-boding fever has left your body. You have survived Pneumonia.
translation: 你的咳嗽症状已经减轻，让人忧心忡忡的高烧也已经退去。你已经从肺炎中幸存下来。

original: The sores on your body have vanished and you are almost back to your regular self. You are rid of the Great Pox.
translation: 你身体的疼痛已经消失，你快恢复成病前的状态了。你已不再受梅毒困扰。

original: It's a miracle! Feeling has returned to your extremities. You survived Leprosy.
translation: 这真是奇迹！你的四肢又有知觉了。你从麻风病中幸存了下来。

original: You awake rejuvenated. After some moments of disbelief you realize that your fever has passed and your appetite has returned. You have survived Consumption.
translation: 你醒来之后发现自己精力充沛。你感到难以置信，一会儿过后你才意识到你的烧已经退了，你的胃口也已经回来了。你已经从痨病中幸存下来。

original: Your delirium has lifted and your temperature is back to normal. You have beaten Slow Fever.
translation: 你的谵妄状态已经解除，体温也已经恢复正常。你战胜了慢性热。

original: A vigor has returned to you as the aches from your recent disease leaves your body. You have survived Camp Fever.
translation: 身上已经没有最近的病症造成的疼痛感，你又恢复了活力。你已经从露营热中幸存了下来。

original: You're not sure how it happened, but your skin has returned to a healthy color and the abscesses are gone. It would seem you have survived the Plague.
translation: 你不知道你到底是怎样痊愈的，但是你的皮肤已经恢复成健康肤色，脓肿也已经消失。你似乎从大瘟疫中幸存了下来。

original: The feverish state you've been stuck in lately is replaced by a new energy. Meanwhile the rashes are gone. Measles, schmeasles.
translation: 前阵子你一直高烧不退。现在不烧了，你感觉精力充沛。同时你的疹子也消失了。

original: The many blisters on your body have faded, almost all of them gone now. So much for Smallpox.
translation: 你身上这么多水疱已经褪去了，几乎所有的都消失了。天花不过如此。

original: The many blisters on your... body have faded, almost all of them gone now. So much for Syphilis.
translation: 你……身上这么多水疱已经褪去了，几乎所有的都消失了。阿兹特克梅毒不过如此。

original: You prefer to be left to your own devices.\n
translation: 你更喜欢顺其自然。\n

original: Mild Treatment
translation: 保守疗法

original: Successful Treatment
translation: 成功的疗法

original: Successful Experimental Treatment
translation: 成功的实验治疗

original: Ill-Treatment
translation: 治疗不当

original: Horrible Mistreatment
translation: 严重的医疗事故

original: Your Court Physician [From.GetBestName] has come to see you and offers treatment for your illness. [From.GetSheHeCap] explains that there are several different types of treatment [From.GetSheHe] can offer.
translation: 你的宫廷医师[From.GetBestName]已前来诊治，并为你的疾病提供治疗。[From.GetSheHeCap]解释说[From.GetSheHe]能提供好几种不同的治疗方案。

original: My life is in your hands.
translation: 我的死活就全看你了。

original: §Y[From.GetBestName]§! will perform an experimental treatment. The outcome of this treatment can be extreme. The risk of this treatment will vary depending on [From.GetHerHis] capabilities.
translation: §Y[From.GetBestName]§! 将会实施实验治疗。治疗的结果会天差地别。治疗的风险的高低取决于[From.GetHerHis]能力

original: As long as you know what you're doing.
translation: 你只要清楚你在做什么就可以了。

original: §Y[From.GetBestName]§! will perform some well tested treatment. There is a chance that the treatment has negative effects. The risk of this treatment will vary depending on [From.GetHerHis] capabilities.
translation: §Y[From.GetBestName]§! 将会实施百试百灵的治疗方案。不过这次治疗还是存在风险，有可能产生负作用。这次治疗的风险高低取决于[From.GetHerHis]能力。

original: Please do only what is necessary.
translation: 请只做有必要的事。

original: §Y[From.GetBestName]§! will make you more comfortable in your current state. This treatment will have a very small chance of going badly, but the positive effects will not have much impact. The risk of this treatment will vary depending on [From.GetHerHis] capabilities.
translation: §Y[From.GetBestName]§!会使得你现在的状态略有好转。这次的治疗还是存在治疗失败的风险，不过几率很小，但治疗的正面效果也没有多大影响。这次治疗的风险高低取决于[From.GetHerHis]能力。

original: These treatments sound scary.
translation: 这些治疗法案太可怕了。

original: [FromFrom.GetBestName] looked me deep in the eyes before he forced me to drink the dirty water he had brought from his office. It was apparently filled with tiny creatures which should drive out the disease demons within me.
translation: [FromFrom.GetBestName]深沉地看着我，之后他强迫我喝下他从工作室带来的肮脏液体。显而易见，这液体里面充满着能够驱散我体内病魔的小东西。

original: [FromFrom.GetBestName] gave me a mix of herbal tea to drink daily and I was told to relax and avoid food.
translation: [FromFrom.GetBestName]给我一包草本药茶，让我每天饮用，还叮嘱我要放松和忌口。

original: [FromFrom.GetBestName] sang for me a bit while [FromFrom.GetSheHe] tucked me in. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] said that rest is enough to cure any ailment.
translation: [FromFrom.GetBestName]给我唱了一首歌，同时[FromFrom.GetSheHe]安抚我睡下。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]说好好休息足以治疗任何疾病。

original: §Y[From.GetBestName]§! will do [From.GetHerHis] best to treat your symptoms.
translation: §Y[From.GetBestName]§! 将尽[From.GetHerHis]所能治疗你的病症。

original: Very well.
translation: 很好。

original: [From.GetTitledName] is fairly sure you are developing Consumption. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]坚信你得了痨病。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持让你听从[From.GetHerHis]指示。

original: [From.GetTitledName] thinks you sound rather horse and is concerned that you may be developing Consumption. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]考虑到你的声音听起来嘶哑的像匹马，认为你可能得了痨病。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持让你听从[From.GetHerHis]指示。

original: [From.GetTitledName] states that [From.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [From.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are developing Consumption. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
