original: [From.GetTitledName] thinks your symptoms point to Pneumonia. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]认为你这症状是痨病。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持让你听从[From.GetHerHis]指示。

original: [From.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests that your symptoms probably point to Pneumonia. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]支支吾吾地说：你的症状很可能是痨病。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持让你听从[From.GetHerHis]指示。

original: [From.GetTitledName] thinks you may be developing the Great Pox. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]认为你可能染上了梅毒。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持让你听从[From.GetHerHis]指示。

original: [From.GetTitledName] blames your own foalish choices for the fact you have the Great Pox. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]指责是你自己驽钝地选择炮友让你染上了梅毒。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持让你听从[From.GetHerHis]指示。

original: [From.GetTitledName] states that [From.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [From.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are developing the Great Pox. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]说[From.GetHerHis]丰富的行医经验让[From.GetHerHim]得出结论：你染上了梅毒。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持让你听从[From.GetHerHis]指示

original: [From.GetTitledName] is sure you are developing the Great Pox. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]确信你染上了梅毒。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持让你听从[From.GetHerHis]指示。

original: [From.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests you are probably developing the Great Pox. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]支支吾吾地说：你很可能染上了梅毒。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持让你听从[From.GetHerHis]指示。

original: [From.GetTitledName] suggests your symptom is not due to a serious illness and that it will pass quite soon. Nevertheless, you will receive some mild treatment.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]说你这症状表明你没什么严重的疾病，很快就会康复。不过，你还是得接受一些保守疗法。

original: [From.GetTitledName] suggests your symptom is not due to a serious illness and that it will not be there furlong. Nevertheless, you will receive some mild treatment.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]说你的症状表明你没什么严重的疾病，而且用不了多久就会痊愈。不过，你还是得接受一些保守疗法。

original: [From.GetTitledName] states that [From.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [From.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that your symptom is not due to a serious illness and that it will pass quite soon. Nevertheless, you will receive some mild treatment.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]说[From.GetHerHis]丰富的行医经验让[From.GetHerHim]确信：你没什么严重的疾病，很快就会痊愈。不过，你还是得接受一些保守疗法。

original: [From.GetTitledName] is confident your symptom is not due to a serious illness and that it will pass quite soon. Nevertheless, you will receive some mild treatment.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]相信你的症状表明你没什么严重的疾病，很快就会康复。不过，你还是得接受一些保守疗法。

original: [From.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests that your symptom is probably not due to a serious illness and that it will pass quite soon. Nevertheless, you will receive some mild treatment.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]支支吾吾地说：你大概没什么严重的疾病，很快就会康复。不过，你还是得接受一些保守疗法。

original: Must not hold a temporary title\n
translation: 不能持有临时头衔\n

original: Must be male unless your realm accepts women as equals\n
translation: 除非你的领地内接受男女平等，否则只能是男性。\n

original: Must be ill or show a symptom\n
translation: 必须生病或者出现某些症状\n

original: Has not been treated recently\n
translation: 最近没有接受治疗\n

original: Your Court Physician is called\n
translation: 你的宫廷医师正在被传召\n

original: Call on your Court Physician for an examination and possible diagnosis, if you have fully developed an illness you can choose to be treated in various ways. This will remove any existing treatment modifiers.
translation: 传召你的宫廷医师来给你做体检以及一些可能的诊断，如果你被确诊为患上了某种疾病，你可以从几种疗法中选择一种。这将会移除现有的治疗修正。

original: Seek Treatment for Illness
translation: 为疾病寻求疗法

original: An Epidemic is Active and Close\n
translation: 一场疫病正在蔓延并已接近\n

original: Secluded with Courtiers
translation: 与廷臣一起隔离

original: Commoners Abandoned
translation: 抛弃民众

original: Shut the Gates
translation: 关上宫门

original: Open the Gates
translation: 打开宫门

original: Open up the gates and allow your courtiers to meet with the common people again.
translation: 打开宫门，让你的廷臣能够再次与平民相见。

original: Some commoners have already gathered outside as your guards start closing the gates. A decisive thump silences the curious chatter coming from the other side.
translation: 你的卫兵正要关上宫门时，一些平民已经在宫门外聚集起来了。果断的关闭宫门的撞击声让外面好奇的谈话声沉寂下来。

original: Seal it!
translation: 封上吧！

original: Loud complaints have become less frequent, instead an unbearable stench is now coming from the other side of the wall. It appears that as a way of showing disapproval, commoners have started leaving all their dead in a big pile just outside the gates.
translation: 沸腾的民怨渐渐减少，取而代之的则是一阵城墙外传过来的让人不堪其扰的恶臭。这阵恶臭以一种方式传达着反对的声音，平民们将他们所有的死尸堆在门外。

original: Guards! Get rid of the smell.
translation: 卫兵！别让我闻到这股恶臭！

original: We must help everyone clear out their dead.
translation: 我们必须帮助每个人清理尸体。

original: A few guards will clear out the bodies
translation: 只要一小队卫兵就足够清理尸体了

original: Leave them, we cannot risk infection.
translation: 别碰他们，不能冒被感染的风险。

original: Lately, [sick_courtier.GetBestName] has been showing symptoms of illness. [sick_courtier.GetSheHeCap] might have contracted the plague. But of course, nothing is certain yet.
translation: 不久前，[sick_courtier.GetBestName]出现病征。[sick_courtier.GetSheHeCap]可能染上了瘟疫。不过，现在也说不准。

original: [sick_courtier.GetSheHeCap] has to go.
translation: [sick_courtier.GetSheHeCap]必须离开。

original: [sick_courtier.GetSheHeCap] can stay, in the dungeon.
translation: [sick_courtier.GetSheHeCap]可以待在宫内，不过只能待在地牢里。

original: Surely we are in no danger.
translation: 毋庸置疑，我们现在可以高枕无忧了。

original: I should hug and comfort [sick_courtier.GetHerHim].
translation: 我应该拥抱并安慰[sick_courtier.GetHerHim]。

original: Unaware of others hearing them, [lover_one.GetBestName] and [lover_two.GetBestName] have been sneaking around the premises to have intimate encounters. Few seem amused by their indiscretion.
translation: [lover_one.GetBestName]和[lover_two.GetBestName]偷偷摸摸地做完足前戏，正要上演激情戏码时，却不知道他们发出的声音已经被其他人听到了。没什么人乐见他们的轻佻行为。

original: This ends now!
translation: 现在该结束了！

original: Unholy, they will have to marry.
translation: 真是亵渎神灵，他们必须结婚。

original: But it is the only entertaining thing in here.
translation: 但这也是这儿唯一的娱乐了。

original: You leave the couple be
translation: 你随他们去

original: [lover_one.GetBestName] tells you how wonderful and understanding you are for letting [lover_one.GetHerHim] and [lover_two.GetBestName] carry on with their romance during these months. They both promised to be of assistance if need be.
translation: [lover_one.GetBestName]说你让[lover_one.GetHerHim]和[lover_two.GetBestName]在这几个月中继续保持浪漫关系真是至圣至明，通情达理。他们都承诺随时听候差遣。

original: [target_courtier.GetBestName] may not be the most attractive [target_courtier.GetManWoman] I ever laid my eyes upon, but [target_courtier.GetSheHe] is here, and the whole situation is growing increasingly boring. Considering my options, it may not be a bad way to spend time.
translation: [target_courtier.GetBestName]或许不是我曾见过最有魅力的[target_courtier.GetManWoman]，但[target_courtier.GetSheHe]就在这里，而整个情势都越来越无聊。考虑到我选择不多，这样子打发时间也许不赖。

original: [target_courtier.GetSheHeCap] will be mine.
translation: [target_courtier.GetSheHeCap]将会是我的人。

original: No, I can manage without romance for now.
translation: 不，没有浪漫我也能活下去。

original: [From.GetBestName] is walking up to me with a big grin on [From.GetHerHis] face looking confident. [From.GetSheHe] smirks and suggests we should visit [From.GetHerHis] bedchamber, to kill some time as there is 'nothing better to do'.
translation: [From.GetBestName]正朝我走来，[From.GetHerHis]脸上自信满满，满面春风。[From.GetSheHe]偷笑了一声，提议我们在[From.GetHerHis]卧室消磨时间，因为「没有更好的事情可做了」。

original: Sounds like a plan.
translation: 听起来不错。

original: I think not.
translation: 我看还是算了吧。

original: [From.GetBestName] followed me into my bedchamber when I suggested we kill some time. It was well worth it.
translation: 我提议我们应该做些什么事情消磨时间，[From.GetBestName]就跟着我进入了我的卧室。真是一刻值千金啊。

original: My charm still works.
translation: 看来我的魅力不减当年啊。

original: [From.GetBestName] was not very impressed with my advances, and tonight I sleep alone.
translation: [From.GetBestName]对我的提议置之不理，看来我今晚只能吊影自怜了。

original: It was worth a shot.
translation: 这值得一试。

original: I try to get a good night's sleep, but I am tormented by horrible recurring nightmares of our people. The pleas for help and the hurtful words begin to get to me.
translation: 我想好好睡一晚，但不断发生在我们人民中的那可怕的噩梦一直烦扰着我。人民寻求帮助的乞求和伤人的话语开始传入我的耳中。

original: We have to open the gates and help them.
translation: 我们必须打开大门帮助他们。

original: I just want to survive this.
translation: 我只想活下去。

original: You stay in seclusion\n
translation: 你保持隔离\n

original: There is nothing we can do for them.
translation: 我们无法为他们做任何事。

original: Only the chosen will survive.
translation: 只有受命运眷顾之人才能活下去。

original: After spending lots of time with few people you have been positively surprised by [new_friend.GetFirstName]. During this difficult time you have gotten to know and understand [new_friend.GetHerHim] well. In many ways [new_friend.GetSheHe] complements you nicely and you have a good time together.
translation: 被迫与很少的人一起度过漫长的时间，[new_friend.GetFirstName]给了你一个惊喜。在困难的时期，你充分认识和了解了[new_friend.GetHerHim]的为人。在许多方面，[new_friend.GetSheHe]和你相辅相成，你们在一起相处得十分愉快。

original: I have gained a friend.
translation: 我交了一个朋友。

original: [epidemic_victim.GetBestName] has contracted the epidemic. Your courtiers seem worried about having [epidemic_victim.GetHerHim] stay with them inside these walls. [epidemic_victim.GetFirstName]s' chances of survival are small if [epidemic_victim.GetSheHe] is abandoned but you and the rest of your court will be safer.
translation: [epidemic_victim.GetBestName]已经被病疫感染。你的廷臣似乎担心继续留[epidemic_victim.GetHerHim]在墙内与他们待在一起会提高被感染的风险。一旦[epidemic_victim.GetSheHe]被放逐，[epidemic_victim.GetFirstName]活下去的机会就十分渺茫，但你和其余廷臣将会十分安全。

original: Throw [epidemic_victim.GetHerHim] out before we are all dead!
translation: 趁我们还没死，快将[epidemic_victim.GetHerHim]赶出去！

original: We have to stick together in here.
translation: 我们必须团结在一起。

original: [court_physician.GetFirstName] your Court Physician informs you that [epidemic_victim.GetBestName] is suffering from the current epidemic. Having [epidemic_victim.GetHerHim] stay with the rest of you inside these walls puts you at risk.
translation: [court_physician.GetFirstName]，你的宫廷医师告诉你[epidemic_victim.GetBestName]已经患上了现在流行的瘟疫。继续把[epidemic_victim.GetHerHim]留在你身边将提高你患病的风险。

original: It is too late, throw [epidemic_victim.GetHerHim] out!
translation: 跟我说这些干什么，快把[epidemic_victim.GetHerHim]赶出去！

original: Help [epidemic_victim.GetHerHim] any way you can.
translation: 用任何你能想到的办法，帮助[epidemic_victim.GetHerHim]。

original: Is at Home Court\n
translation: 在主宫廷中\n

original: §Y[epidemic_victim.GetFirstName]§! will be treated by §Y[court_physician.GetFirstName]§!
translation: §Y[court_physician.GetFirstName]§! 将治疗 §Y[epidemic_victim.GetFirstName]§!

original: Word is going around that since the epidemic came to [capital.GetName] we have seen an increase in cats. Our people are sure the cats are helping the spread of disease.
translation: 据说自从病疫传播到[capital.GetName]后，我们看到的猫的数量不断增加。人民相信正是猫在帮助病疫传播。

original: Gather some cats for examination.
translation: 捕捉部分猫来进行检查。

original: Pay for some outside help to get cats delivered.\n
translation: 雇外乡人将猫全部赶走。\n

original: No, the cats are not to blame.
translation: 不，猫是无罪的。

original: [cat_examiner.GetFirstName] reports that apart from showing disapproval of their capture, most of the cats seemed calm and healthy. Only a few show symptoms of illness, it is unlikely that cats are the cause.
translation: [cat_examiner.GetFirstName]报告说，除了他们没捕获的，大部分他们捕捉到的猫都表现得很安静和健康。只有少数表现出疾病的症状，这些猫不太可能是病疫传播的原因。

original: So the cats are not to blame. Let them go.
translation: 所以这些猫是无罪的。放走它们。

original: Keep some for observation.
translation: 继续留一些进行观察。

original: Complaints about the cats will not end, an angry mob has gathered claiming that cats are the bringers of bad luck and cannot be allowed to roam the streets.
translation: 对猫的控诉显然不会结束。一群愤怒的民众聚集起来，他们声称猫带来了霉运，不能允许它们就这样在街上游荡。

original: Kill the 'source'.
translation: 杀光所有的猫。

original: You find the meanest looking cat from the sample and execute it publicly
translation: 你从样本里找到一只最难看的猫，并将它公开处死

original: Cats are not the cause.
translation: 猫是无罪的。

original: You calm the mob down with a convincing speech
translation: 你通过一场富有说服力的演讲使暴民冷静下来

original: Cats seem mostly healthy.
translation: 大多数猫看起来很健康。

original: Try your best to explain the cat situation.
translation: 尽你最大的努力来说明猫的状况。

original: Get rid of all cats!
translation: 赶走所有的猫！

original: This is absurd, go home.
translation: 这太荒谬了，回家吧。

original: [worried_courtier.GetFirstName] has gotten the news of my decision to remove all the cats. 'Surely cats that are perfectly healthy should not be harmed, I could not accept that!' [worried_courtier.GetSheHe] says.
translation: [worried_courtier.GetFirstName]已听说我要赶走所有的猫。「那些已经被确定是健康的猫咪不应该被赶走，我不接受这样的做法！」[worried_courtier.GetSheHe]这样说道。

original: I'm sorry [worried_courtier.GetFirstName], even your cats.
translation: [worried_courtier.GetFirstName]，我很抱歉，但即使是你的猫也不能幸免。

original: We can keep it a secret. But you owe me.
translation: 你可以悄悄地留下你的猫咪，但你欠我一个人情。

original: [worried_courtier.GetFirstName] should have taken care of hiding [worried_courtier.GetHerHis] feline friends. They have been spotted by others and now the people are furious this was kept secret.
translation: [worried_courtier.GetFirstName]本应该看管好[worried_courtier.GetHerHis]藏起来的猫咪朋友。但它们却被其他人发现，以至于现在人民对这种秘密的做法十分愤怒。

original: Curse you [worried_courtier.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我诅咒你，[worried_courtier.GetFirstName]！

original: One of the examined cats seems to have taken a liking to you, a sweet meow whenever you pass by their cages and a soft purr whenever you come close.
translation: 一只正在接受检查的猫似乎很喜欢你。每次你经过它的笼子时，它都会发出可爱的喵声，而且每当你靠近它时，它都会发出软绵绵的咕噜声。

original: I will call her 'Whiskers', my new sweetheart.
translation: 我要叫她「维斯克丝」，我的甜心。

original: I will call her 'Mittens', my new sweetheart.
translation: 我要叫她「咪咪」，我的甜心。

original: I will call her 'Boots', my new sweetheart.
translation: 我要叫她「布丝」，我的甜心。

original: The people would not approve.
translation: 人们不会同意的。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has called for all cats to be terminated, as you enjoy your time with the cats around the court, this would be horribly upsetting.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]已要求立即驱除所有的猫，但你非常享受与猫咪一起在宫廷玩耍玩耍的时间，这可能会让人非常烦恼。

original: I will ask for an exception.
translation: 我要申请例外。

original: I cannot argue with my liege.
translation: 我不应与我的领主争论。

original: [From.GetTitledName] refused to make an exception.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]拒绝了你的申请。

original: That [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: 那个[GetRootFromInsult]！

original: [From.GetTitledName] agreed to let me keep the cats, in exchange for a  favor.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]同意让我留下猫咪，以换取一个人情。

original: What a relief.
translation: 真叫人松一口气。

original: Pet Cat
translation: 宠物猫

original: Civil Unrest
translation: 国内骚乱

original: Furious Peasants
translation: 愤怒的农民

original: witch
translation: 女巫

original: Witch
translation: 女巫

original: warlock
translation: 巫师

original: Warlock
translation: 巫师

original: Cats Exterminated
translation: 猫被消灭

original: After months of chatter about cats it appears as if the common people are now focusing on other things.
translation: 在经历了持续几个月的关于猫的争论后，大众现在逐渐将他们关注的焦点转移到其他事情上去了。

original: Dissatisfied with my actions in the matter, the peasants have come with demands of not only the removal of all cats, but also additional tax refunds as compensation for me neglecting them earlier.
translation: 因为不满意我在这件事上的行动，这群农民现在不但要求驱除所有的猫，而且还要求额外的退税，以补偿我之前忽略他们的行为。

original: A just demand.
translation: 一个正当的要求。

original: You have no power here!
translation: 你在这里没有权力！

original: Doomsday
translation: 世界末日

original: The people of [capital.GetName] have seen a lot of death and misery lately. As a result, doomsayers are getting more attention from those desperately looking for answers. Crowds gather to listen to raving lunatics speaking of the end of the world. If there is a solution, something to end this nightmare, your people will probably pursue any possibility.
translation: [capital.GetName]的人们最近已经见证了太多死亡和痛苦了。许多末日预言者因而得到了一群绝望的寻找答案的人们的追捧。群众聚集在一起听疯子讲述世界末日。如果有一种方法能结束这场噩梦，你的人民会不惜任何代价。

original: Times are bad.
translation: 最坏的时代。

original: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName], my [Root.GetChancellorName] suggests that I use this difficult time to get some extra income from our gullible commoners. If I can give [greedy_councillor.GetHerHim] a chance to speak, he will take only a small cut and let me have the rest.
translation: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName]，我的[Root.GetChancellorName]建议我可以利用这段困难时期，从一些好骗的平民身上取得一笔额外收入。如果我能给[greedy_councillor.GetHerHim]一个演讲的机会，到时候他只需拿走一小部分，让我独享剩下的大部分。

original: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName], my [Root.GetMarshalName] mentions that the current situation is a perfect setting to squeeze some 'extra military funds' out of our commoners. If [greedy_councillor.GetSheHe] can speak to the crowd it will be taken care of.
translation: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName]，我的[Root.GetMarshalName]提到，现在这段时期正是向民众榨取「额外军事资金」的绝好时机。如果[greedy_councillor.GetSheHe]能被允许向民众讲话的话，这件事就成了。

original: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName], my [Root.GetTreasurerName] tells me in private that in times like these people are willing to give away a little bit more of their wealth to stay alive. If we can make them believe we can help them they should prove generous.
translation: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName]，我的[Root.GetTreasurerName]私底下告诉我说，在这样的时期，人们愿意放弃他们一部分的财富，以让他们能继续活下去。如果我们能让他们相信我们可以帮助他们，他们将会毫不犹豫地慷慨解囊。

original: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName], my [Root.GetSpymasterName] approaches me and wants to ease the purses of our people now that they are so willing to listen to others. Some medicine to help avoid illness could raise their hopes and grant us some much needed income.
translation: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName]，我的[Root.GetSpymasterName]靠近我，告诉我说，既然人们现在如此轻信他人的话，我们不妨减轻下他们钱包的负担。某些可以抵御疾病的药物至少能稍微唤起他们的希望，我们也可以获得些额外的收入。

original: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName], my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] mentions that in difficult times the faith of people are tested. If we were to press this issue to gain some extra donations to our cause, we could split the profits.
translation: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName]，我的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]提到，苦难正是考验人们信仰的最好机会。如果我们以这个为名义举办捐赠活动，我们就可以得到一笔不小的利润。

original: Yes, sounds like an opportune time.
translation: 是的，听起来是个不错的时机。

original: Make a plan to address the people when the time comes.
translation: 制定一个计划，然后在时机成熟时向人民发表讲话。

original: I won't take advantage of our people.
translation: 我不会借此牟利。

original: These months of endless complaints and misery everywhere are simply too much to bear. I have no energy left to take on even the easiest tasks, and if this nightmare does not end soon I fear I may not endure it.
translation: 无休止的长达数月的抱怨和痛苦，给我造成了太多的负担。我已经没有精力去处理那些即便是最简单的任务了，如果这场噩梦再不快点结束，我怕我将崩溃。

original: Nothing matters.
translation: 没什么问题的。

original: The moon fully eclipses the sun, creating a powerful sight which causes everyone to focus their attention on it. People are lighting fires to avoid the darkness, and overall they are terrified.
translation: 月亮完完全全地遮住了太阳，将所有人的注意力集中在它上。人们点燃火堆来驱散黑暗，但他们心中依然充满恐惧。

original: Listen up, we all need to contribute!
translation: 听着，我们都需要做出贡献！

original: You introduce [greedy_councillor.GetTitledName] so that [greedy_councillor.GetSheHe] can make a speech
translation: 你向人们介绍[greedy_councillor.GetTitledName]，以便[greedy_councillor.GetSheHe]能做一场演讲

original: [rival.GetTitledName] is in allegiance with [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!
translation: [rival.GetTitledName]已经投靠了[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]！

original: Make the people believe that §Y[rival.GetTitledName]§! is somehow causing this with [rival.GetHerHis] wicked ways
translation: 让人们相信是 §Y[rival.GetTitledName]§! 采用了[rival.GetHerHis]邪恶的方法导致的这一切

original: This is the end!
translation: 这就是末日！

original: Struck by an immediate fear of death you are weeping and sniveling in public\n
translation: 对死亡的恐惧使你在大众面前痛哭流涕\n

original: We can repent, and survive this if we live pure lives.
translation: 我们可以悔过，选择过纯洁的生活来活下去。

original: Speak of how godliness can save the rest of us\n
translation: 讲述信仰如何能拯救我们\n

original: This is not the end!
translation: 不！这一切还没有结束！

original: An inspirational speech to impress and give courage to the masses\n
translation: 一场鼓舞人心的演讲可以打动人心、给予人们勇气\n

original: Your rival [rival.GetTitledName] keeps coming to mind even at times like these. [rival.GetHerHisCap] stupid laugh and arrogant ways are draining so much energy daily, maybe it is time to make use of the situation and have [rival.GetHerHim] pay.
translation: 即便在这样的时刻，你想到的也依旧是你的对手[rival.GetTitledName]。[rival.GetHerHisCap]愚蠢的笑声和傲慢的做法占据了你太多的精力，或许是时候让[rival.GetHerHim]付出代价了。

original: I will demonize [rival.GetHerHim].
translation: 我要丑化[rival.GetHerHim]。

original: Prepare some nasty stories and other 'proof' that §Y[rival.GetTitledName]§! is wicked\n
translation: 准备一些令人讨厌的故事和其他「证据」，证明§Y[rival.GetTitledName]§!是个邪恶的家伙\n

original: No, that is below me.
translation: 不，这会拉低我的身份。

original: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName] beams a smile at you as [greedy_councillor.GetSheHe] presents you with the earnings from the desperate people of [capital.GetName].
translation: [greedy_councillor.GetFirstName]对你会心一笑，[greedy_councillor.GetSheHe]向你展示从[capital.GetName]的绝望民众那里赚来的钱财。

original: All they needed was hope...
translation: 他们所需要的只是希望……

original: You snicker as you count every last coin\n
translation: 你对你获得的的收益窃笑不已\n

original: There is an angry mob looking for me claiming I made a pact with [From.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]. Nothing particular comes to mind that could have caused this. There is no way to stop and ask them.
translation: 一群愤怒的暴民找到我，并声称我与[From.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]做了一笔交易。我没有想到会造成这样的局面。可已经没有办法制止他们并与他们沟通了。

original: This could be the end.
translation: 这回可完了。

original: Barely escaping the angry mob I could gather that it was [FromFrom.GetTitledName] who sent them my way by claiming I had cursed [capital.GetName].
translation: 勉强逃离愤怒的暴民的我几乎可以猜出是[FromFrom.GetTitledName]派他们来围堵我的，还宣扬我诅咒了[capital.GetName]。

original: That snake!
translation: 那条毒蛇！

original: [rival.GetTitledName] was caught and beaten to death by an angry peasant mob.
translation: [rival.GetTitledName]被一群愤怒的农民捉住并殴打致死。

original: [rival.GetTitledName] was caught and beaten very badly but managed to survive the peasant mob.
translation: [rival.GetTitledName]被一群愤怒的农民撵得到处跑，但成功地躲过了暴徒的袭击。

original: Although a mob of angry peasants went after [rival.GetHerHim], [rival.GetTitledName] had not been caught and have somehow figured out it was me who sent them there.
translation: 虽然一群愤怒的农民四处追捕[rival.GetHerHim]，但[rival.GetTitledName]就是没被捉住，同时还通过某种方式发现我是幕后黑手。

original: People get what they deserve.
translation: 人们会得到他们应得的。

original: Better Days
translation: 更好的日子

original: The attitude for the majority of people in [capital.GetName] has changed. What was only spoken of as the 'end of days' has been changed into a tough, yet promising future.\n\nIt could be that relieving them of material things caused their perspective to change. Or maybe it just coincided with misery not lasting forever. In any case, life will go on for now.
translation: 住在[capital.GetName]的大多数人们的态度发生了变化。唯一能解释的原因是：「末日」已经变成了一个遥远的苦难未来。\n\n这可以缓解他们因世界消亡引起的担忧。又或者好景不长，苦难会卷土重来。但不管怎么说，生活总要继续。

original: The attitude for the majority of people in [capital.GetName] has changed. What was only spoken of as the 'end of days' has been changed into a tough, yet promising future.\n\nHaving a scapegoat like [rival.GetTitledName] might have helped in dealing with their grief, and in punishing [rival.GetHerHim] they perhaps felt like the problem was dealt with. It seems like everyone is happier with the current situation.
translation: 住在[capital.GetName]的大多数人们态度发生了变化。唯一能解释的原因是「末日」已经变成了一个遥远的苦难未来。\n\n让一个人成为替罪羊承担一切，比如说[rival.GetTitledName]，或许有助于让人们发泄他们的悲伤。他们或许会觉得通过惩罚[rival.GetHerHim]，问题就会被解决。看上去每个人都很满意这样的状况。

original: Including me.
translation: 包括我。

original: The attitude for the majority of people in [capital.GetName] has changed. What was only spoken of as the 'end of days' has been changed into a tough, yet promising future.\n\nWhen [rival.GetTitledName] managed to evade harm and attention was turned towards me the commoners seem to have been distracted from their own misery. I may look worse in their eyes now, but death is not the only subject any more.
translation: 住在[capital.GetName]的大多数人们态度发生了变化。唯一能解释的原因是「末日」已经变成了一个遥远的苦难未来。\n\n当[rival.GetTitledName]成功逃脱攻击并将人们注意力转移到我身上时，人们看上去已经不再将他们遭受的痛苦怪罪在我身上了。在他们眼里我或许很糟糕，但死亡不再是唯一的处理方式了。

original: This could have been handled better.
translation: 当时应该有更好的处理办法。

original: The attitude for the majority of people in [capital.GetName] has changed. What was only spoken of as the 'end of days' has been changed into a tough, yet promising future.\n\nStraightening out their lives and being pure in the eyes of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] helped many feel like they will be saved, no matter what happens. Even if others are still dying, the rest show little fear for the end.
translation: 住在[capital.GetName]的大多数人们态度发生了变化。唯一能解释的原因是「末日」已经变成了一个遥远的苦难未来。\n\n[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]帮助人们理顺了他们的生活，而且感觉变得纯洁，让人们感觉他们将被拯救。无论发生什么，即便继续有人死亡，剩下的人也将无所畏惧。

original: The attitude for the majority of people in [capital.GetName] has changed. What was only spoken of as the 'end of days' has been changed into a tough, yet promising future.\n\nNo thanks to my efforts apparently, according to some I contributed to an even worse outcome. I would like to think that my weakness made them feel a sense of independence, to find strength to act instead of just complain. They should be grateful, really.
translation: 住在[capital.GetName]的大多数人们态度发生了变化。唯一能解释的原因是「末日」已经变成了一个遥远的苦难未来。\n\n人们丝毫没有感谢我的努力，反而我的努力造成了更糟糕的后果。我想我的软弱让他们觉得还是得靠自己，采取强有力的行动而不是一味向我抱怨。现在情况好转，他们应该感激我，说真的。

original: The attitude for the majority of people in [capital.GetName] has changed. What was only spoken of as the 'end of days' has been changed into a tough, yet promising future.\n\nMy speech helped inspire many to fight through these difficulties and keep focusing on things that need to be done to make days better. One [Root.GetManWomanOpp] even came up to me and said I was very attractive.
translation: 住在[capital.GetName]的大多数人们的态度发生了变化。唯一能解释的原因是：「末日」已经变成了一个遥远的苦难未来。\n\n我的演讲激发了人们战胜困难的勇气，使他们集中力量放在他们需要做的事情上，让日子一天天好转起来。甚至一位[Root.GetManWomanOpp]走过来告诉我说，我是如此的有魅力。

original: was sacrificed to the gods on the order of $KILLER$
translation: 因$KILLER$的命令被用以祭神

original: was sacrificed to the gods
translation: 被牺牲祭神

original: was gored to death by a boar
translation: 被野猪撞死

original: Break Non-Aggression Pact
translation: 打破互不侵犯条约

original: Breaking your current Non-Aggression Pact with [Root.GetTitledName] will allow [Root.GetHerHim] to wage war against you.
translation: 打破你与[Root.GetTitledName]目前的互不侵犯条约将允许[Root.GetHerHim]对你发动战争。

original: Ever since you lost your limbs, you have started seeing things in a new light. Animals seem to consider you less frightening, they approach you more often than your courtiers. Whether or not it is pity or affection you will never know. \n\nThis one particular bird seems to have the intention to be your most loyal friend. A parrot that hates everyone else, but likes sitting on your shoulders.
translation: 自从你被截肢后，你对你看见的事情有了新的见解。动物们似乎认为你不再那么可怕，它们变得比你的廷臣更亲近你。你永远不会知道，这是对你的怜悯还是喜爱。\n\n这只特别的鸟似乎有意成为你最忠诚的朋友。一只讨厌其他人的鹦鹉，却喜欢停在你的肩膀上。

original: My new best friend!
translation: 我最好的新朋友！

original: Raaaawk, 'best friend'.
translation: 嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷，「最好的朋友」。

original: Starting Fresh
translation: 新的开始

original: Loyal Parrot
translation: 忠诚的鹦鹉

original: Menacing looks attracted a bird with bad attitude.
translation: 凶恶的外表吸引了一只态度恶劣的鸟。

original: Bad Crisis Management
translation: 糟糕的危机处理

original: No Liege
translation: 没有领主

original: Court Physician [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] has completely botched the treatment of my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s disease! [From.GetFirstName] is now even worse off than before, barely clinging on to life! I am expected to punish [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] for this transgression, but what would be a suitable punishment?
translation: 宫廷医师[FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]完全搞砸了对我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]的治疗！[From.GetFirstName]现在病情更加严重了，几乎是勉强维持生命！我要惩罚[FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]的过错，但用何种惩罚比较好？

original: Off with [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] head!
translation: 砍了[FromFromFrom.GetHerHis]脑袋！

original: I will talk some sense into [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim].
translation: 我会和[FromFromFrom.GetHerHim]讲道理。

original: Easy now, [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] is trying [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] best.
translation: 放轻松，[FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]正在尽[FromFromFrom.GetHerHis]最大努力。

original: Into the dungeon with [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim]!
translation: 把[FromFromFrom.GetHerHim]扔进地牢！

original: After being skillfully treated by Court Physician [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName], my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is feeling much better. Perhaps [FromFromFrom.GetSheHe] is deserving of some praise?
translation: 在接受宫廷医师[FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]优秀的治疗后，我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]感觉好多了。或许应该给[FromFromFrom.GetSheHe]一点奖赏？

original: I should compensate [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] for a job well done!
translation: 我应该奖赏[FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]出色地完成了任务！

original: No, [FromFromFrom.GetSheHe] is merely doing [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] job.
translation: 不，[FromFromFrom.GetSheHe]只不过完成了[FromFromFrom.GetHerHis]应当做的工作。

original: I shall personally praise [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim] to the court!
translation: 我将在宫廷内亲自表扬[FromFromFrom.GetHerHim]！

original: Torture Imprisoned
translation: 酷刑折磨囚犯

original: Tortured Me
translation: 折磨我

original: Tortured Kin
translation: 亲属受到折磨

original: Tortured Close Kin
translation: 折磨了近亲

original: Why complicate things when there is nothing like the good old rack? Judging by [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s screams it seems like [From.GetSheHe] learnt [From.GetHerHis] lesson...
translation: 为什么任何复杂的东西都比不上好的旧刑架呢？从[From.GetTitledFirstName]的尖叫声中可以知道，[From.GetSheHe]貌似已经得到了[From.GetHerHis]教训……

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] will think twice before crossing me again.
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]将学会在反对我之前要再三考虑。

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate when suddenly your jailor enters and drags you from your cell. "Do not worry" he assured you, with a less than reassuring smile. "You will not meet the headman's axe today. The merciful [From.GetTitle] has decided that the rack will suffice."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来把你从牢里拖出去。「别担心，」他向你保证，露出不太令人放心的微笑，「今天你不会挨刽子手的斧头。仁慈的[From.GetTitle]决定刑架就足够了。」

original: M-me-merciful?!
translation: 仁——仁慈？！

original: Oh, the sweet kiss of the whip! [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be sleeping on [From.GetHerHis] stomach for quite some time. Judging by [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s screams it seems like [From.GetSheHe] learnt [From.GetHerHis] lesson...
translation: 哦，鞭子给予的甜蜜之吻！[From.GetTitledFirstName]将会把[From.GetHerHis]腹部朝下，趴着睡好长一段时间。从[From.GetTitledFirstName]的尖叫声中可以知道，[From.GetSheHe]貌似已经得到了[From.GetHerHis]教训……

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] better watch [From.GetHerHis] back...
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]最好小心[From.GetHerHis]背部……

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate when suddenly your jailor enters and drags you from your cell. "Do not worry" he assured you, with a less than reassuring smile. "You will not meet the headman's axe today. The merciful [From.GetTitle] has decided that the whip will suffice."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来把你从牢里拖出去。「别担心，」他向你保证，露出不太令人放心的微笑，「今天你不会挨刽子手的斧头。仁慈的[From.GetTitle]决定鞭笞就足够了。」

original: M-me-merciful?!
translation: 仁——仁慈？！

original: A bucket of rats was strapped to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s chest and  heated with burning coals. Fortunately, it was removed before the rats managed to gnaw a way through [From.GetHerHim]. Judging by [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s screams it seems like [From.GetSheHe] learnt [From.GetHerHis] lesson...
translation: 一群老鼠装在桶里绑在[From.GetTitledFirstName]的胸口并烧煤加热。幸运的是，桶在老鼠成功咬穿[From.GetHerHim]的身体之前拿开了。从[From.GetTitledFirstName]的尖叫声中可以知道，[From.GetSheHe]貌似已经得到了[From.GetHerHis]教训……

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] should be grateful to be alive...
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]应该感激自己还活着……

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate in your lonely cell when suddenly your jailor enters. "A proper introduction to your cell mates is due" he says and drags you with him. "The rats. While they might appear withdrawn at first, I'm certain you will think them forward enough when they gnaw through your chest."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来。「你的牢房室友需要个正式的介绍」他说着把你拉到他身边。「老鼠。虽然它们一开始可能会表现的有些孤僻，但我肯定你会充分认识它们，尤其是当它们咬穿你的胸部后。」

original: Wha-what...?!
Tickled Me Wrong
translation: 挠到错处

original: Tickled Me Right
translation: 挠到对处

original: For [From.GetHerHis] heinous crime, that [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetTitledFirstName] deserves nothing but the most excruciating punishment. [From.GetSheHeCap] will be tortured... with a feather.
translation: 因为[From.GetHerHis]罪大恶极，[GetRootFromInsult][From.GetTitledFirstName]应接受最痛苦的惩罚。[From.GetSheHeCap]将会接受折磨……用羽毛来执行。

original: Tickle [From.GetHerHim]! Tickle [From.GetHerHim] until [From.GetSheHe] screams of laughter!
translation: 给[From.GetHerHim]搔痒！挠[From.GetHerHim]直到[From.GetSheHe]大笑出来！

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate when suddenly your jailor enters. You struggle to decipher the look on his face, but you think he might be... disappointed. You demand to know what is going on. "Our almighty [From.GetTitle] has ordered you to be tortured... with a feather."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来。你尝试着解读他脸上的表情，但你认为他可能……有些失望。你请求想知道发生了什么。「我们伟大的[From.GetTitle]决定让你接受折磨……只不过是用一根羽毛。」

original: Alright...
translation: 好吧……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was undressed, tied to a pole and left out in the heat for a few days. While it seems like [From.GetSheHe] suffered no permanent damage, [From.GetSheHe] had to be carried back inside. You are sure [From.GetSheHe] learnt [From.GetHerHis] lesson...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]被脱光衣服，绑在柱子上，在烈日下曝晒了几天。尽管[From.GetSheHe]看起来没有受到永久性伤害，但[From.GetSheHe]必须要带回牢里去了。你确定[From.GetSheHe]得到了[From.GetHerHis]教训……

original: A sufficient punishment.
translation: 一个适当的惩罚。

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate when suddenly your jailor enters. "Remove your clothes" he demands with an ominous grin. "Do not worry, no one will stare at you. You will be quite alone. In the wilderness. Tied to a pole."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来。「脱掉你的衣服」他命令你，带着不详的微笑。「别担心，没人会盯着你看。你将会一个人，在荒野里，绑在一根柱子上。」

original: Y-you must be kidding...? S-surely?
translation: 你…你一定是在开玩笑……？说…说真的吗？

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was undressed, tied to a pole and left out in the snow overnight. While it seems like [From.GetSheHe] suffered no permanent damage, [From.GetSheHe] had to be carried back inside. You are sure [From.GetSheHe] learnt [From.GetHerHis] lesson...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]被脱光衣服，绑在柱子上，在雪夜下冻了几天。尽管[From.GetSheHe]看起来没有受到永久性伤害，但[From.GetSheHe]必须要带回牢里去了。你确定[From.GetSheHe]得到了[From.GetHerHis]教训……

original: At least [From.GetSheHe] lives to tell the tale.
translation: 至少[From.GetSheHe]还能活着讲他的故事。

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate when suddenly your jailor enters. "Remove your clothes" he demands with an ominous grin. "Do not worry, no one will stare at you. You will be quite alone. In the wilderness. Tied to a pole."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来。「脱掉你的衣服」他命令你，带着不详的微笑。「别担心，没人会盯着你看。你将会一个人，在荒野里，绑在一根柱子上。」

original: Y-you must be kidding...? S-surely?
translation: 你…你一定是在开玩笑……？说…说真的吗？

original: Mutilate Imprisoned
translation: 致残囚犯

original: As §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is your prisoner, you may give the order to mutilate [Root.GetHerHim] as punishment. While §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will probably survive, the injuries will be permanent.
translation: 既然§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!是你的囚犯，你可以命令致残[Root.GetHerHim]作为惩罚。尽管§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会活下来，但会造成身体永久性的损伤。

original: Mutilated Me
translation: 致残我

original: Mutilated Kin
translation: 致残亲属

original: Mutilated Close Kin
translation: 致残了近亲

original: You order the jailor to drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] cell while you methodically prepare your tools. No one crosses you unscathed and [From.GetFirstName] will become a living example of this. At least that's the plan, but who knows? You could... slip.
translation: 你命令狱卒把[From.GetTitledFirstName]从[From.GetHerHis]牢中拖出来，期间你可以有条不紊地准备你的工具。没人可以反对你后而毫发无伤，[From.GetFirstName]将成为一个活生生的例子。至少这目前还只是个打算，但谁知道呢？你可以……手滑一下。

original: I have not come for your head. Your leg will do just fine.
translation: 我对你的脑袋不感兴趣。你的腿则正好。

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate when suddenly the jailor enters and drags you out of your cell. Outside, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] awaits. Your blood runs cold when you see [FromFrom.GetHerHis] cold grin. "Do not worry, you [GetFromFromRootInsult]. I have not come for your head. Your leg will do just fine."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来把你从牢里拖出去。在外面，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]正等着。当你看到[FromFrom.GetHerHis]残忍的微笑，你全身的血一瞬间变冷了。「别担心，[GetFromFromRootInsult]。我对你的脑袋不感兴趣。你的腿就够了。」

original: M-my... my leg? Please! No! NOOO!!!
translation: 我…我的……腿？求求你！不！不要！！！

original: You order the jailor to drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] cell while you methodically prepare your tools. No one crosses you unscathed and [From.GetFirstName] will become a living example of this. At least that's the plan, but who knows? You could... slip.
translation: 你命令狱卒把[From.GetTitledFirstName]从[From.GetHerHis]牢中拖出来，期间你可以有条不紊地准备你的工具。没人可以反对你后而毫发无伤，[From.GetFirstName]将成为一个活生生的例子。至少这目前还只是个打算，但谁知道呢？你可以……手滑一下。

original: I have not come for your head. Your hand will do just fine.
translation: 我对你的脑袋不感兴趣。你的手则正好。

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate when suddenly the jailor enters and drags you out of your cell. Outside, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] awaits. Your blood runs cold when you see [FromFrom.GetHerHis] cold grin. "Do not worry, you [GetFromFromRootInsult]. I have not come for your head. Your hand will do just fine."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来把你从牢里拖出去。在外面，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]正等着。当你看到[FromFrom.GetHerHis]残忍的微笑，你全身的血一瞬间变冷了。「别担心，[GetFromFromRootInsult]。我对你的脑袋不感兴趣。你的手就够了。」

original: M-my... my hand? Please! No! NOOO!!!
translation: 我…我的……手？求求你！不！不要！！！

original: You order the jailor to drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] cell while you methodically prepare your tools. No one crosses you unscathed and [From.GetFirstName] will become a living example of this. At least that's the plan, but who knows? You could... slip.
translation: 你命令狱卒把[From.GetTitledFirstName]从[From.GetHerHis]牢中拖出来，期间你可以有条不紊地准备你的工具。没人可以反对你后而毫发无伤，[From.GetFirstName]将成为一个活生生的例子。至少这目前还只是个打算，但谁知道呢？你可以……手滑一下。

original: I have not come for your head. Your eye will do just fine.
translation: 我对你的脑袋不感兴趣。你的眼睛则正好。

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate when suddenly the jailor enters and drags you out of your cell. Outside, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] awaits. Your blood runs cold when you see [FromFrom.GetHerHis] cold grin. "Do not worry, you [GetFromRootInsult]. I have not come for your head. Your eye will do just fine."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来把你从牢里拖出去。在外面，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]正等着。当你看到[FromFrom.GetHerHis]残忍的微笑，你全身的血一瞬间变冷了。「别担心，[GetFromRootInsult]。我对你的脑袋不感兴趣。你的眼睛就够了。」

original: M-my... my eye? Please! No! NOOO!!!
translation: 我…我的……眼睛？求求你！不！不要！！！

original: You order the jailor to drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] cell while you methodically prepare your tools. No one crosses you unscathed and [From.GetFirstName] will become a living example of this. At least that's the plan, but who knows? You could... slip.
translation: 你命令狱卒把[From.GetTitledFirstName]从[From.GetHerHis]牢中拖出来，期间你可以有条不紊地准备你的工具。没人可以反对你后而毫发无伤，[From.GetFirstName]将成为一个活生生的例子。至少这目前还只是个打算，但谁知道呢？你可以……手滑一下。

original: I have not come for your head. Your nose will do just fine.
translation: 我对你的脑袋不感兴趣。不过你的鼻子则正好。

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate when suddenly the jailor enters and drags you out of your cell. Outside, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] awaits. Your blood runs cold when you see [FromFrom.GetHerHis] cold grin. "Do not worry, you [GetFromFromRootInsult]. I have not come for your head. Your nose will do just fine."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来把你从牢里拖出去。在外面，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]正等着。当你看到[FromFrom.GetHerHis]残忍的微笑，你全身的血一瞬间变冷了。「别担心，[GetFromFromRootInsult]。我对你的脑袋不感兴趣。你的鼻子就够了。」

original: M-my... my nose? Please! No! NOOO!!!
translation: 我…我的……鼻子？求求你！不！不要！！！

original: You order the jailor to drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] cell while you methodically prepare your tools. No one crosses you unscathed and [From.GetFirstName] will become a living example of this. At least that's the plan, but who knows? You could... slip.
translation: 你命令狱卒把[From.GetTitledFirstName]从[From.GetHerHis]牢中拖出来，期间你可以有条不紊地准备你的工具。没人可以反对你后而毫发无伤，[From.GetFirstName]将成为一个活生生的例子。至少这目前还只是个打算，但谁知道呢？你可以……手滑一下。

original: I have not come for your head. Your manhood will do.
translation: 我对你的脑袋不感兴趣。你的男性象征就够了。

original: You are quietly contemplating your fate when suddenly the jailor enters and drags you out of your cell. Outside, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] awaits. Your blood runs cold when you see [FromFrom.GetHerHis] cold grin. "Do not worry, you [GetFromFromRootInsult]. I have not come for your head. Your manhood will do just fine."
translation: 当你安静地揣测你的命运的时候，狱卒突然走进来把你从牢里拖出去。在外面，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]正等着。当你看到[FromFrom.GetHerHis]残忍的微笑，你全身的血一瞬间变冷了。「别担心，[GetFromFromRootInsult]。我对你的脑袋不感兴趣。你的男性象征就够了。」

original: M-my... my manhood? Please! No! NOOO!!!
translation: 我的……男性象征？不！不要！！！

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! is castrated.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!被阉了。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes one-legged.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!成了独腿。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes one-handed.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!成了独手。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes one-eyed.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!成了独眼龙。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes disfigured.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!被毁容。

original: Your swollen lymphs have blackened and burst, spewing out blood and pus. You have contracted the Plague.
translation: 你肿胀的淋巴变黑并爆裂开来，喷吐出血和脓液。你染上了大瘟疫。

original: What started out as a mere cough has now turned into shaking chills, shortness of breath and stabs of severe pain in the chest. You have contracted Pneumonia.
translation: 开始仅仅只是咳嗽，如今已恶化成全身寒冷颤抖不止，短促的呼吸和胸口剧烈的刺痛。你得了肺炎。

original: Repulsive sores and abscesses are spreading across your body, originating from the groin. You have contracted the Great Pox.
translation: 令人厌恶的溃疡和脓肿从腹部开始，蔓延至你的全身。你染上了梅毒。

original: You are thrown between waves of chills and sweats. Food has lost its appeal and no amount of sleep seems to remedy your fatigue. You have contracted Consumption.
translation: 你的身体忽冷忽热。你对食物丝毫没有胃口，再怎么多的睡眠都无法消除你的疲乏。你染上了肺痨。

original: You feel as if you are burning up and at times you have difficulties distinguishing between dreams and reality. You have contracted Slow Fever.
translation: 你感觉你像在燃烧，有时候你甚至分不清梦境和现实的区别。你染上了慢性热。

original: Your mind is clouded and a dull red rash is spreading across your body. You feel hot and your joints ache. You have contracted Camp Fever.
translation: 你的脑袋昏昏沉沉，一种红疹蔓延到你的全身。你觉得很热，你的关节很疼。你染上了露营热。

original: You are suffering a high fever and a red, itching rash has slowly spread across your entire body. You have contracted Measles.
translation: 你发了高烧，一种红色的发痒的皮疹已经慢慢地蔓延到你的全身。你染上了麻疹。

original: Yesterday lesions appeared on your face and swiftly spread across your body. Now they have turned to blisters filled with pus. You have contracted Smallpox.
translation: 昨天病变出现在你的脸上并迅速得扩散到了身体。现在它们已经转化成充满的脓浆的水疱。你染上了天花。

original: Repulsive sores and abscesses are spreading across your body, originating from the groin. You are Syphilitic.
translation: 令人厌恶的溃疡和脓肿从腹股沟蔓延到了身体。你染上了阿兹特克梅毒。

original: You are confined to your bed, your body racked with aches and chills. You have contracted the Flu.
translation: 你躺在床上，身体受到疼痛和发冷的折磨。你染上了流感。

original: You spend most of your waking hours on the privy, where you frequently pass a loose, bloody stool. You have contracted Dysentery.
translation: 你大部分清醒的时间都在厕所排泄带血的稀屎，你染上了痢疾。

original: You are pained with hot, swollen joints which disturb your sleep. You have contracted Gout.
translation: 你又疼又热，关节肿胀让你无法安睡。你染上了痛风。

original: When you are not passing a loose stool in the chamber pot, you are bent over it, retching. You are suffering from Food Poisoning.
translation: 你不是蹲在夜壶上拉稀就是弯腰干呕。你正在受到食物中毒折磨。

original: You feel possessed, full of uncontrollable excitement and irrational fears! You have contracted Rabies.
translation: 你就像着魔了一样，充满了无法控制的兴奋和非理性的恐惧！你染上了狂犬病。

original: The symptoms which have troubled you lately were a sign of something much worse. You have Cancer.
translation: 困扰着你的症状是更为险恶疾病的迹象。你患上了癌症。

original: Cancer
translation: 癌症

original: This character has cancer – tumors spreading through their body, draining the life out of them.
translation: 这个角色患上了癌症——肿瘤蔓延至他们的全身，消耗着他们的生命力。

original: The pot which [FromFrom.GetBestName] brought with [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to your chambers emitted a strange buzzing sound. Before you could stop [FromFrom.GetHerHim] [FromFrom.GetSheHe] threw it on the floor, where it exploded in a cloud of pottery shards and swarm of furious bees. As your physician fled the room, you remained their only target.
translation: [FromFrom.GetBestName][FromFrom.GetHerHim]拿到你卧室的那个陶罐，发出奇怪的嗡嗡声。还没来得及阻止[FromFrom.GetHerHim]，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]就将陶罐扔在地上，炸裂成陶器碎片和蜂群组成的云雾。你的医师立刻逃离了房间，留下你作为它们的唯一目标。

original: You could not believe your eyes when [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] pulled a severed hand from [FromFrom.GetHerHis] satchel. The black spots on its finger sent chills down your spine and you demanded to know where [FromFrom.GetSheHe] got it from. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] only hushed you and proceeded to rub the severed hand against your chest.
translation: 当[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]从[FromFrom.GetHerHis]挎包拿出一只断手时，你简直不敢相信自己的眼睛。手指上的黑色斑点使你脊背发冷，你想知道[FromFrom.GetSheHe]是从哪里得到它的。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]只是让你安静下来并继续用断手紧贴着你的胸部摩擦。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] presented you with a potion of the most peculiar sorts. It had neither odor nor taste and possessed the appearance of liquid silver. The metallic potion was easy enough to ingest and you could not understand why this was the risky treatment option.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]向你呈献了一种非常特殊的药剂。它既没有气味也没有味道并拥有水银的外观。这种金属质感的药剂能很轻易的咽下，你不明白为何这是一种冒险的治疗方案。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] insisted that the only cure for your condition was a naked midnight run. During the next full moon [FromFrom.GetSheHe] forced you to undress and sprint through the wilderness. "Do not stop until your legs give out under you!" [FromFrom.GetSheHe] yelled after you. "Expel the evil through your sweat!"
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]坚持认为午夜裸奔是唯一能治愈你的办法。在下一个满月期间[FromFrom.GetSheHe]强迫你脱光并奔跑穿越荒野。「直到双腿跑不动了之前都不要停下！」[FromFrom.GetSheHe]在你身后喊道。「通过你的汗水驱逐邪恶！」

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] made you drink a draught of poppy before strapping you down on [FromFrom.GetHerHis] operating table. You almost dozed off while [FromFrom.GetSheHe] prepared [FromFrom.GetHerHis] instruments, but when [FromFrom.GetSheHe] raised a scalpel towards your eye, you felt wide awake. "I am sorry, my [Root.GetLordLady], but we must remove the root of the problem."
translation: 在把你绑在[FromFrom.GetHerHis]手术台上之前[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你喝下一杯罂粟汁。在[FromFrom.GetSheHe]准备好[FromFrom.GetHerHis]仪器的时候你几乎睡着了，但是当[FromFrom.GetSheHe]朝你的眼睛举起手术刀的时候，你清醒了过来。「我很抱歉，[Root.GetLordLady]，但是我们必须切除问题的根源。」

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a draught which tasted most peculiar. It made you feel numb and your eyelids started drooping. "I apologize, my [Root.GetLordLady], but you do not want to be awake for this next part" [FromFrom.GetSheHe] said. Panic hit you and you tried to get up from the operating table, but your limbs would not obey.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]向你呈献了一种味道非常特殊的汁液。它使你感觉麻木并让你的眼睑开始下垂。「我很抱歉，[Root.GetLordLady]，但是你不会想清醒地看着下面的场景的。」[FromFrom.GetSheHe]说道。你恐慌地想从手术台上爬起来，但你无法控制自己的四肢。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s assistant assured [FromFrom.GetHerHim] you were asleep. However, [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s potion had failed to fully take effect– even though you could neither speak nor move, you were still aware of everything they did to you. You tried to scream and thrash, but you were a prisoner in your own body. The procedure seemed to last forever...
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的助手向[FromFrom.GetHerHim]保证会让你入睡。然而，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的药剂未能完全生效——虽然你既不能说话也不能活动，你还是知道了他们对你做的一切。你试图尖叫和挣扎，但你被囚禁在自己的身体之中。这手术似乎将永远持续下去……

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] informed you that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] had identified the tainted tissue which was the root of your disease, and that removing it would most likely cure you. You were most pleased and agreed to the surgery. However, in hindsight, you wish that [FromFrom.GetFirstName] told you that "the tissue" was your face...
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]告知[FromFrom.GetSheHe]已经确定你的疾病的根源是受污染的身体组织，移除它们将有很大可能治好你。你非常高兴并同意了这个手术。然而，现在想来，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]所谓的「身体组织」是你的脸……

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] buckled the last strap, securing you on the operating table. "I will not lie to you, my [Root.GetLordLady]. This will be excruciatingly painful, but it must be done." You tried to protest when [FromFrom.GetFirstName] brought out the saw, but due to the calming potion [FromFrom.GetSheHe] had made you drink, you slurred the words beyond comprehension.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]扣上了最后一条带子，将你固定在手术台上。「我不会向你说谎，[Root.GetLordLady]。这将是极度痛苦的，但也是必须的。」当[FromFrom.GetFirstName]拿出锯子时你试图表示抗议，但是由于[FromFrom.GetSheHe]已经让你喝下了镇定药剂，你只能含糊不清地发出一些难以理解的词语。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] buckled the last strap, securing you on the operating table. "I will not lie to you, my [Root.GetLordLady]. This will be excruciatingly painful, but it must be done." You tried to protest when [FromFrom.GetFirstName] brought out the saw, but due to the calming potion [FromFrom.GetSheHe] had made you drink, you slurred the words beyond comprehension.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]扣上了最后一条带子，将你固定在手术台上。「我不会向你说谎，[Root.GetLordLady]。这将是极度痛苦的，但也是必须的。」当[FromFrom.GetFirstName]拿出锯子时你试图表示抗议，但是由于[FromFrom.GetSheHe]已经让你喝下了镇定药剂，你只能含糊不清地发出一些难以理解的词语。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] insisted that your humors were out of balance and that the best way to restore them would be through bloodletting. After consulting the astronomical charts, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] decided that you should be bled from your armpits and temples.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]坚持认为你的体液已经失去了平衡，而放血是最好的恢复办法。查阅了天文图表之后，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]确定了应该从你的腋下与两鬓放血。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you to undress and then kneel with your buttocks raised. That was awkward enough, but when you saw the instrument in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] hands you almost bolted. [FromFrom.GetFirstName] must have noticed, because [FromFrom.GetSheHe] patted you calmingly on the shoulder and told you to stop clenching.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你脱下衣服并撅起屁股跪下。这已经够令人尴尬了，但当看见[FromFrom.GetHerHis]手中的仪器时你几乎要狂奔离去。[FromFrom.GetFirstName]肯定注意到了这情况，因为[FromFrom.GetSheHe]轻拍了一下你的肩膀安慰你并让你别再磨牙。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] entered your chambers with an earthenware jar cradled in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] arms and came to sit by your bed. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] pulled a leech from the jar and gave it a most tender look before carefully placing it on your face. "Remain still, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Better not disturb their feeding."
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]来到你的房间，[FromFrom.GetHerHis]手上抱着一个陶罐坐在了你的床上。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]从罐子里扯出一条水蛭并小心翼翼的将它用最温柔的动作放在你的脸上。「保持安静，[Root.GetLordLady]。最好别打扰它们进食。」

original: When [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] entered your chambers [FromFrom.GetSheHe] was followed by an air most foul. The stench seemed to originate from the jar in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] hands– "a mixture of cow's dung and herbs for your poultice, [Root.GetMasterMistress]". When [FromFrom.GetFirstName] proceeded to smear it on your chest you almost retched.
translation: 当[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]进入你的房间时[FromFrom.GetSheHe]带来了一股及其污秽的气息。这股恶臭似乎来源于[FromFrom.GetHerHis]他手中的罐子——「这是为你调制的一种混合了牛粪与药草的膏药，[Root.GetMasterMistress]。」当[FromFrom.GetFirstName]继续把它涂在你的胸部时你差点吐了出来。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] presented you with the charred carcass of a cat and prompted you to dig in. As you ate, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] told you how [FromFrom.GetSheHe] had chased the plump feline around your holdings for hours. You felt as if [FromFrom.GetSheHe] wanted praise for [FromFrom.GetHerHis] hard work, but the vile taste of the meal kept you silent.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]向你献上一条烧焦的猫的尸体并怂恿你吃下。当你吃完之后，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]告诉你[FromFrom.GetSheHe]是如何花了好几个小时在你的地产附近抓到这只肥猫。你觉得[FromFrom.GetSheHe]想要为[FromFrom.GetHerHis]努力获得赞赏，但这顿饭里邪恶的味道使你保持了沉默。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] brought a croaking bucket to your chambers and told you to expose your upper body. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] grabbed a toad, gutted it with a deft hand and proceeded to place the still twitching carcass on your chest. [FromFrom.GetFirstName] continued until the bucket was empty and your torso was covered.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]带着一个呱呱叫的桶来到你的房间并让你脱光上半身。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]抓住一只癞蛤蟆，用他灵巧的手取出内脏再把仍在抽搐的尸体放在你的胸部。[FromFrom.GetFirstName]不断重复这个动作直到掏空了木桶并铺满了你的躯干。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] came to your chambers and offered you a draught which was yellow in color. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] told you to pinch your nose as you drank it. When the tepid liquid passed your lips you almost immediately spat it out again. You demanded to know the content and [FromFrom.GetSheHe] revealed that it was fresh urine from a pregnant sow.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]来到你的房间并献给一瓶黄色的汁液。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]让你捏着鼻子喝下去。当这些温热的液体流进你的嘴唇的时候你又一次差点吐了出来。你询问[FromFrom.GetSheHe]得知这是新鲜的怀孕母猪尿液。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] lowered [FromFrom.GetHerHis] hand into the bucket [FromFrom.GetSheHe] brought to to your chambers. When [FromFrom.GetSheHe] pulled it out again a little fish was wriggling between [FromFrom.GetHerHis] fingers. "Open wide" [FromFrom.GetSheHe] prompted you and dropped it in your mouth. You struggled not to retch as it tickled the back of your throat.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把[FromFrom.GetHerHis]手放进[FromFrom.GetSheHe]带进你房间的桶内。当[FromFrom.GetSheHe]再次伸出时一条小鱼在[FromFrom.GetHerHis]手指间扭动。「张大嘴。」[FromFrom.GetSheHe]催促着并把鱼放进你的嘴里。当它在你喉咙里搔痒的时候你努力忍着没吐出来。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] brought you a concoction made from buckthorn and senna. At first you thought the potion ineffectual, but later the same day you felt a churning in your bowels which sent you running for the privy. As you howled in anguish, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] assured you that the foulness was expelled with your feces.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]给你带来了一种鼠李与番泻叶的混合物。起初你以为这药剂没有效果，但晚些时候你的肚子就翻滚得使你奔向厕所。在你痛苦的嚎叫起来后，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]向你保证秽物会随着你的粪便一起排出。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] was convinced that the best course of treatment would be some rest. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] surrounded you in soft pillows and gently tucked you in under many layers of blankets. Before [FromFrom.GetFirstName] left your chambers, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] pulled your curtains shut. It was noon.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]确信最好的治疗方法就是休息一下。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]用很多柔软的枕头把你包围着并温柔的替你盖上了很多层毯子。在[FromFrom.GetFirstName]离开你房间之前，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]拉上了你的窗帘。现在是中午。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] contributed your ailments to an unsound diet. To revitalize your body [FromFrom.GetSheHe] insisted you consume only raw vegetables and herbal teas for a fortnight. So as not to tempt you, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] confiscated your stash of treats. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] never returned them.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]认为你的疾病是不健康的饮食导致的。为了让你的身体重获健康，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]坚持你在一个星期之内只能吃新鲜蔬菜与药草茶。为了让你不受到诱惑，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]没收了你藏起来的食物。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]再也没有归还它们。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you to lie down on your bed and then to offer [FromFrom.GetHerHim] your hands. Firmly [FromFrom.GetSheHe] rubbed and slapped your palms until they were red, and then repeated the treatment on your soles. As a finishing touch [FromFrom.GetSheHe] pinched you gently up and down your limbs.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你躺在床上，把你的手给[FromFrom.GetHerHim]。然后[FromFrom.GetSheHe]摩擦并拍打你的手掌直到它们变成红色，接着在你的脚掌上重复这个治疗。最后，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]轻轻地拍遍你的四肢。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] offered you a clear potion in a gilded vial. As you had tasted some previous remedied of [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s you were worried at first, but as you drank it you could detect neither odor nor taste. You inquired about the ingredients, but [FromFrom.GetSheHe] told you that it was a secret recipe.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]献给你一瓶装在镀金瓶子里的透明药剂。一开始你担心这和你之前试过[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的一些药水一样，但当你喝下去之后发现它既没有气味也没有味道。你询问了药水的成分，但[FromFrom.GetSheHe]告诉你这是一道秘方。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] gave you hot goat's milk with honey for your cough.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]给了你加蜂蜜的热羊奶治疗你的咳嗽。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] instructed you to gargle a salty infusion of licorice root and thyme for your cough.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]嘱咐你用加盐的甘草根与百里香漱口以治疗咳嗽。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you lean over a pot of boiling water and breathe in the steam against your cough.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你倾倒一盘沸水并在蒸汽中深呼吸以治疗咳嗽。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] instructed you to avoid spices and fatty foods to treat your diarrhea.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]嘱咐你远离香料与高脂肪的食物以治疗你的腹泻。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a pot of steaming chamomile tea to treat your diarrhea.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]给你一壶热气腾腾的甘菊茶来治疗腹泻。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you to eat ten apples a day to treat your diarrhea.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你每天吃十个苹果来治疗腹泻。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you to eat plenty of spicy food to remedy your fatigue.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你进食大量辛辣的食物来治疗你的疲乏。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] rubbed peppermint leaves on your hands and feet to remedy your fatigue.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]用薄荷叶在你的手脚上摩擦来治疗你的疲乏。

original: To remedy your fatigue, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a draught of milk and poppy to help you sleep.
translation: 为了治疗你的疲乏，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]给了你加罂粟汁的牛奶来帮助睡眠。

original: For your headache [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] handed you a cup of what looked like hot water with red flakes in it and told you to drink it slowly.
translation: 因为你的头痛[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]递给你一杯像是加了红色麦片的热水并让你慢慢喝下它。

original: To relieve your headache [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] ordered you to lay down and rest for the afternoon.
translation: 为了减轻你的头痛[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]命令你整个下午都躺下休息。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] filled your pillows with dried branches of lavender and peppermint, hoping it would relieve your headache. It smelled lovely.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]用干燥的薰衣草和胡椒薄荷充填你的枕头，希望这能缓解你的头痛。枕头很好闻。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] refurnished your room. "Your bed facing eastwards might ease your pain."
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]翻修了你的房间。「把你的床朝向东方应该会缓解你的痛苦。」

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] locked you in your chambers, accompanied by a small lizard. When the lizard has died your chest pains should ease.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把你锁在你的房间里，只有一条小蜥蜴陪伴。当这条蜥蜴死了之后你的胸痛应该就会缓解。

original: For your chest pains [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you to sleep with your door open. "You have to let the spirits in", [FromFrom.GetSheHe] said.
translation: 因为你的胸痛[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你睡觉时把门开着。「你应该让精灵进来」，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]说。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] clad your bed in wet grass and told you to sleep on this nature's embrace against your rash.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]用湿漉漉的青草铺在你的床上，让你睡在大自然的怀里以治疗你的皮疹。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a stern look. "Remember to use this poultice on your rash every midnight. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] alone won't aid you."
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]摆出一副严厉的表情。「一定要记得每晚在皮疹上覆盖热泥敷剂。只靠[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]是治不好你的。」

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a jar containing a mixture made from goat's milk and the fat of a boar to smear on your rashes.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]给了你一罐由羊奶和野猪脂肪制成的混合物来涂抹你的皮疹。

original: To treat your abdominal pain [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] had you carry around the bone of a chicken, tied into a small pouch, around your neck. "It wards off the bad spirits", [FromFrom.GetSheHe] told you solemnly.
translation: 为了治疗你的腹痛[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你随身携带一块鸡骨，鸡骨装在一个小袋子里，挂在你的脖子上。「它会驱离坏精灵」，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]严肃地告诉你。

original: To remedy your abdominal pain [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] rubbed a strangely scented oil on your stomach and told you to repeat the procedure every morning.
translation: 为了治疗你的腹痛[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]在你的腹部抹上了一种奇怪的香油并让你每个早上都重复一次。

original: To relieve you of your abdominal pain [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] rubbed your stomach for the better part of an hour.
translation: 为了缓解你的腹痛[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]用了大半个小时搓揉你的腹部。

original: To stop you from vomiting [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you to sleep with an acorn under your pillow.
translation: 由于呕吐，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你睡在一个下面放着橡果的枕头上。

original: To remedy your vomiting [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] rubbed a lovely scented oil on every servant of your court. "It's not your fault they are filthy, my [Root.GetLordLady]".
translation: 为了治疗你的呕吐[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]给你宫廷里的每个仆人抹上了一种令人愉悦的香油。「这不是你的错，是他们太脏了，[Root.GetLordLady]。」

original: To keep you from vomiting [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] had you drink a tall glass of a rare onion water following each of your meals.
translation: 为了止住你的呕吐[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你每顿饭后都喝一大杯生洋葱水。

original: To reduce your malaise [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you to stop worrying and to start  delegating your tasks.
translation: 为了缓解你的不适[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你停止忧虑并开始进行你的工作。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you [FromFrom.GetSheHe] had had [FromFrom.GetHerHis] assistant plant some onions. The first to bloom would tell us whether to stop the ointment or not. Until then you rub the sticky stuff onto your chest.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]告诉你[FromFrom.GetSheHe]已经让[FromFrom.GetHerHis]助手种植了一些洋葱。在这些洋葱第一次开花时就会知道我们是否应该停止使用这些药膏。直到那之前你都要把这些黏黏的东西抹在胸部。

original: To treat your malaise [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] ordered you to eat plenty of fatty and well-spiced food.
translation: 为了治疗你的不适[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]要求你去吃大量的脂肪与适当调味过的食物。

original: To reduce your cramps [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] had you stand in a bucket of warm water until your toes had wrinkled.
translation: 为了减缓你的痉挛[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你站在一桶热水中直到你的脚趾都起了皱纹。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a lump of shiny metal to put in your mouth for an hour each night to cure you of your cramps.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]给了你一块闪亮的金属让你每天晚上放在口中一小时以治疗你的痉挛。

original: To lessen the severity of your cramps [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] ordered you to rub your limbs with vinegar every morning and evening.
translation: 为了减轻你痉挛的严重程度[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]命令你每天早晚用醋擦拭四肢。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a footbath against your fever. It was freezing.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]给你洗脚来降烧。洗脚水是冰的。

original: The liquid in the chalice was warm and sour. "It will chase the other heat away", [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] explained.
translation: 大高脚杯中的液体温暖而带有酸味。「它会驱散其他热度」，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]解释道。

original: To combat your fever [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] wrapped you in wet pieces of linen cloth, hoping it would relieve the worst of the heat.
translation: 为了与你的发烧作斗争[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把你包裹在湿亚麻布中，希望它能缓解严重的发热。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] insisted that you would feel much better if your humors were restored to their proper balance and that bloodletting was the best way to go about it.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]坚持如果你的体液恢复到适当的平衡你会感觉更好，而放血就是最好的方法。

original: To balance your humors, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] made you sprint around your keep to induce sweating.
translation: 为了平衡你的体液，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你在附近全速奔跑来持续排汗。

original: In order to bring balance to your humors, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] made you drink salty water to induce vomiting. It was very effective.
translation: 为平衡你的体液，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你喝盐水来催吐。这非常有效。

original: To draw the illness out of your body, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] covered you from head to toe in leeches.
translation: 为了把疾病拉出你的身体，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把你从头顶到脚趾都铺满了水蛭。

original: To relieve you of your worst ailments, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] suggested you should spend more time in prayer.
translation: 为了缓解你的重病，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]建议你应该花更多的时间在祷告上。

original: To invigorate you [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] recommended that you consume what made you strong in the first place, and thus provided you with jugs of human breast milk.
translation: 为了使你精力充沛[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]建议你将变得强壮放在第一位，并因此给予你一壶人奶。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] insisted that the foul smells of civilization made you sick and ordered you to take daily walks in the wilderness.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]坚持文明的污秽气味使你生病并要求你每天到荒野里散步。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] was certain that your illness was caused by too much laughter. To make you better, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] forbade everyone to tell you jokes and provided you with tedious tomes.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]确信你的疾病是因笑得太多了。为了你好，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]禁止大家给你讲笑话并只给你提供乏味的书籍。

original: To rid you of your ailments [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] ordered you to sleep hanging upside down for a couple of days. "It will rebalance you", [FromFrom.GetSheHe] assured you. \n\nYou feel like a bat.
translation: 为了消除你的疾病[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]命令你倒挂着睡觉两天。「这将重新平衡你」，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]向你保证。\n\n你感觉自己像只蝙蝠。

original: To ease your troubles [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] consulted the stars before draining a good portion of your blood.
translation: 为了缓解你的烦恼[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]在放出你的血液中有好大一部分之前咨询了群星。

original: To ease your pain [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] had you write down the names of your worst enemies and, when nobody was looking, toss the parchment into a fire. "Better them than you, my [Root.GetLordLady]."
translation: 为了缓解你的痛楚[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你写下你最讨厌的敌人的名字，当没有人看着的时候，把羊皮纸丢入火种。「他们痛总好过你痛，[Root.GetLordLady]。」

original: To alleviate your pain [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] lit three candles and had you join hands with [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. After a moment of silence [FromFrom.GetSheHe] had you repeat some words after [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in a language you did not understand...
translation: 为了减轻你的痛楚[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]点燃了三支蜡烛并让你拉着[FromFrom.GetHerHim]的手。沉默了片刻后[FromFrom.GetSheHe]让你跟着[FromFrom.GetHerHim]用你无法理解的语言念出几个词语……

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] spent many hours studying the stars before informing you that in order for your strength to return, you had to fast for the better half of a fortnight.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]花费了很多时间研究群星，接着告诉你为了恢复力气，你必须禁食超过一周。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] strapped you to a chair and had you sleep sitting upright for days.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把你绑在椅子上并好几天都让你端坐着睡觉。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] kept you up late for days, stargazing with [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. "To reconnect with the moon", [FromFrom.GetSheHe] said.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你连续好几天熬夜，与[FromFrom.GetHerHim]一起观星。「重新与月亮连接」，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]这样说道。

original: I feel amazing!
translation: 我觉得太神奇了！

original: I should never have trusted [FromFrom.GetFirstName].
translation: 我当初不该信任[FromFrom.GetFirstName]。

original: The treatment was successful, but I paid a heavy price...
translation: 治疗成功了，但我付出了沉重的代价……

original: Curses! May [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] strike [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] down!
translation: 畜生！愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]惩戒[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: I actually feel better.
translation: 其实我感觉好点了。

original: I probably shouldn't have agreed to this...
translation: 可能我不该同意这个……

original: I feel better, I think.
translation: 我想我感觉好点了。

original: Maybe I should have insisted on some other treatment...
translation: 也许我应该坚持用一些别的疗法……

original: I am glad I hired [FromFrom.GetFirstName].
translation: 我很高兴雇用了[FromFrom.GetFirstName]。

original: I am not sure that did anything.
translation: 我不知道那有什么效果。

original: Camp Fever
translation: 露营热

original: Consumption
translation: 肺痨

original: The Plague
translation: 黑死病

original: Measles
translation: 麻疹

original: Smallpox
translation: 天花

original: The Plague has spread across India, from the north river plains to the southernmost tip of Kanyakumari. While the people sought refuge in the temples at first, now they too lay deserted, only corpses bowing before the gods. Bodies bloated beyond recognition float down the Ganges.
translation: 黑死病席卷印度，从北河平原直到羯若鸠摩利最南端。起初人们在神庙中寻求庇护，现在神庙也已废弃，只有尸体在众神面前鞠躬。发胀得面目全非的尸体顺着恒河漂流下来。

original: Death is haunting the continent of Africa as the Plague is spreading among its inhabitants. Blackened bodies lay rotting in the sun and the stench is unbearable. Many have fled the larger settlements but the epidemic follows with the bodies floating down the Nile and the Niger.
translation: 死亡萦绕于非洲大陆之上，黑死病正在它的居住者中传播。发黑的尸体躺在阳光下腐烂并散发令人难以忍受的恶臭。很多人逃离了较大的定居点，但瘟疫随着尸体一起顺着尼罗河与尼日尔河传播。

original: Panic is rising as the Plague reaps its victims across Southern Europe. Peasants and nobles alike have gathered in the churches to pray for mercy from their God. As even the great Rome has become littered with corpses, many fear that the taint is sent by Him as punishment for the people's sins.
translation: 恐慌在黑死病穿越南欧收割感染者时越来越强烈。农民和贵族都聚集在教堂祈求上帝的怜悯，即使是伟大的罗马也已经横尸遍野，很多人担心这场感染是上帝因为人类原罪给予的惩罚。

original: Not even the most remote regions of the world are safe – the Plague has struck northern Europe. The streets of many cities lay deserted as their inhabitants have fled in fear. Despite the heavy quarantine in the harbors, many a ghost ship eerily drift across the Baltic Sea.
translation: 甚至连世界上最偏远的地区都不是安全的——黑死病袭击了北欧。居民在恐惧中逃离后许多城市的街道变得空无一人。尽管港口重重封锁，很多幽灵船依然离奇地越过波罗的海。

original: No one is safe as the Plague claims its victims across the Steppes. Trade is suffering as the affliction spreads across the northern route of the Silk Road. The tribes are riding into the wilderness, desperately trying to escape the epidemic. Trails of dead bodies mark their passing.
translation: 当黑死病横跨草原、向它的受害者索命时，没有人是安全的。贸易因苦难蔓延至丝绸之路北线而遭受打击。各部落进入了旷野，绝望地试图逃离瘟疫。尸体组成了他们逃离路上的信标。

original: the Hideous
translation: 丑八怪

original: was pierced to death on growing bamboo on the order of $KILLER$

original: Took My Advice
translation: 接受了我的建议

original: Did Not Take My Advice
translation: 未接受我的建议

original: Did Not Trust Me
translation: 不信任我

original: the Youthful
translation: 青春

original: the Alchemist
translation: 炼金术士

original: Let us hear this woman out.
translation: 让我们听这女人说完。

original: The old woman introduces herself as [From.GetTitledFirstName] and proceeds to tell you about the noble art of alchemy. She claims to possess the secret knowledge of transmuting the base metals into gold and creating something she calls "alkahest". However, more importantly, she tells you tales of the mysterious Philosopher's Stone which grants its maker eternal life. If you accept her quest, she promises to share her secrets with you.\n\nWhile it is impossible to know if this alleged mystic tells the truth, at least she looks the part. Judging from her wrinkles and hunched back she must be very old. But is she immortal...?
translation: 这名老妇自称[From.GetTitledFirstName]并接着告诉你关于炼金术的高贵艺术。她宣称拥有秘密的知识，可将基本金属转化成黄金和创造她所谓的「万能溶剂」。不管怎样，更重要的是，她向你讲述不可思议的贤者之石会授予它的创造者永恒的生命的传奇故事。如果你接受她的任务，她承诺与你分享她的秘密。\n\n虽然不可能知道这个所谓的神秘主义者说的是否是实话，但至少她的外表看起来信得过。从她的皱纹和驼背判断她一定很老了。但她真的是不朽的吗……？

original: The old, peculiar woman introduces herself as [From.GetTitledFirstName]. At least that is what you think she said - her words are distorted with a foreign accent. She claims to possess the secret knowledge of transmuting the base metals into gold, and more importantly, she tells you tales of the mysterious Philosopher's Stone. If you are to believe her words, it grants its maker eternal life. \n\nWhile you normally would not be inclined to trust a woman like this, her words do intrigue you. In any case she looks the part - judging from her wrinkles and hunched back she must be very old. But is she immortal...?
translation: 这年老，怪异的妇人自称[From.GetTitledFirstName]。她的话带着扭曲的外国口音——至少你认为是这样。她宣称拥有隐秘的知识能将基本金属转化成黄金，更重要的是，她向你讲述不可思议的贤者之石的传奇故事。如果你相信她的话，它将授予创造者永恒的生命。\n\n她的话激起了你的兴趣，而你通常不会倾向于相信一个这样的女人。无论如何她的外表看起来信得过——从她的皱纹和驼背判断她一定很老了。但她真的是不朽的吗……？

original: Trial of the Body
translation: 肉体的试炼

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] explains that you need to obtain the ingredients known as the Three Primes, the first of which is salt. When you offer to send a servant to the kitchen, she protests. "The art of alchemy is not simply one of collecting ingredients and mixing potions. In order to create the Philosopher's Stone, you must also create a better self." \n\nThe old crone insist that you must conquer your body by mastering the art of pickpocketing. Being of noble birth, you have never needed to resort to such methods, but you do pride yourself on being deft of hand. It cannot be that hard, can it?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]解释说，你需要获得成分被称为三大要素，第一种是盐。当你让仆人去厨房拿来时，她反对了。「炼金术的艺术不仅仅是收集材料和混合药剂。为了创造贤者之石，你还必须创造一个更好的自己。」\n这老太婆坚持认为你必须通过掌握偷窃的艺术来克服你的身体。因为出身贵族，你从来没有需要采取这种手段，不过你对自己灵巧的双手有自信。这并不是那么难，不是吗？

original: Teach me all your tricks, wise woman!
translation: 聪明的女人，把你所有的诡计都教给我！

original: I can handle this on my own.
translation: 我可以自己解决。

original: Attempt to teach yourself how to pick pockets.
translation: 试图自学如何扒窃。

original: Actually, I would rather not steal...
translation: 事实上，我宁愿不偷……

original: Decline §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! quest. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court.
translation: 拒绝§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]的任务。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将离开你的宫廷。

original: The day of the first trial has arrived. You have dressed yourself as a lowly commoner and left your guards behind. It is a strange feeling, walking through the crowded market as if you were no one special. Instead of giving way, people walk right into you and spit curses as you stumble. You are starting to feel uneasy and decide to hurry up and get it over with.\n\nHowever, your nerves seem to have gotten the better of you and you make a dreadful mess of your attempt. Within seconds, the spice merchant's guards are pressing your face into the ground. "Don't hurt me! I am [Root.GetBestName]!" you shout in panic. "Yes, and I am [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]," the merchant scoffs and turns to his guards. "Show this dreg what we do with thieves."
translation: 第一个试炼的日子已经到来。你把自己打扮成一个卑微的平民并撇下你的护卫。装作普通人一样穿过拥挤的市场是一种奇妙的感觉。人们并没有为你让路，他们直直冲着你走来并因你的跌跌撞撞而唾骂。你开始感觉不安并决定赶快把那件事做完。\n\n然而，紧张似乎支配了你并使你的企图陷入了困境。几秒钟后，香料商人的护卫把你的脸压在地上。「别伤害我！我是[Root.GetBestName]！」你惊慌地大喊道。「是啊，我还是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]呢，」商人嘲笑着并转向他的护卫。「让这个渣滓看看我们是怎么对待小偷的。」

original: An Encounter with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]
translation: 与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的一次亲密接触

original: I'm the [Root.GetTitle], I swear! Get your hands off me!
translation: 我是[Root.GetTitle]，我发誓！把你的手从我身上拿开！

original: You fail §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!'s quest and she leaves your court.
translation: 你未能完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!的任务，她离开了你的宫廷。

original: Fickle Fingers
translation: 无影手

original: The day of the first trial has arrived. You have dressed yourself as a lowly commoner and left your guards behind. It is a strange feeling, walking through the crowded market as if you were no one special. No one is looking your way and your confidence is growing. However, you decide to take your time. There is no need to rush. \n\nYour patience pays off when you are presented with the perfect opportunity to slip your hand into the spice merchant's pocket. Before you know it, you are on your way back to the keep with the stolen salt in your pouch, and nobody saw a thing. You are really getting the hang of this! On your return the otherwise grouchy [From.GetFirstName] greets you with a pleased smirk. "You did well. Rest now, my [Root.GetLordLady]. The next trial will not be as easy."
translation: 第一个试炼的日子已经到来。你把自己打扮成一个卑微的平民并撇下你的护卫。装作普通人一样穿过拥挤的市场是一种奇妙的感觉。没有人看着你而你的信心正在增长。可是，你决定慢慢来。这不需要着急。\n\n当你得到一个完美的机会把手伸进一名香料商人的口袋中的时候你的耐心有了回报。很快，你带着装着偷来的盐的袋子走在了回去的路上，而且没有任何人看见。你真的掌握了这个窍门！在你返回后原本不高兴的[From.GetFirstName]用满意的笑容迎接了你。「你做得好，现在去休息吧，[Root.GetLordLady]。下一个试炼将不会这么容易。」

original: You're right, I deserve a nap.
translation: 你是对的，我应该小睡一会。

original: Trial of the Mind
translation: 头脑的试炼

original: You almost jump out of your skin when [From.GetFirstName] suddenly steps out from behind a corner. "Heading to bed already, my [Root.GetLordLady]? The night has only begun." Apparently it is time for your next trial and this time you must acquire brimstone. "This one is a trial of the mind, [Root.GetMasterMistress]. You must go to the laboratory and produce the Prime yourself. You have until dawn." Before she disappears again, she hands you a dusty tome. \n\nYou spend several hours desperately trying to make sense of the tome's archaic language. The text seems to mention two different methods– one of which looks very complicated, however the simpler one runs the risk of producing a violent explosion...
translation: 当[From.GetFirstName]突然从一个角落里走出来时你差点吓得灵魂出窍。「要上床睡觉了，[Root.GetLordLady]？夜晚才刚刚开始。」显然是时候进行你的下一个试炼了，这次你必须取得硫磺。「这是头脑的试炼，[Root.GetMasterMistress]。你必须自己到实验室去制备要素。黎明前必须完成。」在再次消失之前，她递给你一本满是灰尘的巨书。\n\n你花了几个小时拼命地试图去理解书中的古代语言。书中似乎提到两种不同的方法——其中一个看起来很复杂，而简单的方法有发生剧烈爆炸的风险……

original: Better to be safe than sorry...
translation: 保证安全要比后悔更好……

original: Pick the complicated but safe method.
translation: 选择复杂但安全的方法。

original: Dying tonight or dying tomorrow, it matters little! I must succeed!
translation: 今天死还是明天死，这都无关紧要！我必须要成功！

original: Pick the simple but dangerous method.
translation: 选择简单但是危险的方法。

original: I'm too tired for this. I'm going to bed.
translation: 我太累了，我该睡了。

original: Decline §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! quest. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court.
translation: 拒绝§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]的任务。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会离开你的宫廷。

original: A Putrid Smell
translation: 腐朽的味道

original: You keep staring at the tome's pages for another couple hours, but your mind is hazy with sleep and the letters only dance before your eyes. The candle is burning low and dawn is fast approaching.
