You must make your attempt now– it is better to fail than to never grasp the opportunity at all. \n\nYou assemble what you think are the proper instruments and get started. The outcome of each step does not at all match the descriptions in the book but you hope for the best and keep going. However, when the first rays of morning light fall through the window you have succeeded with nothing except filling the laboratory with a putrid smell. When [From.GetFirstName] enters, she only gives you a displeased look, half disappointment and half disgust.
translation: 你的双眼又盯着这本厚书看了好几个小时，然而睡意的迷雾已笼罩了你的思绪，字母只好在你双眼外舞蹈。蜡烛将灭，黎明迫近。你现在必须再试一次——失败总比从未试过抓住机会来得好。\n\n你收集好了你认为合适的仪器，开始了最终的尝试。每一步的结果虽然不能吻合书上的描述，但你依然保持乐观并继续进行实验。然而，当清晨的第一缕阳光穿透窗户，你只成功用一股腐臭的气味充满了实验室。当[From.GetFirstName]走进来，她仅仅不悦地望了你一眼，半是失望和半是恶心。

original: I will never read a book again...
translation: 我再也不看书了……

original: You fail §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!'s quest and she leaves your court.
translation: 你没能完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!的任务，她离开了你的宫廷。

original: Fire and Brimstone
translation: 烈火与硫磺

original: You cannot endure the thought of doing nothing but waiting for your impending demise. Life is short and only immortality can grant you peace of mind. You are certain that you grasped all the details of your chosen method– all you need now is a steady hand. \n\nAfter each step, the outcome is identical to the one described in the tome. Your confidence is rising– you are almost there! Your high spirits make you move swifter, but you do not notice. Not until it is too late. At the very last step, you slip and drop the vial in your hand. You do not even have time to flinch before you are engulfed in the roaring flames.
translation: 你无法忍受无所事事，只能等待不断逼近的终结。生命苦短，唯有永生可以抚平你躁动不安的思绪。你十分确定所选方法的所有细节，万事俱备——只欠一只稳定的手。\n\n每一个步骤的结果都与古书上描述的一致。你因而信心满满——就差最后一步了！你高涨的情绪让你的动作变快，但你并没有注意到这一点。直到一切都无法挽回。就在实验的最后一步，你滑了一跤，手中的魔药掉到了地上。连喊救命时间都没有，你就被咆哮的火焰所吞噬。

original: Aaahhh!!!
translation: 啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！

original: You die a horrible death, thus failing §Y[FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s§! quest. She leaves your court.
translation: 你惨烈地死去，因而没能完成§Y[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的§!任务。她离开了你的宫廷。

original: Sharp Mind and Deft Hands
translation: 心灵手巧

original: Despite the late hour, your mind feels as sharp as a razor. While the tome's language troubled you at first, you now feel confident that you have interpreted every detail correctly. The method makes perfect sense and you barely have to glance at the instructions when you assemble all the instruments and ingredients. \n\nAfter each step, the outcome is identical to the one described in the tome. Your confidence is rising– you are almost there! However, you make sure that your high spirits do not get the better of you, and proceed at a steady pace. When [From.GetFirstName] enters at dawn, you present her with vial filled with yellow shards. "Well done, [Root.GetMasterMistress]!" she exclaims with one of her rare smiles. "Only one Prime left!"
translation: 尽管已是深夜，你的思绪依然锋利如刀。虽然古书的用语一开始让你困扰，如今你自信已准确解读书中每一个细节。方法十分有效，你几乎不需要看书上的指引就能收集起所有必要的仪器和材料。\n\n每一个步骤的结果都与古书上描述的一致。你因而信心满满——只有一步之遥了！然而，你确保自己不被高涨的情绪冲昏头脑，并以稳健的节奏继续实验。当[From.GetFirstName]在清晨步入你的房间时，你递给她用黄色水晶瓶装着的魔药。「干得漂亮，[Root.GetMasterMistress]！」她大声赞赏，嘴角浮现出了一丝罕见的笑容，「只剩一个要素了！」

original: I'm quite the scholar, aren't I!
translation: 我真是饱读诗书，不是么！

original: Trial of the Spirit
translation: 灵魂的试炼

original: "The third and most elusive of the Three Primes is the metal known as quicksilver", [From.GetFirstName] announced as she entered your study this morning. Now it is dusk, and she has brought you far from civilization to an abandoned mine. "Here you will perform the last and most dangerous trial, my [Root.GetLordLady]. You will spend the night in this haunted place. If you exit with a piece of quicksilver ore, you have succeeded, and eternal life will be yours. However, if you fail, the ghosts of the past will likely drive you mad– or worse." \n\nYou have wandered the narrow tunnels for almost an hour when a spine-chilling wail echo from the darkness. You freeze– is this one of the ghosts [From.GetFirstName] mentioned?
translation: 「第三个，也是最捉摸不定的三大要素，是名为水银的金属」，[From.GetFirstName]她在今晨进入你的书房时如此声称。现在则已近入夜，而她将你带到了一个远离文明的废弃矿井。「在此，你要完成最后也是最危险的试炼，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。你将在此闹鬼之地度过今夜。若你能带出一块水银矿石，你就成功了，永恒的生命即属于你。不过，若你失败，过去的鬼魂会让你疯狂——甚至更糟。」\n\n你已在狭小的坑道里瞎走了近一个小时，一个毛骨悚然的哀嚎在黑暗中回荡。你僵在原地——这是[From.GetFirstName]提及的鬼魂之一吗？

original: The specter must know this place, maybe it can help?
translation: 那个幽灵一定了解这个地方，它能帮忙么？

original: Take a risk and ask the ghost for guidance.
translation: 冒险，向幽灵寻求指引。

original: I will venture down another tunnel...
translation: 我会冒险试试另一条隧道……

original: Avoid the ghost and keep searching on your own.
translation: 避开鬼魂，继续自己寻找出路。

original: I will not stay down here a moment longer!
translation: 我再也不想在这多待一秒钟了！

original: Abandon §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s quest. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court.
translation: 放弃§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的任务。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!会离开你的宫廷。

original: The End of the Road
translation: 路的尽头

original: You hesitantly call out for the ghost. At first, nothing happens, and you think you must have been mistaken. Then suddenly an ear-deafening roar breaks the silence. You turn on your heel and run for your life, but stumble almost instantly. As the roar grows louder you fear that this is the end, but a rush of wind passes by above your head and then everything is silent. When you get back up, you spot the rock you tripped over. A crimson piece of mercury ore! \n\nYou raise the rock triumphantly above your head as you step into the daylight. [From.GetFirstName] greets you with a pleased laugh. "Excellent, [Root.GetMasterMistress]. Tonight, we will create the Philosopher's Stone, and immortality will be yours."
translation: 你犹豫着向鬼魂发出呼唤。一开始，什么都没发生，你觉得肯定是错觉。突然间震耳欲聋的咆哮打破了寂静。你掉头逃命，但几乎立刻跘倒。咆哮的声音越来越大，你害怕自己要交待在这里，但一阵劲风吹过你的头顶，一切又重归寂静。而爬起来时，你看到那块跘倒你的石头。一块猩红的汞矿石！\n\n你踏进晨光，胜利般地举起这块石头。[From.GetFirstName]带着满意的微笑祝贺你。「太好了，[Root.GetMasterMistress]。今夜，我们就创造出贤者之石，永生将属于你。」

original: I have conquered Death, the greatest adversary of all.
translation: 我已经征服了死亡，一切事物的大敌。

original: You have successfully completed §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! quest and have gained immortality.\n
translation: 你成功完成了§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!任务并获得了永生。\n

original: A Fortunate Accident
translation: 幸运的意外

original: Quietly you walk back to the last intersection and continue your search down another tunnel. How much time has passed? Hours or days, it is impossible to tell. Your own breath has grown so loud in your ears and you keep seeing the same rock formations over and over again... When you trip on a rock you just lay there for a few minutes, contemplating surrender. However, when you do get up, you spot the rock you tripped over. A crimson piece of mercury ore! \n\nYou raise the rock triumphantly above your head as you step into the daylight. [From.GetFirstName] greets you with a pleased laugh. "Excellent, [Root.GetMasterMistress]. Tonight, we will create the Philosopher's Stone, and immortality will be yours."
translation: 静悄悄地走回上一个岔口，你向另一个坑道继续搜寻。已经过去多长时间了？几个小时还是几天？没可能知道。呼吸声在你的耳朵听来显得太吵了，同样的石头不停地出现……当你在一块石头上跘了一下，你直接躺倒在地好几分钟，考虑要不要放弃。然而，等你成功爬起来，你看到那块跘倒你的石头。一块猩红的汞矿石！\n\n你踏进晨光，胜利般地举起这块石头。[From.GetFirstName]带着满意的微笑祝贺你。「太好了，[Root.GetMasterMistress]。今夜，我们就创造出贤者之石，永生将属于你。」

original: Finally!
translation: 终于！

original: You have successfully completed §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! quest and have gained immortality.\n
translation: 你完成了§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!任务并获得了永生。\n

original: A Roar in the Dark
translation: 黑暗中的咆哮

original: You stumble down the dark corridor and hesitantly call out for the ghost. You instantly regret your decision as you are answered with an ear-deafening roar. It is followed by a gust of wind which extinguishes your torch. You turn on your heel and run for your life, but trip after only a few steps. A taste of blood fills your mouth and the roar grows louder, shaking you to your very core. There is no point trying to get up. You close your eyes and await your doom.
translation: 你在黑暗的甬道中跌跌撞撞，迟疑着向鬼魂发出呼唤。瞬间，你就对这个决定后悔了，因为一声震耳欲聋的咆哮回应了你。伴随着一股劲风吹灭了你的火把。你掉头逃命，但几步之后就跘倒在地。鲜血的味道充满了你的口腔，咆哮声越来越大，震得你七荤八素。没必要再爬起来了。你闭上眼睛等待末日。

original: So close...
translation: 很近了……

original: Voices in the Dark
translation: 黑暗中的声音

original: Quietly you walk back to the last intersection and continue your search down another tunnel. How much time has passed? Hours or days, it is impossible to tell. Your own breath has grown so loud in your ears and you keep seeing the same rock formations over and over again... As your limbs grow weaker, your panic increases in strength, and soon you are shouting for help. Your own words echo back at you, warped by the tunnels. Are they even yours? You can no longer recognize them... You wander the tunnels, howling and weeping, until your knees buckle and you fall unconscious. \n\nAfter what feels like an eternity, you feel soft rain on your face. You have no idea how you made it out.
translation: 安静地走回上一个岔口，你继续搜寻另一个坑道。几个小时还是几天？没可能知道。呼吸声在你的耳朵听来显得太吵了，同样的石头不停地出现……四肢逐渐虚弱，你的恐惧则日渐增强，很快你就开始大叫求助。你自己的声音回荡在坑道的包裹中。这些声音还是你的吗？你甚至无法分辨……漫无目的走在坑道里，嚎叫并哭泣，直到你膝盖一软，倒地失去意识。\n\n永恒般漫长之后，你感到柔和的雨滴落在你脸上。你甚至不知道自己是怎么走出来的。

original: At least it's quiet now...
translation: 至少现在安静了……

original: You have failed §Y[FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s§! quest. She leaves your court.
translation: 你没能完成§Y[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的§!任务。她离开了你的宫廷。

original: You expected a wrinkled old crone, but the alleged mystic standing before you is something entirely different. The young woman who introduces herself as [From.GetFirstName] is a breath-taking beauty. Her voice is soft as lambs wool and her smile bright as a summer sun. You invite her to dine with you and her conversation is most intriguing. She claims to hold the secrets to eternal life and vitality and offers to teach you more, if you are willing to accept her quest.\n\nWhile it is impossible to know if this fair maiden speaks the truth, at least she seems very experienced for her tender age. But is she immortal...?
translation: 你原以为会是个满脸皱纹的老太婆，但眼前这位公认的神秘者则完全是另一个极端。名叫[From.GetFirstName]的年轻女士是位惊心动魄的美人。嗓音柔和，如羊羔的毛皮；笑容明亮，如夏日的阳光。你邀请她与你共进晚餐，而她的谈吐才是最吸引人的。她声称拥有永恒生命和活力的秘密，并提出如果你愿意接受她的任务，她可以教导你更多。\n\n虽然不可能知晓这位美女所言是否为真，至少她看上去远比她稚嫩的年岁更有阅历。但她真的是永生的吗……？

original: You expected a wrinkled old crone, but the alleged mystic standing before you is something entirely different. Although she is very different compared to all the other women at court, no one can deny that her beauty is breath-taking. With a voice as soft as lambs wool and tinged with a foreign accent she introduces herself as [From.GetFirstName]. You invite her to dine with you and her conversation is most intriguing, if not outright controversial at times. She claims to hold the secrets to eternal life and vitality and offers to teach you more, if you are willing to accept her quest. \n\nWhile it is impossible to know if this fair maiden speaks the truth, at least she seems very experienced for her tender age. But is she immortal...?
translation: 你原以为会是个满脸皱纹的老太婆，但眼前这位公认的神秘者则完全是另一个极端。虽然与宫廷中其他任何女性都不一样，但无人能否认她惊心动魄的美。她用柔和如羊羔的毛皮，又带有异邦的风情的嗓音自称为[From.GetFirstName]。你邀请她与你共进晚餐，而她的谈吐才是最吸引人的，却极其惊世骇俗。她声称拥有永恒生命和活力的秘密，并提出如果你愿意接受她的任务，她可以教导你更多。\n\n虽然不可能知晓这位美女所言是否为真，至少她看上去远比她稚嫩的年岁更有阅历。但她真的是永生的吗……？

original: The Fellowship of the Glade
translation: 林中空地冒险团

original: [From.GetFirstName] tells you a tale about a hidden glade in which an ancient apple tree grows. The apples are the most delicious in the world, but more importantly, anyone who eats them become young anew. She offers to help you find the glade, but she also warns you that the search will not be easy and potentially very dangerous. \n\n[From.GetFirstName] urges you to form a fellowship of brave warriors to aid you in your quest. While you could just order some of your soldiers to tag along, she insists that they must follow you out of loyalty, not only by duty. She suggests that you arrange a grand feast and speak to them from your heart.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]告诉你一个传说，一处隐秘的林中空地长着一株古苹果树。其上的苹果是世间最美味的，但更重要的是，任何吃下它的人将重获青春。她提出帮助你找到这片林中空地，但同时警告你，搜寻绝对不易，甚至可能充满危险。\n\n[From.GetFirstName]催促你组建以勇敢战士为成员的团队，在任务中帮助你。尽管你大可以命令一些士兵跟随即可，她坚持要找出于忠诚，而非职责跟随你的人。她提议你组织一次盛大的宴会，与他们谈心。

original: Spare no expenses!
translation: 不惜费用！

original: Arrange a great feast and invite warriors from every corner of your realm.
translation: 安排一场盛大的宴会，并邀请来自你王国各个地方的战士。

original: If you insist. But they better keep out of my wine cellar...
translation: 既然你坚持如此。但他们最好远离我的酒窖……

original: Arrange a smaller feast and invite warriors from the local region.
translation: 安排一场小宴会，并邀请当地的战士。

original: This sounds like nonsense!
translation: 听上去毫无意义！

original: Decline §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! quest. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court.
translation: 拒绝§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]的任务。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将离开你的宫廷。

original: An Awkward Meeting
translation: 尴尬的会见

original: It is the night of your feast yet quite a few of those invited are missing. You grumble that you ought to have just ordered them to attend. [From.GetFirstName] soothingly pets your arm and assures you that you can still turn things around. \n\nHalfway through the dinner, you stand up to hold you speech. So far the night has been a failure and this fact does not exactly boost your confidence. Your listeners must notice this, because soon their gazes start to drift and they fidget uncomfortably in their seats. In the end you cannot stand it. You cut your speech short and bitterly order all your guests to leave. [From.GetFirstName] gives you one last disappointed look before leaving with the rest of them.
translation: 是夜，你的宴会召开，但许多受邀的人都没出现。你抱怨自己就应该直接下令让他们出席。[From.GetFirstName]轻拍你的手臂，向你保证你可以扭转局面。\n\n晚宴进行到一半，你起立发言。目前为止，今晚完全失败，这个事实不能提振你的自信。你的听众一定都注意到这一点，因为很快他们就眼神飘忽，在座位上烦躁地扭动。你终于受不了了。简短地结束自己的演讲，愤愤不平地命令你的客人离开。[From.GetFirstName]最后留下一个失望的眼神随着宾客离去。

original: I really do prefer my own company...
translation: 我真的更喜欢选自己的下属……

original: You fail §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! quest and she leaves your court.
translation: 你没能完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!任务，她离开了你的宫廷。

original: A Merry Gathering
translation: 愉快的会见

original: It is the night of your feast and warriors have come from far and wide. The word must have spread because there are far more guests than expected. Luckily, with [From.GetFirstName]'s help you manage to make room for everybody and after raiding the stores there is enough food and wine to go around. The music is jolly, the spirits are high and laughter echoes in your hall. \n\nHalfway through the dinner, you stand up to hold you speech. At first you are nervous, but when you see the fervor light up in the guests' eyes, your confidence rises. You deliver the best and most passionate speech of your life. By the end of it, the crowd stands up, howling and applauding. You look to your right where [From.GetFirstName] is seated– she is beaming at you. It seems like you have your fellowship.
translation: 是夜，你的宴会召开，战士们从远方四处赶来。消息必定传播得很远，因为来的客人比想象还多。幸有[From.GetFirstName]相助，你成功给每个人找到位置，并在洗劫了商店之后拿出足够的食物和美酒。快活的音乐，热烈的气氛，笑声在大厅中回荡。\n\n晚宴进行到一半，你起立发言。最开始你很紧张，但你看见宾客眼中的热忱，很快提振自信。你的演讲是今生最好最热情的一次。演讲结束时，大家全部起立，嚎叫鼓掌。你看向右侧，[From.GetFirstName]端坐于此——她亦对你面露喜色。似乎你已有了自己的伙伴。

original: More wine! More wine for everyone!
translation: 满上！给每个人都满上！

original: You have successfully completed §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! first quest.
translation: 你成功完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!第一个任务。

original: An Obstacle in Your Path
translation: 路途的阻碍

original: Ever since [From.GetFirstName] announced that the time for the search was nigh you have been busy with preparations. The warriors are equipped, the provisions gathered and the best horses procured. Yesterday you finally set out on your quest. \n\n[From.GetFirstName] has led your fellowship deeper and deeper into the wilderness. The trail which you follow is barely visible in the thick underbrush, but [From.GetFirstName] seems certain this is the right path. The trail begins to slope upwards and within a few hours you are trudging up a narrow mountain path. The trail makes a sharp turn and as you pass it you spot an obstacle overhead. There has been a rockfall and boulders are blocking the path. [From.GetFirstName] insists that this trail is the only way forward.
translation: 自从[From.GetFirstName]宣布出发搜寻的时日将至，你一直忙于准备。战士装备齐整，粮草供应充足，并找来最好的马匹。终于在昨天出发了。\n\n[From.GetFirstName]带领你的冒险团队不断深入荒野。所循的小径在厚实的林下灌木里已近磨灭，但[From.GetFirstName]似乎确信这是正确的路。小径开始倾斜向上，数小时内你都跋涉在狭窄的山路。越过一个小径的急转，你发现前方有阻碍。这里曾发生过岩崩，巨石堵住了通路。[From.GetFirstName]坚持这条小径是唯一向前的道路。

original: We should carefully move each rock, one by one.
translation: 我们应该小心地挪开每个石头，一次挪一块。

original: Pick the safer but more exhausting option.
translation: 选择安全但累人的方式。

original: We must make haste! We'll shift the biggest boulder and the rest will follow.
translation: 我们必须加快速度！挪走最大的巨石，其他石头就会跟着移开。

original: Pick the more perilous but quicker option.
translation: 选择更危险但快速的方式。

original: It was not meant to be. Let us go home.
translation: 我们还是回家吧，不应该是这样的。

original: Abandon §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s quest. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court.
translation: 放弃§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的任务。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将离开你的宫廷。

original: Sweat and Blood
translation: 血汗

original: You cannot do this without your fierce followers. However, they seem doubtful, so you attempt to raise their spirits and lead by example. You call out to draw their attention and proceed to inform them of your plan. While you do so, you pick a decently sized boulder and begin to shift it. At least you attempt to– however, it does not move an inch. Your companions do not seem convinced so you buckle down and really give it all you've got. Embarrassingly your efforts have no other outcome than a sweaty brow and scraped hands. You call for help but your breathless voice is less than inspiring.
translation: 没有精力旺盛的伙伴，你一个人做不到这些。可是，他们似乎很怀疑，于是你尝试鼓动他们的精神，亲身上阵。你呼叫吸引他们的注意，继续告诉他们自己的计划。同时，你选了一个合适大小的石头开始挪动它。至少你试着挪动——然而，连一寸都动不了。你的伙伴看上去没有被说服，于是你弯腰蹲下用尽全力去搬。非常尴尬，你的努力没有成果，除了满头大汗和擦伤的手。你呼叫帮助，但气喘吁吁的声音激励不了任何人。

original: We... We should probably head back.
translation: 我们……我们或许应该掉头。

original: You fail §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! quest and she leaves your court.\n
translation: 你没能完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!任务，她离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: The Sweat of Your Brow
translation: 满头大汗

original: You cannot do this without your fierce followers. However, they seem doubtful, so you attempt to raise their spirits with an inspirational speech. Your strong voice echoes in the mountain pass and yet again you can see the fire in your companions' eyes. They throw themselves into the task without hesitation and together you toil for many hours. Sweat and blood is your price but when dusk arrives, the path is cleared. Triumphantly [From.GetFirstName] grabs your hand and raises it above your heads. Your followers are exhausted, but this fact does not dampen their excited cheers. \n\nTomorrow your journey continues. While there is still some way to go, [From.GetFirstName] assures you that the path ahead will not cause you too much trouble.
translation: 没有精力旺盛的伙伴，你一个人做不到这些。可是，他们似乎很怀疑，于是你尝试用激动人心的演讲鼓动他们的精神。你强有力的声音在山间回荡，并再次看到伙伴双眼中的烈火。他们毫无迟疑地一头扎进任务里，你们一起苦干了好几个小时。血汗是你们的代价，但临近入夜，道路终于通畅。[From.GetFirstName]胜利般地抓住你的手举过你的头顶。你的伙伴们都精疲力尽，但这并不能阻碍他们的喜悦。\n\n第二天你的旅途继续。虽然还有一些路途，[From.GetFirstName]向你保证前路不会造成什么麻烦。

original: We are the toughest adventurers this land has ever seen!
translation: 我们是这片土地上最坚强的冒险者！

original: You have successfully completed §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! second quest.
translation: 你成功完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!第二个任务。

original: Long Way Down
translation: 长路向下

original: You cannot do this without your fierce followers. However, they seem doubtful, so you attempt to raise their spirits and lead by example. You call out to draw their attention and proceed to inform them of your plan. By using your spear as a makeshift lever you attempt to shift the biggest of the boulders. It does move an inch, but before it starts to roll the spear snaps in your hand and the end smacks you right between the eyes. No one comes to your aid. Angered by their passive manners, you snatch the spear from the man standing closest to you and try again. Your temper makes you careless and before you know it, the ground shifts underneath your feet. The boulder plummets down into the ravine but so do you. The echoes of your terrified screams outlast your final breath.
translation: 没有精力旺盛的伙伴，你一个人做不到这些。可是，他们似乎很怀疑，于是你尝试鼓动他们的精神，亲身上阵。你呼叫吸引他们的注意，继续告诉他们自己的计划。使用你的长矛作为杠杆，你意图搬动最大块的巨石。巨石确实挪动了一寸，但还没滚动起来，长矛就在你手中折断，末端啪一下打中你双眼之间。没人过来帮你。被他们消极的态度激怒，你夺过最靠近你的战士的长枪再试一次。发脾气让你大意，在你意识到之前，脚下的地面已经挪动起来。巨石倾泻进深谷之中，连带着你一起。惊恐的尖叫在你咽气后还反复回荡着。

original: Aaaaahhh!
translation: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！

original: You die a tragic death, thus failing [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s quest. She leaves your court.
translation: 你惨烈地死去，因此[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的任务失败了。她离开了你的宫廷。

original: The Tree of Life
translation: 生命之树

original: A heavy purse of coins should do the trick.
translation: 一大袋金币应该能搞定。

original: Take the safer bet and bribe the man.
translation: 选择较安全方法，贿赂那个人。

original: I must attempt to persuade them once more!
translation: 我必须尝试再次说服他们！

original: Trust in your diplomatic abilities and attempt to persuade your companions.
translation: 相信你的外交能力，并试图说服你的同伴。

original: He is right. Who am I to say I deserve it more than them?
translation: 他说得对。我能说我比他们更值得拥有吗？

original: Abandon §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! quest. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court.
translation: 放弃§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]的任务。[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将离开你的宫廷。

original: A Most Convincing Offer
translation: 最有说服力的方案

original:
Once the man is done speaking, you agree that the matter must be properly considered before a decision is made. You appoint the man to be the warriors' spokesperson and invite him to your tent for supper.

When the two of you are alone, you make your offer. While you might not get the apple, he probably won't, either. A safer bet would be to support your claim in exchange for a heavy purse of coins. The man hesitates but then accepts.

Later that evening when you argue your cause the man says you have got him convinced and supports your claim. All other opposition melts away. You walk up to the tree, [From.GetFirstName] at your side. "Congratulations, [Root.GetMasterMistress]," she murmurs with a smile. "Eternal life is finally yours."
translation:
那个人一说完话，你同意这件事要仔细考虑后再决定。你指定那个人作为战士们的发言人，邀请他到你的帐篷里晚餐。

只剩你们二人时，你提出你的条件。如果你没办法获得苹果，他恐怕也得不到。更安全的选择是支持你的要求，换来一大袋金币。那个人虽然迟疑，还是同意了。

是夜稍晚，当你为你的理由辩护，那个人说你已说服了他，并支持你的要求。其他所有反对都消失了。你走向古树，[From.GetFirstName]跟着你。「恭喜你，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」她微笑低语。「永恒的生命最终是你的。」

original: I have conquered Death, the greatest adversary of all.
translation: 我已经征服了死亡，一切事物的大敌。

original: You have successfully completed §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! quest and have gained immortality.\n
translation: 你成功完成了§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!任务并获得了永生。\n

original: Enemy to Friend
translation: 化敌为友

original: You courteously let the man finish, making a note of all his arguments. You then proceed to crush them, one by one, with the most eloquent speech of your life. You plead to their logic as well as to their hearts. Are you not the same [Root.GetManWoman] whom they pledged their loyalties to? Are you not their rightful and honorable liege? If you have their support, your gratefulness will be eternal. You will secure the future of their dynasties and their names will live on forever. By the end of your appeal there is a moment of absolute stillness and silence. Then the instigator kneels before you, tears in his eyes, and offers to bring you the apple himself. You have succeeded. \n\nIt is dusk when the man returns from the tree with the apple in his hand. "Congratulations, [Root.GetMasterMistress]," [From.GetFirstName] murmurs with a smile as you bite into the fruit. "Eternal life is finally yours."
translation: 你优雅地让那个人说完，记下他所有论点。接下来就用最雄辩动人的演讲一个接一个地粉碎这些论点。你触动他们的逻辑与心灵。你难道不是他们宣誓效忠的那个[Root.GetManWoman]吗？你难道不是他们的正当且荣耀的领主？如果你获得了他们的支持，你的感激之情将永恒持续。你将确保他们家族的未来，他们的英名也将长存。结束你的恳求后，人群出现了短暂的绝对沉寂与静默。接着，煽动者跪倒在你面前，满眼泪水，提出亲自帮你带回苹果。\n\n黄昏时此人从果树归来，手中拿着苹果。「恭喜你，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」[From.GetFirstName]在你咬下第一口果实时微笑低语。「永恒的生命最终是你的。」

original: I have conquered Death, the greatest adversary of all.
translation: 我已经征服了死亡，一切事物的大敌。

original: You have successfully completed §Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§!'s quest and have gained immortality.\n
translation: 你成功完成了§Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§!的任务并获得了永生。\n

original: Bribing a Traitor
translation: 贿赂叛徒

original: Once the man is done speaking, you agree that the matter must be properly considered before a decision is made. You appoint the man to be the warriors' spokesperson and invite him to your tent for supper. When the two of you are alone, you make your offer. His support for your claim in exchange for a heavy purse of coins. The man hesitates but then accepts. \n\nLater that evening you argue your cause. When you have finished your speech, you expectantly turn towards the man. The words that come out of his mouth are not the ones you expected, however. He exposes your attempt to bribe him and fires up the others. You start to run for the tree but the angry mob catches up within moments.
translation:
那个人一说完话，你同意这件事要仔细考虑后再决定。你指定那个人作为战士们的发言人，邀请他到你的帐篷里晚餐。

只剩你们二人时，你提出你的条件：他支持你的要求，以一大袋金币作为交换。那个人虽然迟疑，还是同意了。

是夜稍晚，你为你的理由辩护。完成演讲后，你充满期待地看向那个人。然而，从他嘴里吐出的话语不是你期待的。他揭露你意图贿赂他，扔下其他人。你开始跑向古树，但愤怒的暴徒很快赶上了你。

original: No, please! NOOO!
translation: 不要，求你！不要！

original: You die at the hands of your companions, thus failing §Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]'s§! quest. She leaves your court.
translation: 你死在伙伴的手上，因而没能完成§Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]的§!任务，她离开了你的宫廷。

original: The Price of Trusting
translation: 轻信的代价

original: You interrupt the instigator. Are you not the same [Root.GetManWoman] whom they gladly pledged their loyalties to? Are you not their rightful and honored liege? When you finish your appeal there is a moment of silence. Then the instigator nods slowly and agrees to fetch you the apple himself. Relieved, you thank him. This could have ended badly! \n\nYou nervously watch from below as the man climbs the tree. It is very tall and on more than one occasion he looks perilously close to falling. When he finally reaches the top of the tree, you shout in triumph, but your happiness is soon thwarted – with a defiant look, the man sinks his teeth into the apple himself. You glance at [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName], panic in your eyes, but she only shakes her head wistfully. It is over.
translation: 你打断了煽动者。你难道不是他们欣然宣誓效忠的那个[Root.GetManWoman]吗？你难道不是他们的正当且荣耀的领主？结束你的恳求后，人群出现了短暂的寂静。接着，煽动者缓缓点头，并同意为你亲自摘来苹果。你如释重负，感谢他。这件事有可能一发不可收拾！\n\n你紧张地从后面看着那个人爬上古树。树长得很高，不止一次他都显得摇摇欲坠。终于他爬到了树顶，你发出了胜利的呼喊，但你的狂喜迅速消逝——那个人挑衅地看了你一眼，将自己的牙齿咬进了苹果里。你绝望的看向[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]，可她只是惆怅地摇摇头。结束了。

original: Get down here! I'll have your head, I tell you!
translation: 我告诉你，给我下来！不然我要你的脑袋！

original: You have failed §Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]'s§! quest. She leaves your court.\n
translation: 你没能完成§Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]的§!任务。她离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: A Serious Concern
translation: 严重忧虑

original:
[From.GetTitledFirstName] joins you after supper one evening. [From.GetSheHeCap] initiates a conversation about the status of trade in the realm, but you notice that [From.GetSheHe] seems distraught. You interrupt [From.GetFirstName] and demand to know why [From.GetSheHe] has sought you out. [From.GetFirstName] gently takes your hand in [From.GetHersHis] and keeps [From.GetHerHis] eyes lowered as [From.GetSheHe] speaks. 

"The truth is, [GetFromVsFromFromRelation], I am worried. Who is this [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName], really? How can she be trusted? I fear that she is taking advantage of your... recent concerns." 

[From.GetSheHeCap] finally looks up, meeting your gaze. "Please, [GetFromVsFromFromRelation], let me look into it."
translation:
[From.GetTitledFirstName]一天晚餐后来找你。[From.GetSheHeCap]主动谈起领地内的贸易状况，但你注意到[From.GetSheHe]似乎心事重重。你打断了[From.GetFirstName]的话，要求知道[From.GetSheHe]为什么单独来找你。[From.GetFirstName]轻柔地用[From.GetHersHis]手拉住你的手，并在[From.GetSheHe]说话中保持[From.GetHerHis]视线低垂。

「实际上，[GetFromVsFromFromRelation]，我很担心你。这个[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]是谁，是认真的吗？她怎么能受信任？我怕她在利用你……近来的忧虑。」

[From.GetSheHeCap]最终抬高视线，与你的眼神交汇。「求你了，[GetFromVsFromFromRelation]，让我调查她。」

original:
[From.GetTitledFirstName] joins you after supper one evening. [From.GetSheHeCap] initiates a conversation about the status of trade in the realm, but you notice that [From.GetSheHe] seems distraught. You interrupt [From.GetFirstName] and demand to know why [From.GetSheHe] has sought you out. [From.GetFirstName] folds [From.GetHerHis] hands on [From.GetHerHis] lap and keeps [From.GetHerHis] eyes lowered as [From.GetSheHe] speaks. 

"My [Root.GetLordLady], the truth is, I am worried. Who is this [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName], really? How can she be trusted? I fear that she is taking advantage of your... recent concerns." 

[From.GetSheHeCap] finally looks up, meeting your gaze. "Please, my [Root.GetLordLady], let me look into it."
translation:
[From.GetTitledFirstName]一天晚餐后来找你。[From.GetSheHeCap]主动谈起领地内的贸易状况，但你注意到[From.GetSheHe]似乎心事重重。你打断了[From.GetFirstName]的话，要求知道[From.GetSheHe]为什么单独来找你。[From.GetFirstName]将[From.GetHerHis]双手叠放在[From.GetHerHis]大腿上并在[From.GetSheHe]说话中保持[From.GetHerHis]视线低垂。

「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，实际上，我很担心你。这个[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]是谁，是认真的吗？她怎么能受信任？我怕她在利用你……近来的忧虑。」

[From.GetSheHeCap]最终抬高视线，与你的眼神交汇。「求你了，[Root.GetLordLady]，让我调查她。」

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] joins you after supper one evening. [From.GetSheHeCap] initiates a conversation about the status of trade in the realm, but you notice that [From.GetSheHe] seems distraught. You interrupt [From.GetFirstName] and demand to know why [From.GetSheHe] has sought you out. \n\n"My dearest [GetFromVsFromFromRelation], I fear for your life," [From.GetSheHe] says earnestly and seizes your hand. "Who is this sacrilegious heathen you have invited to your court? Her promises are sweet, I am certain, but she cannot be trusted. Please, [GetFromVsFromFromRelation], allow me to find out her true motive. Before it is too late."
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]一天晚餐后来找你。[From.GetSheHeCap]主动谈起领地内的贸易状况，但你注意到[From.GetSheHe]似乎心事重重。你打断了[From.GetFirstName]的话，要求知道[From.GetSheHe]为什么单独来找你。\n\n「我最亲爱的[GetFromVsFromFromRelation]，我为你的性命担惊受怕，」[From.GetSheHe]直视你的双眼恳切地说道。「你邀请来宫廷的这个亵渎神圣的异教徒到底是谁？她的许诺确实很诱人，我也承认，但她绝不可信。求你了，[GetFromVsFromFromRelation]，让我找到她的真实动机。不然一切都太迟了。」

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] joins you after supper one evening. [From.GetSheHeCap] initiates a conversation about the status of trade in the realm, but you notice that [From.GetSheHe] seems distraught. You interrupt [From.GetFirstName] and demand to know why [From.GetSheHe] has sought you out. \n\n"My [Root.GetLordLady], I fear for your life," [From.GetSheHe] says earnestly. "Who is this sacrilegious heathen you have invited to your court? Her promises are sweet, I am certain, but she cannot be trusted. Please, my [Root.GetLordLady], allow me look find out her true motive. Before it is too late."
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]一天晚餐后来找你。[From.GetSheHeCap]主动谈起领地内的贸易状况，但你注意到[From.GetSheHe]似乎心事重重。你打断了[From.GetFirstName]的话，要求知道[From.GetSheHe]为什么单独来找你。\n\n「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我为你的性命担惊受怕，」[From.GetSheHe]恳切地说道。「你邀请来宫廷的这个亵渎神圣的异教徒到底是谁？她的许诺确实很诱人，我也承认，但她绝不可信。求你了，[Root.GetLordLady]，让我找到她的真实动机。不然一切都太迟了。」

original: Nonsense! I am sure you are overreacting.
translation: 无稽之谈！我确定你是反应过度了。

original: You dismiss §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! worries.
translation: 你拒绝了§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!的关心。

original: It is certainly better to be safe than sorry...
translation: 保障安全总比事后后悔好……

original: You allow §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! to investigate §Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§!.
translation: 你允许§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!调查§Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§!。

original: You are right! How could I ever be so naive as to trust [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]!
translation: 你是对的！我怎么能如此幼稚地去相信[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]！

original: Troubling News
translation: 令人不安的消息

original: Late one night there is a knock on the door of your study. You open the door to find [From.GetTitledFirstName] standing there. [From.GetHerHisCap] eyes dart around nervously as [From.GetSheHe] requests to be let inside. You make a gesture for [From.GetHerHim] to enter and asks [From.GetHerHim] to take a seat. \n\n"I have some very disturbing news, [GetFromVsFromFromRelation]," [From.GetSheHe] says as soon as you sit down. "It's about [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]. I've had her followed, and the intelligence my spies have given me is most worrying." [From.GetSheHeCap] proceeds to tell you about a clandestine meeting [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] had with a suspicious-looking stranger. According to [From.GetTitledFirstName], [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] intends to harm you!
translation: 一天深夜，有人敲响了你书房的们。你打开门发现[From.GetTitledFirstName]站在外面。[From.GetHerHisCap]双眼紧张地观察周围，要求你让[From.GetSheHe]进来。你示意[From.GetHerHim]进来并让[From.GetHerHim]坐下。\n\n「我有一些非常令人担忧的消息，[GetFromVsFromFromRelation]，」[From.GetSheHe]一坐下来就这样说道。「是关于[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]的。我派人跟踪她，而我间谍的情报让我非常担忧。」[From.GetSheHeCap]继续告诉你，[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]与一名形迹可疑的陌生人私下会面。据[From.GetTitledFirstName]说，[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]意图伤害我！

original: Late one night there is a knock on the door of your study. You open the door to find [From.GetTitledFirstName] standing there. [From.GetHerHisCap] eyes dart around nervously as [From.GetSheHe] requests to be let inside. You make a gesture for [From.GetHerHim] to enter and asks [From.GetHerHim] to take a seat. \n\n"I have some very disturbing news, my [Root.GetLordLady]," [From.GetSheHe] says as soon as you sit down. "It's about [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]. I've had her followed, and the intelligence my spies have given me is most worrying." [From.GetSheHeCap] proceeds to tell you about a clandestine meeting [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] had with a suspicious-looking stranger. According to [From.GetTitledFirstName], [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] intends to harm you!
translation: 一天深夜，有人敲响了你书房的们。你打开门发现[From.GetTitledFirstName]站在外面。[From.GetHerHisCap]双眼紧张地观察周围，要求你让[From.GetSheHe]进来。你示意[From.GetHerHim]进来并让[From.GetHerHim]坐下。\n\n「我有一些非常令人担忧的消息，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，」[From.GetSheHe]一坐下来就这样说道。「是关于[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]的。我派人跟踪她，而我间谍的情报让我非常担忧。」[From.GetSheHeCap]继续告诉你，[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]与一名形迹可疑的陌生人私下会面。据[From.GetTitledFirstName]说，[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]意图伤害我！

original: You must be mistaken. [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] would never do such a thing!
translation: 你一定是弄错了。[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]绝不会做这种事！

original: You dismiss §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! intelligence.
translation: 你驳回§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!情报。

original: I knew it! Throw that two-faced witch in the dungeon!
translation: 我就知道！把这表里不一的女巫关进地牢！

original: I can hardly believe it... I must hear the truth for myself.
translation: 我简直不敢相信……我必须亲耳听到真相。

original: You seek out §Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§! and demands to know the truth.
translation: 你去找§Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§!并要求知道真相。

original: All is Well
translation: 一切顺利

original: Late one night there is a knock on the door of your study. You open the door to find [From.GetTitledFirstName] standing there. You make a gesture for [From.GetHerHim] to enter and asks [From.GetHerHim] to take a seat. \n\n[From.GetFirstName] nervously twist [From.GetHerHis] hands together and it takes [From.GetHerHim] a moment to formulate a sentence. "Please forgive me, [GetFromVsFromFromRelation]. It appears I was mistaken. From everything I have seen, [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] seems to be most trustworthy and knowledgeable. Do forget everything I said. I am sorry if I caused you any trouble."
translation: 一天深夜，有人敲响了你书房的们。你打开门发现[From.GetTitledFirstName]站在外面。你示意[From.GetHerHim]进来并让[From.GetHerHim]坐下。\n\n[From.GetFirstName]紧张地绞着[From.GetHerHis]手指，花了[From.GetHerHim]好长一段时间才组织起语言。「请原谅我，[GetFromVsFromFromRelation]，看起来我是弄错了。我看到的所有事情都表明，[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]是最值得信赖且最博学的人。一定要忘掉我所说的话。如果给你造成困扰，我道歉。」

original: Late one night there is a knock on the door of your study. You open the door to find [From.GetTitledFirstName] standing there. You make a gesture for [From.GetHerHim] to enter and asks [From.GetHerHim] to take a seat. \n\n[From.GetFirstName] nervously twist [From.GetHerHis] hands together and it takes [From.GetHerHim] a moment to formulate a sentence. "Please forgive me, my [Root.GetLordLady]. It appears I was mistaken. From everything I have seen, [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] seems to be most trustworthy and knowledgeable. Do forget everything I said. I am sorry if I caused you any trouble."
translation: 一天深夜，有人敲响了你书房的们。你打开门发现[From.GetTitledFirstName]站在外面。你示意[From.GetHerHim]进来并让[From.GetHerHim]坐下。\n\n[From.GetFirstName]紧张地绞着[From.GetHerHis]手指，花了[From.GetHerHim]好长一段时间才组织起语言。「请原谅我，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，看起来我是弄错了。我看到的所有事情都表明，[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]是最值得信赖且最博学的人。一定要忘掉我所说的话。如果给你造成困扰，我道歉。」

original: I am glad to hear it.
translation: 我听到这个消息很高兴。

original: The Mystic's Ultimatum
translation: 神秘者的最后通牒

original: You are just about to knock on the door of [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]'s chamber when the door is thrown open. The mystic's face is hard as stone and her eyes flash fire. "Please, come inside, [Root.GetMasterMistress]," she says coldly. \n\n"It has come to my attention that you have had me followed," [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] says as she closes the door behind you. You try to reply, but she cuts you off. "I cannot teach you if you do not have absolute faith in me. Either trust that I am your loyal servant, or send me away. Nothing else will do."
translation: 你正准备敲响[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]的卧室大门，门就突然大开。神秘者脸若寒霜，眼含怒火。「请进，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」她冷淡地说。\n\n「我已经注意到你派人跟踪我，」[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]刚刚在你身后关上门，就立刻说道。你正要回答，她打断了你。「如果你不能完全相信我，我也无法教导你。相信我是你忠诚的仆人，或者把我送走。没有别的选择。」

original: You are right, please forgive me. I must have faith.
translation: 你是对的，请原谅我。我必须要有信心。

original: It is too much to ask. It would be best if you left.
translation: 你的要求太过分了，你最好给我滚

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court and you abandon her quest.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将离开你的宫廷而你放弃她的任务。

original: Nothing else will do? How about the dungeon!
translation: 什么都可以？去地牢怎么样！

original: An Empty Cell
translation: 空囚室

original:
You are enjoying a rare solitary evening when a sudden tapping on your door disturbs the silence. Your visitor is the captain of the guard. He urges you to come with him to the dungeon, quickly. This is not at all the kind of evening you had in mind... 

Once there, you meet the jailor, who is equally agitated. He rambles incoherently and gestures towards the cell in which you had [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] locked up. You peer through the peephole. "Where is she?!" 

When the jailor finally calms down, he explains that the mystic disappeared from her cell at some point during the evening. He seems... scared. Apparently he has never experienced or heard of anything like this...
translation:
你正难得地独享夜晚，一阵轻轻的敲门声打破了寂静。来客是守卫队长。他强烈希望你快点跟他一起去地牢。这个夜晚跟你想的完全不一样……

一来到那里，你见到了狱卒，同样非常激动。他语无伦次，指向那个你用来关押[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]的囚室。你通过窥视孔看进去。「她去哪了？！」

狱卒终于冷静下来，他解释说神秘者就在今晚的某个时候突然消失。他看起来……很害怕。很明显，他从没有经历或者听说过任何类似的事情……

original: Tonight I will sleep with one eye open...
translation: 今晚我要睁一只眼睡觉……

original: Your court [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] [From.GetFirstName] hesitantly leads you to his chamber. "This is... Highly unorthodox, my [Root.GetMasterMistress]. But I assure you, all our research points to the lady you are about to meet. She has traveled a long way, from the distant lands in the East, to come and see you. A quite remarkable lady, if I say so myself..." \n\nYou ask [From.GetTitledFirstName] about this mysterious woman and her teachings, but [From.GetSheHe] avoids your questions and insists that it will be better if you ask her yourself.
translation: 你的宫廷[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle][From.GetFirstName]迟疑着带领你走向他的房间。「这实在是……非常离经畔道，我的[Root.GetMasterMistress]。但我向你保证，我所有的研究都指向这位你即将面见的女士。她长途跋涉，来自遥远的东土，只为来这见你。一位让人印象特别深刻的女士，在我看来……」\n\n你询问[From.GetTitledFirstName]有关这位神秘的女性和她的学说，但[From.GetSheHe]回避你的问题并坚持认为你亲自问她比较好。

original: When you heard about the alleged mystic you pictured someone very youthful. However, you did not picture a child. \n\nThe little girl, who calls herself [From.GetFirstName], is unlike any child you have ever met. Her manners are incredibly mature and she seems to be far more knowledgeable than your most educated advisors. She tells you tales of faraway realms and distant times, heavy with symbolism and hidden meanings. While it is very strange to hear such wise words spoken by a mere child, the vividness of her stories makes you wonder if she experienced them all herself. She promises to tell you more if you accept her as a teacher.
translation: 当你听说这位公认的神秘者，你想象她非常年轻。可是，你未曾想过她还是个孩子。\n\n这位女童，自称[From.GetFirstName]，不像你见过的任何小孩。她行事异常的成熟，且似乎比你最有学识的顾问还要博学。她告诉你遥远领地和上古时期的故事，充斥着象征与隐义。尽管听到如此智慧的语言从一位儿童口中吐出非常奇怪，她逼真的故事让你猜想这些都是她亲身经历的。她保证会告诉你更多事情，如果你接受她为教师。

original: When you heard about the alleged mystic you pictured someone very youthful. However, you did not picture a child. At first, you are inclined to laugh - who is this bizarre little girl? However, you can tell within minutes that [From.GetFirstName] is no ordinary child. Her somber manners are actually rather unsettling. \n\nShe tells you tales of faraway realms and distant times, heavy with symbolism and hidden meanings. While it is very strange to hear such words spoken by someone so young, the vividness of her stories makes you wonder if she experienced them all herself. She promises to tell you more if you accept her as a teacher.
translation: 当你听说这位公认的神秘者，你想象她非常年轻。可是，你未曾想过她还是个孩子。最开始，你很想大笑——这个奇怪的小女孩是谁？然而，几分钟内你就知道[From.GetFirstName]不是一般的小孩。她严峻的行事更像是让人不安。\n\n她告诉你遥远领地和上古时期的故事，充斥着象征与隐义。尽管听到如此智慧的语言从一位儿童口中吐出非常奇怪，她逼真的故事让你猜想这些都是她亲身经历的。她保证会告诉你更多事情，如果你接受她为教师。

original: A Fallen Man
translation: 潦倒男人

original: [From.GetFirstName] and you are walking side by side through the capital as she patiently explains the principles of reincarnation and immortality. "[Root.GetFirstName], my friend. Remember that Karma is not only produced when you act. Everything you think, say and cause is also Karma. While good deeds yield sweet fruits, Punya, unkindness brings forth spoiled fruits, Paap." \n\nYour walk has brought you to a rundown alley where a man in tattered clothes sleeps in a doorway. As you approach, the stench of alcohol and vomit becomes unbearable. [From.GetFirstName] tells you that the man was cheated of all his savings and how he fell into despair when the local authorities refused to help him. The tale fills you with compassion for the poor fellow.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]和你正并排走在首都，听她耐心地解释转世与永生的原则。[Root.GetFirstName]，我的朋友。谨记业不只是你的行为，也是你的思想、你的言语、你所引起。善行结出甘美的果实，即福，不慈将生败坏的苦果，即恶。」\n\n你沿路走到一条下坡的小巷，一名衣衫褴褛的男人睡在居民门口。你越靠近他，酒精和呕吐物的恶臭就越难以忍受。[From.GetFirstName]告诉你此人被骗走所有积蓄，并在本地当局拒绝帮助他之后陷入绝望。这个描述让你充满了对这名穷苦兄弟的同情。

original: [From.GetFirstName] and you are walking side by side through the capital as she patiently explains the principles of reincarnation and immortality. "[Root.GetFirstName], my friend. Remember that Karma is not only produced when you act. Everything you think, say and cause is also Karma. While good deeds yield sweet fruits, Punya, unkindness brings forth spoiled fruits, Paap." \n\nYour walk has brought you to a rundown alley where a man in tattered clothes sleeps in a doorway. As you approach, the stench of alcohol and vomit becomes unbearable. [From.GetFirstName] tells you that the man was cheated of all his savings and how he fell into despair when the local authorities refused to help him. It seems like [From.GetFirstName] want you to pity him but you cannot force yourself to do so.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]和你正并排走在首都，她耐心地向你解释转世与永恒的原则。「[Root.GetFirstName]，我友。谨记业不只是你的行为，也是你的思想、你的言语、你所引起。善行结出甘美的果实，即福，不慈将生败坏的苦果，即恶。」\n\n你沿路走到一条下坡的小巷，一名衣衫褴褛的男人睡在居民门口。你越靠近他，酒精和呕吐物的恶臭就越难以忍受。[From.GetFirstName]告诉你此人被骗走所有积蓄，并在本地当局拒绝帮助他之后陷入绝望。似乎[From.GetFirstName]想让你去可怜他，但你无法强迫你自己做到。

original: My heart aches for this man! I will give him the money he lost.
translation: 我的心为这人而心痛！我要把他丢失的钱给他。

original: I understand his suffering but he should have persevered.
translation: 我理解他的痛苦，但他应该坚持下去。

original: This man only has himself to blame!
translation: 这人只能怪他自己！

original: I see what you're trying to do, [From.GetFirstName], but I won't be manipulated!
translation: 我知道你想做什么，[From.GetFirstName]，我可不是一枚棋子！

original: Abandon §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s quest. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court.
translation: 放弃§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的任务。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将离开你的宫廷。

original: The Spoiled Fruit
translation: 苦果

original: [From.GetFirstName] folds her arms over her chest and frowns. If she was just any child you would have laughed, but [From.GetFirstName]'s disapproval fills you with worry. Did you not do the right thing? \n\n"I see now that I was mistaken on your account, [Root.GetFirstName]. While it is easy to say the good word and do the good deed, I can tell that you are not thinking the good thought. You do not truly care about this man. Before you can grow, you must be honest with your failings. I am afraid you are not ready to embrace my teachings."
translation: [From.GetFirstName]双手抱胸，皱起了眉毛。如果她仅是随便一个小孩，你会笑出声，但[From.GetFirstName]的不赞同让你充满担忧。我刚才做错了吗？\n\n「看来我对你的人有错误的判断，[Root.GetFirstName]。善良的言辞和行动虽然容易，但你没有怀着善良的思想。你并非真正关心此人。在你成长之前，你必须真诚对待你的弱点。恐怕你还没有准备好接受我的教导。」

original: [From.GetFirstName] folds her arms over her chest and frowns. If she was just any child you would have laughed, but [From.GetFirstName] looks quite menacing. \n\n"What did I just tell you about Karma and the spoiled fruit of bad actions? It will only come back and punish you, [Root.GetFirstName]. I am afraid you are not ready to embrace my teachings."
translation: [From.GetFirstName]双手抱胸，皱起了眉毛。如果她仅是随便一个小孩，你会笑出声，但[From.GetFirstName]让人害怕。\n\n「关于业，我刚才是怎么跟你说恶行之苦果的？[Root.GetFirstName]。恐怕你还没有准备好接受我的教导。」

original: I guess I don't really care about my subjects.
translation: 我想我真的不关心我的臣民。

original: You fail §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! quest and she leaves your court.
translation: 你没能完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!任务而她离开了你的宫廷。

original: The Sweetest Fruit
translation: 胜果

original: [From.GetFirstName] nods contentedly as you kneel next to the man and offer him your coin purse. "The fruit of good thoughts and good deeds is sweet indeed, my friend. Acts of kindness brings peace to your heart and brings you one step closer to enlightenment. You are a just ruler, indeed." \n\nDuring the walk home, your heart does feel lighter. You intently listen to [From.GetFirstName]'s thoughtful musings, trying to remember every word. She might be the true saint you have been waiting for.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]满意地点头。你在那人旁边跪下，送出自己的钱包。「善思与善行的果实确实是甘甜的，我的朋友。慈悲的行为给你的心灵带来平静，让你离启示更进一步。你确实是一位公正的统治者。」\n\n回家的路途中，你心中的确更加轻松。你一心一意地聆听[From.GetFirstName]智慧的沉思，尽力记住每个字。她可能就是你所寻找的那位真圣人。

original: [From.GetFirstName] nods contentedly at your words. "Most people understand the value of compassion and a good deed, but few understand the true meaning of honesty. Before we can grow, we must learn to accept our failings. You have taken the first step on the journey." \n\n[From.GetFirstName]'s words really resonate with you and during the walk home you intently listen to her lesson. You soak up every word and decide to make a change in your life. If you have taken the first step, surely taking the next will be easier.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]听到你的话，满意地点头。「大部分人都知晓同情和善行的价值，但很少人了解诚实的真意。在我们成长之前，我们必须学会接受我们的弱点。你已迈出旅途的第一步。」\n\n[From.GetFirstName]的话引起你的共鸣，回家的路上一心一意地聆听她的教诲。你沉浸在每个字当中，决定从此改变你的生活。若已踏出第一步，继续前进就更简单。

original: I will treat everyone fairly from now on.
translation: 从现在起，我将公平地对待每一个人。

original: You have successfully completed §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! first quest.
translation: 你成功完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!第一个任务。

original: Mind Over Body
translation: 驭体于灵

original: [From.GetFirstName] has been happy with your progress and informed you that the time had come for a period of deep introspection. "You must venture into the wilderness all on your own, my friend, with nothing but the clothes on your back. You are to stay there until you have had a deep epiphany." You are not quite sure what an epiphany feels like, but [From.GetFirstName] assured you that all will become clear in time. \n\nNow you have spent four days in isolation, fasting and meditating. Your mind does feel clearer, however you are not sure if you are approaching your epiphany or if the lack of sustenance is making you delirious. While [From.GetFirstName] ordered you to abstain from food, she cannot see you now, and the hunger is becoming quite unbearable...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]一直很满意你的进步，告知你，现在是时候开始一段时间的内省了。「你必须独自走进旷野中，我的朋友，除了身上的衣服什么都不带。你要在那里停留，直到你获得深刻的顿悟。」我不太懂顿悟的感觉是什么，但[From.GetFirstName]向你保证到时候一切就都清楚了。\n\n现在你已孤独渡过四天，禁食并冥想。你的心灵确实更加清明，可你不确定，这是由于你在靠近顿悟，还是因为缺少食物让你精神错乱了。尽管[From.GetFirstName]命令你远离食物，她现在看不见你，而饥饿已经变得难以忍受……

original: All of this is pointless if I starve to death.
translation: 如果我饿死了，我所做的这些都是毫无意义的。

original: Eat something before resuming your meditation.
translation: 在恢复冥想之前先吃点东西。

original: I will not quit now, no matter the cost!
translation: 无论付出什么代价，我现在都不会放弃。

original: Keep fasting.
translation: 保持禁食。

original: Nothing good will come of this. I give up...
translation: 这没什么好处。我放弃……

original: Abandon §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s quest. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court.
translation: 放弃§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的任务。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将离开你的宫廷。

original: A Beautiful Dream
translation: 一场好梦

original: Finally it arrives. The moment of perfect clarity. All of your senses are on edge - each expression as distinguished and detailed as if you experienced everything for the first time. It is as if your mind's expanding, reaching out, enveloping everything. You can feel that the realization is there, just beyond your limits. You just have to... \n\nYou wake up with a jerk. Everything aches. Your back, your stomach, your head... You lay there for a moment, doing and thinking nothing, before crawling up to seated. The feeling of elation you had a moment ago is gone as if it was never there. It was all a dream. In reality your mind is as murky as a stagnant pond. You are not making any progress, and have not done for several days. Unfortunately this seems to be beyond your abilities...
translation: 终于它来了。完全澄澈的瞬间。所有的感官都绷紧起来——各个事物的表现都分明而清晰，好似你是第一次体验一切。你的心灵如同在扩张，伸出，包裹一切。你能感到实现就在那里，就在你的极限之外一点点。你仅仅只需要……\n\n你突然惊醒。全神上下都在疼痛。你的后背、你的小腹、你的头颅……你在那躺了一会，什么也不做什么也不想，然后挣扎着爬起来坐好。之前感受到的狂喜已经消失，如同从未出现。仅仅只是梦境。现实中你的心灵昏暗如死水。你没有任何进步，接下来几天都做不到。很不幸，这似乎超出了你的能力……

original: Better to give up than dying out here...
translation: 宁可放弃也不愿死在这里……

original: You fail §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! quest and she leaves your court.
translation: 你没能完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!任务而她离开了你的宫廷。

original: The Moment of Clarity
translation: 澄澈的瞬间

original: Finally it arrives. The moment of perfect clarity. All of your senses are on edge - each expression as distinguished and detailed as if you experienced everything for the first time. It is as if your mind is expanding, reaching out, enveloping everything. You can feel that the realization is there, just beyond your limits. You just have to... \n\nAnd then it is as if something snaps within you. Some limitation which has always held you back is gone and now everything makes sense. Each of [From.GetFirstName]'s lessons is rushing through your mind, each word as clear as if she was standing next to you. You sit there for a while, just taking everything in, paralyzed with amazement.
translation: 终于它来了。完全澄澈的瞬间。所有的感官都绷紧起来——各个事物的表现都分明而清晰，好似你是第一次体验一切。如同你的心灵在扩张，伸出，包裹一切。你能感到实现就在那里，就在你的极限之外一点点。你仅仅只需要……\n\n接着，似乎有你体内什么东西断开了。一直拖住你的限制消失了，一切都有了意义。[From.GetFirstName]的每次教诲在你心灵里冲刷而过，每个字都清晰得如同她就站在你身边。你呆坐了一会，吸收所有的东西，因震惊而瘫痪着。

original: I see it now. I must tell [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我看见了。必须告诉[From.GetFirstName]。

original: You have successfully completed §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! second quest.
translation: 你成功完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!第二个任务。

original: Chasing a Dream
translation: 追逐梦境

original:
Finally it arrives. The moment of perfect clarity. You can feel that the realization is there, just beyond your limits. You clamber back to your feet and start running. Almost there... 

Then, sudden terror, the sensation of falling. It only last for a moment before it is replaced by an overwhelming pain radiating from your ankle. You lay there on the ground for a few moments, gasping for air like a fish out of water. When the world comes back into focus, you see the cliff above. Did you run off it...? 

You shout for help until your voice is raw, but you know it is all in vain. You have not seen a single soul in days, and most likely you never will again. When the night arrives and wraps you in its cold embrace, you close your eyes and let go.
translation:
终于它来了。完全澄澈的瞬间。你能感到实现就在那里，就在你的极限之外一点点。你手脚并用开始奔跑。就快到了……

然后，恐惧突然而至，伴随着坠落感。这只持续了一瞬间，即被来自踝部压倒一切的疼痛所替代。你在地上躺了好一会，努力抓住空气，就像离了水的鱼。世界终于回到焦距，你看见头顶的悬崖。你刚才从上面跑掉下来了……？

你呼叫着帮助，直到声音变哑，但你知道一切都是徒劳。已经好几天连一个活物都没见到了，而且你很有可能再也见不到。夜幕降临，把你抱在寒冷的怀里，你闭上了眼睛随他去。

original: At least the pain is gone.
translation: 至少不再痛了。

original: You die a tragic death, thus failing [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s quest. She leaves your court.
translation: 你悲剧地死去，因而无法完成[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的任务，她离开了你的宫廷。

original: The Bonds of Mortality
translation: 凡体的束缚

original:
[From.GetFirstName] was most pleased to hear about your epiphany in the wilderness. Since then she has been preparing you for the last step of your journey towards enlightenment and immortality. "To live forever, my dear friend, you must learn to separate the self from the body," she told you. 

Now [From.GetFirstName] says that you are ready. It is time to put all her lessons into practice. If you succeed, your body will become an immortal vessel, and eternal life is yours. If you fail... You do not want to think about it. 

[From.GetFirstName] has offered you a draught of herbs. "This will make the bonds looser and help you to let go," she told you. "But be careful. If you lose the connection to your body entirely, who knows where your spirit will end up."
translation:
[From.GetFirstName]听闻你在旷野中的顿悟，非常满意。从那之后她就在为你前往启示和永生之旅的最后一步做准备。「永远活着，我的朋友，你必须学会将自我从肉体中剥离，」她告诉你。

[From.GetFirstName]现在说你已经准备好了。是时候将她的教诲付诸实践。若你成功，肉体将是永生的容器，永恒的生命属于你。若你失败……你不会希望去想象这种事。

[From.GetFirstName]递给你一些药草的提取物。「这能令束缚松弛，帮助你离开，」她告诉你。「不过小心。如果你完全失去了与你身体的联系，没人知道这灵魂的归处。」

original: I am ready. Give me the draught.
translation: 我准备好了。给我提取物。

original: Take the risk and accept the draught.
translation: 承担风险，接受提取物。

original: I think I can do this on my own.
translation: 我想我可以自己做这件事。

original: Decline to drink the draught and attempt the release of self on your own.
translation: 拒绝喝提取物，试着独自释放自我。

original: I don't think I'm ready for this.
translation: 我想我还没准备好。

original: Decline §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! quest. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court.
translation: 拒绝§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]的任务。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会离开你的宫廷。

original: A New Beginning
translation: 新的开始

original:
You lay down on the bed and close your eyes. Slowly but surely all the impressions and thoughts melt away as you clear your mind. Even the sound of your own breath disappears into nothingness as you sink deeper and deeper... 

And then, you rise. The body before you is yours, you know this. You have seen the reflection of that face a thousand times, but never like this. It looks peaceful – not even breathing, you realize. This fact does not upset you. Detachedly you observe it for a while before you sink back into your body. 

The first breath is more vivid than anything you ever felt. "Like a newborn baby," [From.GetFirstName] says contentedly. "Welcome, my friend, to your new life."
translation:
你平躺在床上，闭上眼睛。随着你澄澈心灵，缓慢但确实地，所有的印象和思绪都溶解消失。甚至自己呼吸的声音也消失在虚空中，随着你下沉的不断深入……

接着，你坐了起来。眼前的肉体是自己的，你知道，你已经看过这张脸的倒影一千次了，但这次不一样。它看上去很安详——甚至不呼吸，你意识到。这个事实并没有让你惊慌。超然地观察了一会，你重新沉回自己的肉体。

第一次呼吸比你曾感受到的任何一次都更真实。「如同赤子，」[From.GetFirstName]满意地说道。「欢迎来到你的新生，我的朋友。」

original: I promise to make the most of this second chance, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我会好好珍惜这次新生，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: You have successfully completed §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! quest and have gained immortality.\n
translation: 你成功完成了§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!任务并获得了永生。\n

original: A New Beginning
translation: 新的开始

original:
As you lower the flask from your lips a strange feeling comes over you. [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] helps you to lay down on the bed – your limbs are numb and it is almost impossible to make them obey. You try to speak, but it is as if your tongue belongs to someone else. Your body is melting, dissolving... 

As your body is sinking down into the bedding, your spirit rises, shedding its mortal husk. You know that the body before you used to be your own but now you feel strangely detached from it. You do not belong with this old hunk of flesh anymore. You turn around, and keep rising... 

In another part of the keep, a new life is born. You can feel its pureness, its vitality, the brightness of its life force. A fresh start...?
translation:
随着你从唇边放下长颈瓶，一种奇特的感受占据了你。[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]帮助你平躺在床上——四肢已经麻木，几乎不可能让他们听命。你想要说话，却觉得自己的舌头属于别人。你的肉体在融化、溶解……

肉体沉进了寝具，你的灵魂则升起，脱去了它必死的躯壳。你知道眼前的肉体曾属于你自己，但现在只感到奇特的超脱。你不再属于这一大块肉了。你转身继续升高……

在城堡的另一处，一个新生命诞生了。你能感到其纯净，其活力，其生命力的光芒。一次新的开始……？

original: Yes. A fresh start.
translation: 是的。一次新的开始。

original: Your abandon your body to start a new life as §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!. §Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§! leaves your court.
translation: 你放弃了自己的肉体，作为§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!重新开始。§Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§!离开了你的宫廷。

original: A Stranger Inside
translation: 鸠占鹊巢

original:
You lay down on the bed and close your eyes. Slowly but surely all the impressions and thoughts melt away as you clear your mind. Even the sound of your own breath disappears into nothingness as you sink deeper and deeper... 

And then, you rise. The body before you is yours, you know this. You have seen the reflection of that face a thousand times, but never like this. It looks peaceful. You stay like this for a while, observing detachedly. 

Then suddenly something rushes through you. For a moment everything feels twisted, wrong. The feeling is gone as soon as it came, but the body before you starts to move. The eyes snap wide open and the lips are parted with a bone-chilling shriek. You try to sink back into the body but you cannot. Something is already there!
translation:
你平躺在床上，闭上眼睛。随着你澄澈心灵，缓慢但确实地，所有的印象和思绪都溶解消失。甚至自己呼吸的声音也消失在虚空中，随着你下沉的不断深入……

接着，你坐了起来。眼前的肉体是自己的，你知道，你已经看过这张脸的倒影一千次了，但这次不一样。它看上去很安详。你保持这种状态好一会，超然地观察着。

突然间有东西刷过你。一时间一切都变得扭曲、不对劲。这感觉来的快去得也快，可是眼前的身体居然开始移动起来。双眼圆睁，嘴唇被彻骨般寒冷的尖叫撑开。你想要沉回肉体可你做不到。有什么东西已经在里面了！

original: I am fading away, I can feel it...
translation: 我正在消失，我能感觉到……

original: The body of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is possessed by a strange spirit. §Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§! leaves your court.
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的身体被古怪的灵体附身了。§Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§!离开了你的宫廷。

original: Immortal
translation: 永生

original: This character has achieved eternal life and will never succumb to the ravages of old age. The character is not invincible though, physical injury will still hurt them.
translation: 这个角色已经获得了永生，永远不会屈服于年老的蹂躏。但这个角色并不是不可战胜的，身体上的损害仍然会伤害他们的生命。

original: Your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] comes to your study one evening. [From.GetSheHeCap] appears quite agitated, pacing the room back and forth for a full minute before speaking. "[Root.GetFatherMotherCap], I beg of you, please let me leave the keep. Please, you must!" You demand to know [From.GetHerHis] reason but [From.GetSheHe] refuses to tell you the specifics, only that it is a matter of life and death.
translation: 你的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]一天晚上来到了你的书房。[From.GetSheHeCap]看上去十分急躁，在开口之前来回踱步整整一分钟。「[Root.GetFatherMotherCap]，我请求你让我离开这座城堡。请你一定要答应！」你询问[From.GetHerHis]理由，然而[From.GetSheHe]拒绝谈论详情，只说这件事情人命关天。

original: If you say so, my [From.GetSonDaughter]. I trust your judgement.
translation: 如果你这么认为的话，我的[From.GetSonDaughter]，那我相信你的判断。

original: What about your poor [Root.GetFatherMother]?! If you leave, I can't let you back in!
translation: 你可怜的[Root.GetFatherMother]该怎么办？如果你走了，就别想回来！

original: I can't let you risk your life, [From.GetFirstName]. I'm sorry, but no.
translation: 我不能让你冒生命危险，[From.GetFirstName]。我很抱歉，但是不行。

original: A guard comes to tell you that your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] is back. First, you are relieved, but the happy feeling disappears almost entirely when [From.GetFirstName] enters your chamber with a ragged peasant [seclusion_childs_lover.GetBoyGirl] in [From.GetHerHis] tow. "[Root.GetFatherMotherCap], let me introduce  [seclusion_childs_lover.GetFirstName]. We're in love and I'd like your blessing."
translation: 一名守卫来告诉你，你的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]已经回来了。最开始，你如释重负，然而这份喜悦当[From.GetFirstName]进入你的房间时几乎荡然无存。[From.GetHerHis]怀里搂着一个衣衫褴褛的农民[seclusion_childs_lover.GetBoyGirl]。「[Root.GetFatherMotherCap]，让我向您介绍[seclusion_childs_lover.GetFirstName]。我们真心相爱，希望得到您的祝福。」

original: You walk past your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName]'s room when you hear a familiar laugh. Has [From.GetSheHe] returned without visiting you? Angrily you knock on the door and the laughter stops, but the door remains shut. You pull it open only to see a half-naked [From.GetFirstName] hurriedly getting dressed alongside a strange [seclusion_childs_lover.GetManWoman]. What is the meaning of this?!
translation: 你途径[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]的房间时听到了一阵熟悉的笑声。难道[From.GetSheHe]没有拜访你就回来了？怒不可遏的你用力地敲打着房门，笑声消失了，但门依然没有打开。你拉开大门，只看见半裸的[From.GetFirstName]正匆忙地穿上衣服，旁边站着一个陌生的[seclusion_childs_lover.GetManWoman]。这到底是什么鬼？！

original: If it's what you really want, [From.GetFirstName], I can't stop you...
translation: 如果这是你真正想要的，[From.GetFirstName]，我无法阻止你……

original: [seclusion_childs_lover.GetSheHeCap] can stay, but no one else is to know!
translation: [seclusion_childs_lover.GetSheHeCap]可以留下来，但不能让任何人知道！

original: What were you thinking?! Get this filthy wretch out of my keep!
translation: 你在想些什么？！马上把这个肮脏的混蛋赶出我的堡垒！

original: I trusted you to be careful! Both of you must leave, at once!
translation: 我曾经相信你能谨慎小心！现在你们两个都给我立刻滚出去！

original: I saw nothing...
translation: 我什么都没看到……

original: You have just lain down in bed when someone knocks on your door. You sigh and grumble, but get up to open. It is [seclusion_informant.GetTitledFirstName] and they have brought some unwelcome news. Apparently [From.GetFirstName] married in secret. You are sure [From.GetSheHe] will come to regret it...
translation: 你刚躺下就有人敲门。你叹了口气，嘟嘟囔囔的起来开门。来人是[seclusion_informant.GetTitledFirstName]，带来了不好的消息。[From.GetFirstName]秘密结婚了。你确信[From.GetSheHe]会后悔的……

original: One of your servants brought you a letter which arrived by pigeon this morning. It is from your [From.GetSonDaughter], [From.GetFirstName]. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] married that pitiful peasant of [From.GetHersHis]. You are sure [From.GetSheHe] will come to regret it...
translation: 你的一个仆人带给你一封信，这是早上信鸽送来的。这是你的[From.GetSonDaughter]，[From.GetFirstName]写来的。[From.GetSheHe]和[From.GetHersHis]那个下贱的农民结婚了。你确信[From.GetSheHe]会后悔的……

original: I am disappointed, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: [From.GetFirstName]，你太让我失望了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] was absent from supper so you decide to visit [From.GetHerHis] chambers to make sure [From.GetSheHe] is well. You knock a few times and when nothing happens you open the door. The room is empty, but [From.GetFirstName] has left a note behind. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] has disobeyed you and sneaked out of the keep!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]缺席了晚餐，因此你决定去[From.GetHerHis]房间确认下[From.GetSheHe]的状况。你敲了一会儿门但是无人回应。你打开了门，室内空无一人，只有[From.GetFirstName]留下的一张便条。看来[From.GetSheHe]违背了你的命令跑出了堡垒！

original: Why won't that [GetRootFromInsult] ever listen!
translation: 为什么[GetRootFromInsult]永远不知道听话！

original: Let Me Leave
translation: 允许我离开

original: Forbade Me To Leave
translation: 禁止我离开

original: Expelled Me From Seclusion
translation: 把我赶出藏身地

original: Let Us Stay In Seclusion
translation: 让我们呆在藏身地

original: Expelled Lover From Seclusion
translation: 把情人赶出藏身地

original: Consorts With Mystics
translation: 结交神秘者

original: Consorts With Infidels
translation: 结交异教徒

original: Peasant Crisis
translation: 农民危机

original: Renewed Faith
translation: 重拾信念

original: Peasants Pleased With Witch Hunt
translation: 农民对猎巫行动很满意

original: Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [From.GetFirstName] has brought you some troubling news. Words are spreading that worshipers of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] are the root of the terrible epidemic ravaging your realm. [From.GetTitledFirstName] encourages you to look into these rumors.
translation: 你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][From.GetFirstName]带来了糟糕的消息。有流言说[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的崇拜者是国内瘟疫横行的罪魁祸首。[From.GetTitledFirstName]建议调查这个流言。

original: Horrifying news indeed! Investigate this for me, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 真是可怕的消息！调查这件事，[From.GetFirstName]。

original:
You send your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] to investigate the rumors about warlocks and witches.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasant Unrest'§! for 10 years, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+10.0%§!
Local Tax Modifier: §R-50.0%§!
translation:
你派出了你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]去调查巫师和女巫的流言。

你的全部直辖领获得 10 年的§Y「农民骚乱」§!，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+10.0%§!
本地税收修正：§R-50.0%§!

original: Nonsense! There are no such things as warlocks and witches!
translation: 一派胡言！根本没有什么巫师啊女巫的！

original:
You dismiss the rumors and the concerns of [Root.GetLordSpiritualName].

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasant Crisis'§! for 10 years, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+15.0%§!
Local Tax Modifier: §R-75.0%§!
translation:
你无视了谣言和[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]的担忧。

你的全部直辖领获得 10 年的§Y「农民危机」§!，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+15.0%§!
本地税收修正：§R-75.0%§!

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has brought you an alarming amount of people who claim to have witnessed the abomination of witchcraft. If you are to believe their accounts, the allies of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] are many and pose a great threat to your realm.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]带来了数量惊人的声称目击了可憎的巫术活动的目击者。如果你相信他们的证词，[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的盟友们已经多到足以威胁你的国度。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName], you must find these sinners, before it is too late!
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]，在一切都太迟之前，你必须赶紧找到这些罪人！

original: You send your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] to find any witches or wizards in your court.\n
translation: 你让你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]把你宫廷中的所有巫师和女巫揪出来。\n

original: Warn the court - everyone must stay vigilant!
translation: 警告廷臣们——所有人都给我机灵点！

original: Make sure that all of your courtiers are watching for signs of witchcraft.\n
translation: 确保所有廷臣都在寻找巫术的迹象。\n

original: Actually, I already have my suspicions...
translation: 其实，我已经有怀疑的对象了……

original: Take the opportunity and denounce someone you dislike as a practitioner of witchcraft.\n
translation: 趁此机会指控你讨厌的人是巫术活动的参与者。\n

original: These stories are ridiculous. Stop wasting my time!
translation: 这些故事都荒谬至极。别再来浪费我的时间……

original: You dismiss the witnesses and the concerns of [Root.GetLordSpiritualName].\n
translation: 你无视了目击者和[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]的担忧。\n

original: After a thorough investigation, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has come to the conclusion that [bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName] is most likely the [bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch] in your court. [bg_likely_witch.GetSheHeCap] has been seen talking to themselves in strange languages and a few poor souls have even been assaulted by [bg_likely_witch.GetHerHim].
translation: 在彻底的调查后，[From.GetTitledFirstName]得出结论，整个宫廷内[bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName]是最有[bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch]嫌疑的。[bg_likely_witch.GetSheHeCap]经常用奇怪的语言自言自语，肯定已经有人被[bg_likely_witch.GetHerHim]袭击了。

original: After a thorough investigation, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has come to the conclusion that [bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName] is most likely the [bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch] in your court. Everyone knows [bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName] to be a most sinful [bg_likely_witch.GetManWoman] and as such [bg_likely_witch.GetSheHe] must be consorting with [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName].
translation: 在彻底的调查后，[From.GetTitledFirstName]得出结论，整个宫廷内[bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName]是最有[bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch]嫌疑的。所有人都知道[bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName]是个罪孽深重的[bg_likely_witch.GetManWoman]，因此[bg_likely_witch.GetSheHe]必然和[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]有关系。

original: After a thorough investigation, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has come to the conclusion that [bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName] is most likely the [bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch] in your court. [From.GetFirstName] claims to have found condemning scriptures in [bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName]'s chambers, suggesting that [bg_likely_witch.GetSheHe] is not a true servant of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 在彻底的调查后，[From.GetTitledFirstName]得出结论，整个宫廷内[bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName]是最有[bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch]嫌疑的。[From.GetFirstName]声称在[bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName]的房间里发现了人神共愤的文字，这说明[bg_likely_witch.GetSheHe]肯定不是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的真正仆人。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has brought you some distressing news - [From.GetSheHe] is certain that [bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName] is a [bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch]! [From.GetSheHeCap] claims to have seen [bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName] talking to [bg_likely_witch.GetHerselfHimself] in a strange tongue and also informs you of several incidents where [bg_likely_witch.GetSheHe] has assaulted other members of court.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]给你带来了令人苦闷的消息——[From.GetSheHe]确信[bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName]是一个[bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch]！[From.GetSheHeCap]声称曾见过[bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName]与[bg_likely_witch.GetHerselfHimself]用一种奇怪的口音自言自语，并向你汇报[bg_likely_witch.GetSheHe]曾攻击其他宫廷成员的几起事件。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] approaches you with a most serious accusation - [From.GetSheHe] believes that [bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName] is a [bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch]! [From.GetSheHeCap] says that everyone knows [bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName] to be a most sinful [bg_likely_witch.GetManWoman] and as such [bg_likely_witch.GetSheHe] must be consorting with [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]带来了一项严重的指控——[From.GetSheHe]相信[bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName]是一个[bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch]！[From.GetSheHeCap]说所有人都知道[bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName]是个罪孽深重的[bg_likely_witch.GetManWoman]，因此[bg_likely_witch.GetSheHe]必然和[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]有关系。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has told you something quite unsettling. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] has reason to believe that [bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName] is a [bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch]! [From.GetSheHeCap] claims to have found condemning scriptures in [bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName]'s chambers, suggesting that [bg_likely_witch.GetSheHe] is not a true servant of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉你一条令人不安的消息。[From.GetSheHe]有理由相信[bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName]是一个[bg_likely_witch.GetWarlockWitch]！[From.GetSheHeCap]声称在[bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName]的房间里发现了人神共愤的文字，这说明[bg_likely_witch.GetSheHe]肯定不是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的真正仆人。

original: You must be right, [From.GetFirstName]! I will have [bg_likely_witch.GetHerHim] imprisoned!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]说的没错！我必须把[bg_likely_witch.GetHerHim]关进监狱！

original:
§Y[bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be imprisoned until it is time for judgment.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasants Pleased With Witch Hunt'§! for 60 days, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §G-10.0%§!
translation:
§Y[bg_likely_witch.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会被关进监狱，等待审判。

你的所有直辖领获得 60 天的§Y「农民对猎巫行动很满意」§!修正，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§G-10.0%§!

original: These accusations are preposterous! [bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName] is [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s faithful servant!
translation: 这些指控都是一派胡言！[bg_likely_witch.GetFirstName]是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的忠实仆人！

original: You dismiss the intelligence §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! gave you.\n
translation: 你无视了§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!呈上的情报。\n

original: [bg_rival_1.GetTitledFirstName] and [bg_rival_2.GetTitledFirstName] burst into your throne room, yelling madly. Apparently both have reasons to believe that the other is a practitioner of witchcraft. While the accusations are dire, there is no physical proof. You only have your gut feeling to go on.
translation: [bg_rival_1.GetTitledFirstName]和[bg_rival_2.GetTitledFirstName]闯到了你的金銮殿，疯狂的喊叫着。似乎他们都有理由认为对方是巫术活动的参与者。尽管指控很严重，但并没有实际证据。你只能跟着感觉走了。

original: [bg_rival_1.GetTitledFirstName] must be a [bg_rival_1.GetWarlockWitch]!
translation: [bg_rival_1.GetTitledFirstName]肯定是个[bg_rival_1.GetWarlockWitch]！

original: §Y[bg_rival_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be imprisoned until it is time for judgment.\n
translation: §Y[bg_rival_1.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会被关进监狱，等待审判。\n

original: There is only one [bg_rival_2.GetWarlockWitch] here and that is [bg_rival_2.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 真相只有一个，[bg_rival_2.GetTitledFirstName]才是[bg_rival_2.GetWarlockWitch]！

original:
§Y[bg_rival_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be imprisoned until it is time for judgment.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasants Pleased With Witch Hunt'§! for 60 days, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §G-10.0%§!
translation:
§Y[bg_rival_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会被关进监狱，等待审判。

你的所有直辖领获得 60 天的§Y「农民对猎巫行动很满意」§!修正，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§G-10.0%§!

original: I'm no fool! Both of you worship [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!
translation: 我才不傻咧！你们两个都崇拜[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]！

original:
§Y[bg_rival_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[bg_rival_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be imprisoned until it is time for judgment.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasants Pleased With Witch Hunt'§! for 60 days, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §G-10.0%§!
translation:
§Y[bg_rival_1.GetTitledFirstName]§!和§Y[bg_rival_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!都将被关进监狱，等待审判。

你的所有直辖领获得 60 天的§Y「农民对猎巫行动很满意」§!修正，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§G-10.0%§!

original: This is absurd! Get out of my sight!
translation: 简直胡闹！赶紧滚出我的视线！

original: You dismiss §Y[bg_rival_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[bg_rival_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你无视了§Y[bg_rival_1.GetTitledFirstName]§!和§Y[bg_rival_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: Your courtier [From.GetTitledFirstName] has told you some quite condemning things about [bg_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the latter is consorting with  [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] and must be stopped for the good of everyone, especially [bg_spouse.GetHerHis] poor [bg_lover.GetHusbandWife] [bg_lover.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 你的廷臣[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉你了一些有关[bg_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]的非常人神共愤的事情。[From.GetSheHeCap]声称后者与[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]厮混，且为了众人考虑必须阻止此人，特别是为了[bg_spouse.GetHerHis]可怜的[bg_lover.GetHusbandWife][bg_lover.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: I will protect [bg_lover.GetHerHim] from this evil [bg_spouse.GetWarlockWitch]!
translation: 我不会让[bg_spouse.GetWarlockWitch]罪恶的手伸向[bg_lover.GetHerHim]！

original:
§Y[bg_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be imprisoned until it is time for judgment.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasants Pleased With Witch Hunt'§! for 60 days, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §G-10.0%§!
translation:
§Y[bg_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会被关进监狱，等待审判。

你的所有直辖领获得 60 天的§Y「农民对猎巫行动很满意」§!修正，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§G-10.0%§!

original: Keep your nose out of others' business!
translation: 不要管别人的闲事！

original: You dismiss the intelligence §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! gave you.\n
translation: 你无视了§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的情报。\n

original: You have taken some time to consider your targets. Whom at court could you accuse of witchcraft and get away with it? Now you finally believe you have some good options. No one should question you...
translation: 你花了不少时间思考该选哪个目标。宫廷里有谁是你可以指控巫术而又不会引火烧身的？现在你确信找到了一个好选择，没人会因此质疑你……

original: [bg_dislike_1.GetTitledFirstName] is a [bg_dislike_1.GetWarlockWitch]!
translation: [bg_dislike_1.GetTitledFirstName]是一个[bg_dislike_1.GetWarlockWitch]！

original:
§Y[bg_dislike_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be imprisoned until it is time for judgment.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasants Pleased With Witch Hunt'§! for 60 days, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §G-10.0%§!
translation:
§Y[bg_dislike_1.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会被关进监狱，等待审判。

你的所有直辖领获得 60 天的§Y「农民对猎巫行动很满意」§!修正，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§G-10.0%§!

original: Imprison the heretic [bg_dislike_2.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 把异端[bg_dislike_2.GetTitledFirstName]抓起来！

original:
§Y[bg_dislike_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be imprisoned until it is time for judgment.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasants Pleased With Witch Hunt'§! for 60 days, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §G-10.0%§!
translation:
§Y[bg_dislike_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会被关进监狱，等待审判。

你的所有直辖领获得 60 天的§Y「农民对猎巫行动很满意」§!修正，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§G-10.0%§!

original: [bg_dislike_3.GetTitledFirstName] is to blame for the affliction!
translation: [bg_dislike_3.GetTitledFirstName]是灾难的罪魁祸首！

original:
§Y[bg_dislike_3.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be imprisoned until it is time for judgment.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasants Pleased With Witch Hunt'§! for 60 days, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §G-10.0%§!
translation:
§Y[bg_dislike_3.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会被关进监狱，等待审判。

你的所有直辖领获得 60 天的§Y「农民对猎巫行动很满意」§!修正，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§G-10.0%§!

original: I will be merciful and accuse no one.
translation: 我要仁慈点，不要乱指责任何人。

original: The judgment day has arrived! It is time to deal with those who have consorted with [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] and threatened your realm. What will you do?
translation: 审判的日子到了！是时候对付那些崇拜[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]，破坏你的国家的家伙了。你会怎么做？

original: Light the pyres!
translation: 点燃火堆！

original: §Y'Peasant Unrest'§! will be removed from all of your demesne.\n\n
translation: §Y「农民骚乱」§!将从你的所有直辖领中去除。\n\n

original: Let them rot in the dungeon.
translation: 让他们在地牢里腐烂吧。

original: You let the prisoners rot in the dungeon.
translation: 你让囚犯们在牢里自生自灭。

original: Teach them about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s great mercy.
translation: 用[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的万慈教育他们。

original: Today you found [bg_relative_witch.GetFirstName] stabbed to death in [bg_relative_witch.GetHerHis] chamber. You saw the courtiers whisper when [bg_relative_witch.GetSheHe] passed them in the corridors, but you never did anything about it. Now the hatred and paranoia which you help stir up has taken [bg_relative_witch.GetHerHim] from you.
translation: 今天你发现[bg_relative_witch.GetFirstName]被刺死在[bg_relative_witch.GetHerHis]房间中。你曾经见到廷臣们都在[bg_relative_witch.GetSheHe]走过身边时窃窃私语，但你不曾参与其中。如今由你挑起的猜疑和憎恨让[bg_relative_witch.GetHerHim]永远地离开了你。

original: Today you found [bg_relative_witch.GetFirstName] stabbed to death in [bg_relative_witch.GetHerHis] chamber. You saw the courtiers whisper when [bg_relative_witch.GetSheHe] passed them in the corridors, but you never did anything about it. Your own inability to find a witch has led to someone taking matters into their own handa and [bg_relative_witch.GetFirstName] paid the price.
translation: 今天你发现[bg_relative_witch.GetFirstName]被刺死在[bg_relative_witch.GetHerHis]房间中。你曾经见廷臣们都在[bg_relative_witch.GetSheHe]走过身边时窃窃私语，但你不曾参与其中。因为你没能找出女巫，导致其他人自行动手，让[bg_relative_witch.GetFirstName]付出了代价。

original: My [bg_relative_witch.GetFirstName]...
translation: 我的[bg_relative_witch.GetFirstName]……
