original: [bg_relative_witch.GetTitledFirstName] has been killed by people believing [bg_relative_witch.GetHerHim] to be a [bg_relative_witch.GetWarlockWitch].\n
translation: [bg_relative_witch.GetTitledFirstName]被相信[bg_relative_witch.GetHerHim]是[bg_relative_witch.GetWarlockWitch]的人杀害了。\n

original: It seems like the precautions you took has paid off. There has been very little talk of witchcraft during the last weeks and no accusations. While you will never know for certain if those prosecuted were to blame for the epidemic, at least everyone else seem relieved...
translation: 你的预防措施似乎有了回报。过去几周已经没有什么人谈论巫术活动，也没有新的指控。然而你也不能确信究竟那些被控诉的人是不是瘟疫的罪魁祸首，至少所有人看上去都放宽心了。

original: I did what I had to do.
translation: 我已经做了我该做的事。

original: It has been many months since peasants and courtiers alike began to call for a witch hunt. Despite their best efforts to point fingers you have found no one you believe to be a real follower of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]. They have now given up hope of you ever finding the guilty infidels.
translation: 从农民和廷臣们要求展开一场猎巫运动至今已经几个月了。那批人除了努力乱指控之外没找出任何一个你认为真正的[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]追随者。他们已经不指望你能找到哪怕一个有罪的异教徒了。

original: I pray it will be over now.
translation: 我祈求这破事儿能到此为止了。

original: Recently you have noticed a charming woman at your court. You have never heard of her name before but her refined manners and etiquette suggest that she has had a fine upbringing. She is an excellent conversationalist and everyone adores her. Maybe you could make use of her talents?
translation: 最近你发现宫廷里有一位迷人的女士。你从未听说过她的名字，但她优雅的礼仪和动作显示了她极有教养。她极为健谈，人人都爱慕她。也许你可以利用一下她的天赋？

original: [From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName], can I interest you in a seat on my council?
translation: [From.GetFirstName][From.GetLordLady]，我能否请你到我的内阁中任职？

original: No, I don't need her help.
translation: 不，我不需要她。

original: A most peculiar woman has arrived at your court. In only a matter of months she has made a name for herself as a most accomplished warrior. You have even seen her defeat some of your best champions in the sparring ring. Maybe she could teach your other soldiers a thing or two?
translation: 一位很古怪的女士到达了你的宫廷。不消几个月功夫她就证明了自己是个杰出的战士。你甚至目睹她在角斗场里战胜了你最强的几个精英。也许她可以教你的战士们几手？

original: [From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName], I could use a woman of your talents!
translation: [From.GetFirstName][From.GetLordLady]，我可以用你的才能！

original: No, I don't think so.
translation: 不，我不这么认为。

original: A most impressive woman has recently arrived at your court. Apparently the reason for her visit has been to arrange a trade agreement with the local merchants. While people did not think much of her at first, now you have heard many courtiers praising her savvy business sense. Perhaps you should make her an offer?
translation: 一位令人印象深刻的女士最近来到了你的宫廷。她到此是为了和当地的商人谈一份贸易协议。一开始人们不把她放在眼里，而现在你的廷臣们都开始赞扬她的商业嗅觉了。也许你可以给她一个职位？

original: [From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName], you should work for me!
translation: [From.GetFirstName][From.GetLordLady]，你应该为我工作！

original: Everything is fine just as it is.
translation: 维持现状才是最好的。

original: A few days ago you noticed an intriguing woman at your court. Most of the time she sat quietly and did not draw any attention to herself. However, you could tell that she was listening very intently to the conversation and that nothing escaped her watchful eyes. Perhaps you can find a use for her talents?
translation: 几天前你注意到你宫廷中的一位女士相当有趣。大多数时候她都安静地坐着，不引起任何注意。但是你发现她一直在仔细倾听着各种谈话，而且没有什么事情能逃得过她的眼睛。也许你可以利用下她的天分？

original: [From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName], I have the perfect job for you.
translation: [From.GetFirstName][From.GetLordLady]，我有一份最适合你的工作。

original: No, I don't trust her.
translation: 不，我不相信她。

original: Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has asked you to consider her for the position of [Root.GetChancellorName] on your council. While you are sure she would be up to the task, it would be an unconventional choice, if not an outright scandalous one. Your vassals would not be happy...
translation: 你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]要求你考虑下让她担任你的[Root.GetChancellorName]。虽然你确定她一定能胜任，但是这样会打破传统，你的封臣们不会喜欢这样离经叛道的事情……

original: Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has asked you to consider her for the position of [Root.GetMarshalName] on your council. While you are sure she would be up to the task, it would be an unconventional choice, if not an outright scandalous one. Your vassals would not be happy...
translation: 你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]要求你考虑下让她担任你的[Root.GetMarshalName]。虽然你确定她一定能胜任，但是这样会打破传统，你的封臣们不会喜欢这样离经叛道的事情……

original: Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has asked you to consider her for the position of [Root.GetTreasurerName] on your council. While you are sure she would be up to the task, it would be an unconventional choice, if not an outright scandalous one. Your vassals would not be happy...
translation: 你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]要求你考虑下让她担任你的[Root.GetTreasurerName]。虽然你确定她一定能胜任，但是这样会打破传统，你的封臣们不会喜欢这样离经叛道的事情……

original: Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has asked you to consider her for the position of [Root.GetSpymasterName] on your council. While you are sure she would be up to the task, it would be an unconventional choice, if not an outright scandalous one. Your vassals would not be happy...
translation: 你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]要求你考虑下让她担任你的[Root.GetSpymasterName]。虽然你确定她一定能胜任，但是这样会打破传统，你的封臣们不会喜欢这样离经叛道的事情……

original: What a brilliant idea, [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 这是个好主意，[From.GetFirstName]！

original: How dare you suggest something so inappropriate?
translation: 你怎么敢说这么不妥的事情？

original: Scandalous Councillor
translation: 遭人非议的内阁成员

original: Scandalous Councillor
translation: 遭人非议的内阁成员

original: Scandalous Councillor
translation: 遭人非议的内阁成员

original: Hunting the Dead
translation: 猎杀亡灵

original: Days of the Living Dead
translation: 活死人之日

original: At first there were only rumors, but now no one can deny the disease ravaging the world. Streets and fields all over your realm lay barren. Some of your subjects have escaped the worst afflicted areas while many others have succumbed and paid the ultimate price. \n\nNow new rumors are starting to spread. They say that the dead are rising from the mass graves to walk the earth once more. There have even been whispers of these undying corpses attacking the living. So far nothing has been confirmed, and you have publicly branded the reports as falsehood. However, secretly, you are not convinced. The last terrible rumors did turn out to be true...
translation: 一开始只是些传言，但时至今日已经无人可以否认可怕的疾病正蹂躏着整个世界。街道和田野变得空空荡荡。你的臣民们有的逃离了传染最剧烈的地区，但更多人已经被疾病打倒。\n\n如今又有新的流言在传播。他们说死人正在从墓地中爬出，重新行走在大地上。甚至有传言说这些不死大军正在攻击活着的人们。目前为止没有确切证实，你当众宣布这些报告是伪报。但是，私下里，你也没有任何信心。上一个恐怖的流言可被证明了是真实的……

original: These are dark days, indeed.
translation: 真是黑暗的时代啊。

original: My guards inform me that a mob of peasant has gathered outside my gates, and it is growing by the hour. Their leader is demanding an audience with me. Apparently it has something to do with the recent rumors of living corpses.
translation: 我的守卫告诉我一群农民集结在我的大门外，而且每小时人数都在增多。他们的首领要求和我谈谈。似乎和最近关于不死大军的传言有关。

original: We'd better let him in.
translation: 让他们进来吧。

original: Grant the peasant leader's request for an audience.\n
translation: 听听那个农民的首领想说什么。\n

original: Keep the gates shut!
translation: 把门给我关死喽！

original:
Ignore the peasants and hope for the best.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasant Unrest'§! for 2 years, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+10.0%§!
Local Tax Modifier: §R-50.0%§!
translation:
忽视农民，期待最好的结果。

你的所有直辖领获得两年§Y「农民骚动」§!，有如下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+10.0%§!
本地税收修正：§R-50.0%§!

original: The peasant leader, who goes by the name [From.GetFirstName], is a ghastly sight! He claims to have been bitten by one of the living dead and barely escaped with his life. He begs that I take action and save my people from this terrible scourge.
translation: 那个叫[From.GetFirstName]的农民首领脸色惨白，他声称被一个活死人咬了，好不容易才逃得性命。他请求我采取行动来拯救我的子民对抗这场天灾。

original: They are not monsters, but people, and we will help them.
translation: 他们不是怪物，而是人，我们会帮助他们。

original: You invest in healers and field hospitals, hoping it will calm the peasants and slow the spread of the disease.\n
translation: 你花钱聘请医生和投资建设诊所，希望这样可以让农民们冷静下来，并延缓疾病的传播。\n

original: This is not the end. The words of the [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] are certain!
translation: 这还不是末日。[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]说的很清楚了！

original: Teach §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s mercy and convince him that the sick are not to be feared, but cared for.\n
translation: 告诉§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!关于[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的仁慈，让他相信这些病人不是可怕的，只是需要照顾。\n

original: I will send some soldiers to hunt these monsters down!
translation: 我要派一些士兵去追捕这些怪物！

original:
Dedicate a portion of your levy to protect your people from the living dead.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Hunting the Dead'§! for 1 year, giving the following effects:
Levy Size: §R-20.0%§!
translation:
派出你的一部分兵力保护人们不受活死人攻击。

你的所有直辖领获得1年的§Y「猎杀亡灵」§!，有以下效果：
征召兵规模：§R-20.0%§!

original: You know these fiends better than anyone, [From.GetFirstName]. Save your people!
translation: 你比任何人都更了解这些人，[From.GetFirstName]。去拯救你的人民！

original: Convince §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! and his peasant mob to hunt the living dead themselves.\n
translation: 说服§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!和他的农夫们自行猎杀活死人。\n

original: A crying peasant woman has been brought before me. Her little child had been ill and was mistakenly slain in the hunt for the living dead. My advisors tell me that this is not the only case and the people are growing resentful towards their "protectors".
translation: 一个哭泣的女人被带到了我的面前。她的小儿子生了病，被误当成活死人杀死了。我的顾问告诉我这不是孤例，人们已经对他们的「保护者」感到不满了。

original: Forgive me, dear woman! Please accept this gift as a sign of my remorse.
translation: 女士，请原谅我！收下我以表歉意的礼物吧。

original: Offer the woman a sum of money and a public apology, hoping that it will be enough to appease the peasants.\n
translation: 给这个女人一笔钱并公开道歉，希望这足以平息农民们的不满。\n

original: [end_peasant_leader.GetFirstName] is the instigator behind this devastating lawlessness.
translation: [end_peasant_leader.GetFirstName]是这些法外狂徒背后的煽动者。

original: Shift the blame on [end_peasant_leader.GetFirstName] and call off the persecution of the "living dead".\n
translation: 把责任推给[end_peasant_leader.GetFirstName]并叫停对「活死人」的迫害。\n

original: The blame is yours. The lot of you demanded protection in the first place!
translation: 这是你自找的。当初是你们那么多人要求保护！

original:
Dismiss the mother and the angry peasants.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasant Crisis'§! for 3 years, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+15.0%§!
Local Tax Modifier: §R-75.0%§!
translation:
无视这个母亲和愤怒的农民。

你的全部直辖领获得3年的§Y「农民危机」§!，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+15.0%§!
本地税收修正：§R-75.0%§!

original: I hear [From.GetFirstName] has been preaching about aiding the afflicted and has amassed quite a following over the last few months. While the fear of the living dead has dissipated substantially, the pendulum has swung in the other direction and now many are happily interacting with the sick.
translation: 我听说[From.GetFirstName]正在宣传如何帮助感染者，过去几个月间已经聚起了不少追随者。对活死人的恐惧还在扩散，但在另一些方向上情况则相反，许多人依然乐于和病人互动。

original: He is a danger to my people. Arrest him!
translation: 他是我的子民的潜在威胁。逮捕他！

original:
Have §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! arrested, risking the wrath of his followers.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasant Crisis'§! for 10 years, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+15.0%§!
Local Tax Modifier: §R-75.0%§!
translation:
将§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!逮捕，可能招致他的追随者的怒火。你的全部直辖领获得10年的§Y「农民危机」§!，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+15.0%§!
本地税收修正：§R-75.0%§!

original: Dispose of this half-wit. Discreetly.
translation: 把这个蠢蛋处理掉。小心点。

original: Attempt to have §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! assassinated.
translation: 试图刺杀§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!。

original: It is too late to interfere now. Perhaps something good will come of it.
translation: 现在插手已经太迟了，现在只能听天由命吧。

original: Allow §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! to continue encouraging contact between the sick and the healthy.\n\nThe depopulation level increases by 1 in all of your counties
translation: 允许§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!继续鼓励健康的人们接触病人。\n\n你的所有省份的人口减少速率加快1级。

original: Everything went according to plan. My agents disposed of [end_peasant_leader.GetFirstName] and made it appear as if he abandoned his disciples. They already seem to have lost heart as a consequence. Hopefully this will slow the spread of the disease.
translation: 一切都照计划进行。我的手下干掉了[end_peasant_leader.GetFirstName]而且伪装成他抛弃了他的追随者的样子。他们已经失去了主心骨。希望这样能减缓疾病的蔓延。

original: Excellent.
translation: 好极了。

original: The agents I sent to deal with [end_peasant_leader.GetFirstName] certainly killed him, but they also made a grand spectacle of it. Now all of his followers know that I am to blame and despite by best efforts towards damage control, the word is spreading like wildfire. They have painted me quite the villain...
translation: 我派去处理[end_peasant_leader.GetFirstName]的手下当然得手了，但是他们同时也把这件事闹大了。现在他所有的追随者都知道我是真凶，尽管我们极力控制，言论还是如野火一样传播开来。现在他们都把我当成小人……

original: This can't end well...
translation: 此事无法善了……

original:
All of your demesne gets §Y'Peasant Crisis'§! for 10 years, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+15.0%§!
Local Tax Modifier: §R-75.0%§!
translation:
你的全部直辖领获得10年的§Y「农民危机」§!，有以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+15.0%§!
本地税收修正：§R-75.0%§!

original: A World on Fire
translation: 燃烧的世界

original: Despite your efforts to handle the situation - or perhaps exactly because of them - the situation in your realm has doubtlessly gotten out of hand. It is no longer within your power to rein in the fear and anger of your people. They are turning on each other, neighbors slaying neighbors, friends betraying friends. Sometimes the motivations behind these killings are nothing more than a simple cough or wound. \n\nIt is clear to you now that the rumors about the living dead were never true, though it matters little. Many innocents lost their life to persecution, rather than the disease itself. The streets will not be crowded again for many years to come. The scars in your subjects' minds will likely last much longer...
translation: 尽管你努力控制局面——或者说正是因为你的努力——国内的情况毫无疑问地脱离了掌控。如今你已经无法继续在民众的恐惧和怒火下继续统治。他们已经开始自相残杀，邻里互相杀戮，朋友互相背叛。有时仅仅一声咳嗽或者一个小伤口就会招来杀身之祸。\n\n很明显关于活死人的流言全是假的，但是这已经不重要了。许多无辜的人失去了生命，他们死于迫害而不是疾病。未来许多年内街道上都会冷冷清清。你的臣民心中的伤痕则会遗留更长时间……

original: Is this the punishment of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
translation: 这是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的惩罚吗？

original: The depopulation level increases by 1 in all of your counties.
translation: 你的所有省份的人口减少速率加快1级。

original: Last Living Souls
translation: 最后的生灵

original: Your inability to handle the threat of the "living dead" has left your realm shaken and shattered. While the rumors turned out to be false, the disease has still ravaged your lands. Many fields and orchards lay abandoned in the countryside, and in the towns crowded streets are a rare sight. Those who are left struggle hard to make ends meet. You and your court is no exception. Not even [Root.GetTitle]s are immune to the touch of Death. \n\nWhen will the nightmare end, you ask yourself. Who knows? Perhaps it must get even worse before things turn around for the better. All you know for certain is that the streets will not be crowded again for many years to come. The scars in your subjects' minds, however, will likely last much longer...
translation: 你无力控制民众对「活死人」的恐惧导致了你的国度的动荡。尽管谣言最后被证明是假的，疾病依然在你的土地上肆虐。乡村中的许多田地已经被荒弃，城镇里拥挤的街道也已难寻。那些幸存的人还在努力营生，你和你的宫廷也不例外，哪怕[Root.GetTitle]也躲不开死神之手。\n\n你问自己，噩梦何时是个头。谁知道呢？也许在一切好起来之前还会有更糟的事情发生。你唯一确定的是未来许多年内街道上都会冷冷清清。你的臣民心中的伤痕则会遗留更长时间……

original: Will our lives ever be the same again?
translation: 我们的生活还能再回到从前吗？

original: The depopulation level increases by 1 in all of your counties.
translation: 你的所有省份的人口减少速率加快1级。

original: A Glimmer of Hope
translation: 希望的曙光

original: These have been hard days, no one can deny it, but perhaps the worst has passed. The rumors concerning the living dead have all but ceased. It seems like the pale, twisted specters which have haunted your realm were nothing but sick people. Most of them were not even aggressive, despite the claims of the mob. While the sick still pose a danger to others, the fear is not so great as before, and the situation has been handled in the best way you could hope for. \n\nAll is not over yet, however. The realm might have pulled through this panic, but the disease is still claiming lives. There is no rest nor respite until the epidemic is over.
translation: 这是一段艰难的时光，没人能否认这一点，但最坏的时刻似乎已经过去了。关于活死人的流言已经终结。那些在你的国土上游荡的苍白，扭曲的幽灵只不过是生病的人们。和人们宣称的不同，他们绝大多数根本没有攻击性。尽管病患依然会威胁到其他人，恐惧已经没以前那么厉害了，这已经是你能预计到的最佳情况了。\n\n可事情还没有全部结束。领地或许撑过了这次大恐慌，但疾病还在收割生命。直到这次瘟疫过去以前，一切都还无休无止。

original: May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] continue to show us mercy.
translation: 愿[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]继续保佑我们。

original: §Y'Peasant Unrest'§! will be removed from all of your demesne.\n\n
translation: §Y「农民骚乱」§!将会从你的所有直辖领移除。\n\n

original: §Y'Peasant Crisis'§! will be removed from all of your demesne.\n\n
translation: §Y「农民危机」§!将会从你的所有直辖领移除。\n\n

original: The peasants in your demesne calm down.
translation: 你直辖领内的农民冷静下来了。

original: Worship the Ancestors
translation: 敬拜祖先

original: Make a sacrifice to your Ancestors and ask for their aid regarding an important matter, such as relationships or prosperity. This can only be done every tenth year.
translation: 向你的祖先献祭，并请求祖先对重要事情的帮助，比如人际关系或繁荣。这只能每 10 年进行一次。

original: You begin preparations for the sacrifice.
translation: 你开始准备祭献的事宜。

original: Summon Devout Warriors
translation: 召集虔诚战士

original: Due to your reputation as [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s faithful servant, you can summon a band of devout warriors to defend your realm against the heathens.
translation: 因为你作为[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的忠实仆人的名声在外，你可以召集一队虔诚的战士来帮助你的国家抵御异教徒。

original: You summon a band of devout warriors.\n
translation: 你召唤一群虔诚的战士。\n

original: Is the Primary Defender against a Religious Enemy\n
translation: 是对抗宗教敌人的主要防御方\n

original: Invigorated
translation: 精力充沛

original: Good Listener
translation: 好听众

original: New Insights
translation: 新见解

original: Bargainer
translation: 交易者

original: Confident
translation: 自信满满

original: Overtaxed Subjects
translation: 税负过重的臣民

original: Inspired Warriors
translation: 野心勃勃的战士

original: Respected by the People
translation: 受人民尊重

original: Bad Person
translation: 恶人

original: Blessing of Health
translation: 祝福健康

original: was offered up in sacrifice to the Ancestors by $KILLER$
translation: 被$KILLER$献祭给了先祖

original: You have decided to visit the shrine in the holy grove and make a sacrifice in the honor of your Ancestors, hoping for their aid in return. What will you ask of your fore[Root.GetFatherMother]s?
translation: 你决定拜访神圣树林中的祭坛并为你祖先的荣耀奉上牺牲，以求取他们的帮助。对你列祖列宗你会要求什么呢？

original: A long and healthy life.
translation: 健康长寿。

original: I wish for affection and companionship.
translation: 我希望有爱和陪伴。

original: Guide my sword in battle and let me conquer my enemies!
translation: 在战斗中引导我的剑，让我征服我的敌人！

original: Prosperity and growth for my realm.
translation: 领地繁荣昌盛。

original: Ancestors, share your wisdom with me!
translation: 祖先们，赐予我智慧吧！

original: You asked your Ancestors for health and longevity. Now it is time to present your offering - what will you give them in return?
translation: 你向先祖祈求健康和长寿。现在是时候献上你的礼物了——你会向他们献上什么？

original: You asked your Ancestors for aid with your relationships. Now it is time to present your offering - what will you give them in return?
translation: 你向先祖祈求改善人际关系，现在是时候献上你的礼物了——你会向他们献上什么？

original: You asked your Ancestors for military power and prowess in battle. Now it is time to present your offering - what will you give them in return?
translation: 你向先祖祈求军事实力和战场技艺。现在是时候献上你的礼物了——你会向他们献上什么？

original: You asked your Ancestors for prosperity and wealth for your realm. Now it is time to present your offering - what will you give them in return?
translation: 你向先祖祈求国家的繁荣和富有。现在是时候献上你的礼物了——你会向他们献上什么？

original: You asked your Ancestors for guidance and knowledge. Now it is time to present your offering - what will you give them in return?
translation: 你向先祖祈求指引和知识。现在是时候献上你的礼物了——你会向他们献上什么？

original: Oh, great fore[Root.GetFatherMother]s, I willingly offer you my flesh and blood!
translation: 啊，伟大的先祖们，我愿意把我的血肉奉献给你！

original: You offer the Ancestors one of your body parts.\n
translation: 你向祖先祭献你身体的一部分。\n

original: May this soul serve you well in the afterlife!
translation: 愿这个灵魂在来世为你服务！

original: You offer the Ancestors the life of one of your prisoners.\n
translation: 你将囚犯的生命祭献给祖先。\n

original: Ancestors, may this feast please you!
translation: 祖先们，请享用这顿盛宴！

original: You offer the Ancestors the best food and drink money can buy.\n
translation: 你把能买到的最好的食物和酒祭献给祖先。\n

original: I had this idol carved in your honor. I hope it will please you.
translation: 我把你的荣誉刻在这个神像上。我希望它能让你高兴。

original: You offer the Ancestors a small carving.\n
translation: 你用一个小雕像祭献祖先。\n

original: May this soul serve you well in the afterlife!
translation: 愿这个灵魂在来世为你服务！

original: You offer the Ancestors the life of one of your courtiers.\n
translation: 你祭献给祖先一个廷臣的生命。\n

original: You lay down on the offering stone, bracing yourself for the ritual. Thankfully the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]'s knife is sharp and soon the stone is dark with your blood. Your agonized screams will surely have pleased the ancestor. Now all you can do is wait, and hope.
translation: 你躺在祭献石台上，用你自己作为祭献品。还好[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]的刀子足够锋利，石台很快沾满了你暗红色的鲜血。你的惨叫一定可以取悦你的祖先。现在你能做的就是等待和期待。

original: The offering struggled violently when the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] and her disciples pushed it down on the offering stone. The Ancestors will surely be pleased with such a vigorous servant.  Now all you can do is wait, and hope.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]和她的手下把祭品按倒在祭献石台上。祭品还在剧烈的挣扎，祖先一定会满意于这样元气满满的仆人。现在你能做的就是等待和期待。

original: Together with the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] and her disciples you placed a great bounty of food and drink on the offering stone. You spent the entire night feasting and singing the great chants in your Ancestors' honor. Now all you can do is wait, and hope.
translation: 和[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]以及她的手下们一起，你在祭献石台上布置了大量的食物和美酒。你一整夜都在欢饮高歌，赞颂你祖先的荣光。现在你能做的就是等待和期待。

original: You placed the delicate little idol on the offering stone and paid your respect to your Ancestors. Now all you can do is wait, and hope.
translation: 你把精巧的小人偶放在了祭献石台上以表你对祖先的崇敬。现在你能做的就是等待和期待。

original: May the Ancestors bestow their blessing upon me.
translation: 愿祖先赐予我祝福。

original: I am sick, I know I am. Yet my physician has been struck dumb by how much energy I seem to possess, in the face of the anguish I should be going through. I want to say that I have the Ancestors by my side, but I'm not sure anyone would believe me.
translation: 我知道我病了。然而我的医生却弄不懂为何我明明正经受着如此痛苦，却依然充满能量。我想说我的祖先正在我的身边，但我觉得大概没人会相信我。

original: Perhaps it's my positive attitude?
translation: 这大概是因为我积极乐观？

original: I am not sure that athleticism runs in my family, but it never hurts to try a little. However, my subjects have raised some curious eyebrows when they've spotted me lifting barrels and rocks for fun and exercise... I've just felt inspired!
translation: 我也不确定这种运动天赋是不是深刻在家族血脉中的，但是不妨尝试一下。当我的臣属们好奇地看着我举起木桶和巨石当做练习和消遣的时候……我感受到了激励！

original: I'd love to see my grand[Root.GetFatherMother] do one-handed push-ups like these!
translation: 我很想看到我的祖[Root.GetFatherMother]单手举起这玩意的样子！

original: I guess it could be the nettle soup I've started eating lately, or the recent good weather, but I feel invigorated. I even got a compliment today, saying I looked several years younger! Is this the work of the Ancestors?
translation: 是因为刚才喝的荨麻汤不错，还是因为最近天气上佳，总之我感觉充满了活力。甚至有人恭维我，说我看上去年轻了好几岁！这是因为祖先的保佑吗？

original: I feel amazing!
translation: 我感觉棒极了！

original: Ever since I begged the Ancestors to aid me with my failing health, I have been feeling... off. More off than usual, that is. Perhaps I asked for too much?
translation: 自从我请求祖先们保佑我每况日下的健康，我就感觉更不舒服了……比以往还不舒服。也许我要求太多了？

original: I hope I'm just being paranoid...
translation: 我希望我只是多疑而已……

original: It is impossible to prove, but I do think I feel slightly better than usual. There is an additional spring in my step and my mind is clearer. I am sure that the Ancestors are with me, keeping me strong and safe!
translation: 虽然无法证明，但是我比平时感觉好多了。我的步伐更加强壮有力了，而且我的头脑也更清醒。我相信我的祖先在保佑着我，保证我的安全和健壮！

original: Ancestors, I thank you for your blessing!
translation: 祖先们，我感谢你们的保佑！

original: No one can explain why, but the affliction which has been tormenting me for these last few weeks seems to have left my body! All of the symptoms are gone and I feel as healthy as ever. By [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], it is truly a miracle!
translation: 没人能解释为什么，这几个星期一直缠绕我的痛苦似乎已经不再继续困扰我的身体了！所有的症状都消失了，我感觉和以前一样健康。感谢[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，这真的是个奇迹！

original: Give praise to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and the Ancestors!
translation: 赞美[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]和祖先们！

original: I don't know why I have never noticed [ancestors_lover.GetTitledFirstName] before. In fact, I have some memory of finding [ancestors_lover.GetHerHim] the opposite of attractive! Yet I find myself drawn to [ancestors_lover.GetHerHis] side. I think perhaps the Ancestors have steered me in [ancestors_lover.GetHerHis] direction.
translation: 我不知道为什么我以前从没注意到[ancestors_lover.GetTitledFirstName]。事实上，我甚至记得我觉得[ancestors_lover.GetHerHim]是美丽的反义词！但是我却发现我被吸引到[ancestors_lover.GetHerHis]身边。我想一定是祖先们把我朝着[ancestors_lover.GetHerHis]方向引导。

original: I'm aching to confess my love to [ancestors_lover.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我已经等不及向[ancestors_lover.GetHerHim]表白了！

original: I am still not convinced we are right for each other...
translation: 我还是不觉得我们命中注定……

original: There are few things I enjoy more than the company of [ancestors_friend.GetTitledFirstName]. I know we weren't always this close, but it's hard to recall a time when we weren't. In times like these, it's rare to have such a trusted confidant.
translation: 我很难找到比[ancestors_friend.GetTitledFirstName]的陪伴更有趣的事情了。我知道我们不是一直这么亲密，但是我已经记不住什么时候开始如此了。现在很难找到一个值得信赖的密友。

original: May our descendants be the best of allies as well!
translation: 希望我们的子孙也是最好的盟友！

original: Although it's really annoying, the way they chew with an open mouth.
translation: 不过他们张着大嘴嚼东西的样子真烦人。

original: I've been thinking a lot about my Ancestors lately and I'm reminded by the elusive nature of friendships... I try to be myself, but it's not always that easy to get along with people. However, I want to make an effort.
translation: 最近想了很多次关于我的祖先们，提醒了我友情那难以揣摩的本质……我尽可能的做我自己，但是很难和别人相处好。不过，我想努力尝试。

original: Communication is key.
translation: 交流是关键。

original: Did [ancestors_rival.GetTitledFirstName] always bug me like this? Not only does [ancestors_rival.GetSheHe] constantly interrupt my speech, but when we walk past each other [ancestors_rival.GetSheHe] has even stopped greeting me - and I am the [Root.GetTitle]! What have I done to deserve to be treated this way?
translation: [ancestors_rival.GetTitledFirstName]一直这么烦我么？[ancestors_rival.GetSheHe]不仅仅经常打断我的演讲，而且当我们走路碰到对方的时候[ancestors_rival.GetSheHe]居然也不向我打招呼——我可是[Root.GetTitle]！我做了什么竟然受到如此对待？

original: The nerve of that [ancestors_rival.GetManWoman]!
translation: [ancestors_rival.GetManWoman]好大的胆子！

original: Recently I have felt as if I have gained a totally new understanding of my people. What drives and inspires them, attracts or repulses them - it all seems so clear now. I do not think I am imagining things, because I have been met with more respect than ever before.
translation: 最近我感觉我似乎对我的人民们更加了解了。什么驱使他们，什么激励他们，吸引或者让他们厌烦——所有东西似乎都很清晰了。我不觉得我在幻想，因为我比以前受到了更多的尊敬。

original: Perhaps the Ancestors are guiding me?
translation: 也许祖先们在指引着我？

original: Recently this gorgeous black and white cat has been following me around everywhere. It seems as if it has decided that I am its [Root.GetMasterMistress]! I did ask the Ancestors for help with my relationships, although this is not quite what I had in mind.
translation: 最近这只漂亮的黑白小猫形影不离地跟随着我。它似乎自己决定了我就是它的[Root.GetMasterMistress]！我确实向祖先们祈求人际关系上的帮助，但是这和我想象的完全不同。

original: But it is so cute. Come here, kitty!
translation: 但是它好可爱。小猫过来！

original: Shoo! Go away!
translation: 嘘！走开！

original: I have recently noticed one of my soldiers. [ancestors_commander.GetFirstName] is something else, to say the least. [ancestors_commander.GetSheHeCap] outmaneuvers warriors with twice [ancestors_commander.GetHerHis] experience in the sparring ring on a regular basis. Perhaps I can find [ancestors_commander.GetHerHim] a new position?
translation: 我最近注意到我的一个士兵。[ancestors_commander.GetFirstName]与众不同。[ancestors_commander.GetSheHeCap]经常在比武大赛里用智谋取胜比[ancestors_commander.GetHerHis]两倍经验还多的对手。也许我能给[ancestors_commander.GetHerHim]个新的职位？

original: Maybe the Ancestors sent [ancestors_commander.GetHerHim] to me?
translation: 也许是我的祖先将[ancestors_commander.GetHerHim]派给我？

original: If my Ancestors ever taught me anything, it is that a warrior's greatness is not only measured by the strength of [Root.GetHerHis] arm or [Root.GetHerHis] skill with [Root.GetHerHis] weapon. To truly dominate a battlefield, one must know how to analyze the flow of battle and how to lead one's troops.
translation: 如果说我的祖先们有教会了我什么东西，那就是告诉了我一名战士的伟大并不取决于[Root.GetHerHis]四肢如何强壮、[Root.GetHerHis]武器如何尖锐或[Root.GetHerHis]技术如何高超。而是如果想要真正的掌控战场，那么就必须知道如何分析战场形势并且领导整只军队。

original: I can almost feel my ancestor's guiding touch.
translation: 我几乎能感受到祖先们的指引。

original: Oh, [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] be cursed! Today I made a senseless mistake in the sparring ring which had devastating consequence. My opponent was not ready and [Root.GetHerHis] blade easily cut through my armor. Have my Ancestors withdrawn their protection?
translation: 哦，该死的[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]！今天我在比武大赛里犯下了一个很蠢的错误，并且造成了很严重的后果。我的对手还没准备好，结果[Root.GetHerHis]利刃却轻易得穿透了我的护甲。难道我的祖先们不再保佑我了吗？

original: I will never be the same again.
translation: 我再也不会和以前一样了。

original: My [Root.GetMarshalName] [ancestors_marshal.GetFirstName] has suggested some interesting changes concerning how we train and equip our soldiers. [ancestors_marshal.GetSheHeCap] claims the ideas came from a flash of inspiration. I am sure we have the Ancestors to thank!
translation: 我的[Root.GetMarshalName][ancestors_marshal.GetFirstName]建议我关于如何训练和装备我们的士兵。[ancestors_marshal.GetSheHeCap]声称这些主意是灵光一现时得到的。我确信我要感谢祖先们！

original: One of my commanders has suggested some interesting changes concerning how we train and equip our soldiers. They claim the ideas came from a flash of inspiration. I am sure we have the Ancestors to thank!
translation: 我的指挥官建议了一些有趣的对训练和装备士兵们的方法的改动。他们声称这些主意是他们灵光一现时得到的。我确信我要感谢祖先们！

original: Let us give these ideas a try!
translation: 让我们试试这些主意！

original: It seems as if people from far and wide have heard of my offering to the Ancestors. Now they are flocking to join my armies in quest for the glory of old. Together we will honor the Ancestors on the battlefield!
translation: 似乎四面八方的人们都听说了我对祖先们的献祭。现在他们踊跃的加入我的军队准备恢复旧日的荣光。我们将一起在战场上向祖先们致敬！

original: Power to [Root.Realm.GetName]!
translation: [Root.Realm.GetName]的力量！

original: I have been contemplating the tales of my Ancestors. I am more than a little impressed by their wit and I think I have picked up a thing or two from my studies. They really are great source of inspiration and knowledge.
translation: 我仔细阅读着祖先们的传说。我被他们的智慧所折服，而且我觉得在学习过程中我学到了一两招。这些传说真是知识和灵感的源泉。

original: We can always learn from those who came before.
translation: 我们可以追随着先人的脚步。

original: An intriguing woman by the name of [ancestors_wise_woman.GetFirstName] recently joined my court. I could tell from the first moment that she was learned, and since then she has kept impressing me with her knowledge and sound reasoning. Her counsel is always welcome, no matter how harsh it might be. I know she is rarely mistaken.
translation: 自称为[ancestors_wise_woman.GetFirstName]的神秘女人最近加入了我的宫廷。我从第一面开始就能感觉到她的博学，从那之后她就一直换着花样让我对她的雄辩和博学感到敬佩。她的建议无论听起来多么伤人也会被接受。我知道她很少犯错。

original: I believe the Ancestors sent her my way.
translation: 我确信我的祖先们派她来了。

original: I know that my Ancestors always valued a wise and sharp mind, so I have decided to spend more time on my studies. Today I was out walking, contemplating the mysteries of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], when a new insight struck me.
translation: 我知道我的祖先们对聪明灵巧的头脑一直很重视，所以我决定要花费更多时间沉迷学习。今天我在外出散步的时候，突然想到了[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的传奇故事，我灵光一现。

original: How could I never have thought of that before!
translation: 我怎么以前没想到啊！

original: During the last few weeks, I have been studying the tales of my Ancestors with the aid of one of the elders. She keeps questioning me about the metaphors and underlying themes of these stories, but my answers never seem to impress her.
translation: 最近这几个星期，我一直都在寻求长者们的帮助，学习我祖先们的传奇故事。她不停地问我关于这些传奇故事的隐藏比喻和中心主题，但是我的回答似乎永远没让她满意过。

original: I don't think I have a mind for this...
translation: 也许我不适合这个……

original: I enter my study only to find a stunning owl perched on my window sill. It observes me with its piercingly yellow eyes for a few moments, and then taps the window with its beak. Did the Ancestors send it my way?
translation: 我进入书房的时候发现一只很漂亮的猫头鹰栖息在我窗口。它用着锐利的黄色眼睛盯着我，然后用鸟嘴敲打着窗户。难道是祖先们派它来的？

original: Who's a pretty bird?
translation: 这只漂亮的鸟叫什么？

original: Shoo, you pesky creature! Leave me be!
translation: 嘘，你这只讨厌的小鸟！离我远点！

original: The last few seasons have been treating my capital [Root.Capital.GetName] well, and by well, I mean excellent! Trade is flourishing and even most peasants seem fed and happy. While I do take some credit for this prosperity, I am convinced that my Ancestors have been protecting us.
translation: 最近几个季节对我的首都[Root.Capital.GetName]很好，其实我是想说完美！贸易日渐兴盛而且大部分的农民看起来很高兴并能吃饱肚子。尽管这更加繁荣的城镇有我一份功劳，我坚信我的祖先们在保佑我。

original: Blessed be the Ancestors!
translation: 赞美祖先们！

original: My [Root.GetTreasurerName] [ancestors_treasurer.GetFirstName] has come to me with some new ideas regarding trade and infrastructure. All of them seem very promising. [ancestors_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] claims the ideas came from a flash of inspiration. I am sure we have the Ancestors to thank!
translation: 我的[Root.GetTreasurerName][ancestors_treasurer.GetFirstName]向我建议了一些关于建设和贸易的新主意。所有主意听起来都很有希望。[ancestors_treasurer.GetSheHeCap]声称这些主意是灵光一现时得到的。我确信我要感谢祖先们！

original: One of my advisors has come to me with some new ideas regarding trade and infrastructure. All of them seem very promising. [Root.GetSheHeCap] claims the ideas came from a flash of inspiration. I am sure we have the Ancestors to thank!
translation: 我的一个顾问向我建议了一些关于建设和贸易的新主意。这些主意听起来都前途无限。[Root.GetSheHeCap]声称这些主意是灵光一现时得到的。我确信我要感谢祖先们！

original: Put the plans into motion!
translation: 执行这些计划！

original: Recently I have had good fortune and made quite a few bargains. At first, it was only some nice pelts and a new sword, but today I aided my [Root.GetTreasurerName] in striking an excellent deal regarding provisions for our soldiers. Could it be the Ancestors guiding me?
translation: 最近我运气很好，做了几笔好交易。一开始，只是一些好毛皮和一把新剑，但是今天我帮助[Root.GetTreasurerName]达成了一笔关于提供士兵粮草的好交易。也许是祖先们在指引我？

original: I know a good deal when I see one!
translation: 我知道如何做笔好交易！

original: One of my subjects realized that I have been overtaxing everyone for quite some time, and now everyone knows it. Even though it was an honest mistake they refuse to send me the proper amounts, claiming that the difference has already been paid.
translation: 我的一个臣民注意到我已课税过重有一段时间了，现在所有人都知道了。尽管真的是一个无心的错误，他们拒绝支付合适的金额，声称差距已经支付过了。

original: Those stingy bastards!
translation: 这些小气的吝啬鬼！

original: Set Crown Focus
translation: 设为统治重心

original: Set [Root.Location.GetName] as your Crown Focus. [Root.Location.GetName] will be more likely to Prosper, and may receive special events. Only one County may be Crown Focus at a time.
translation: 设[Root.Location.GetName]为统治重心。[Root.Location.GetName]会容易繁荣起来，并且触发特殊事件。只有一个省份可以被设置为统治重心。

original: Unset Crown Focus
translation: 取消统治重心

original: Remove Crown Focus from [Root.Location.GetName]. [Root.Location.GetName] will not lose any current modifiers, but will no longer receive special treatment.
translation: 取消[Root.Location.GetName]的统治重心。[Root.Location.GetName]不会失去任何现有的修正，但是不再会有任何特殊对待。

original: Charmed
translation: 着迷

original: Enchanted
translation: 着魔

original: Inattentive
translation: 粗疏

original: Acting Suspicious
translation: 表现可疑

original: Broken Promises
translation: 打破承诺

original: What is Love?
translation: 什么是爱情？

original:
Today is the day. The one I've been dreading. While I have kept my appearances up throughout the ceremony, a paralyzing doubt is gnawing at my soul. My new [gbc_spouse.GetHusbandWife], [gbc_spouse.GetFirstName], is certainly a good match - but is that all there is to it? I know people like us never marry for love, but why does the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] talk of such things? I fear dying without ever having known true love. 

During the following wedding feast I feel as if I am moving through thick fog, mechanically repeating the motions, just as I have been taught. 

That is, until I see [gbc_lover.GetHerHim]. [gbc_lover.GetHerHisCap] pealing laughter and radiating smile breaks through the numbness, like a Cupid's arrow lodging itself deep in my heart.
translation:
今天就是我一直以来恐惧的那天。我在仪式过程中保持着外表和礼仪，可一股令人麻痹的怀疑撕咬着我的灵魂。我的[gbc_spouse.GetHusbandWife]，[gbc_spouse.GetFirstName]，确实是个好伴侣——不过就只有如此？我知道像我们这种人结婚永远不会是因为爱情，但是为什么[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]会谈论爱情呢？我害怕在死之前也感受不到真爱。

在结婚宴会上我感觉像在穿越深深的迷雾。我像他们教我的那样机械地重复着对话。

直到我看到[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]。[gbc_lover.GetHerHisCap]笑声和令人温暖的微笑融化了我的麻木，就像丘比特一箭射中了我的心。

original: Is [gbc_lover.GetSheHe] the answer to my prayers?
translation: 难道[gbc_lover.GetSheHe]就是我祈求的答案？

original: While taking a break from dancing I have received the opportunity to converse with [From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName]. I am not disappointed. [From.GetHerHisCap] wit, [From.GetHerHis] beauty, [From.GetHerHis] charm! I do not want the moment to end, but [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetHusbandWifeOpp] [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName] is approaching...
translation: 在跳舞后休息的时候我有幸可以和[From.GetLordLady][From.GetFirstName]交谈。我也没有失望。[From.GetHerHisCap]聪慧，[From.GetHerHis]美貌，[From.GetHerHis]魅力！我不想这么快结束，但是[From.GetHerHis][From.GetHusbandWifeOpp][gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]走了过来……

original: May I have the honor of this dance?
translation: 我可以与你跳支舞么？

original: I better leave, [gbc_spouse.GetFirstName] is looking displeased...
translation: 我最好离开，[gbc_spouse.GetFirstName]看起来不是很高兴……

original: Tonight I was visited by [From.GetFirstName] in my dreams. When I woke up I could still hear [From.GetHerHis] velvet voice echo in my ears and feel the comforting weight of [From.GetHerHis] hand in mine. Oh, graceful angel! Most [GetRootFromCompliment]. My heart aches for you!
translation: 今晚我在梦里遇见了[From.GetFirstName]。当我醒来的时候我还能听到[From.GetHerHis]柔美的声音回响在我耳边，掌中有[From.GetHerHis]令人安慰的手的感觉。哦，优雅的天使！多么[GetRootFromCompliment]。我的心因你而渴望！

original: I must find [From.GetHerHim], before [From.GetSheHe] leaves!
translation: 我必须找到[From.GetHerHim]，在[From.GetSheHe]离开前！

original: This is wrong... I must forget [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 这是错的……我必须忘记[From.GetHerHim]。

original: By the grace of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], [From.GetFirstName] had not yet left! I found [From.GetHerHim] in the garden, taking a stroll. [From.GetSheHeCap] let me join [From.GetHerHim] and soon our conversation flowed as easy and pleasant as a leisurely summer's day. In the end, I had to profess my love. [From.GetSheHeCap] rejected me most virtuously, but I could tell [From.GetSheHe] was moved by my words.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]保佑，[From.GetFirstName]还没有离开！我发现[From.GetHerHim]在花园里散步。[From.GetSheHeCap]让我和[From.GetHerHim]一道，很快我们就变得无话不谈。最后，我表白了我的爱意。[From.GetSheHeCap]忠贞地拒绝了我，但是我可以感觉到[From.GetSheHe]被我的话语打动了。

original: I will give [From.GetHerHim] time.
translation: 我会给[From.GetHerHim]时间。

original: I must send [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] something to assure [gbc_lover.GetHerHim] of my ardent feelings. I have understood that a [gbc_lover.GetLordLady] such as [gbc_lover.GetSheHe] appreciates having poems dedicated to them. However, a fine fur never disappointed anyone, either.
translation: 我必须给[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]一个定情物让[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]确认我的热情。我听说一位像[gbc_lover.GetSheHe]这样的[gbc_lover.GetLordLady]喜欢专门献给他们的诗歌。不过，一张完美的毛皮也不会让任何人失望。

original: My feelings must be known, I will write a poem!
translation: 我的感情必须被知晓，我会写首诗歌！

original: I shall capture the essence of my love and send it to [gbc_lover.GetHerHim].
translation: 我必须捕捉到我的爱情的精髓然后送给[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]。

original: A thoughtful present should prove my affections.
translation: 一个考虑周到的礼物会证明我的爱情。

original: No, this has gone too far. I will not send anything.
translation: 不，这已经走得太远了。我不会送任何东西。

original: I labored throughout the evening and well into the night. However, it did pay off - the poem became even better than I could have hoped for! If anyone read this they would surely know whom it describes, even though I never mentioned [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]'s name.
translation: 我花费了整晚创作。不过，我的辛苦终于获得了回报——诗歌比我想象的还要好！任何人读过这个，都一定能知道这描述的是谁，尽管我并没有提过[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]的名字。

original: I pray [gbc_lover.GetSheHe] will sense my ardent feelings through this verse!
translation: 我祈祷[gbc_lover.GetSheHe]会从诗里感受到我的热情！

original: I labored throughout the evening and well into the night. No matter how I tried, I could not get the verse just right. The prose and structure turned out well, but I am not confident that I have fully captured the delicate nature of [gbc_lover.GetHerHis] qualities and my own feelings.
translation: 我花费了整晚创作。不论我怎样尝试，我还是没法创作出完美的诗歌。诗调和层次还不错，但是我不确信我完美得捕捉了[gbc_lover.GetHerHis]优雅的容貌和我自己的感情。

original: It is the thought that counts. I am sure [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] will agree.
translation: 心意才是最重要的。我相信[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]会同意我。

original: This is useless. I should just buy some gift.
translation: 这是毫无意义的。我还是就买点礼物吧。

original:
My dearest [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName], 
I was deeply moved by your most beautiful verse. I thank you from the bottom of my heart. You have proven to be a most noble soul. I dearly hope you will continue to bless me with your correspondence. 

 Your faithful friend, 
[From.GetFirstName]
translation:
我最亲爱的[Root.GetLordLady][Root.GetFirstName]，
我被你那美妙的诗歌感动。我从我心底里感谢你。你证明了你有一个高尚的灵魂。因此我希望你会继续我们的往来。

你的忠实的朋友，
[From.GetFirstName]

original:
To the esteemed [Root.GetBestName], 
I am honored by your high regard of me, my [Root.GetLordLady], but I cannot encourage you. I am not the [From.GetManWoman] you believe me to be. I am bound by my promise, to my [From.GetHusbandWifeOpp] and to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]. If you care for me at all, I wish you would abandon this folly and leave me be. 

My best wishes to you and your beautiful bride, 
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致受人尊敬的[Root.GetBestName]，
你对我极为尊敬使我感动不已，[Root.GetLordLady]，但是我不能鼓励你。我不是你想象中的[From.GetManWoman]。我被我自己的承诺所束约，包括对我[From.GetHusbandWifeOpp]的承诺以及对[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]的承诺。如果你真的关心我的话，那么我希望你能停止这场闹剧并且不再打扰我。

致你和你漂亮的新娘最诚挚的祝福，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
My dearest [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName], 
I send my deepest gratitude to you for the beautiful fur I received. I do not know why I would deserve such a gift, but I humbly accept. You have proven to be a most kind soul, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]. I hope you will continue to bless me with your correspondence. 

 Your faithful friend, 
[From.GetFirstName]
translation:
我亲爱的[Root.GetLordLady][Root.GetFirstName]，
我要为了那精美的毛皮而给予你最深刻的感谢。我不知道我为什么获得这么精美的礼物，但是我诚恳地接受。你证明了你有最慷慨的灵魂，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]。我希望你会继续我们的往来。

你的忠实的朋友，
[From.GetFirstName]

original: I will keep writing them for you, my [GetRootFromCompliment]!
translation: 我会一直为了你写这些诗歌的，我的[GetRootFromCompliment]！

original: I ruined everything...
translation: 我破坏了这一切……

original: I will keep writing to you, most [GetRootFromCompliment].
translation: 我会一直给你写信的，最[GetRootFromCompliment]。

original: I have received an invitation from [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]'s [gbc_rival.GetHusbandWife], [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]. [gbc_rival.GetSheHeCap] is arranging a yearly hunting trip at [gbc_rival.GetHerHis] estate and would like for me to join. [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] will surely be there...
translation: 我从[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]的[gbc_rival.GetHusbandWife]，[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]那里收到了一份邀请。[gbc_rival.GetSheHeCap]在[gbc_rival.GetHerHis]庄园组织了一个一年一度的狩猎并且邀请了我加入。[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]一定会在那里的……

original: Of course I'll accept! I'd do anything for just a glimpse of [gbc_lover.GetFirstName].
translation: 我当然接受！我为了见[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]一面可以赴汤蹈火。

original: This won't end well. I'd better decline.
translation: 应该没什么好结局。我最好拒绝。

original: It's the first eve of [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]'s great hunt and everyone is welcomed by a great feast. The entertainment and refreshments are superb but I only have eyes for [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] seated by [gbc_rival.GetFirstName]'s side. During the evening [gbc_lover.GetSheHe] meets my gaze a handful of times, only to look away blushing.
translation: 在[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]的狩猎活动的第一晚，所有人都被邀请加入一场盛大的宴会。各种娱乐活动和点心都棒极了，但是我眼里只有坐在[gbc_rival.GetFirstName]旁边的[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]。整晚[gbc_lover.GetSheHe]只和我目光相对数次，随即脸红地移开视线。

original: I must seek [gbc_lover.GetHerHim] out after the feast!
translation: 我必须在宴会后找到[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]！

original: I shouldn't push my luck. I am sure I will see [gbc_lover.GetHerHim] tomorrow.
translation: 我也许不应该这么冒险。我确信我能明天见到[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]。

original: It is past midnight and I am wandering the halls of the keep, searching for [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]'s quarters. While [gbc_lover.GetSheHe] left the feast early, [gbc_lover.GetHerHis] [gbc_rival.GetHusbandWife] was still drinking with [gbc_rival.GetHerHis] closest friends when I left. However suddenly, when I turn a corner, [gbc_rival.GetSheHe] is right there!
translation: 已经过了午夜了，我还在城堡里的走廊游荡，搜寻[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]的卧室。在[gbc_lover.GetSheHe]早早退席后，[gbc_lover.GetHerHis][gbc_rival.GetHusbandWife]还在和[gbc_rival.GetHerHis]亲密的朋友一起喝酒。我转过一个弯，突然间，[gbc_rival.GetSheHe]出现在我面前！

original: I must have gotten lost... I was just looking for the privy!
translation: 我一定是迷路了……我只是在找厕所！

original: I am stalking through the underbrush, closely following my assigned hound. It seems as if it has found a trail! Then suddenly my concentration is shattered by a distant [gbc_lover.GetManWoman]'s scream. What is happening?!
translation: 我在灌木丛中紧紧地跟踪着我分配到的猎犬。似乎它自己发现了一条小道！然后突然间我的注意力被远方的[gbc_lover.GetManWoman]尖叫声打断了。发生了什么？！

original: I must find the [gbc_lover.GetLordLady] in peril, it could be [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我必须中找到在险境中的[gbc_lover.GetLordLady]，说不定是[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]！

original: I am sure it was nothing. Scared by a pheasant, perhaps.
translation: 我相信没什么的。也许被一只野鸡吓到了。

original: Heart beating in my chest, I sprint through the forest. Within what must have been a minute, but felt like an hour, I burst through the thick foliage and enter a clearing. Before me [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] is kneeling on the ground, hair disheveled and horse gone. Opposite [gbc_lover.GetHerHim], and just about to strike, stands a huge wolf!
translation: 心脏在我胸口跳动着，我在树林里飞奔。尽管只是几分钟，却让人感觉一个小时那么久。我从浓密的树叶中穿了过去，找到了一块空地。在我面前[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]，跪在地上，头发凌乱不堪，而且坐骑也跑了。在[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]对面，一只巨大的野狼准备袭击！

original: Shoot an arrow towards the wolf
translation: 朝着狼射箭

original: successful shot.
translation: 命中。

original: Attempt to distract the wolf
translation: 尝试分散狼的注意力

original: successful distraction.
translation: 成功的分心。

original: Do nothing
translation: 什么也不做

original: My arrow sears through the air and hits the wolf straight in the eye. As the huge gray body hits the ground, [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] turns my way. For a moment all [gbc_lover.GetSheHe] can do is stare, but then [gbc_lover.GetSheHe] stumbles across the clearing and throws [gbc_lover.GetHerselfHimself] into my arms.
translation: 我的箭直接命中狼的眼睛。在那巨大的狼倒在地上的时候，[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]转过身来面对着我。在那片刻，[gbc_lover.GetSheHe]除了盯着我什么反应都没有，但接着[gbc_lover.GetSheHe]跌跌撞撞地穿过空地并且将[gbc_lover.GetHerselfHimself]送进我的怀抱里。

original: My arrow sears through the air, but misses the wolf with several yards. The great beast does not even flinch. Before I can draw another arrow, it launches itself at [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我的箭穿破空气，但射在那只狼好几码以外的空处。那只巨大的野兽竟然都不退缩。在我可以射出下一箭之前，它已经准备袭击[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]！

original: All I can think of is screaming, so I do. Soon the rest of my body unfreezes and I run towards the beast, arms waving over my head. The beast is startled by my sudden appearance, and its hesitation fuels my bravery. Just before impact, it retreats. A shocked [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] stumbles into my arms.
translation: 我能唯一想到的就是尖叫，所以我尖叫了。很快我身体的其他部位不再麻木，我向那只野兽跑去，胳膊在我头上挥舞着。野兽被我突然的出现吓到了，它的犹豫更加助长了我的勇敢。在我即将和它接触之前，它吓跑了。惊魂未定的[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]挣扎着落进我怀里。

original: All I can think of is screaming, so I do. Soon the rest of my body unfreezes and I run towards the beast, arms waving over my head. While it is no longer staring at [gbc_lover.GetFirstName], instead it launches itself at me! One excruciating bite, and then it's gone. [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] stumbles over to me, eyes full of tears.
translation: 我能唯一想到的就是尖叫，所以我尖叫。很快我身体的其他部位不再麻木，我向那只野兽跑去，胳膊在我头上挥舞着。尽管它不再盯着[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]，它却袭击了我！让人疼痛难忍的一口，然后它就跑掉了。[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]挣扎到我身边。泪流满面。

original: There is nothing I can do, it is too late. The nightmare unfolds before me. [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] cries my name in panic just before the beast pounces. Now [gbc_lover.GetHerHis] screams are nothing but wordless agony.
translation: 我已经没有什么可做的，太迟了。噩梦一般的场景展现在我面前。在野兽袭击的前一刻[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]惊恐地哭喊着我的名字。现在[gbc_lover.GetHerHis]尖叫已经停止了，只有无声的疼痛。

original: Oh, [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]! [gbc_lover.GetKingQueen] of my heart!
translation: 噢，[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]！我心中的[gbc_lover.GetKingQueen]！

original: Uh... Let's get you back to [gbc_rival.GetFirstName].
translation: 呜……我们回[gbc_rival.GetFirstName]身边去。

original: [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]? [gbc_lover.GetFirstName], no!!!
translation: [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]？[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]，不！！！

original: I never thought I would feel this way! I keep smiling all the time for no good reason. I want to be with [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] all the time - listen to [gbc_lover.GetHerHis] pealing laughter, hold [gbc_lover.GetHerHim] in my arms...
translation: 我从来没想到我会有这种感觉！即便没什么原因也总是微笑着。我想要和[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]一直在一起——听着[gbc_lover.GetHerHis]清脆的笑声，在我怀中抱着[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]……

original: I'll pretend to be ill and visit [gbc_lover.GetHerHim] while [gbc_lover.GetHerHis] [gbc_rival.GetHusbandWife] is away!
translation: [gbc_lover.GetHerHis][gbc_rival.GetHusbandWife]不在的时候，我会假装生病然后去见[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]！

original: I better join the hunt today, lest [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName] becomes suspicious.
translation: 我最好加入狩猎，否则[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]一定会起疑心的。

original: I am laying in [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]'s warm embrace, eyes closed, doing nothing but listening to [gbc_lover.GetHerHis] steady heartbeat. Then suddenly the perfect moment is disrupted when the door swings open, revealing a most shocked [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我在[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]的温暖怀抱中躺着，双眼闭上，什么也不做，只是静静地听着[gbc_lover.GetHerHis]沉稳的心跳声。突然间打开的门击破了这个美妙的时刻，震惊无比的[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]出现了！

original: Luckily, I am a fast runner!
translation: 幸运的是，我跑得比谁都快！

original: My most beloved [Root.GetFirstName], \nI cannot believe how blessed I am, having found such a [GetRootFromFromCompliment] such as you! Yet, I write to you with a heavy heart, my dearest. Living under the same roof as my loathsome [gbc_rival.GetHusbandWife] is more than I can bear. It breaks my heart that [gbc_rival.GetHerHis] mere existence is keeping us apart! Please, [Root.GetFirstName], save me from this misery!
translation: 我最亲爱的[Root.GetFirstName]，\n我没法相信自己是多么幸运，能找到像你一样的[GetRootFromFromCompliment]！但是，亲爱的，我带着一颗沉重的心写给你。和我那令人厌烦的[gbc_rival.GetHusbandWife]同住一个屋檐下实在让我无法忍受。仅仅只是[gbc_rival.GetHerHis]存在就导致我们分离，这让我心痛无比！[Root.GetFirstName]，求你把我从痛苦中解放出来！

original: I will find a way to free you from [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我会想个办法把你从[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]手里救出来！

original: We knew it had to be this way. There's nothing I can do.
translation: 我们都知道情况只能这样下去。我无能为力。

original: [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]'s face occupies my mind during all my waking hours, and [gbc_lover.GetHerHis] voice haunts my sleep at night. We have to be together! What shall I do about [gbc_lover.GetHerHis] [gbc_rival.GetHusbandWife]? I have had a few ideas...
translation: [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]的容貌整天在我脑海里挥之不去，而且[gbc_lover.GetHerHis]声音在我梦境里困扰着我。我们必须在一起！我应该怎么处理[gbc_lover.GetHerHis][gbc_rival.GetHusbandWife]？我有几个主意……

original: I shall challenge [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName] to a duel to the death!
translation: 我会和[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]决斗！

original: I must attempt to appeal to [gbc_rival.GetHerHis] better senses.
translation: 我必须尝试打动[gbc_rival.GetHerHis]善良情感。

original: Surely I could arrange for a little... hunting accident.
translation: 我还是安排一个……狩猎事故好了。

original: The day has arrived. Two brave hearts draw their swords but only one of them will keep beating past sunset. [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName] is a worthy opponent, but today I am Fortuna's favored one. After many intense blows, I get an opening and sink my blade into [gbc_rival.GetHerHis] side. Rivulets of [gbc_rival.GetHerHis] crimson blood herald my victory.
translation: 约定的那天终于到来了。两颗勇敢的心拔出了他们的宝剑，而只有一个能活着见到日落。[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]是个可敬的对手，不过今天我才是幸运女神的宠儿。在几轮打斗后，我找到了一个突破口然后将我的剑插入[gbc_rival.GetHerHis]体内。[gbc_rival.GetHerHis]像小溪一般的鲜血证明了我的胜利。

original: [gbc_lover.GetFirstName], my dearest angel, I've done it! You're free!
translation: [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]，我心爱的天使，我做到了！你自由了！

original: The day has arrived. Two brave hearts draw their swords but only one of them will keep beating past sunset. [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName] is a worthy opponent, and with each exchange of blows I can feel my confidence faltering. Then a sudden attack, a missed parry, and [gbc_rival.GetHerHis] sword finds the soft flesh of my armpit...
translation: 约定的那天终于到来了。两颗勇敢的心拔出了他们的宝剑，而只有一个能活着见到日落。[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]。是个可敬的对手，在交手几招后，我能感觉到我的自信在消退。然后一次格挡失败的奇袭让[gbc_rival.GetHerHis]剑穿透了我的腋下的软肉……

original: I have failed you, my angel...
translation: 我让你失望了，我的天使……

original: At first, [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName] wanted to hear none of it, as expected. The more I talked however, the more I could notice [gbc_rival.GetHerHim] softening. In the end, [gbc_rival.GetSheHe] realized that none of it could be undone. Divorcing [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] and thus giving both [gbc_rival.GetHerHim] and [gbc_lover.GetHerHim] a fresh start is the only reasonable course of action.
translation: 一开始，[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]和意料中的一样不想听我说任何东西。不过我说的越多，我越发现[gbc_rival.GetHerHim]逐渐心软。最后，[gbc_rival.GetSheHe]意识到他们已经无法回到过去。和[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]离婚然后给[gbc_rival.GetHerHim]和[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]一个全新的开始是唯一理智的选择。

original: I knew [gbc_rival.GetSheHe] would understand, [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我就知道[gbc_rival.GetSheHe]会理解的，[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]！

original: I did not expect it to be easy, however [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName] is outright unreasonable! The more I try to explain, the redder [gbc_rival.GetHerHis] face becomes. Before I can present my strongest arguments [gbc_rival.GetSheHe] calls for the guards!
translation: 我没期待这件事会很简单，不过[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]简直就是不讲道理！我越尝试解释，[gbc_rival.GetHerHis]脸就变得越红。在我说出我最有利的论据前[gbc_rival.GetSheHe]召唤了卫兵前来！

original: Let go of me, hounds! Let go, I say!
translation: 放开我，狗奴才！我说了，放开我！

original: Anxiously I have been awaiting the news all day. Did my plot succeed? Are we free, [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] and I? When the messenger enters my study, it is almost as if time itself stops. But then he gives me the joyous news - [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName] is dead! I did it!
translation: 我焦急地等待了一整天的消息。我的密谋成功了没？我和[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]是否自由了？当信使进入我的书房的时候，感觉就像时间停止了一样。然而他给我了喜讯——[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]死了！我成功了！

original: I must go to [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] at once!
translation: 我必须马上见到[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]！

original: Anxiously I have been awaiting the news all day. Did my plot succeed? Are we free, [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] and I? When the messenger enters my study I can tell right away that he brings dark tidings. He confirms my suspicions - [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName] lives and [gbc_rival.GetSheHe] knows. Now [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] is outside of my reach, forever...
translation: 我焦急地等待了一整天的消息。我的密谋成功了没？我和[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]是否自由了？当信使进入我的书房的时候，我立刻感觉到是坏消息。他确认了我的怀疑——[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]活着而且[gbc_rival.GetSheHe]知道了真相。现在我永远也得不到[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]了……

original: Perhaps I went too far...
translation: 也许我太过分了……

original: All's Well That Ends Well
translation: 终成眷属

original: Finally, we are together, [gbc_lover.GetFirstName] and I. As it should be, as it always will be. We might have encountered obstacles along the way, yet our love is stronger for it. Now that [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]'s old [gbc_lover.GetHusbandWifeOpp] is out of the picture we can start over and create a new life, together. \n\nIt will not always be easy. Everyone who knows will disapprove. However, at the moment, it does not bother me in the slightest. My fear of never experiencing true love, of dying alone, is over. I have found all I will ever need.
translation: 我们终于在一起了，[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]和我。本来就应该这样。也许我们一路走来遇见了各种困难，但是我们的爱情因此更加坚强。现在[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]之前的[gbc_lover.GetHusbandWifeOpp]不会再打扰我们，我们可以重新开始并且一起塑造我们自己的生活。\n\n这件事不会容易。所有知道的人都将会反对。不过，现在，我不在乎。我不会体验到真爱的恐惧、孤独地死去的恐惧结束了。我找到了我所需要的一切。

original: [gbc_lover.GetFirstName], my [GetRootFromCompliment], I love you!
translation: [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]，我的[GetRootFromCompliment]，我爱你！

original: [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]'s great hunt is now over. These weeks have been... eventful. To say the least.
translation: [gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]的大型狩猎终于结束了。这几周至少可以用……多事之秋来形容。

original: After all, I am glad to be home.
translation: 毕竟，我很开心能回家。

original: Oh, great [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], have you no mercy?! It turns out that the screams I heard in the forest were [gbc_lover.GetFirstName]'s! [gbc_lover.GetSheHeCap] was savagely attacked by a wolf. When they found [gbc_lover.GetHerHim], [gbc_lover.GetHerHis] heart was still beating, yet it was too late.
translation: 啊，伟大的[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，你是否没有仁慈之心？！我之前在森林里听到的惨叫声原来是[gbc_lover.GetFirstName]的！[gbc_lover.GetSheHeCap]被一头狼野蛮地袭击了。当他们找到[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]，[gbc_lover.GetHerHis]心还在跳动，不过已经太迟了。

original: Could I have saved [gbc_lover.GetHerHim]? Is this my fault?
translation: 我当时能救[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]吗？这是我的过错么？

original:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName], 
Your filthy conduct towards my [gbc_lover.GetHusbandWife] has brought dishonor to my name. No longer can I bear it! I accept your challenge, dog. Get your affairs in order, because I shall show you no mercy! 

[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
你对我的[gbc_lover.GetHusbandWife]那肮脏下流的举止已经败坏了我的名誉。我不会再忍受下去！我接收你这条狗的挑战。把你的后事都处理好，因为我不会展现任何仁慈！

[gbc_rival.GetTitledFirstName]

original: You are the one who should be afraid, you [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: 你才是应该害怕的那个，你这个[GetRootFromInsult]！

original: Once Upon a Dream
translation: 宛如梦境

original: You walked here together, in this garden, mere months ago. Laughing at each other's quick remarks, stealing short glances... It seems like an altogether different live. Now, it's over, and it will never be the same again. \n\nMaybe being alone is not so bad. It gives you plenty of time to hone your skills and build your realm... No distractions, no limitations. What could be more important than that, after all?
translation: 就在几个月前，你们还在花园里一起散步，互相取笑对方的俏皮话，时不时偷看着对方……这都感觉像完全不同的人生。现在，已经结束了，而且永远回不到以前了。\n\n也许一个人也没什么不好。孤独让你有更多时间锻炼你的技能并且让你建设你的领地……不再分心，没有限制。毕竟，还有什么会比这个更重要？

original: Yet, I cannot stop thinking of [gbc_lover.GetHerHim]...
translation: 但是，我还是忍不住会想[gbc_lover.GetHerHim]……

original: [New.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetTitledFirstName] are getting married. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.
translation: [New.GetTitledFirstName]和[From.GetTitledFirstName]刚刚结婚。我们可以收取王室税用来支付婚礼花费。

original: The cook accused me of stealing cookies, the Spymaster insisted I had stolen his quill, and I was accused of making a lot of mischief. For once, I was innocent! I found the perpetrator playing with the quill and stuffing [troublemaker_child.GetHerHis] face with cookies just outside the stable...
translation: 厨师指责我偷了饼干，间谍总管坚持声称我偷了他的鹅毛笔，而且我还被指责做了很多其他恶作剧。但是这次，我是清白的！我看到了真正的作恶者在马厩外玩着鹅毛笔并且吃得[troublemaker_child.GetHerHis]脸上都是饼干渣……

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has increased [From.GetHerHis] army size by §G5%§!
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!增加了 §G5%§! 的[From.GetHerHis]军队数量

original: My ward [From.GetTitledFirstName] came running for me, tears streaming down [From.GetHerHis] face and snot creeping towards [From.GetHerHis] mouth.\n"[Root.GetFirstName], please help me! The other children are not nice to me!"
translation: 我的受监护人[From.GetTitledFirstName]跑着来找我，眼泪从[From.GetHerHis]脸上滑落，鼻涕慢慢地流到[From.GetHerHis]嘴里。\n「[Root.GetFirstName]，求你帮帮我！其他小孩对我很不友好！」

original: I'll punish [child_bully.GetFirstName], don't you worry
translation: 我会教训[child_bully.GetFirstName]，不要担心

original: Humiliate Imprisoned
translation: 羞辱囚犯

original: As §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is your prisoner, you can choose to publicly humiliate [Root.GetHerHim] as punishment for [Root.GetHerHis] crimes.
translation: 因为§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!是你的囚犯，你可以选择公开的羞辱[Root.GetHerHim]作为对[Root.GetHerHis]罪行的惩罚。

original: Humiliated Me
translation: 羞辱了我

original: You order tar be poured over [From.GetTitledFirstName], after which [From.GetSheHe] is rolled in feathers. Your guards laugh as they wheel [From.GetHerHim] around the city. Commoners and nobles alike sneer incredulously at [From.GetTitledFirstName]. What a display!
translation: 你命令把焦油泼到[From.GetTitledFirstName]身上，然后把[From.GetSheHe]在羽毛堆里翻滚。你的卫兵们一边笑着一边把[From.GetHerHim]在城市里巡回展览。平民们和贵族们都难以置信地盯着[From.GetTitledFirstName]。多么有趣的展览！

original: The dress suits [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 这件衣服很适合[From.GetHerHim]。

original: Your [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to be merciful and you are safe from the rack. However, before your release you are to be drenched in tar and rolled in feathers. You will then be put on a cart and wheeled through the streets. The guard escorting you to your sentence snickers delightedly at your predicament.
translation: 你的[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定要仁慈点，所以你免于上绞刑架。不过在你被释放前，你要被裹上焦油然后在羽毛堆里翻滚。然后你会被放进牢笼里然后全城巡回展览。护送你去行刑的卫兵偷偷地嘲笑着你的窘境。

original: I do not deserve this humiliation!
translation: 我不应该受到这种羞辱！

original: After some struggle [From.GetTitledFirstName] is dragged from [From.GetHerHis] cell, out to the town square and put in the stocks. [From.GetSheHeCap] will learn to respect you soon enough.
translation: 在经过一番挣扎后，[From.GetTitledFirstName]从[From.GetHerHis]牢房里被拖到城市的广场上并且铐上手足枷。[From.GetSheHeCap]将会学会如何尊重你。

original: Let them stare! Serves [From.GetHerHim] right.
translation: 让他们看！[From.GetHerHim]活该。

original: The guards rouse you from your slumber and you are dragged from your cell. Your [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to release you, but not before you have spent some time in the stocks. "Discourages the youth from causing trouble", one guard mumbles. "Oh, and expect rotten tomatoes."
translation: 卫兵们把你从牢房里唤醒并且把你拖出来。你的[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定释放你，不过在你被释放前，你要先在手足枷待上一会。「这是为了劝阻年轻人不再制造麻烦」，一个卫兵咕哝道。「哦还有，等着迎接烂番茄洗礼吧。」

original: This is so embarrassing!
translation: 这真丢人！

original: The scurrilous [From.GetTitledFirstName] is bound by the hands and led through the crowded streets, dressed in naught but [From.GetHerHis] shame. May your people and the heavens bear witness to [From.GetHerHis] repentance!
translation: 下流的[From.GetTitledFirstName]被绑住双手然后被拖到人满为患的街道上游街，满身上下除了[From.GetHerHis]羞耻心什么也没有。希望你的人民们和天空作[From.GetHerHis]悔过的见证者！

original: I did it for [From.GetHerHis] own good.
translation: 我是为了[From.GetHerHis]好。

original: Your [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sentenced you. To repent for your unsavory crimes, you are to be led through the crowded streets, naked in front of the people as well as the heavens. Shame is your name.
translation: 你的[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经宣布了对你的判决。为了使你忏悔那些不光彩的罪行，你将会被带到人满为患的街道上，赤身裸体地面对黎民和苍天。你将受尽羞辱。

original: My name is [Root.GetTitledFirstName]! This is unfair!
translation: 我是[Root.GetTitledFirstName]！这不公平！

original: Declaim Poetry
translation: 朗诵诗歌

original: As you are such an accomplished poet, and §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is your prisoner, you may punish [Root.GetHerHim] by declaiming terrible poems to [Root.GetHerHim].
translation: 因为你是一个小有名气的诗歌作家，而且§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!是你的囚犯，你可以选择向[Root.GetHerHim]朗诵糟糕的诗歌来惩罚[Root.GetHerHim]。

original: Read Me Bad Poetry
translation: 向我朗诵了糟糕的诗歌

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is forced to spend a full hour listening to one of your guards reciting your most atrocious poetry. Not only is the brute butchering the rhythm of it, but you made certain this particular poem contains the most contrived metaphors.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]被强迫听你的一个卫兵朗诵你最糟糕的一首诗歌整整一个小时。这个野蛮人不仅仅糟蹋了诗歌的节奏，你还煞费苦心地在诗歌里加入了很多不自然的比喻。

original: [From.GetHerHisCap] ears will ring with contemptible cadence for weeks!
translation: [From.GetHerHisCap]耳朵会一直重复着那可鄙的旋律！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sentenced you to one of [From.GetHerHis] infamous poetry readings. For over an hour you squirm as a brutish guard completely misunderstands the intonation of each phrase, and you find yourself wincing at each superfluous adjective.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]判决你接受[From.GetHerHis]恶名昭彰的诗歌朗诵。整整一个小时你都在一个野蛮的卫兵完全不理解每句的语调下辗转反侧，你发现你自己会对每个多余的形容词颤抖。

original: This is incredibly awkward.
translation: 这真的非常尴尬。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is forced to spend a full hour listening to a child reciting some of your most repellent poetry. Not only is the young imbecile void of rhetoric skill, but you made certain this poem is particularly trite.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]被强迫整整一个小时听你一些最糟糕的诗歌。朗诵的年轻的低能儿不仅仅没有修辞能力，你还特意把这首诗弄得陈腔滥调。

original: [From.GetHerHisCap] delicate intellect will be tarnished forever.
translation: [From.GetHerHisCap]那脆弱的小脑袋将会永远被损害。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sentenced you to one of [From.GetHerHis] notorious poetry readings. A child is presented to you, to declaim the most abominable mush of sunset related laments. You have never heard anything quite so vapid.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]判决你接受[From.GetHerHis]臭名昭著的诗歌朗诵。一个小孩被带到你面前，朗诵与日落有关的最悲惨的感叹。你从没听过如此繁琐无味的诗歌。

original: This is deplorable.
translation: 这真可悲。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is forced to spend a full hour listening to one of the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s reciting some of your raunchiest poems. Not only is the holy person hesitantly mumbling out the words, but their face is reddening with each phrase. The scene is very uncomfortable.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]被强迫整整一个小时听[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]的一些最猥琐的诗歌。这位圣职人员不仅仅很不情愿地念出来，而且他们的脸随着每一句诗歌也变得越来越红。整个场景十分令人不舒服。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] cringed the whole thing through!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]一直作呕！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sentenced you to one of [From.GetHerHis] disreputable poetry readings. The bawdy poem, and the banality of life it implied, will stay with you for a long time...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]判决你听[From.GetHerHis]极为肮脏的诗歌。 猥琐的诗歌，和诗歌所表现的庸俗的生活，会永远停留在你的脑海里……

original: My mind is tarnished forever.
translation: 感觉智商被掏空。

original: You order [From.GetTitledFirstName] be stripped of [From.GetHerHis] clothing, [From.GetHerHis] hands and feet bound, before [From.GetSheHe] is slung up on horseback. The [GetRootFromInsult] will be paraded around your camp: let all bear witness to [From.GetHerHis] humiliation!
translation: 你命令将[From.GetTitledFirstName][From.GetHerHis]衣服全都扒光，把[From.GetHerHis]脚和手都绑起来，然后将[From.GetSheHe]绑在马背上。那个[GetRootFromInsult]将会在你的营寨里游行：让所有人见证[From.GetHerHis]羞辱！

original: That's entertainment!
translation: 这是娱乐！

original: What seems like an ordinary day in your confinement takes a brusque turn when guards appear to strip you of your clothing. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sentenced you to be tied up and paraded around camp on horseback. "You'll be nude, but you'll live", a guards spits, disappointment in his voice.
translation: 原本看起来很正常的一天突然变得粗暴了起来。卫兵们将你的衣服全都扒掉。[From.GetTitledFirstName]判决将你绑到马背上然后在营寨里游行。「你虽然赤身裸体，但是至少你还活着」，一个卫兵失望地啐了一口。

original: How will I ever face anyone again?
translation: 我还怎么有脸见人？

original: The powder was yellow and had a delicious scent. You were distraught to see [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] mix it with brimstone and sprinkle it over the still tepid gall-bladder of a beaver. The animal had been found rabid, frothing from the mouth, exhibiting clear signs of the illness. "We fight evil with evil, [Root.GetMasterMistress]."
translation: 黄色粉末闻起来有种很香的味道。你惊恐地看着[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把它和硫磺混在一起并洒在尚有余温的海狸胆囊上。这海狸捉来时状若疯狗，口吐白沫，很明显地展现出疾病的症状。「我们用邪恶对抗邪恶，[Root.GetMasterMistress]。」

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] approached you with a small knife. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] held your arm steady and made a precise incision, barely breaking your skin. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] then proceeded to press something against the wound. It looked like diseased tissue and you shuddered.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]拿着一把小刀接近了你。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]紧紧地抓住你的胳膊并且用刀划出了一个精准的切割，刚刚划破你的皮肤。然后[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]将什么东西按在伤口上。这看起来像被感染的生物组织，你不由自主地瑟瑟发抖。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] handed you a plate with a gray powdery substance on it. Apparently it consisted of ground-up scabs from a person in a worse state than you. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] showed no indication of joking as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] told you to lean in and inhale as much as you could though your nose.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]给了你一个装上了灰色粉状物的盘子。明显是一个比你状况还要糟糕的人的结痂磨成的粉末。接着[FromFrom.GetSheHe]命令你用鼻子凑近然后尽可能的吸进体内，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]一点都不像是在开玩笑。

original: The red powder was tantalizing in color. A servant had made the mistake of tasting it in its pure form - his tongue had swollen up badly and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] had chastized him firmly for it. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] poured the spice into a chalice of water and stirred it meticulously, before feeding you a spoonful.
translation: 红色粉末看起来色泽诱人。一个仆人犯了错误，偷尝了一口纯粉末——他的舌头肿胀得厉害，而[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]因此严厉地惩罚了他。[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]将粉末倒入一杯水并且细心地搅拌好，然后喂了你一勺。

original: Your eyes widened when [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] led a goat into your chambers. The foul smell of its flatulence made you both cover your noses, but the physician pulled your hand away. "Apologies, my [Root.GetLordLady], this is the treatment." [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] recommended deep breaths.
translation: 当你看见[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]领着一只山羊进入你的房间，你的眼睛睁得老大。山羊胃肠胀气产生的恶臭使你们两个都遮住了鼻子，但是医师把你的手拉开。「抱歉，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，这就是治疗方法。」[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]建议你深呼吸。

original: "Relax your breathing", [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] instructed you. The feather in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] hand looked almost ethereal as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] began to gently brush you under your nose. "Evil, begone!" [FromFrom.GetSheHe] urged, as the sneezing began.
translation: 「放缓你的呼吸」，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]嘱咐你。[FromFrom.GetHerHis]手里的羽毛看起来如同隐形一般，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]开始轻轻地在你鼻子下方刷动。「恶魔退散！」[FromFrom.GetSheHe]命令道，与此同时你开始打喷嚏。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] arranged a small ceremony in your name. Once your family and closest entourage were all gathered in the main hall, the [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] gave a sermon highlighting your virtue and benevolence. Their united prayers will surely speed your recovery.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]以你的名义举办了一个小型仪式。当你的所有家庭和密友都在大堂里聚集好的时候，[From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]在讲道的时候着重描述你的美德和仁厚。他们联合起来的祷告一定会加快你的恢复。

original: You spent many evenings with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] recited you stories from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], until you were fast asleep. The routine has been comforting.
translation: 你和[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]共同度过了许多夜晚。[FromFrom.GetSheHe]会讲述来自[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的故事，直到你陷入沉睡。这个生活习惯让痛苦缓和。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] called on the [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] to bring forth the finest singer in the court, which turned out to be a young child with a bright tenor voice. For several days in a row, the child sang you to sleep. How soothing.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]请求[From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]把宫廷里最好的歌手找来，歌手居然是个男高音的小孩。接下来的几天，你在这个小孩的歌声中入眠。多么令人宽心。

original: The water was steaming hot when [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] let the honey drip into it. It dissolved almost instantly, but [FromFrom.GetSheHe] stirred it for a long time. "That's it?", you finally asked. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] nodded, and you drank the tea.
translation: 当[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把蜂蜜放进冒着蒸汽的热水里的时候，蜂蜜立刻融化了，但是[FromFrom.GetSheHe]搅拌了很长时间。「就这样？」，你终于忍不住问。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]点了点头，然后你喝下了茶。

original: The steam rose from the cup as [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] stirred the green powder in it. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] explained the healing properties of the herb at length, before motioning for you to drink it. "The root is in there, too", [FromFrom.GetSheHe] boastfully revealed.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把绿色粉末放到热水里搅拌，水杯里的热气慢慢上升着。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]长篇大论地解释了这些草药的治疗效果，然后让你喝下去。「树根也在里头」，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]得意洋洋地说到。

original: The trade routes of the east have become less traveled, as reports of the Plague spreading in the Persian expanse have increased in frequency. Entire villages are gone from the world of the living, disregarding the wealth and good harvests the area was enjoying. The reality is stark, as death continues to spread and despair paves its road.
translation: 大瘟疫在波斯地区的传播似乎更频繁了，因此东方的贸易路线逐渐变得人烟稀少。整个整个的村庄全部死于瘟疫，当地曾经的财富和好收成也无法阻止。现实是那么严峻无情，绝望在为继续蔓延的死亡铺路。

original: An ominous shadow looms over the regions of the Middle East as the Plague has left little but tragedy in its wake. The reports are scarce, but upon hearing the tales of lone refugees walking the roads, often the sole survivor of a family, the hearts of many are torn as to why [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] would allow this to happen.
translation: 不祥的阴影笼罩着中东地区，大瘟疫过后仅有悲剧幸存。信息十分稀少，但听到的情况，都来自独自行走在道路上的难民，他们往往是家庭中唯一的幸存者。人们的心被撕扯，为什么[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]会允许这种情况发生。

original: The atmosphere at court has grown tense, as word of the Plague raging in Asia Minor has reached you. To further disturb the people a story is circulating - survivors speak of a cursed ship, carrying living corpses come to recruit for their captain of death... The myth is lent more credibility each time a coastal city succumbs to the epidemic.
translation: 宫廷的气氛开始紧张，因为大瘟疫在小亚细亚肆虐的消息已经传来此处。一个广泛流传故事进一步扰乱民众——幸存者们讨论着受诅咒的船，死去的船长带着活尸招募船员……每当一个沿海的城市被疫情毁灭，故事就更加可信。

original: From the Rock of Gibraltar to the ports of London the Plague has been spreading, harvesting lives of nobles and farmers alike. The countryside of the afflicted areas have been left haunting and desolate. Here and there pyres, from the burning of the diseased, can be seen from miles away.
translation: 从直布罗陀巨岩到伦敦港，大瘟疫已经蔓延开来，不分贵贱地收割着贵族和农民的生命。受灾地区的农村仅剩下冤魂不散的荒凉。随处可见燃烧患者的火堆，即使在数英里外的远处都能看到。

original: Death comes to all, and in Eastern Europe the terror is becoming mundane. The Plague has been ravishing the lands, unbiased regarding the social status of men, indifferently claiming even babies from the arms of their parents. Travels to the area are currently discouraged.
translation: 死亡降临在每个人头上，在东欧，对死的恐惧甚至成为日常生活的一部分。大瘟疫肆虐整片土地，对于不同地位的人，它不偏不倚，甚至对于父母怀中的婴儿也冷酷不仁。目前最好不要前往该地区。

original: I trust your knowledge, oh wise one.
translation: 我相信你的知识，哦，聪明的人。

original: §Y[From.GetBestName]§! will perform a mystical treatment. The outcome of this treatment is uncertain. The risk of this treatment will vary depending on [From.GetHerHis] capabilities.
translation: §Y[From.GetBestName]§!将执行一个神秘的治疗。这种治疗的结果是不稳定的。这种治疗方法的风险要取决于[From.GetHerHis]能力。

original: I feel... different.
translation: 我感觉有些……不一样。

original: You will be cured of your disease! \n\n
translation: 你的病将会得到治愈！\n\n

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] sat you in front of a tall mirror and lit a circle of candles around you. "We need to contact the other you", [FromFrom.GetSheHe] stated casually. When you raised your eyebrows at [FromFrom.GetHerHim] [FromFrom.GetSheHe] placed a hand on your shoulder. "This will... alter you."
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]让坐在你在一个高大的镜子前，点燃你身边的蜡烛。「我们需要联系另一个你」，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]随意说道。你惊讶而失望地看着[FromFrom.GetHerHim]，而[FromFrom.GetSheHe]把手放在你的肩膀。「这将……改变你。」

original: Confined to your bed, the servants told you that the smoke from the pyre could be seen for miles. The lives of over two dozen fine animals had been ended in the night, in a grand sacrifice. As per [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s orders, you have been rubbing your skin with the ashes for a fortnight.
translation: 你被固定在自己的床上，佣人告诉你，柴堆冒出的烟能从数英里外看到。在这场盛大的牺牲中，超过两打的动物在夜里死去。按照[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的命令，两星期来你一直在用灰烬擦拭你的皮肤。

original: The room was lit up only by the flame of a candle. Facing the westward window, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] painted your nails with drops of oil. You felt a heat on your skin as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] moved your hand towards the flame. "Do not fret, my [Root.GetLordLady]. By the wisdom of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], you shall be cleansed."
translation: 房间只被烛光照亮。面对着西窗，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]用油滴涂抹你的指甲。你觉得自己的皮肤很热，因为[FromFrom.GetSheHe]将你的手移向火焰。「不要担心，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。通过[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的智慧，你将得到净化。」

original: "The moon demands your devotion" [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] said, before handing you a pipe of something with a spicy scent. After a few tokes you looked up at the night sky and improvised the greatest poem in the world. Later, the words elude you...
translation: 「月亮需要你的奉献」[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]说，然后交给你一些带香气的东西。你吸了一口，看着天空的月亮即兴作了世界上最好的诗。接着，那些词汇离你远去……

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] instructed you to step into the empty tub and left you to undress in private. [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s return was heralded by a loud "baah!". [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] was followed by a servant and half a dozen goats. With a deft hand, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] proceeded to grab the goats and slit their throats over the tub, one by one. The stains on the floor will not go away.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]示意你踏入木桶，让你一个人脱衣服。[FromFrom.GetFirstName]返回时带着一声响亮的「咩！」作为伴奏。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]身后跟着仆人和半打山羊。[FromFrom.GetFirstName]用灵巧的双手抓住羊，在木桶上方一个接着一个地割破它们的喉咙。地板上的污渍不会消失。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] had you drink an especially heavy brew, every night before bedtime. "It loosens the fabric of your being, letting the spirits into your body", [FromFrom.GetSheHe] assured you. "It's also quite... relaxing", [FromFrom.GetSheHe] admitted, grinning at you.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]让你在每天晚上睡前喝一种重酿的酒。「这能松开你的构造，使灵魂进入你的身体」，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]向你保证。「但这也能令人……放轻松」，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]承认，朝你咧嘴笑。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] told you that the task of interpreting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] is difficult work, but cleansing through fire is an art as old as the world itself. Little did you know [FromFrom.GetSheHe] would have you walk over burning coals.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]告诉你解读[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的事业是很困难的，但用火清理是一种和世界本身同样古老的技艺。当时你还不知道[FromFrom.GetSheHe]会让你走过燃烧的煤炭。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] demands a trial of your mind. Together you traveled until you reached a small lake. Hand in hand, you walked into the water. You were shocked when [FromFrom.GetFirstName] grabbed you by the shoulder and held you down.
