translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]告诉你[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]意图审判你的灵魂。你们一起前行，直到遇到一个小湖。手牵手，你们走进湖中。当[FromFrom.GetFirstName]抓住你的肩膀将你按下去时，你非常震惊。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] told you that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] demands a sacrifice. Later that evening you heard screaming. Following the sound you found [FromFrom.GetFirstName] hunched over a body, panic in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] eyes, blood on [FromFrom.GetHerHis] hands. "It was for the good of the realm...!", [FromFrom.GetSheHe] breathed.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]告诉你，[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]需要献祭，那天晚上，你听到一声尖叫。跟随声音，你找到[FromFrom.GetFirstName]背着一个尸体，恐慌在[FromFrom.GetHerHis]眼中浮现，鲜血沾满[FromFrom.GetHerHis]双手。「这是为了领地的安危……！」[FromFrom.GetSheHe]喘息道。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] gave you a pouch of herbs and sent you on a journey, to find your spirit guide. You wandered the wilderness for days, eating only roots from the pouch, sleeping under the stars. Finally, you felt a presence and you saw a great horned beast. Afterwards you wondered... Are you the beast?
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]递给你一袋草药，让你旅行去寻找你的精神指引。你在旷野中走了好几天，只吃袋中的草根，在星空下睡觉。最终，你感到一个存在，你看到一个大独角兽。然后你猜想……你就是那只野兽吗？

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] stood at the end of your bed as the servants lit the candles. A pot was placed in your hands - judging from the sounds, it contained a terrified rat. "The creature will carry your burdens in your stead", [FromFrom.GetSheHe] explained. Then the chanting began.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]站在你的床尾，仆人点燃了蜡烛。一个锅被放到你手中——从声音判断，里面有一只害怕的老鼠。「这生物将替你承担你体内的负担」，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]解释说。然后开始吟诵。

original: One early day [FromFrom.GetFirstName] invited you to join [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] chambers. As the first bright rays of the morning sun shone into the room [FromFrom.GetFirstName] went on and on about how serving you has been an honor. "For you, [Root.GetMasterMistress]" [FromFrom.GetSheHe] breathed, before slitting [FromFrom.GetHerHis] own throat with an ornamental knife.
translation: 昨天[FromFrom.GetFirstName]邀请你在[FromFrom.GetHerHis]房间见[FromFrom.GetHerHim]。当清晨第一缕阳光照进房间[FromFrom.GetFirstName]不停地说为你服务是一件多么荣幸的事。「为了你，[Root.GetMasterMistress]」[FromFrom.GetSheHe]喘息着，下一刻就用一把装饰刀划破了[FromFrom.GetHerHis]喉咙。

original: Come on, [From.GetFirstName], let's try something new. I insist.
translation: 来吧，[From.GetFirstName]，让我们尝试一下新东西。我建议。

original: §Y[From.GetBestName]§! will perform an experimental treatment. The outcome of this treatment can be extreme. The risk of this treatment will vary depending on [From.GetHerHis] capabilities.
translation: §Y[From.GetBestName]§!将进行一个实验性的治疗。这种治疗的结果有可能很极端。而治疗的风险取决于[From.GetHerHis]能力。

original: This treatment will probably affect your mental state...\n\n
translation: 这种治疗可能会影响你的心理状态……\n\n

original: WHAT was that? I could've died, [FromFrom.GetFirstName]!
translation: 那是什么？我可能会死，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]！

original: My child! NOOOO!
translation: 我的孩子！不！

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]! What did you do?!
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]！你都干了些什么？！

original: AAARGH!
translation: 啊啊啊啊啊啊！

original: Mystically Altered
translation: 神秘的改变

original: Mystically Altered
translation: 神秘的改变

original: Mystically Altered
translation: 神秘的改变

original: Matters of Life and Death
translation: 事关生死

original: With age comes wisdom, they say. "Or at least, it may change the questions we ask", you mutter to yourself. You have had trouble sleeping lately - more often than not, while the rest of your court is sound asleep, you find yourself staring at the ceiling. You are getting older, each day closer to leaving this plane of existence. It is folly to fear such things, of course, yet you cannot keep these feelings at bay. You want more days with [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], your family...!\n\nYou sit up straight in your bed. This is ridiculous. You are the ruler! You have people ready to serve your any whim! Perhaps your councillors have ideas? If nothing else, it might ease your trouble sleeping.
translation: 年长带来智慧，他们都这么说。「至少，可能会改变我们要问的问题」，你喃喃自语。你最近常常失眠——往往你的整个宫廷都在熟睡，而你发现自己在盯着天花板。你开始逐渐变老，每天都离抛下存在的世界更进一步。恐惧这种事太愚蠢了，但你并不能阻止这感觉。你想要更多的时间陪伴[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]，你的家人……！\n\n你直挺挺地坐在你的床上。这太荒谬了。你是统治者！你的人民随时准备满足你的任何要求！也许你的内阁成员会有想法？别的不说，这可能会缓解你的睡眠问题。

original: With age comes wisdom, they say. "Or at least, it may change the questions we ask", you mutter to yourself. You have had trouble sleeping lately - more often than not, while the rest of your court is sound asleep, you find yourself staring at the ceiling. You are getting older, each day closer to leaving this plane of existence. It is folly of course, yet you are terrified you'll end up all alone, like the miserable [eternal_life_sad_example.GetTitledFirstName]... You've seen [eternal_life_sad_example.GetHerHim] skulking about, a dark cloud over [eternal_life_sad_example.GetHerHim]...\n\nYou sit up straight in your bed. This is ridiculous. You are the [Root.GetTitle]! You have [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] on your side! Maybe your councillors could calm you down? If nothing else, it might ease your trouble sleeping.
translation: 年长带来智慧，他们都这么说。「至少，可能会改变我们要问的问题」，你喃喃自语。你最近常常失眠——往往你的整个宫廷都在熟睡，而你发现自己在盯着天花板。你开始逐渐变老，每天都离抛下存在的世界更进一步。这很愚蠢，但你害怕孤单，像悲惨的[eternal_life_sad_example.GetTitledFirstName]……你曾看过[eternal_life_sad_example.GetHerHim]懦弱地想要掩饰，死亡的阴云笼罩[eternal_life_sad_example.GetHerHim]……\n\n你直挺挺地坐在你的床上。这太荒谬了。你是[Root.GetTitle]！你有[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]保佑你！也许你的内阁成员能让你冷静？别的不说，这可能会缓解你的睡眠问题。

original: With age comes wisdom, they say. "Or at least, it may change the questions we ask", you mutter to yourself. You have had trouble sleeping lately - more often than not, while the rest of your court is sound asleep, you find yourself staring at the ceiling. You are getting older, each day closer to leaving this plane of existence. It is folly to fear such things, of course, yet you cannot keep these feelings at bay. Didn't you use to dream of grander things? What about you carving your own path? What happened to your ambitions?\n\nYou sit up straight in your bed. This is ridiculous. You are the ruler! You have people ready to serve your any whim! Perhaps your councillors have ideas? If nothing else, it might ease your trouble sleeping.
translation: 年长带来智慧，他们都这么说。「至少，可能会改变我们要问的问题」，你喃喃自语。你最近常常失眠——往往你的整个宫廷都在熟睡，而你发现自己在盯着天花板。你开始逐渐变老，每天都离抛下存在的世界更进一步。恐惧这种事太愚蠢了，但你并不能阻止这感觉。你就没有什么更远大的理想吗？你自己选择的路呢？你的野心呢？\n\n你直挺挺地坐在你的床上。这太荒谬了。你是统治者！你的人民随时准备满足你的任何要求！也许你的内阁成员会有想法？别的不说，这可能会缓解你的睡眠问题。

original: With age comes wisdom, they say. "Or at least, it may change the questions we ask", you mutter to yourself. You have had trouble sleeping lately - more often than not, while the rest of your court is sound asleep, you find yourself staring at the ceiling. You are getting older, each day closer to leaving this plane of existence. It is folly to fear such things, of course, yet you cannot keep these feelings at bay. Didn't you use to dream of... more? What about you and [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]? What happened to love?\n\nYou sit up straight in your bed. This is ridiculous. You are the ruler! You have people ready to serve your any whim! Perhaps your councillors have ideas? If nothing else, it might ease your trouble sleeping.
translation: 年长带来智慧，他们都这么说。「至少，可能会改变我们要问的问题」，你喃喃自语。你最近常常失眠——往往你的整个宫廷都在熟睡，而你发现自己在盯着天花板。你开始逐渐变老，每天都离抛下存在的世界更进一步。恐惧这种事太愚蠢了，但你并不能阻止这感觉。你就没有梦想……更多吗？你和[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]是怎么回事？爱情怎么办？\n\n你直挺挺地坐在你的床上。这太荒谬了。你是统治者！你的人民随时准备满足你的任何要求！也许你的内阁成员会有想法？别的不说，这可能会缓解你的睡眠问题。

original: With age comes wisdom, they say. "Or at least, it may change the questions we ask", you mutter to yourself. You have had trouble sleeping lately - more often than not, while the rest of your court is sound asleep, you find yourself staring at the ceiling. You are getting older, each day closer to leaving this plane of existence. It is folly to fear such things, of course, yet you cannot keep these feelings at bay. Didn't you use to dream of grander things? What about you carving your own path? What happened to your ambitions?\n\nYou sit up straight in your bed. This is ridiculous. You are the ruler! You have people ready to serve your any whim! Perhaps your councillors have ideas? If nothing else, it might ease your trouble sleeping.
translation: 年长带来智慧，他们都这么说。「至少，可能会改变我们要问的问题」，你喃喃自语。你最近常常失眠——往往你的整个宫廷都在熟睡，而你发现自己在盯着天花板。你开始逐渐变老，每天都离抛下存在的世界更进一步。恐惧这种事太愚蠢了，但你并不能阻止这感觉。你就没有什么更远大的理想吗？你自己选择的路呢？你的野心呢？\n\n你直挺挺地坐在你的床上。这太荒谬了。你是统治者！你的人民随时准备满足你的任何要求！也许你的内阁成员会有想法？别的不说，这可能会缓解你的睡眠问题。

original: Summon the council!
translation: 召集内阁！

original: You summon a secret meeting, invite only.
translation: 你召集一次秘密的会议，只有受邀者参加。

original: Summon the council!
translation: 召集内阁！

original: You summon your council. Who is §Y[eternal_life_sad_example.GetTitledFirstName]§! anyway?
translation: 你召集自己的内阁。谁会去管§Y[eternal_life_sad_example.GetTitledFirstName]§!啊？

original: Actually, when I think about it, I've lived a good life.
translation: 事实上，当我胡思乱想的时候，我已经活得挺好了。

original: You return to your bed. You haven't tried counting sheep yet.\n
translation: 你回到你的床上。你还没试过数羊入睡。\n

original: I should relax. And spend more time with [eternal_life_sad_example.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我应当放松。和[eternal_life_sad_example.GetTitledFirstName]多呆一些时间！

original: You drink some water and go back to bed.\n
translation: 你喝一些水，然后回到床上。\n

original: Budding Friendship
translation: 新的友谊

original: A Meeting of the Minds
translation: 各种观点的会议

original:
Your council convenes and the faces of your advisors speak of confusion. "Why are we here, my [Root.GetLordLady]?" It comes with a hint of concern. You sit down and the suspense is almost tangible, as you leave the question hanging in the air. Finally you speak and without disclosing much of your current nightly restlessness, you convey the message eloquently enough... 

"I want to discuss the concept of life and death. And... I want to look into everlasting life." They nod, slowly. "So what do you think?" 

The spirit rises in the room as your councillors start to talk, some hesitantly, some gesturing wildly. They all have ideas.
translation:
你的内阁召开会议，但内阁成员们的脸上写满了疑惑。「为什么召集我们，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？」话里带着一丝忧虑。你径直坐下来，悬念的气氛几乎让空气凝固，因为你没有回答这个问题。最后，你说话了，丝毫没有透露前夜里的不安，你传达的信息足够明确……

「我想讨论生与死的概念。并且……我想得到永恒的生命。」他们缓慢地点头。「所以，你们怎么看？」

房间的气氛渐渐活跃，内阁成员们开始讲话，有的迟疑，有的指手画脚。他们都有些自己的看法。

original: Send my trusted [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 派出受我信任的[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: Have [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] organize a search party!
translation: 让[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]组织一个搜索队！

original: I trust [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] to handle this discreetly.
translation: 我相信[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]能谨慎地处理。

original: [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName], I want you to hit the books!
translation: [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]，我希望你翻查所有典籍！

original: Maybe you guys should decide what to do...
translation: 也许你们应该决定要做什么……

original: I would rather not make any decisions on my own.
translation: 我宁愿自己没有做出任何决定。

original: Your [Root.GetChancellorName] §Y[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]§! will use [Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] diplomatic ties and send letters to all [Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] confidants. Eternal life is surely something of interest to many a noble and somebody has to know something.\n\n
translation: 你的[Root.GetChancellorName]§Y[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会利用[Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis]外交联系并发送信件给[Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis]知己们。永恒的生命必定会使很多贵族感兴趣，其中有些人肯定知道些什么。\n\n

original: Your [Root.GetMarshalName] §Y[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]§! will arrange a realm-wide search for any person in possession of knowledge on the matter. [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHeCap] seems doubtful regarding the whole endeavor, but maybe a healthy dose of scepticism is just what the job requires?\n\n
translation: 你的[Root.GetMarshalName]§Y[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]§!将安排一次整个领地范围内的搜索，去寻找任何拥有相关知识的人。[Root.job_marshal.GetSheHeCap]似乎对整个事有所怀疑，但是也许适当的怀疑正是这工作所必需的？\n\n

original: Your [Root.GetSpymasterName] §Y[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]§! claims to have connections [Root.job_spymaster.GetSheHe] can't rightly speak of. However, that one raised eyebrow of [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] tells you that one of these shadowy figures of the underground might just have the information you need.\n\n
translation: 你的[Root.GetSpymasterName]§Y[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]§! 声称有一些[Root.job_spymaster.GetSheHe]不能明说的门路。然而，[Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis]皱起眉毛告诉你，其中一个阴暗的地下人物可能就有你想要的信息。\n\n

original: §Y[Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]§! smiles, but doesn't push [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] cause. [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] knows that your library in [Root.Capital.GetName] is the most impressive in the realm. It would not be unreasonable to study the literature already at your disposal.\n\n
translation: §Y[Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]§!微微一笑，但并未赶紧启动[Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHis]工作。[Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]明白[Root.Capital.GetName]的图书馆是领地内最令人印象深刻的了。研究这些属于你的文献资料已经是难以完成的任务。\n\n

original: You continue staring out the window.\n\n
translation: 你继续盯着窗外。\n\n

original: Perhaps this issue is best resolved by the council. They were hired for a reason after all.\n\n
translation: 这个问题也许最好由内阁解决。毕竟雇他们来工作不是吃白饭的。\n\n

original: You let the council decide themselves.
translation: 你让内阁自己决定。

original: A Subtle Touch
translation: 微妙的接触

original: As per your orders your [Root.GetChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] has been corresponding with all the important scholarly nobles of the known world. Some of them have been intrigued by the enquiries put forward. Others have been skeptical, while some have been outright dismissive. However, a select few have been relaying mysterious rumors from the north, stories sounding nothing short of magic. \n\n[Root.job_chancellor.GetFirstName] informs you that one contact in particular is worried about the repercussions if it became known that they have been entertaining these borderline heretic ideas. "It pains me to say, my [Root.GetLordLady], but this sort of gossip does not come for free" [Root.job_chancellor.GetSheHe] says, brows furrowed. "I may be a diplomat, but I'm not a hypnotist."
translation: 根据命令，你的[Root.GetChancellorName][Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]与已知世界所有知名的富有学识的贵族联系。这个要求激起了一些人的兴趣。另一些人则持怀疑态度，有些人甚至完全不屑一顾。然而，少数人讲述了一个来自北方的神秘传言，故事听起来很神奇。\n\n[Root.job_chancellor.GetFirstName]告诉你，其中一位特别地担心，如果大众知道他们曾考虑过这些近乎异端的想法，会发生什么后果。「说这话我很痛苦，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，但这消息并不是免费的。」[Root.job_chancellor.GetSheHe]眉头紧锁地说。「我也许是一个外交官，但我不是一个催眠术士。」

original: You can't quit now! Make sure this gift reaches your contact.
translation: 你现在不能退出！确保你的联系人收到这个礼物。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will make good use of the money.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!会好好用这笔钱。\n

original: You think I'm running a charity here? Just use that silver tongue of yours.
translation: 你觉得我是在运营一个慈善机构？用好你的三寸不烂之舌。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! looks a bit crestfallen.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!看起来有点沮丧。\n

original: Paying Your Passage
translation: 为你的信息渠道付款

original: "I'm not going to say I believe the stories, but we have picked up some promising information, my [Root.GetLordLady]" [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] says. "However, we could do with some more supplies if we are to journey even further. In fact, I would like to send word to hire scouts in certain more distant regions, if we are to follow the leads and continue this... Mission." [From.GetSheHeCap] pauses at the door, [From.GetHerHis] posture strained. "Of course, there are other ways to reach eternity," [From.GetSheHe] sighs. When you open your mouth to respond, indignantly, [From.GetSheHe] interrupts you: "I suppose the attitude comes with the job, [Root.GetMasterMistress]. My apologies."\n\n Your [Root.GetMarshalName] exits the room, [From.GetHerHis] steps growing fainter as you consider your options...
translation: 「我不会说我相信这些故事，但我们已经找到了一些可能的情报，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]说道。「然而，如果我们想要把这件事更加深入下去，就需要更多资金。实际上，我可能需要雇佣一些远方的探子，如果我们还想要跟进线索并继续这个……任务。」[From.GetSheHeCap]在门口停下，[From.GetHerHis]身子立得笔直。「当然了，也有其他获得永生的方法，」[From.GetSheHe]轻叹一声。你正准备开口回应，[From.GetSheHe]很不礼貌地打断了你：「我接到这工作就是这种态度了，[Root.GetMasterMistress]。我很抱歉。」\n\n你的[Root.GetMarshalName]离开了房间，[From.GetHerHis]脚步声越来越轻，而你在思考可能的选择。

original: I shall send word to the whole world, if need be.
translation: 我将通告世界，如果必须如此。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and [From.GetHerHis] troops shall be moved by your generosity!\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!和[From.GetHerHis]队伍必会感谢你的慷慨！\n

original: Fine! I'll spruce up the armory.
translation: 好的！我会改善军械。

original: This should cheer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! up.\n
translation: 这应该能让§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!开心起来。\n

original: Maybe [From.GetSheHe]'s right. I'm not a believer either...
translation: 也许[From.GetSheHe]说得对。我也是半信半疑……

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! mood finally got to you. [From.GetSheHeCap] will continue looking without any special aid from you.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]的§!情绪终于影响到了你。[From.GetSheHeCap]将在没有你的帮助的情况下继续搜寻。\n

original: Promises in the Dark
translation: 黑暗中的承诺

original: Your [Root.GetSpymasterName] finds you in the night, startling you awake. "Sorry, [From.GetMasterMistress], but the walls have ears. I dared not come during the day" [From.GetSheHe] says. "Somebody is on my track, I could use some help throwing them off my scent. No no, don't worry, it means that we're getting close", [From.GetSheHe] whispers, a confident smirk only just visible on [From.GetHerHis] face.\n\n"There's a legend, you see, and... Well, we're very close to locating a certain person who can help, but we're not the only ones looking for her..."
translation: 你的[Root.GetSpymasterName]在晚上找到你，将你叫醒。「对不起，[From.GetMasterMistress]，但隔墙有耳，我不敢在白天来找你。」[From.GetSheHe]说，「有人跟踪我，我需要借助一些帮助甩掉他们。不不，不用担心。这意味着我们更加接近目标。」[From.GetSheHe]小声说，自信的笑容在[From.GetHerHis]脸上浮现。\n\n「有一个传说，你知道的，而且……我们快要定位到一个能帮助到我们的人，但并不止只有我们在找她……」

original: I could... Pay for disguises?
translation: 我可以……付款给你伪装？

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will receive additional funds for some stealthy gear.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将得到额外的资金用于隐秘行动的装备。\n

original: I'm going back to sleep.
translation: 我要回去睡觉了。

original: You shoo §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! away.\n
translation: 你将§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!嘘走。\n

original: A Holy Sigh
translation: 神圣之叹

original: When you check up on [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] to inquire about the search, you find [From.GetHerHim] slumped over [From.GetHerHis] books, sound asleep. You clear your throat loudly and [From.GetSheHe] sits up straight, drowsy eyes darting panickedly around the room, before suppressing a yawn. \n\n"Sorry, [Root.GetMasterMistress], I must've dozed off. Truth be told, I am starting to give up... To make it through all these scriptures, I think I need an assistant. Or ten." [From.GetSheHeCap] rolls [From.GetHerHis] eyes, then looks down, abashedly. "I'm sorry, my [Root.GetLordLady], I'll make do, of course."
translation: 当你去探查[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]并询问研究进展时，你发现[From.GetHerHim]趴在[From.GetHerHis]书籍上，陷入了熟睡。你大声清了清你的嗓子，[From.GetSheHe]立刻坐直，困倦的双眼惊恐地扫射整个房间，发现是你才停止压抑自己的哈欠。\n\n「不好意思，[Root.GetMasterMistress]我刚才肯定是昏睡过去了。实话实说吧，我开始想要放弃了……要翻遍这些文献，我想我需要一个助手。或者十个吧。」[From.GetSheHeCap]转了转他的双眼，又看向地下，非常羞愧。「我很抱歉，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我一个人当然也可以做到。」

original: Nonsense! You rest. I'll hire some scribes.
translation: 胡说！你去休息去。我会雇一些书吏。

original: You doubt yourself too much, [From.GetFirstName]. Sleep it off!
translation: 不要怀疑自己的能力，[From.GetFirstName]。睡一觉就不困了！

original: A Mystic Appears
translation: 神秘人出现

original: The mystic is invited to your court.
translation: 神秘人被邀请到宫廷。

original: Your [Root.GetChancellorName] [From.GetFirstName] is beaming. "You know how [eternal_life_random_diplomat.GetTitledFirstName] can be, I had to make sure that it was [eternal_life_random_diplomat.GetHerHis] son who mentioned it first and then it was easy to make it seem [eternal_life_random_diplomat.GetHerHis] idea in the first place and, well... I won't bore you with ALL the details" [From.GetSheHe] says, clearly excited to have something noteworthy to tell you. When you roll your eyes for the third time [From.GetSheHe] finally pulls it together and skips to the part about a mystic woman, allegedly traveling the whole world, strange wonders following her footsteps. \n\n"Oh, [Root.GetMasterMistress], I think you should invite her here," [From.GetSheHe] urges.
translation: 你的[Root.GetChancellorName][From.GetFirstName]很开心。「你知道[eternal_life_random_diplomat.GetTitledFirstName]是什么样的人，我必须确保这是[eternal_life_random_diplomat.GetHerHis]儿子首先提起，然后就很容易让它看起来像[eternal_life_random_diplomat.GetHerHis]自然的想法，嗯……好吧不讲细枝末节了。」[From.GetSheHe]说，显然有值得注意的事告诉你。当你第三次翻白眼的时候，[From.GetSheHe]终于把整个故事串联起来，说到一位神秘女性，据说在周游整个世界，她的足迹留下许多奇特的猜测。\n\n「哦，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，我想你应该将她邀请过来。」[From.GetSheHe]敦促你。

original: Greetings, wise woman! I'll have a room set for you right away.
translation: 你好，聪明的女士！我马上为你安排一个房间。

original: Your [Root.GetMarshalName] [From.GetFirstName] looks lost for words. "[Root.GetMasterMistressCap], I am not sure what to think". [From.GetSheHeCap] shakes [From.GetHerHis] head as [From.GetSheHe] searches for the correct way to phrase [From.GetHerselfHimself]. "My [Root.GetTitle], she is... impressive. I can't quite put my finger on it. Not to mention she has traveled far." [From.GetHerHisCap] face conveys uncertainty and [From.GetSheHe] shifts [From.GetHerHis] weight. "I see", you say, scratching your head.\n\n[From.GetFirstName] breaks the silence: "My [Root.GetLordLady], I can still send her away. What say you?"
translation: 你的[Root.GetMarshalName][From.GetFirstName]看起来吓到不会说话了。「[Root.GetMasterMistressCap]，我真的不知道要怎么对待这件事。」[From.GetSheHeCap]摇了摇[From.GetHerHis]头，想要[From.GetSheHe]搜寻出正确的方式表达[From.GetHerselfHimself]的想法。「我的[Root.GetTitle]，她真的……令人难忘。我确实说不上来。更不要说她已经长途跋涉了这么远。」[From.GetHerHisCap]表情传达出迷惑的心情，[From.GetSheHe]换了一下[From.GetHerHis]重心。「我知道了」，你说道，挠了挠头。\n\n[From.GetFirstName]打破了沉寂：「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我还是可以把她送走。你怎么说？」

original: Uhm, greetings. If my lady would care to join us at court...?
translation: 嗯，贵安。我的小姐是否介意加入宫廷……？

original: A Young Mystic Appears
translation: 年轻神秘人出现

original:
You are almost used to your [Root.GetSpymasterName] [From.GetFirstName] visiting your chambers at the strangest hours, but you still jump when [From.GetSheHe] steps out from the shadows one evening. "It wasn't easy, but we got something, my [Root.GetLordLady]," [From.GetSheHe] says calmly, as if clandestine meetings had become the norm for social interaction. You compose yourself before asking "what?", your voice not quite concealing your irritation.

Perhaps you were foolish to investigate eternal life? You could be setting yourself up to be duped, or so the whispers go. 

"There's a mystic. She... is something else" [From.GetFirstName] says, interrupting your thoughts. "Should I bring her to you?"
translation:
你几乎习惯了你的[Root.GetSpymasterName][From.GetFirstName]在最奇怪的时间拜访你的卧室，但当你听见[From.GetSheHe]的脚步从夜晚的阴影中传来时，你仍吓了一跳。「这并不容易，但我们知道了一些事，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，」[From.GetSheHe]平静地说，好似秘密会面已经成为正常社交的规则。你尽力平复自己，然后问道「什么事？」但你的声音仍然难掩愤怒。

也许寻找永生是件愚蠢的事？你让自己上了当，你自言自语道。

「有一个神秘人。她……是另一种情况……」[From.GetFirstName]说道，打断了你的思绪。「我是否要将她带给你？」

original: Psst, kiddo! I have a job for you.
translation: 嘘，孩子！我有个工作给你。

original: A Strange Mystic Appears
translation: 一个陌生的神秘人出现

original: This Mortal Coil
translation: 此乃尘世

original: Oh, that useless [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 哦，没用的[From.GetFirstName]！

original: You consider firing §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. It'd feel good, wouldn't it.
translation: 你考虑开除§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!。那感觉一定很好，应该会的。

original: An Intriguing Encounter
translation: 有趣的邂逅

original: I am intrigued. You should stay, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我很好奇。你应当留下，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: The mystic woman takes up residence in your court.
translation: 神秘的女性在你的宫廷住下。

original: This is preposterous! You should leave.
translation: 真是荒谬！你赶紧离开。

original: The mystic leaves your court.
translation: 神秘人离开你的宫廷。

original: I will accept your teachings, [From.GetFirstName]. Eternal life must be mine.
translation: 我会接受你的教诲，[From.GetFirstName]。永恒的生命一定会属于我。

original: You invite the stranger to take up residence in your court.
translation: 你邀请陌生人在你的宫廷住下。

original: This is outrageous! Leave at once if you want to keep your head!
translation: 真是岂有此理！离开这里，如果你还想活着！

original: The mystic leaves your court.
translation: 神秘人离开你的宫廷。

original: Blasphemy! In the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], imprison this filthy heretic!
translation: 这是亵渎！以[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]之名！逮捕这个肮脏的异端！

original: This is a fool's errand. Leave it be!
translation: 只有傻瓜会去干。放弃吧！

original: Who Lives Forever Anyway
translation: 谁会得到永生

original: You asked several people in your court, and even waited for a long time for some of them to get back to you, but none of them have heard of a method to avoid the whole mess of dying. You reckon it's a lot like sleeping though? You probably shouldn't worry about it.
translation: 你询问几个在宫廷的人，甚至等了很长一段时间为了让他们中的几个人你回答你，但没有人听说过有躲避死亡的办法。你可以将它看做是一个漫长的睡眠？你可能不需要多加担心。

original: Wonder what's for dinner tonight?
translation: 好奇今晚吃些什么？

original: You take a nap.
translation: 你打了个盹。

original: Who Wants To Live Forever
translation: 谁想得到永生

original: I wish... never mind.
translation: 我想要……算了。

original: A part of you will always wonder if you missed something.
translation: 你或许将永远好奇你是否错过了些什么。

original: Heeding the Call
translation: 响应号召

original: A stranger has appeared at your court. "She says she will only speak to you, my [Root.GetLordLady]," a servant bows before you, clearly annoyed. You pause. What is this about? The times are busy in [Root.Capital.GetName] and you were in the middle of contemplating whether you should have a grand feast thrown in your name or arrange for a prestigious hunting trip. There is always someone to impress, and you would rather not get involved in the drama of the court. You glance at the servant, still bowing deeply. Very well...\n\nIn the main hall a hooded figure approaches you.
translation: 一个陌生人出现在你的宫廷。「她说她只会跟你说话，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，」一个仆人在你面前鞠躬，很明显他很懊恼。你停下脚步，这是要干什么？这是[Root.Capital.GetName]最繁忙的时段，而你在考虑是否以你的名义举办一场宴会或者安排一个著名的狩猎之旅。总有人需要你去留下好印象，而你不愿卷入宫廷闹剧，你看了一眼仆人，他仍深深鞠躬。很好……\n\n在大殿，一个带斗篷的人接近你。

original: Intriguing.
translation: 真是有趣。

original: Send her away!
translation: 将她赶出去！

original: The tall figure offers you a nod, but does not smile. She eyes you skeptically, measuring you up as much as you are her. Her clothing is modest and her posture clearly that of a warrior's. "I am [From.GetTitledFirstName]. You are [Root.GetFirstName]," she says, as if somebody had forgotten to introduce you. Perhaps you should have spoken the first words, to assert your position, but the muscular woman makes you more than a little nervous. \n\n"I hear you are looking to live forever," she finally says, more a statement than question. "I can help."
translation: 高挑身材的女人向你点了一下头，但并未微笑。她用怀疑的眼神、审视的眼光看着你，就像你看着她。她的穿着很谦虚，姿态更像是一个战士。「我是[From.GetTitledFirstName]。你是[Root.GetFirstName]，」她说道，好像有人忘记介绍你了。也许你应该先说话，来坚定你的立场，但是这个女人让你非常紧张。\n\n「我听说你正寻找长生之法，」她最终说道，比起问题更像是声明。「我能帮忙。」

original: The tall figure offers you a nod, but does not smile. She eyes you skeptically, measuring you up as much as you are her. Her clothing, possibly intended to be modest, is foreign to you and you have trouble concealing your confusion. In fact, the warrior woman before you is bound to stand out in your court in more ways than one. "I am [From.GetTitledFirstName]. You are [Root.GetFirstName]," she says, as if somebody had forgotten to introduce you. Perhaps you should have spoken the first words, to assert your position, but the muscular woman makes you more than a little nervous.\n\n"I hear your are looking to live forever," she finally says, more a statement than question. "I can help."
translation: 高挑身材的女人向你点了一下头，但并未微笑。她用怀疑的眼神、审视的眼光看着你，就像你看着她。她的衣服——可能是刻意显得端庄——看起来非常陌生，你对此表现出了难以掩饰的困惑。实际上，在你面前的女性，不止一个方面在你的宫廷中鹤立鸡群。「我是[From.GetTitledFirstName]。而你是[Root.GetFirstName]。」她说道，就像有人忘记介绍你似的。也许你应该先说话，来坚定你的立场，但是这个女人让你非常紧张。\n\n「我听说你正寻找长生之法，」她最终说道，比起问题更像是声明。「我能帮助你。」

original: In Honor of the Ancestors
translation: 为了祖先的荣耀

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] sits on the floor when you enter the room, what looks like polished pieces of bone strewn out in front of her. She motions for you to join her. "You have neglected your spirit" she says, eyes closed. You shift uncomfortably in your seat. "I have not" you mumble. Her eyes open at this and she stares at you, a steely cold look and you retract your statement. "You must sacrifice" she declares. "Very well" you reply, thinking you'll have your learned [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] see to it. As if she could read your mind [From.GetFirstName] shakes her head: "You must do this on your own. Do you see what I see?"  \n\nYou notice a pattern in the bones. It looks just like...
translation: 当你进入房间时[From.GetTitledFirstName]正坐在地板上，打磨过的骨片散落在她面前。她提议你加入她。「你忽略了你的灵魂。」她闭着眼睛说。你在你的座位上不安的移动。「我并没有」你小声嘀咕。她睁开眼睛盯着你，一副冷冰冰的样子，你收回了你的发言。「你必须做出牺牲」，她说。「好的」，你回答，考虑让你博学的[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]看一看骨片。好似能看穿你的内心，[From.GetFirstName]摇了摇头∶「你必须自己来，你看到的是我看到的吗？」\n\n你注意到骨片形成的图案，它看起来就像……

original: An antelope. How curious!
translation: 羚羊。不可思议！

original: You will perform the sacrifice using an antelope, ordered in from far away.\n
translation: 你会用一只从远方进口的羚羊举行祭祀。\n

original: A field of crops. Beautiful.
translation: 谷物丰收的田野。真是美丽。

original: You will perform the sacrifice using a barrel of the finest grain in [Root.Capital.GetName].\n
translation: 你会用一桶[Root.Capital.GetName]里最精美的谷物来执行祭祀。\n

original: A man, falling. What do you want from me?!
translation: 一个人，在坠落。你想要我干什么？！

original: You refuse to perform the sacrifice. You fail §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! quest and she leaves your court.\n
translation: 你拒绝举办仪式。你未完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]的§!要求，她离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: A Bloody Mishap
translation: 血腥的意外

original: All was well until you tried placing the animal on the ceremonial stone slab and you were surprised at its strength. It moves wildly under your hands, refusing to have its neck pressed to the rock. "I don't want to do this," you think for a brief moment, as a sharp dagger is handed to you. [From.GetTitledFirstName] watches you intently, her stern face void of motion, and you find yourself wondering if she possesses any feelings at all or if she carries herself by duty alone?\n\nSuddenly pain shoots through your arm, as the flailing antelope bites down hard on your hand. [From.GetFirstName] reacts instantly and swings her sword at the creature, chopping its head right off, but your fingers are already gone. There is blood EVERYWHERE.
translation: 一切进行完美，直到你试图将动物放到仪式石板上，你对它所拥有的力量感到吃惊。它在你手中疯狂挣扎，抗拒你将它的脖子压到石板上。「我并不想要这样，」你想了一下子，而一把匕首交到你手上。[From.GetTitledFirstName]全神贯注的看着你，她严厉的表情一动不动，你怀疑她是否还拥有感情，也许她活着只为了她的使命？n\n突然一阵疼痛感向你袭来，你手中的羚羊正在大力的咬你的手。[From.GetFirstName]立即做出反应，向这生物挥动手中的剑，砍下了它的头，但你的手指都被咬掉了。鲜血到处都是。

original: You anxiously carry the torch to the altar, where three full barrels of grain stand neatly together. [From.GetTitledFirstName] watches you intently, her stern face void of motion, and you find yourself wondering if she possesses any feelings at all, or if she carries herself by duty alone? Such a straight back. Such discipline! You can see why she would inspire respect and the thought makes you nervous. \n\nThe momentary distraction causes you to lose focus and you realize that the flames are now licking on your sleeves, spreading quickly up your arm. [From.GetFirstName] reacts almost instantly, throwing her cloak around you, but the fire won't go out! You are screaming, the pain too much to bear.
translation: 你焦急地携带火炬靠近祭坛，祭坛上装满谷物的三个桶整齐的放在一起。[From.GetTitledFirstName]全神贯注的看着你，她严厉的表情一动不动，你怀疑她是否还拥有感情，也许她活着只为了她的使命？多么直的后背。多么有纪律性！你可以看出为什么她会激发你的尊敬，而这种想法让你紧张。\n\n分心使你丧失了注意力，你才意识到火焰正在舔舐你的袖口，并在你的手臂上迅速蔓延。[From.GetFirstName]反应很迅速，她将外衣丢给了你，但火并未熄灭！你尖叫着，这痛苦无法承受。

original: AAAAH!!! By [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], it hurts!
translation: 啊啊啊啊啊！！！[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]啊，好痛啊！

original: Your ancestors and §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! remain unimpressed. You fail §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!'s request and she leaves your court.\n
translation: 你的祖先和§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!仍不为所动。你未完成§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!的要求，她离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: The Grateful Dead
translation: 感恩而死

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] hands you a beautiful dagger. The antelope, held down on a stone slab, is surprisingly calm. "Thank you" you say quietly to the animal - you hesitate only a second before slicing its throat. The blood pours down the altar and [From.GetFirstName] nods solemnly. Your heart flutters at the notion of having pleased the statuesque character. \n\n"Your grandfathers and mothers would be proud" [From.GetFirstName] announces.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]递给你一个美丽的匕首。被拴在石板上的羚羊出奇的平静。「谢谢你」你悄悄对动物说——你在划开它的喉咙前只犹豫了一秒。鲜血从祭坛上流下，[From.GetFirstName]郑重的向你点头。你的心脏快速跳动，因你让祖先雕像高兴。\n\n「你的祖父母们会感到自豪」[From.GetFirstName]宣告道。

original:
[From.GetTitledFirstName] hands you the torch. Placed carefully next to each other three barrels, filled to the brim with fine grain, await your approach. [From.GetFirstName] nods at you from the altar and starts chanting something, using words you have never heard before. You step up to the altar and lower the torch to one of the barrels, to let the flames have their way. 

[From.GetFirstName] eventually stops speaking and she looks at you, approval, albeit faint, definitely readable on her face. You smile broadly. 

"Your grandfathers and mothers would approve of this" [From.GetSheHe] says.
translation:
[From.GetTitledFirstName]将火把递给你。三个木桶被小心地相邻放置，用精细的谷物装满至边缘，等待你上前。[From.GetFirstName]在祭坛向你点头，用你从未听过的语言开始吟唱。你踩着祭坛，将火炬向下靠近一个桶，让火焰自己寻找道路。

[From.GetFirstName]停止说话，她看着你，满意的神情，尽管很微弱，但在她脸上清晰可见。你笑得很开心。

「你的祖先很满意。」[From.GetSheHe]说。

original: Thank you, [From.GetFirstName], for having me do this.
translation: 非常感谢，[From.GetFirstName]，你能让我做这个。

original: [From.GetFirstName]'s Sacred Jar
translation: [From.GetFirstName]的神圣陶罐

original: [From.GetFirstName] knocks on your door one evening, carrying a large ceramic jar, animal motifs and ornaments encircling it. Puzzled, you invite her in and pull out two chairs. "Student [Root.GetFirstName], I am pleased with the sacrifice you performed," she says, sitting down on the floor. She places the jar in front of her. "Your ancestors are surely appeased, but I thought it would be a good time to prove to them your strength further."\n\nAs she removes the lid from the jar you hear a hissing noise. A large snake spring launches at you and you are left to your instincts!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]在一个晚上敲响你的门带着一个陶瓷罐，上面绘着动物图案并用装饰物包裹。你感到不解，你请她进屋并拉出两把椅子。「[Root.GetFirstName]同学，我很满意你的献祭。」她坐在地板上说。她将罐子放在面前。「你的祖先是肯定能满足，但我认为现在就是一个很好机会，向他们证明你的实力更进一步。」\n\n她将罐子打开，你听到嘶嘶声。一只巨蛇弹簧般向你射来，你只能凭借本能去反应！

original: Grab the snake by its neck
translation: 抓住蛇的颈部

original: You will attempt to wring the neck of the snake, risking its venomous fangs. While more likely to succeed, this seems dangerous.
translation: 你会试着去扭断蛇的颈部，冒着被毒牙咬到的风险。虽然更容易成功，但看起来很危险。

original: Reach for a heavy object
translation: 拿一个重物

original: You've spotted a large book on the table next to you and will try to block the snake with it. A more defensive strategy.
translation: 你发现在你旁边桌上有一本厚重的书，并尝试用它来挡住蛇。这是更具防御性的策略。

original: Run
translation: 跑

original: You flee the room, screaming. §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! is disappointed and leaves your court.\n\n
translation: 你尖叫着逃离房间。§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!感到失望并离开你的宫廷。\n\n

original: The Serpent's Kiss
translation: 蛇之吻

original: Before you have even time to react the snake bares its fangs. Heading straight for you, seemingly flying, it bites you in your neck. The creature hisses, slithers around you and begins to move upwards. "Nooo, not the face!" you yell, flailing your arms wildly. "[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName], help me!"\n\nAfter what seems like an eternity [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] rises from her spot and steps in to grab the snake by its neck, her voice soothing it as it obediently pours back into the jar.
translation: 在你来得及反应之前，蛇就露出了尖牙。它直奔向你，就像飞行一样，它想咬住你的脖子！这生物嘶嘶的叫着，滑行在你身上，并不断向上移动。「不要，不要咬脸！」你大喊，疯狂挥舞你的手臂。「[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]，帮帮我！」\n\n这一瞬间仿佛永恒般漫长，[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]从她的位置上站起，抓住了蛇的脖子，她用声音抚慰它让它回到了罐子里。

original: I don't feel so good...
translation: 我感觉不是那么好……

original: You pass out. §Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§! is disappointed in your skills and leaves your court.\n
translation: 你晕了过去。§Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§!对你的技术很不满，于是离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: The Serpent's Kiss
translation: 蛇之吻

original: I don't feel so good...
translation: 我感觉不是那么好……

original: Your body begins to cramp, you feel faint and you pass out. §Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§! is disappointed and leaves your court.\n\n
translation: 你的身体开始抽筋，你觉得头晕然后昏了过去。§Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]§!感到失望并且离开了你的宫廷\n\n

original: [Root.GetTitle] of Snakes
translation: 蛇之[Root.GetTitle]

original: [From.GetFirstName]'s eyes widen as you, with the speed of a heron, reach out and grab the snake by its neck. The creature writhes in your hand and you proceed to slam it against a table, hard. In a state of panic you repeat the action several times before you hear [From.GetFirstName]'s steady voice getting through to you: "[Root.GetMasterMistressCap]. The soul is gone. You can let it go... You did good."\n\nThe snake is limp in your hold. Your palms are sweaty.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]睁大了眼睛，此时你以苍鹭般的速度伸手抓住脖子上的蛇。这生物在你的手中翻腾，于是你接着把它狠摔在桌上。在恐慌的状态下，你不停地重复这个动作，直到听见[From.GetFirstName]沉稳的声音：「[Root.GetMasterMistressCap]。它的灵魂已经离去了。你可以将它放下……你干的很好。」\n\n蛇从你的手里滑落，你手心全都是汗。

original:
[From.GetFirstName] sits calmly as you quickly, but not quite gracefully, grab the heavy tome and slam it uncomfortably hard into the side of the snake. The creature bounces off to the other end of the room where you follow it, frantically stomping on the floor while the animal wriggles around your feet. When it stops you are panting, and you look around to see [From.GetFirstName] looking at you, motionlessly. 

 "It wasn't venomous, was it?" you frown. 
"Not at all," she replies, a smile tugging at the corner of her mouth.
translation:
[From.GetFirstName]平静坐着，看着你快速，却不很优雅地抓过沉重的巨著使出吃奶的力气砸在的蛇的一侧。这种生物跳到了房间了另一个角落，你追过去疯狂地踩踏地面，只知道它在你的脚边蠕动。当它终于不动了，你已气喘吁吁，你回头看到[From.GetFirstName]正看着你，一动不动。

「这条不是毒蛇，对吧？」你皱眉问到。
「完全不是！」她回答，嘴角翘起一丝微笑。

original: That was intense.
translation: 这很激烈。

original: A Trial of Faith
translation: 信仰的试炼

original:
When you after a long wait are summoned to [From.GetFirstName]'s chambers again you are excited. What mystical challenge lies ahead of you this time? There's a spring in your step as you enter to find her standing like a statue - head bowed, hands holding something to you. Sometimes you wonder what she does when you're not around. Does she even move?
"What's this?" you ask.
"Magic," she says naturally. "The time has come for your spirit to choose its next vessel. No, don't be afraid! The breath of life within you is powerful enough to be passed on. You should be proud." 
She hands you a waterskin and motions to the floor. Then she begins to hum - it is both melodic and eerie.
translation:
你经过漫长的等待，终于被[From.GetFirstName]召唤到她的房间，再次相会使你感到兴奋。这一次什么神秘的挑战将摆在你的面前？你的脚步充满活力，当你进入时，你发现她站在那里就像一座雕塑——低着头，将双手抱着的东西给你。有时候，你不知道，当你不在身边时她做些什么。她甚至不动么？
「这是什么？」你问到。
「魔法，」她很自然地说。「将你的灵魂转移到另一个容器的时间到了。不，不要害怕！你体内生命的气息强大到足以转移灵魂。你应当自豪！」
她递给你一个皮革水袋并示意你躺在地上。然后她就开始哼唱——既优美和谐又神秘怪异。

original: You are so wise, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 你真睿智，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: You gulp down the liquid and lay down on the floor, closing your eyes to the sound of §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! voice. This will potentially kill you, but there is also a chance of something incredible happening.
translation: 你吞掉液体，躺在地板上，听着§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!的声音闭上眼睛。这有可能杀死你，但也有机会发生一些不可思议的事情。

original: This sounds potentially dangerous.
translation: 这听起来有潜在的危险。

original: You pretend to drink the liquid and lay down, anxiously closing your eyes. This will close your body to most spiritual forces.
translation: 你假装喝下液体然后躺下，紧张地地闭上眼睛。这将使你的身体无法接受灵性的力量。

original: I've changed my mind.
translation: 我改变了主意。

original: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! is disappointed and leaves your court.
translation: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!很失望，离开了你的宫廷。

original: The Spirits Gathering
translation: 灵魂聚集

original: You are floating in space. When you turn around it feels as though you are moving under water and you can't seem to make a sound. There is a melody in your head that you can't quite wrap your head around - it is both soothing and frustrating. It is pulling at you, drawing you in. Suddenly you are moving at incredible speed! Just as you are trying to catch a glimpse of the little spot of light you are shooting towards, you realize it is you, yourself, lying on the floor. [From.GetFirstName] leans over you, trying to wake you. \n\nYou crash into your own body and the first breath you draw feels magnificent. "The seed of life is in you still. And I don't think you're the only one in there any more", [From.GetFirstName] says contentedly.
translation: 你漂浮在虚空。当你转身，感觉就好像是在水下移动，你无法发出声音。有一个旋律在你脑中缠绕，而你无法集中精力——它既舒缓又沮丧。它在拉扯着你，将你拉进去。突然，你以难以置信的速度移动！你正要试图辨认自己飞速移动方向前面的那一个光点，你意识到那正是你自己，躺在地板上。[From.GetFirstName]凑到你跟前，试图叫醒你。\n\n你进入你的身体，你吸入的第一口空气是那么清新。「你体内仍拥有生命的种子。而且我不认为你还是唯一一个在你身体那里的人。」[From.GetFirstName]心满意足地说。

original: My ancestors... I can feel them!
translation: 我的祖先们……我能感受到他们！

original: Infused by the spirits of your most powerful ancestors, you become immortal!
translation: 你强大祖先的灵魂注入你的身体，你变得不朽。

original: Immortal Ancestors
translation: 不朽的祖先

original:
The floor is hard, and the words chanted by [From.GetFirstName] make no sense to you. It is a language you do not understand and the melody has no pattern to it. Your eyes closed, you grow a little irritated by the whole situation. Maybe it is natural to move on to the next realm, who are you to stop it? Who is [From.GetFirstName] to have you go through these trials?

"It's happening!" [From.GetFirstName] exclaims suddenly, and you feel like you exploded, like you are sucked into space, then thrown back into your body again, all within the blink of an eye. When you sit up, bewildered, the mystic smiles at you.

"You're hosting your grandfathers in your body. They will keep you alive, for many days to come" she says.
translation:
地板很是坚硬，而被[From.GetFirstName]高呼的话对你毫无意义。这是你不熟悉的语言，它的旋律没有任何模式。你闭上眼睛，对这情况感到愤怒。也许前往下一个世界是很自然的，凭什么你要阻止这件事？凭什么[From.GetFirstName]要让你通过这些试炼？

「来了！」[From.GetFirstName]突然宣布，你感觉你好像爆炸了，就像你被吸进真空，然后重新抛回你的身体，所有都发生在眨眼的一瞬间。当你坐起来，不知所措时，神秘者向你微笑。

「你将你的祖先挽留在你的身体里。在未来无数的日子里，他们将让你继续活着。」她说。

original: Isn't that going to be... Crowded?
translation: 那不会变得……很挤么？

original: Your spirit infused with those of your ancestors, you become immortal!
translation: 你祖先和你的灵魂一同注入，你变得不朽！

original: The Final Ritual
translation: 最后的仪式

original: [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]'s chanting grows faint as you find yourself floating upwards, looking down at your own body. The room has a strange purple hue to it, as if twilight had fallen. Yet it shouldn't have? The mystic leans in over your body, touching your forehead, and she speaks but you can't make out what she is saying. You struggle to move closer to her through the air, but you feel like you are under water, your limbs heavy, your movement slowed to a crawl. You try to call her attention by screaming, but no sound comes out. Suddenly she turns around, not seeing you, but sensing your presence. She moves her hand through the air where you hang and smiles. You can barely make out the words she says: "You are a brave warrior, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], and your spirit is strong. I hope we meet again."
translation: [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]的吟唱声逐渐淡去，而你发现自己在上浮，往下看见你自己的身体。房间里有一个奇怪的紫色色调，仿佛黄昏已经降临。但应该还没有这么晚啊？神秘者俯在你的身体上，抚摸你的额头，然后她说话，但你根本听不出来她在说什么。你挣扎的在空中移动接近她，但是你觉得你像是在水下，你的四肢沉重，你的运动像爬行一样缓慢。你尝试通过尖叫来吸引她的注意，但没有声音发出来。她突然转身，没看到你，但感知到你的存在。她移动她的手穿过你漂浮处的空气，微笑着。你只能勉强辨认出她说的话：「你是一个勇敢的战士，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，你的灵魂很强壮，我期待重逢。」

original: [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName], I'm not ready! Am I ready?
translation: [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]，我还没准备好！我准备好了么？

original: Released from your old vessel your spirit moves on to take up residence in the newly born [From.GetFirstName]. You die.
translation: 你的灵魂从旧容器中释放，并转移到新生的[From.GetFirstName]中。你死去了。

original: An Open Spirit Door
translation: 开放的灵魂之门

original: The chanting quickly begins to feel repetitive. You try to relax, but something doesn't feel right. Who are you play at things like life and death? You just want to be left alone! Sometimes you even wonder whether you're a good ruler or not, and how can one know? \n\nYou feel the warrior mystic placing a hand on your sweaty forehead. Her skin is cool to the touch and you are suddenly grateful. Maybe this is not so bad after all? Then you hear someone talking excitedly. You are overcome with an urge to hush them as they are disturbing the ritual. Then you hear more voices. Your eyes still closed you start to twist and turn, and a convulsing nausea takes you over. "Oh, no," you hear [FromFrom.GetFirstName] utter worriedly before the voices start screaming...
translation: 吟诵很快开始让你感到重复。你试图放松，但有些事感到不对。你在玩弄什么，生或者死？你只想一个人呆着！有时你甚至会怀疑你是否是一个好的统治者，而人类又怎能知道？\n\n你感觉神秘者将手放在你出汗的额头上。她的皮肤感觉凉爽，你突然感激起来。也许这并没有那么糟糕？然后你听到有人兴奋地交谈。你克制不住冲动，嘘声让他们闭嘴，因为他们正在扰乱仪式。然后你听到更多的声音。你的眼睛仍然紧闭而你开始感到旋转和扭曲，抽搐带来的恶心占据了你。「哦，不。」在那声音尖叫之前，你听到[FromFrom.GetFirstName]忧心忡忡的声音。

original: AAAH! Someone help me!
translation: 啊啊啊啊！谁来帮帮我！

original: The ritual fail and you become possessed by the long lost spirits of angry ancestors. \n§Y[FromFrom.GetFirstName]§! hurriedly leaves your court.\n
translation: 仪式失败，而你被迷失了许久的愤怒祖灵附体。\n§Y[FromFrom.GetFirstName]§!匆匆离开你的宫廷。\n

original: Sought My Knowledge
translation: 寻求我的知识

original: Promising Student
translation: 有前途的学生

original: Exceptional Student
translation: 出色的学生

original: Phenomenal Student
translation: 惊人的学生

original: Your [Root.GetTreasurerName] [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] wants to talk about the old tunnels under the castle. The argument is that they should be maintained better now that times are rough - you never know when you'll have to get out, and quickly.
translation: 你的[Root.GetTreasurerName][Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]想要谈谈那个城堡下的旧隧道。关键是隧道应当得到更好的维护，因为世道不太平 - 你不会知道你什么时候需要通过隧道快速离开。

original: What a splendid idea, [Root.job_treasurer.GetFirstName]!
translation: 多么优秀的想法，[Root.job_treasurer.GetFirstName]！

original: You rummage through your things and hand §Y[secluded_steward.GetFirstName]§! a faded map of the tunnels\n
translation: 你在你的物品里翻找一通，然后递给§Y[secluded_steward.GetFirstName]§!一个褪色的隧道地图\n

original: That's clever! I'll... think on this.
translation: 这很聪明！我会……考虑一下。

original: You don't trust §Y[secluded_steward.GetFirstName]'s§! intentions and decide to give [secluded_steward.GetHerHim] some faulty maps of the tunnel system...\n
translation: 你不信任§Y[secluded_steward.GetFirstName]的§!意图，决定给[secluded_steward.GetHerHim]一些错误的隧道地图……\n

original: Oh, I see what you're doing. I'm not telling you anything!
translation: 哦，我知道你要做什么。我不会告诉你任何事！

original: You decide not to trust §Y[secluded_steward.GetFirstName]§!\n
translation: 你决定不信任§Y[secluded_steward.GetFirstName]§!\n

original: "My liege!" [secluded_steward.GetTitledFirstName] catches up with you as you are strolling down the main hall. [secluded_steward.GetSheHeCap] looks concerned and you order [secluded_steward.GetHerHim] to spit it out, whatever the news is. "The tunnels, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [secluded_steward.GetSheHe] breathes and continues to tell you that it seems somebody has been using them - guards have stumbled upon tools and torches, recently used, by the looks of it.
translation: 「我的领主！」[secluded_steward.GetTitledFirstName]在你于大厅里闲逛时匆匆赶上你。[secluded_steward.GetSheHeCap]看起来忧心忡忡，而你命令[secluded_steward.GetHerHim]直说，无论消息是什么。「那个隧道，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」，[secluded_steward.GetSheHe]喘了一整子才告诉你似乎有人在使用隧道——卫兵意外发现了工具和火把，从外表看来，最近才被用过。

original: This is a great opportunity for an ambush!
translation: 这是一个埋伏的好机会！

original: You order more guards to the tunnels, hoping to catch anyone sneaking in or out\n\n
translation: 你命令更多人守卫隧道，期望抓住想要溜进溜出的任何人\n\n

original: This is a disaster! Seal the tunnels!
translation: 这是一场灾难！封闭隧道！

original: You order the tunnels razed, refusing anyone sneaking in, or leaving for that matter\n\n
translation: 你命令销毁隧道，拒绝任何人潜入，或从这里离开\n\n

original: You sure it's not the guards' own tools?
translation: 你确定它不是卫兵自己的工具？

original: You decide to let this play out without interfering
translation: 你决定不去干扰这件事的发展

original: Someone's been captured in the tunnels!
translation: 有个人在地道里被抓住了！

original: create sneaky person
translation: 发现一个鬼鬼祟祟的人

original: Your guards have captured someone in the tunnels! However, the person does not seem to be completely stable. Your guards' faces are not showing the usual bloodthirst when they present [captured_sneaker.GetBestName], a starved-looking and oddly jumpy person.
translation: 你的卫兵在隧道里抓住了某个人！不过，那个人似乎并不完全稳定。你卫兵的脸上并没有展现出通常的激动神色，就将[captured_sneaker.GetBestName]带到你面前，是个饿成皮包骨头而且特别神经兮兮的人。

original: Let's hear what [captured_sneaker.GetSheHe] has to say for [captured_sneaker.GetHerselfHimself].
translation: 让我们听听[captured_sneaker.GetSheHe]要怎么为[captured_sneaker.GetHerselfHimself]辩解。

original: You order [captured_sneaker.GetFirstName] isolated for questioning\n\n
translation: 你下令将[captured_sneaker.GetFirstName]隔离审问。\n\n

original: Throw [captured_sneaker.GetHerHim] in the dungeon!
translation: 把[captured_sneaker.GetHerHim]投入地牢！

original: You imprison the sneaky rat\n\n
translation: 你把这只老鼠监禁起来\n\n

original: It would almost be mercy to execute [captured_sneaker.GetHerHim], you say?
translation: 杀了[captured_sneaker.GetHerHim]都算是仁慈了，你说呢？

original: You order the lurker executed before [captured_sneaker.GetSheHe] can cause any more harm, better safe than sorry!\n\n
translation: 你在这个潜行者造成危害之前处决了[captured_sneaker.GetSheHe]，不怕一万，就怕万一！\n\n

original: You approach the locked door warily. Inside, [captured_sneaker.GetFirstName] is talking quietly to [captured_sneaker.GetHerselfHimself]. The guards tell you that [captured_sneaker.GetSheHe] claims to have had a lover at court. They were on the way back into the castle when [captured_sneaker.GetHerHis] beloved fell ill. Devastated from the loss [captured_sneaker.GetSheHe] remained in the tunnels. \n"[captured_sneaker.GetSheHeCap] doesn't seem all there, my [Root.GetLordLady]..."
translation: 你小心谨慎地靠近上锁的牢门。在里面，[captured_sneaker.GetFirstName]正在悄声和[captured_sneaker.GetHerselfHimself]说话。卫兵告诉你[captured_sneaker.GetSheHe]曾经在宫廷里有一个爱人。他们回城堡的途中[captured_sneaker.GetHerHis]至爱病死了。失去至爱一蹶不振，[captured_sneaker.GetSheHe]继续留在隧道里。\n「[captured_sneaker.GetSheHeCap]好像精神不正常，我的[Root.GetLordLady]……」

original: That poor thing! Let [captured_sneaker.GetHerHim] join my court!
translation: 太惨了，让[captured_sneaker.GetHerHim]加入我的宫廷！

original:
Whatever disease took the lover of [captured_sneaker.GetFirstName] has obviously left [captured_sneaker.GetHerHim] immune
The somewhat jittery [captured_sneaker.GetFirstName] joins your court
translation:
无论是什么疾病夺走了[captured_sneaker.GetFirstName]的爱人，显然[captured_sneaker.GetHerHim]安然无事
战战兢兢的[captured_sneaker.GetFirstName]加入了你的宫廷

original: I can't risk it. [captured_sneaker.GetSheHeCap] has to go.
translation: 我不能冒这个险，[captured_sneaker.GetSheHeCap]必须离开。

original:
Even if you were to believe the story [captured_sneaker.GetSheHe] has likely been exposed to disease
You send [captured_sneaker.GetHerHim] out through the main gate
translation:
虽然你都要相信了[captured_sneaker.GetSheHe]似乎曾染上疾病的故事
你还是把[captured_sneaker.GetHerHim]送出了大门

original: You awake in the middle of the night to a loud clamoring down the corridor. Outside your room the shadows of pitchforks paint the walls and you hear screaming. You close the door behind you. How did the peasants get in? The tunnels should be secure! My [secluded_steward.GetTitledFirstName] had them inspected! Although, the maps weren't exactly up to date...
translation: 你半夜被走廊里的一片叫嚷声吵醒。你看到了房外墙面上草叉晃动的阴影，又听到了尖叫声。你关上了身后的门。这些农民是怎么进来的？地道应该很保险才对！我的[secluded_steward.GetTitledFirstName]检查过了！虽然地图可能有点过时……

original: You awake in the middle of the night to a loud clamoring down the corridor. Outside your room the shadows of pitchforks paint the walls and you hear screaming. You close the door behind you. How did the peasants get in? The tunnels should be secure! My [secluded_steward.GetTitledFirstName] had them inspected?
translation: 你半夜被走廊里的一片叫嚷声吵醒。你看到了房外墙面上草叉晃动的阴影，又听到了尖叫声。你关上了身后的门。这些农民是怎么进来的？地道应该很保险才对！我的[secluded_steward.GetTitledFirstName]检查过了吧？

original: Guaaaaards! To arms!
translation: 卫兵！卫兵！！抄家伙！

original: You grab your weapon and run out into the darkness to face the peasants!\n\n
translation: 你抓起武器冲进了黑暗，和那些农民正面交锋！\n\n

original: You are heading for bed after a late-night snack when you hear steps behind you in the corridor. Who could it be at this hour? You halt, pretending to admire a tapestry, and the steps die out. Someone is definitely following you. As you enter your chambers you draw your knife, hide behind the door and await your pursuer.
translation: 你吃完夜宵正准备睡觉，听到了背后的走廊里有脚步声。这会儿还会是谁呢？你站住了，假装在欣赏一块壁毯，而脚步声消失了。一定是有谁在跟着你。你走进卧室，掏出了刀，躲在门后等着那个跟踪者。

original: Go ahead, I am ready...
translation: 来啊，我准备好了……

original: You are absentmindedly flipping through a book after another long day when there is light tap on your door. Before you can get up, the door is opened and [captured_sneaker.GetFirstName] enters. [captured_sneaker.GetSheHeCap] silently crosses the room, slowly unbuttoning [captured_sneaker.GetHerHis] nightdress. [captured_sneaker.GetHerHisCap] intentions are plain as day in [captured_sneaker.GetHerHis] smoldering eyes.
translation: 忙完了一天后，你漫不经心的翻着书，突然听到了有人轻敲了一下门。你还没来得及起身，门开了，[captured_sneaker.GetFirstName]走了进来。[captured_sneaker.GetSheHeCap]无声地穿过房间，慢慢地褪下[captured_sneaker.GetHerHis]睡袍。[captured_sneaker.GetHerHisCap]意图已经在[captured_sneaker.GetHerHis]欲火中烧的眼神里一览无余。

original: You are absentmindedly flipping through a book after another long day when there is light tap on your door. Before you can get up, the door is opened and [captured_sneaker.GetFirstName] enters. [captured_sneaker.GetSheHeCap] silently crosses the room, slowly unbuttoning [captured_sneaker.GetHerHis] nightshirt. [captured_sneaker.GetHerHisCap] intentions are plain as day in [captured_sneaker.GetHerHis] smoldering eyes.
translation: 忙完了一天后，你漫不经心的翻着书，突然听到了有人轻敲了一下门。你还没来得及起身，门开了，[captured_sneaker.GetFirstName]走了进来。[captured_sneaker.GetSheHeCap]无声地穿过房间，慢慢地褪下[captured_sneaker.GetHerHis]睡衣。[captured_sneaker.GetHerHisCap]意图已经在[captured_sneaker.GetHerHis]欲火中烧的眼神里一览无余。

original: Oh, [captured_sneaker.GetFirstName]. I thought you would never come!
translation: 噢[captured_sneaker.GetFirstName]。我都以为你永远不会来了！

original: You invite [captured_sneaker.GetFirstName] to stay the night\n\n
translation: 你邀请[captured_sneaker.GetFirstName]在这过夜\n\n

original: Oh, er. I like you, but not like that. Can we just be friends?
translation: 啊，呃。我喜欢你，但不是那种喜欢。我们能只做好朋友吗？

original: [captured_sneaker.GetFirstName] looks disappointed, then flushes and quickly buttons [captured_sneaker.GetHerHis] clothing\n\n
translation: [captured_sneaker.GetFirstName]看上去很失望，红着脸飞快的穿好了[captured_sneaker.GetHerHis]衣服\n\n

original: What are you doing here? Get out!
translation: 你在这儿干嘛呢？出去！

original: [captured_sneaker.GetBestName] flees the room, the embarrassment clearly too much to handle\n\n
translation: [captured_sneaker.GetBestName]逃出了房间，这实在是太尴尬了\n\n

original: As the peasant rebels screamed the name of their leader, [captured_sneaker.GetBestName], you furiously charged them, hacking them down, one by one. They had made it into the castle, but they never stood a chance. Together with your well trained guards, the rebels were crushed. In the wake of the victory, you are mostly reminded that trust is a hard earned thing in this world.
translation: 当农民叛军在高喊着他们领袖的名字，[captured_sneaker.GetBestName]，你疯狂地开始冲锋，一个接一个地砍倒他们。虽然他们冲进了城堡，但也到此为止了！这些叛军在你和你训练有素的卫兵面前被无情地碾碎。在胜利的余波中，你想到最多的事情是——信任是世上最难获得的东西。

original: As the peasant rebels screamed the name of their leader, [captured_sneaker.GetBestName], you furiously charged them, hacking them down, one by one. They had made it into the castle, but this was where you drew the line! Together with your well trained guards, the rebels had little chance of succeeding. In the wake of the victory, you contemplate the harshness of it all.
translation: 当农民叛军在高喊着他们领袖的名字，[captured_sneaker.GetBestName]，你疯狂地开始冲锋，一个接一个地砍倒他们。虽然他们冲进了城堡，但也到此为止了！这些叛军在你训练有素的卫兵面前毫无胜算。在胜利的余波中，你仔细思考着这一切的残酷。

original: This doesn't feel like victory.
translation: 这不是胜利的感觉。

original: The rebels were slaughtered\n\n
translation: 叛军被消灭了\n\n

original: Crushed Castle Rebellion
translation: 平定城堡叛乱

original: Maybe it was your [Root.GetTreasurerName] [secluded_steward.GetFirstName]? Maybe the lurker you let in somehow got them in? How long had they planned this? The chaos was everywhere, and even though your guards handled the peasant soldiers well enough, the injuries are felt on your side as well.
translation: 是你的[Root.GetTreasurerName][secluded_steward.GetFirstName]吗？是你放进来的那个潜行者找了个办法带进来的？他们计划这事多久了？到处都是骚乱，就算你的卫兵能很好的控制这些农民士兵，你们还是伤亡惨重。

original: That scheming lurker you let in must somehow have messaged the rebels, you think. During the chaos they called for [captured_sneaker.GetHerHim], over and over, "[captured_sneaker.GetBestName]". The chaos was everywhere, and even though your guards handled the peasant soldiers well enough, the injuries are felt on your side as well.
translation: 你放进来的那个诡计多端的潜行者一定想办法通知了叛军，你看。在这场骚乱中他们一直在呼喊[captured_sneaker.GetHerHim]，重复着「[captured_sneaker.GetBestName]」。到处都是骚乱，就算你的卫兵能很好的控制这些农民士兵，你们还是伤亡惨重。

original: This is awful.
translation: 这糟透了。

original: In the chaos [captured_sneaker.GetBestName] made a stealthy get away while you are injured for life\n\n
translation: 在骚乱中[captured_sneaker.GetBestName]趁你身受重伤的时候，神不知鬼不觉地溜走了\n\n

original: This is awful.
translation: 这糟透了。

original: Even if [captured_sneaker.GetBestName] had something to do with it, [captured_sneaker.GetSheHe] remained in prison the whole time... meanwhile, you are injured for life\n\n
translation: 就算[captured_sneaker.GetBestName]和这事有关，自始至终[captured_sneaker.GetSheHe]也没离开牢房……而这段时间里你身受重伤。\n\n

original: Suspected Assassin
translation: 有嫌疑的刺客

original: Killed an Assassin
translation: 杀死了一个刺客

original: As the door's handle slowly begins to move, you ready yourself for your ambush. A hooded figure steps over the threshold but you keep a cool head and wait for the perfect moment to strike. The would-be assassin takes another step and you make your move. Skin and flesh gives away in a most satisfactory manner as you sink your knife into [captured_sneaker.GetHerHis] back.
translation: 门把手开始旋转，而你做好了伏击准备。一个带着头套的影子踏过了门口，但你仍然冷静地等待着最佳时机。疑似刺客的人又走了一步，你出手了。你的刀没入[captured_sneaker.GetHerHis]后背，皮肉完美的被切开。

original: Die, you [GetRootFromFromInsult]!
translation: 死吧，[GetRootFromFromInsult]！

original: You survived the attempt on your life and killed the assassin\n\n
translation: 你在这次刺杀中活了下来并杀死了刺客\n\n

original: You almost jump out of your skin when the door's handle slowly begins to move. You knew it! As soon as the hooded figure steps over the threshold you throw yourself at them, howling, and the two of you fall to the floor. The assassin fights fiercely and soon [captured_sneaker.GetSheHe] has the upper hand. Fortunately, your battle cry was heard by the guards, and they rush in to save you.
translation: 当门把手开始慢慢旋转的时候，你的心脏都快蹦到了嗓子眼。你早就知道了！带着头套的影子刚踏过门口时，你就大吼一声扑了上去，你们两个都摔倒在了地上。刺客凶猛地反击，[captured_sneaker.GetSheHe]很快占据了上风。还好你们打斗的声音惊动了卫兵，他们冲进房间救了你。

original: At least I live.
translation: 至少我还活着。

original: You survive the assassination attempt but are gravely injured\n\n
translation: 你在这次刺杀中幸存，但身受重伤\n\n

original: Every second feels like an eternity and your heart is racing in your chest. Nothing happens, however, and as time drags on your courage dwindles and your hands begin to shake. Suddenly you are startled by a sound from behind and as you turn to face it, you crash into something solid, and something sharp. You whimper as the assassin's dagger sinks deep in your abdomen.
translation: 你的心跳的飞快，度日如年。然而，什么都没有发生，随着时间的流逝，你的勇气渐渐消失，你的双手开始发抖。背后突然的声响让你一惊，你转过身，撞上了一个坚硬而锐利的东西。刺客的匕首没入了你的小腹，你闷哼了一声。

original: Not... like... this...
translation: 不应该……这……样……

original: The assassin accomplishes [captured_sneaker.GetHerHis] mission and escapes from your court\n\n
translation: 刺客完成了[captured_sneaker.GetHerHis]使命，并从你的宫廷逃脱\n\n

original: Budding Romance
translation: 情窦初开

original: This character is a jumped up peasant who revolted against their betters.
translation: 这个角色是一个妄自尊大，反抗贵族的农民。

original: My court [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] informs that there is unrest within my borders. The recent outbreak of disease has made people worry that it is the wrath of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]. Some are even saying that it's my fault, for not going to temple more often.
translation: 我的宫廷[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]告诉我领地内人心骚动。近来爆发的疾病让人们担心[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]已怒火中烧。还有人甚至说这是我的错误，因为我都不怎么去神殿。

original: They're right. I should make more of an effort.
translation: 他们是对的，我应该做出更多努力。

original: You start attending temple twice a day.\n
translation: 你开始一天去两次神殿。\n

original: I can't risk being infected by the recent disease. Send a double!
translation: 我冒不起染病的风险，弄个替身过去！

original: You order your [Root.GetSpymasterName] §Y[hindu_spymaster.GetFirstName]§! to hire an actor to attend temple for you twice a day.\n
translation: 你让你的[Root.GetSpymasterName]§Y[hindu_spymaster.GetFirstName]§!去雇了个演员，替你一天去两次神殿。\n

original: I shall build a temple for the restless souls.
translation: 我将会给那些空虚的灵魂建一个神殿。

original: You order the construction of a temple nearby [Root.Capital.GetName].\n
translation: 你下令在[Root.Capital.GetName]修建一个神殿。\n

original: I am [Root.GetTitle]! I do as I please.
translation: 我可是[Root.GetTitle]！我爱怎么来就怎么来。

original: You allow the unrest to continue.
translation: 你对领土内的动荡放任自流。

original: I place the holy basil on the steps of the temple. I light the diya and I recite the mantras of Shiva's enlightenment. My subjects have noticed the regularity with which I see to the rituals, but most importantly I feel reconnected with my patron god, the fair Shiva.
translation: 我把神圣的罗勒放在神殿的台阶上。我点亮了油灯，背诵着湿婆降示的真言。我的人民注意到了我规律的宗教活动，但更重要的是我与我的保护神湿婆心意相连。

original: I place the holy basil on the steps of the temple. I light the diya and I recite the holy words of Vishnu. My subjects have noticed the regularity with which I see to the rituals, but most importantly I feel reconnected with my patron god, Vishnu, the Protector.
translation: 我把神圣的罗勒放在神殿的台阶上。我点亮了油灯，背诵着毗湿奴的圣言。我的人民注意到了我规律的宗教活动，但更重要的是我与我的保护神毗湿奴心意相连。

original: I place the holy basil on the steps of the temple. I light the diya and I focus my emotions on Brahma, the creator. My subjects have noticed the regularity with which I see to the rituals, but most importantly I feel reconnected with my patron god, the mighty Brahma.
translation: 我把神圣的罗勒放在神殿的台阶上。我点亮了油灯，用心体会造物者梵天。我的人民注意到了我规律的宗教活动，但更重要的是我与我的保护神梵天心意相连。

original: I place the holy basil on the steps of the temple. I light the diya and I recite the chant of Kali. My subjects have noticed the regularity with which I see to the rituals, but most importantly I feel reconnected with my patron god, Kali, the Goddess of Time.
translation: 我把神圣的罗勒放在神殿的台阶上。我点亮了油灯，吟唱着时母的圣歌。我的人民注意到了我规律的宗教活动，但更重要的是我与我的保护神迦梨时母心意相连。

original: I place the holy basil on the steps of the temple. I light the diya and I recite the mantras of Ganesha. My subjects have noticed the regularity with which I see to the rituals, but most importantly I feel reconnected with my patron god, the wise Ganesha.
translation: 我把神圣的罗勒放在神殿的台阶上。我点亮了油灯，背诵着象头神的真言。我的人民注意到了我规律的宗教活动，但更重要的是我与我的保护神象头神心意相连。

original: I place the holy basil on the steps of the temple. I light the diya and I recite the mantras. My subjects have noticed the regularity with which I see to the rituals, but most importantly I feel reconnected with my patron god, the holy Ganga.
translation: 我把神圣的罗勒放在神殿的台阶上。我点亮了油灯，背诵着真言。我的人民注意到了我规律的宗教活动，但更重要的是我与我的保护神，圣洁的恒河，心意相连。

original: I place the holy basil on the steps of the temple. I light the diya and I recite the mantra of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. My subjects have noticed the regularity with which I see to the rituals, but most importantly I feel reconnected with the gods.
translation: 我把神圣的罗勒放在神殿的台阶上。我点亮了油灯，背诵着[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的真言。我的人民注意到了我规律的宗教活动，但更重要的是我与诸神心意相连。

original: I beg the gods are pleased as well.
translation: 我祈愿神灵也感到愉悦。

original: My agent's regular visits to the temple has placated the commoners. I sometimes wonder what [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] thinks of me for deceiving my people this way, but my council agrees - it would do no one good if the [Root.GetTitle] fell ill.
translation: 我的替身规律地去参拜神殿，抚慰了那些平民。有时候我会怀疑当我这样欺骗人民时，[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]会怎么看待我，但我的内阁都支持我这么做——如果[Root.GetTitle]病了，对谁都没有好处。

original: Let's keep up the charade! Peasants truly are too easy to fool.
translation: 继续伪装！农民实在是太好愚弄了。

original: Depending on your skills of deception the commoners may or may not end up completely calmed.\n\n
translation: 平民能不能完全安定下来，取决于你骗术的高低。\n\n

original: I should stop this while I can.
translation: 在我还能阻止这件事的时候，我就应该行动。

original: You call of the deception.\n\n
translation: 你停止了欺骗。\n\n

original: Devoted Worshiper
translation: 献身的信徒

original: In the face of the misery tormenting our lands, the people of [Root.Capital.GetName] have found a new faith in me, their pious [Root.GetTitle]. One family has even sent their only child to be my servant, would I wish it - in their eyes they would be serving [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 面对折磨着这片土地的苦难，[Root.Capital.GetName]的民众对于我，他们虔诚的[Root.GetTitle]，有了新的信心。一个家庭献出了他们的独子作为我的仆人，只要我愿意接受——在他们眼中这就是在侍奉[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]。

original: Humble beginnings or not, the child could be a good servant.
translation: 无论出身微寒与否，这个孩子可能是一个好仆人。

original: A child named §Y[zealous_child.GetBestName]§! appears at your court.\n§Y'Civil Unrest'§! will be removed from all of your demesne\n
translation: 一个名叫§Y[zealous_child.GetBestName]§!的孩子出现在了你的宫廷\n§Yk「国内动荡」§!将从你的所有直辖领中移除\n

original: I don't worship for fame, nor will I tear a child from their family.
translation: 我不是为了名誉才崇拜神的，我也不会让一个孩子和家人骨肉分离。

original: You provide the family with a small gift, recommending they send the youngster to temple studies instead.\n§Y'Civil Unrest'§! will be removed from all of your demesne\n
translation: 你给了这个家庭一个小礼物，并建议他们让这个少年去神殿里上学。\n§Y「国内动荡」§!将从你的所有直辖领中移除\n

original: The commoners have discovered my ruse! They have murdered my double and set fire to the temple! They now think that I, as well as the gods, have abandoned them.
translation: 这些平民识破了我的诡计！他们杀害了我的替身，放火烧了神殿！他们现在认为我和众神一道抛弃了他们。

original: Filthy peasants, how dare they?!
translation: 肮脏的农民！他们也敢这样？

original:
All of your demesne gets §Y'Furious Peasants'§! for ten years, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+25.0%§!
Local Tax Modifier: §R-75.0%§!
translation:
你的所有直辖领获得了持续十年的§Y「狂怒的农民」§!，并伴随以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+25.0%§!
本地税收修正：§R-75.0%§!

original: I'll have to fire that worthless [Root.GetSpymasterName] of mine!
translation: 我要开除那个没用的[Root.GetSpymasterName]！

original: You blame it all on your [Root.GetSpymasterName]!\n\n
translation: 你觉得这都是你的[Root.GetSpymasterName]的错！\n\n

original: Deceitful Ruler
translation: 狡诈的统治者

original: Visiting Temple
translation: 参拜神殿

original: Visited Temple
translation: 已参拜神殿

original: The doubles I hired don't really look like me, but most of the peasants have never even seen my face - it's no wonder they believed that ugly impostor to be their real [Root.GetTitle].
translation: 我雇佣的替身看起来跟我并不像，但绝大多数农民都没见过我——也难怪他们会觉得那个丑陋的顶替者会是他们真正的[Root.GetTitle]。

original: I love a good ruse.
translation: 我喜欢好的计谋。

original: §Y'Civil Unrest'§! will be removed from all of your demesne\n
translation: §Y「国内动荡」§!将从你的所有直辖领中移除\n

original: I couldn't have done it without my trusted [Root.GetSpymasterName].
translation: 多亏了值得信赖的[Root.GetSpymasterName]，我才做成这件事。

original: Received Professional Praise
translation: 得到专业上的表扬

original: The speech I gave about the gods demanding everyone's labor put a decent amount of fear into the commoners - they are working around the clock, the recent epidemic fueling a race against time. However, some rebels have been sabotaging the construction, and the suspects have been brought before me.
translation: 我做了个众神要求每个人都努力劳作的演讲，在平民之中引发了相当大的恐慌——他们没日没夜的工作，最近的疫病让人人都像打了鸡血一样的跟时间赛跑。然而还是有一些叛乱分子在破坏建设工程，嫌疑人被带到了我面前。

original: Vandalizing a TEMPLE? Off with their heads!
translation: 毁坏神殿？拖出去砍头！

original:
You execute the street urchins, increasing the morale of your workers.

§Y'Civil Unrest'§! will be removed from all of your demesne
translation:
你处死了那些街头混混，鼓舞了工人的士气。

§Y「国内动荡」§!将从你的所有直辖领中移除

original: They can have shelter - in prison!
translation: 他们可以有个容身之地——在监狱里！

original: You imprison the vandals.\n\n
translation: 你监禁了这群破坏者。\n\n

original: These are the villains? But they are children!
translation: 就是这群恶棍吗？但他们还是孩子啊！

original:
You take pity on the vagrant youths. Two youngsters named §Y[vagrant_child_1.GetBestName]§! and §Y[vagrant_child_2.GetBestName]§! join your court.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Furious Peasants'§! for ten years, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+25.0%§!
Local Tax Modifier: §R-75.0%§!
translation:
你同情这些流浪的少年。两个叫做§Y[vagrant_child_1.GetBestName]§!和§Y[vagrant_child_2.GetBestName]§!的年轻人加入了你的宫廷。

你的所有直辖领获得了持续十年的§Y「狂怒的农民」§!，并伴随以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+25.0%§!
本地税收修正：§R-75.0%§!

original: The temple is finished and the people wipe the sweat from their brow. [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] will not be able to take this token of worship from me. The gods are certainly pleased.
translation: 神殿完工，人们擦去了额头上的汗水。[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]也没法将这崇拜的标志与我分离。众神肯定感到了愉悦。

original: Construction was already going on at the location I had planned to set up my temple! The builders saw easy money in my orders and "forgot" to inform me. Thankfully, my [Root.GetTreasurerName] has sorted it out. At least I get a small refund.
translation: 在我计划建神殿的地方，已经有工程开工了！这些建造工觉得从我的计划里捞钱很容易，还「忘了」告诉我。谢天谢地，我的[Root.GetTreasurerName]解决了这个问题，至少我还拿到了一点退款。

original: Some people sure work well under pressure.
translation: 有些人就是需要压力才能工作好。

original: §YFurious Peasants§! will be removed from all of your counties.\n
translation: §Y「狂怒的农民」§!将从你所有的省份移除\n

original: This is highly unfortunate!
translation: 这简直是太不幸了！

original: Your attempt to placate the peasants fail.
translation: 你安抚农民的尝试失败了。

original: [vagrant_child_1.GetBestName] has been caught sneaking into the stable. [vagrant_child_1.GetHerHisCap] sibling claims they are friends with one of the elephants there, but some ruckus upset the animal and [vagrant_child_1.GetBestName] has been injured. The workers have put down their tools, declaring the project cursed!
translation: [vagrant_child_1.GetBestName]潜入马房的时候被抓住了。[vagrant_child_1.GetHerHisCap]兄弟说他们和里面的一头大象是好朋友，但喧闹声惊吓到这些动物，使[vagrant_child_1.GetBestName]受了伤。工人们都放下了工具，说这个工程受到了诅咒！

original: That fool of a child! I should never have taken [vagrant_child_1.GetHerHim] in.
translation: 这个蠢孩子！我就不该让[vagrant_child_1.GetHerHim]进来。

original:
Your attempts to quell the peasant unrest fail.
All of your demesne gets §Y'Furious Peasants'§! for ten years, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+25.0%§!
Local Tax Modifier: §R-75.0%§!
translation:
你安抚农民骚乱的尝试失败了。
你的所有直辖领获得了持续十年的§Y「狂怒的农民」§!，并伴随以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+25.0%§!
本地税收修正：§R-75.0%§!

original: Chaos has erupted in the stable nearby the construction site and elephants are going rampage! Some workers have been killed, and the survivors refuse to go back. They are saying that the project is cursed!
translation: 工地边上的马房出现了一阵混乱，大象正在横冲直撞！有的工人死于非命，幸存者也拒绝回去工作。他们说这个工程受到了诅咒！

original: Superstitious peasants! What about my investment?
translation: 迷信的农民啊！这让我投进去的钱怎么办？

original: The White Rider
translation: 白色骑士

original: Reliable sources say there is a noble in the realm claiming to be [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] incarnate - they call [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim] "the White Rider". For months, this betrayer has been out there rallying forces to [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis] side to join some imaginary war against the whole mortal world. The rumors say [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHe]'s seven feet tall and [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis] voice can make the earth tremble beneath your feet. \n\nHowever, you know better than to trust such idle gossip. What's troubling is the amount of support garnered by this self-proclaimed prophet. Not to mention, it has been happening right under your nose - without revealing the White Rider's identity! What if this lunatic has the people on [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis] side?
translation: 可靠消息说，领地内的一名贵族声称自己是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的化身——他们叫[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim]「白色骑士」。几个月来，这名叛徒一直在外召集力量到[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis]麾下，以参加一场想象中的战争，去对抗整个凡间。有流言说[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHe]的七尺身高和[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis]声音能让大地在你的脚下颤抖。\n\n只不过，你知道最好不要相信这种无稽之谈。现在最麻烦的是这个自称的先知收割了大量支持者。更不要说，这是在你的眼皮底下发生的——而且白色骑士的真实身份还没有被揭露！如果这个疯子真的让人民到[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis]那边要怎么办？

original: Investigate! I must know who is behind it all.
translation: 给我查！我要知道幕后主使。

original: The court is all astir with ideas of a new era coming - the righteous ones will be saved through fire! With the investigation into the White Rider ongoing I can make light of the situation, or take a firm stand on the matter of this delusional zealot.
translation: 新时代即将到来的消息使宫廷沸腾了——公义的人必将在烈火中被救赎。由于正在进行对白色骑士的调查，我可以对这种事情视而不见，或者正视这个妄想的狂信者引发的问题。

original: I'll slip some horse-puns into all my speeches.
translation: 我会在所有演讲里穿插关于马的双关笑话。

original: I'll give a speech on the dangers of heresy.
translation: 我会做一个关于异端危害性的演讲。

original: I'll threaten anyone who harbors gentle feelings towards this crazed villain!
translation: 任何对这种癫狂的罪犯怀有同情的人都给我小心点！

original:
Dear, [Root.GetFirstName].
The rumors around [Root.Capital.GetName] are worrisome. Do the people really believe in the end of days? Is there a cult growing? I worry something is coming, for us all. I beg you put an end to this ruckus, sooner rather than later.

Kind regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的，[Root.GetFirstName]。
[Root.Capital.GetName]周边的谣言令人担忧。人们难道真的相信世界末日吗？一个异端教派的势力正在增强？我觉得有什么东西正冲着我们所有人来。我祈求你让这场骚乱结束吧，越早越好。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Honored [Root.GetTitledName].
The rumors from [Root.Capital.GetName] are troublesome. My couriers claim that a cult is growing - there are tales of a reckoning and the end of days? I humbly suggest you put an end to this madness, sooner rather than later.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitledName]。
来自[Root.Capital.GetName]的谣言真是麻烦。我的信使说一个异端教派正在增强——说是末日审判即将到来？我谦虚的祈求你结束这场疯狂，越早越好。

真诚的，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
The rumors from [Root.Capital.GetName] are troublesome... Is it true, has your rule spawned a cult for the end of days? I've long dreamt of your demise and I believe it is coming for you now. That it will be your own people disposing of you... That I did not foresee!

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
来自[Root.Capital.GetName]的谣言真是麻烦啊……真的是你的统治引发世界末日的异端教派吗？我一直做梦都想看到你死掉，我确信这事情是冲着你来的。你将被你自己的人民处理掉……这倒是我没提前预见到的！

真诚的，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Oh dear!
translation: 哦天哪！

original: I understand.
translation: 可以理解。

original: That jackal!
translation: 卑鄙小人！

original: The court is in a state of disarray and I hear yelling outside. "T-troops, my [Root.GetLordLady]", a servant stutters, panic in his eyes. There appears to be a large military force amassing outside our gates - their banner that of the White Rider.
translation: 宫廷一片混乱，我听到了外面的喊声。「是军……军队！我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」我的一个仆人结结巴巴的喊道，眼里满是惊恐。大门外似乎有一大群军事力量正在聚集——他们的旗帜上正是白色骑手的徽章。

original: Calm down. I shall parlay with the army leader!
translation: 冷静，我要跟这支军队的领头人谈一下。

original: You use diplomacy in an attempt to avoid bloodshed.\n
translation: 你尝试用外交手段以避免流血事件。\n

original: Words are for the weak.
translation: 弱者才会谈判。

original: You boldly ride out onto the battlefield to face the lunatic!\n
translation: 你一往无前的冲进战场，面对敌军！\n

original: Smooth Talker
translation: 巧舌如簧

original: Agent of Virtue
translation: 美德典范

original: Belligerent Ruler
translation: 好战的统治者

original: [Root.Religion.GetName] Reckoning
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName]的审判

original: The guards throw the leader to the floor before me. So this is the mad [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetManWoman] who's been agitating the realm.\n"The righteous shall be spared from the flame. If you are pure, you have nothing to fear from me!" [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHe] proclaims passionately.
translation: 卫兵们把带头人丢到了我面前的地上。就是这个疯[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetManWoman]一直在搞事。\n「公义之人必将从烈火中幸免。你要是行得正坐得直，完全不必害怕我！」[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHe]充满激情地宣讲着。

original: Enough! Let us make a deal...
translation: 够了！让我们来做个交易……

original:
You ask §Y[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName]§! to disband [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis] troops in exchange for a title.

§Y'Religious Tension'§! will be removed from all of your demesne
translation:
你要求§Y[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName]§!解散[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis]军队，以换取一个头衔。

§Y「宗教关系紧张」§!将从你的所有直辖领中移除

original: You'll clear your head in prison.
translation: 去监狱把你脑子里的水倒出来。

original:
You imprison §Y[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName]§! - that should calm [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim] down.

§Y'Religious Tension'§! will be removed from all of your demesne
translation:
你监禁了§Y[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName]§!——这应该能让[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim]冷静下来。

§Y「宗教关系紧张」§!将从你的所有直辖领中移除

original: Heretics must burn.
translation: 异端都将被烧死。

original:
You deal with §Y[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName]§! in the only way fitting [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis] kind.

All of your demesne gets §Y'Prophet Was Set To Burn'§! for one year, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+10.0%§!
translation:
你用唯一适合§Y[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName]§!的办法解决了[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis]。

你的所有直辖领获得持续一年的§Y「先知被烧死」§!，伴随以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+10.0%§!

original: the Survivor
translation: 幸存者

original: Prophet Was Set To Burn
translation: 先知被送上火刑架

original:
To the respected [Root.GetBestName],
By now, I have left my estate. You should know, I never wanted a title. However, you are not the first person to fail to see the truth. I will pray for you, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. May the heavens spare you from the fire.

Sincerely,
[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName]
translation:
致尊敬的[Root.GetBestName]，
现在，我已经离开了我的土地。你应该理解，我从来都不是为了头衔。然而，你也不是第一个看不穿这个真相的人。[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我会为你祈祷。希望上天能让你免于炼火。

真诚的，
[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName]

original: I see.
translation: 知道了。

original: They found [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim] hanging from a tree, on a hill near the capital. I'm told that the risk of [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName] becoming a martyr for [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis] cause is slim, yet I'm not at peace. I still haven't read the letter that was left for me.
translation: 他们发现[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim]吊死在都城附近山丘的树上。我早已被警告[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName]可能会成为殉道者，因为[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis]理念很浅薄，但听到这消息我还是不能淡定。我还没有读他留给我的信。

original: They found [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim] hanging from a beam in [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis] cell. My scholars tell me that the risk of [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName] becoming a martyr for [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis] cause is slim, yet I'm not at peace. I still haven't read the letter that was left for me.
