translation: 他们发现[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim]吊死在[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis]牢房的一根铁栅栏上。我的学者早已警告我[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName]可能会成为殉道者，因为[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHis]理念很浅薄，但听到这消息我还是不能淡定。我还没有读他留给我的信。

original: It's time I read the letter.
translation: 是时候看看那封信了。

original: I'll throw the letter away.
translation: 我会把信扔了。

original:
I had to test my theory! If I am right, no harm will come to me. But if you are reading this, I am in the arms of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Or maybe [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]... Then I... I am truly mad and the War of Reckoning would have killed your people. Forgive me.

Sincerely,
[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName]
translation:
我必须要测试我的理论了！如果我是对的，我将不会受到伤害。然而如果你在读这段话，说明我已经在[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的怀抱中了，当然[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]也有可能……接下来……我真的非常愤怒，审判之战将消灭你的人民。抱歉。

真诚的，
[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName]

original:
If you are reading this, I am in the arms of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Or maybe [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]... Either way, it means that I was wrong and the war of reckoning would have killed your people. Thank you for stopping me. I can't tell the voices apart anymore.

I am so sorry,
[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName]
translation:
如果你在读这段话，说明我已经在[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的怀抱中了，当然[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]也有可能……无论怎样，这证明我是错的，而审判之战可能已经屠杀了你的人民。感谢你阻止了我。我已经不能分辨那些声音了。

很抱歉。
[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName]

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: The pyre was lit, and the flame were just about to take care of [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName] when a group of hooded figures attacked, daggers glinting in the light of the fire. Their prophet of doom was cut loose, and in the chaos that errupted [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHe] slipped away! They're calling [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim] "the Survivor".
translation: 柴堆已经点燃，火焰即将烧到[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetFirstName]身上，这时一群蒙面人攻了进来，他们的匕首在火光里熠熠生辉。他们的末日先知挣脱了绳索，在混乱中[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHe]不知所踪！人们称呼[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim]为「幸存者」。

original: What in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
translation: 借[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]之名吗？

original:
To [Root.GetBestName],
I believe you acted the way expected of you. I do not blame you. But not even [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] can help you if you stray too far from the path laid out before you. Stay vigilant! And take care of your people.

Sincerely,
[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName]
translation:
致[Root.GetBestName]，
我相信你按你的预想行动了。我并不责备你。但倘若你离开在面前的正路太远，即使是[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]也帮不了你了。保持警惕！照顾好你的人民。

真诚的，
[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName]

original: I see.
translation: 我知道了。

original: All I wanted to do was to check in on my doomsday prophet prisoner, [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName], yet when I arrived the jailor scratched his head and mumbled awkwardly: "That, uh, White Rider character... Well, there's no easy way to put this. [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHeCap]'s gone."
translation: 我只是想去看看我那位被囚禁的末日先知，[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName]。我刚到，就看到狱卒挠着头，尴尬地嘟囔着：「那个，呃，白色骑士……好吧，这很难解释，但[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHeCap]已经不在了。」

original: [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHeCap]'s escaped? You incompetent fool!
translation: 让[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHeCap]给跑了？你们这群饭桶！

original: [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName] has been acclimatizing well to the life I've set up for [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim]. I'm starting to wonder whether that whole White Rider thing was just an elaborate grab for attention. [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHeCap] is actually quite pleasant to be around.
translation: [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetBestName]已经很好的适应了我给[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetHerHim]安排的新环境。我开始想这整件白色骑手的事情是否只是一场精心设计的闹剧，以吸引眼球。与[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHeCap]相处其实很愉快。

original: I'm impressed - [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHe] could be an asset.
translation: 这让我印象深刻——[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetSheHe]是个人才。

original: I'll never really trust that [EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetManWoman].
translation: 我永远都不会相信这个[EoD_doomsday_prophet.GetManWoman]。

original: Escaped Execution
translation: 逃脱处决

original: Friends in High Places
translation: 位高权重的朋友

original: I killed them all.
translation: 我杀了所有人。

original: I almost feel guilty.
translation: 我都快感到愧疚了。

original: The End Is Not Nigh
translation: 结尾比较平淡

original: Your sword raised and your spirits high, you charged the field of rebellious zealots. In the mayhem that followed [From.GetFirstName] soon locked eyes with you, a mix of defiance and excitement on [From.GetHerHis] face. The action slowly dispersed around the two of you fighting, until the outcome of the battle was clear to come down to this one duel - the White Rider, the prophet of doom, versus the [Root.GetTitledName].\n\nIn retrospect, you are saddened by the fact that there was no bard present to chronicle the magnificent victory you claimed against this foe. If nothing else, at least the war is over.
translation: 你举起了剑，斗志高昂，战场上都是狂热的叛军。受到重创后，[From.GetFirstName]把目光锁定在你身上，[From.GetHerHis]脸上浮现出轻蔑和兴奋的神色。你们两人周围的打斗在逐渐远离，直到战争的胜负将取决于你们之间的决斗——白色骑手，这位末日先知，与[Root.GetTitledName]的对决。\n\n回忆往事时，你总为当时没有吟游诗人在场感到遗憾，使得你这场伟大的胜利没有能够被记载和传诵。如果没有其他事，至少，战争结束了。

original: Imprison [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 囚禁[From.GetHerHim]！

original: The End of [From.GetFirstName]
translation: [From.GetFirstName]的终结

original: Their torches lit and swords raised, the White Rider and [From.GetHerHis] army fought with a passion reminiscent of the heroes of old. When [From.GetSheHe] finally met [From.GetHerHis] maker it was by accident - according to eye witnesses [From.GetSheHe] tripped on a fallen comrade, piercing [From.GetHerselfHimself] on a broken spear. With hands thrown out in appeal to the heavens, it is said that [From.GetHerHis] final expression was one of utter disbelief.\n\n[From.GetHerHisCap] legacy will probably not live up to [From.GetHerHis] own delusions of grandeur, but you take comfort in knowing that the War of Reckoning has ended with the demise of [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 他们点燃火把，高举长剑，白色骑士和[From.GetHerHis]军队以古代英雄再世般的热情战斗着。[From.GetSheHe]是在意外的情况下最终去见[From.GetHerHis]创造者的——根据目击证人，[From.GetSheHe]跘倒在一个陨命的同伴身上，断矛把[From.GetHerselfHimself]刺穿了。双手高举向天堂祈求，据说[From.GetHerHis]遗言是彻底的不信。\n\n[From.GetHerHisCap]遗产或许将不会发展得如[From.GetHerHis]幻想一般庞大不过你还是松了一口气，确信审判之战已随着[From.GetFirstName]的死而结束。

original: By the grace of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], peace has been restored.
translation: 由于[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的恩典，和平终于回归了。

original: Army
translation: 军队

original: [GBC_dead_one.GetTitledFirstName] died from the plague. Oh noes!
translation: [GBC_dead_one.GetTitledFirstName]死于大瘟疫。天哪！

original: A Wistful Night
translation: 一夜沉思

original: It's been a while since [GBC_dead_one.GetTitledName] left this mortal world, but not a day goes by that [GBC_dead_one.GetSheHe] does not cross your mind. It can be in the morning, when you first put your feet on the cold floor - you pause as you suddenly remember the black blisters on [GBC_dead_one.GetHerHis] skin. It can be during supper, when [GBC_dead_one.GetHerHis] favorite food is being served, but what can you do? Should you demand the next child at court be named after [GBC_dead_one.GetHerHim]? \n\nYou shake your head. Most often the doubts come in the night. When the stars are out, the world is quiet and you are alone with your thoughts. Such a horrible fate [GBC_dead_one.GetSheHe] suffered, in the end. Was it truly the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
translation: [GBC_dead_one.GetTitledName]离开凡间已经有一阵了，然而你没有一天不在想念着[GBC_dead_one.GetSheHe]。有可能是在早上，当你的双脚碰到冰冷的地面时，你会恍惚记起[GBC_dead_one.GetHerHis]皮肤上的黑色水泡。有可能是在晚餐中，当[GBC_dead_one.GetHerHis]最爱的菜肴被端上来时，但是你能怎么办？你应该把宫廷里下一个出生的婴儿取名为[GBC_dead_one.GetHerHim]的名字吗？\n\n你摇了摇头。通常，这些念头出现在夜里。当星空暗淡，万籁俱寂，只有你在思绪陪伴着你。最终，[GBC_dead_one.GetSheHe]的命运还是那么悲惨。这真的是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的旨意吗？

original: I can't believe [GBC_dead_one.GetSheHe]'s not with us anymore.
translation: 我不敢相信[GBC_dead_one.GetSheHe]已经离开了我们。

original: I've been thinking a lot on [GBC_dead_one.GetTitledName] and what happens when we die. My [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] has advised me to look inwards and let the wisdom of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] comfort me. Yet when I'm alone in the dark any divine presence fails me.
translation: 我一直在想关于[GBC_dead_one.GetTitledName]的事情，以及我们死后会发生什么。我的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]建议我探求自己的内心，让[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的智慧来安抚我。然而我在夜里孤身一人时，并没有神迹显现。

original: I've been thinking a lot on [GBC_dead_one.GetTitledName] and what happens when we die. I've tried looking inwards and let the wisdom of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] comfort me, yet when I'm alone in the dark any divine presence fails me.
translation: 我一直在想关于[GBC_dead_one.GetTitledName]的事情，以及我们死后会发生什么。我尝试探求自己的内心，让[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的智慧来安抚我。然而我在夜里孤身一人时，并没有神迹显现。

original: I should talk to someone about this.
translation: 我应该找人谈谈这件事。

original: No one understands me.
translation: 不会有人理解我的。

original: [GBC_new_friend.GetTitledFirstName] approached me today. Apparently [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] has noticed the regularity with which I've been visiting the grave of [GBC_dead_one.GetTitledName], but [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] hasn't wanted to disturb me... "Surely a [Root.GetTitle] doesn't need to talk about [Root.GetHerHis] grief" [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] said, smiling awkwardly.
translation: [GBC_new_friend.GetTitledFirstName]今天接近了我。显然[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]注意到了我频繁的来[GBC_dead_one.GetTitledName]的墓前祭奠，而[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]不想打扰我……「显然一位[Root.GetTitle]不需要谈论[Root.GetHerHis]悲伤。」，[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]尴尬地笑笑。

original: I'm more human than they know.
translation: 我比他们以为的更接近常人。

original: I don't need to talk about it. I'm fine! Seriously.
translation: 我不需要跟人说这个。我很好！真的。

original: [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName] tells me that our [GBC_dead_one.GetTitledName] had a way with birds. I had no idea! Noticing my astonished expression, [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName] has now introduced me to Hedwig, an adorable little owl. Apparently it used to belong to [GBC_dead_one.GetFirstName]. "I think she likes you" [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] says, stroking its head.
translation: [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]告诉我，我们的[GBC_dead_one.GetTitledName]擅长接近飞鸟。我完全不知道！看到我惊讶的表情，[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]把海德薇，一只可爱的小猫头鹰带给了我。显然这之前是属于[GBC_dead_one.GetFirstName]的。「我觉得她喜欢你呢。」[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]抚摸着她的头说。

original: That's the cutest thing I've seen since my servant's cat had triplets!
translation: 自从我仆人的猫生了三胞胎以来，这是我见过最可爱的东西了！

original: I shouldn't. I can barely take care of myself.
translation: 我不应该要。我都没法照顾好我自己。

original: Pet Owl
translation: 宠物猫头鹰

original: My councillor [GBC_nice_councillor.GetFirstName] raised an eyebrow at me during a meeting today. "I've noticed your kins[GBC_new_friend.GetManWoman] [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName] has been visiting you more often, my [Root.GetLordLady]. I wasn't aware you two were close?"
translation: 我的内阁成员[GBC_nice_councillor.GetFirstName]在今天的会议上失望而惊讶地看着我。「我注意到你的亲戚[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]最近经常来拜访你，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。而我之前没注意到你们两位很亲近？」

original: I suppose grief has brought us together.
translation: 我想是悲痛让我们关系更近。

original: I don't know what you're talking about.
translation: 我搞不懂你要说什么。

original: Alone in my chambers, having just fed my beloved bird, [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName] bursts into the room, promptly marching over to Hedwig. "I've changed my mind!" [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] says belligerently, grabbing the cage.
translation: 我一个人呆在房间里，刚刚喂完我可爱的小鸟，[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]闯了进来，快速的向海德薇走去。「我改主意了！」[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]紧抓着笼子，言语忿忿。

original: Wait, what? [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName], what's the matter?
translation: 等等，啥？[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]，怎么回事？

original: NO! You can't take her! I won't let you!
translation: 不！你不能带走她！我不允许！

original: Take it. I was growing it tired of it anyway.
translation: 带走吧，我已经厌倦了它。

original: [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName] pauses and hides [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] face in [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] hands. "I'm sorry, [Root.GetFirstName]. I don't know what I'm doing." When [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] finally meets my eyes, tears stain [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] cheeks. "I think I'm dying. You're going to lose me, like we lost [GBC_dead_one.GetFirstName]."
translation: [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]停下动作，将[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]脸埋在[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]手里。「我很抱歉，[Root.GetFirstName]。我不知道我在做什么。」当[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]终于和我的视线交汇，[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]脸上已满是泪水。「我想我要死了。你将会失去我，就像我们失去[GBC_dead_one.GetFirstName]一样。」

original: My friend, I've seen the plague before. I don't think this is it.
translation: 我的朋友，我之前见过大瘟疫。我不觉得你这是瘟疫。

original: Compose yourself, [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]!
translation: [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]，你得保持镇定！

original: [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName] drops to [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] knees and starts to loudly sob, face in [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] hands. "Oh, [Root.GetFirstName], I shouldn't burden you with this. Nay, I should not even be here!" Hedwig tilts her head at you as [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName] runs away, leaving you alone with the puzzled bird.
translation: [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]突然好似失去了力气，[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]双膝跪地，开始放声大哭，把脸埋在[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]手里。「噢，[Root.GetFirstName]，我不应该让你承担这件事。不对，我都不应该出现在这里。」海德薇将她的头侧过来看着你，因为[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]突然跑走，留下你一个人陪着一头雾水的鸟儿。

original: [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHeCap] can talk to me when [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]'s ready.
translation: [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHeCap]随时可以跟我谈，只要[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]准备好了。

original: I should demand to know what is up with [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我应该去问清楚[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]到底发生了什么！

original: [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName] throws a fist into the wall and curses under [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] breath before turning to you. "You don't understand, do you, my [Root.GetLordLady]?! Everyone will disappear! You and me. Even this stupid bird!" [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] yells. The owl glances at you, indifference in her eyes.
translation: [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]用拳头使劲砸了一下墙，在[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]粗重的呼吸声下诅咒着，这才转过身来面对你。「你不明白，对吧，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？！所有人都会消失！你和我。甚至这只笨鸟！」[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]咆哮道。猫头鹰瞄了你们一眼，双眼里只有冷漠。

original: You should leave, now.
translation: 你现在就该离开了。

original: §Y[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]§! storms off, slamming the door behind [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHim].\n
translation: §Y[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]§!冲了出去，门重重地在[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHim]身后关上。\n

original: When [GBC_new_friend.GetTitledFirstName] invited me hunting, I was thrilled! [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHeCap] seemed a little nervous to make eye contact with me at first, but we quickly fell into our old banter. I was also introduced to [Root.GetFirstName], [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]'s new falcon! If that [GBC_new_friend.GetManWoman] is ill [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]'s hiding it well.
translation: 当[GBC_new_friend.GetTitledFirstName]邀请我去狩猎，我非常激动！刚开始，[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHeCap]似乎在与你眼神接触时有点紧张，但很快你们就找回互相打趣的感觉。我因此也认识了[Root.GetFirstName]，[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]的新猎鹰！如果这个[GBC_new_friend.GetManWoman]真的在生病[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]一定藏得很好。

original: When [GBC_new_friend.GetTitledFirstName] invited me hunting, I hesitated. I guess I've sort of been avoiding [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHim] since our last conversation, but my heart said it's time I forgive [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] break-down. While it was fun and [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] showed me [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] new falcon, I wish [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]'d talk to me about what is tormenting [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHim].
translation: 当[GBC_new_friend.GetTitledFirstName]邀请我去狩猎，我犹豫了。我猜我有点躲着[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHim]，自从我们上次谈话不欢而散，但我的内心告诉我是时候原谅[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]崩溃。虽然确实很欢乐，而且[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]向我展示[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]新猎鹰，我还是希望[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]可以和我谈谈是什么东西在折磨[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHim]。

original: Even the sun has its ups and downs.
translation: 就连太阳也有起落。

original: The future may be uncertain, but at least you are by [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] side again.
translation: 未来也许充满变数，但至少在你身边又有[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]陪伴。

original: I thought friends talked about everything.
translation: 我曾以为朋友之间无话不谈。

original: You look forward to the two of you getting past this, even though the future seems uncertain right now.
translation: 你期望你们两人能越过此事，即使现在看来未来仍充满变数。

original: The Small Things We Don't Say
translation: 这件小事我们不会说出来

original: The idea that [GBC_new_friend.GetTitledName] would be taken from this world has had an effect on your posture. When [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] joins you for breakfast one morning, a spring in [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] step and a wide smile on [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] face, you unconsciously straighten your back. The usually pale countenance of your friend has even made your own appetite vanish on occasion. Yet there is something different about [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHim] now... \n\n"The physician tells me it was just a fever!" [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] says jubilantly, joining you at your table. "Oh, come on, [Root.GetFirstName]. You didn't think I'd abandon you, did you? Who'd look after the country? Alright, alright, but who would've looked after you?"
translation: 想到[GBC_new_friend.GetTitledName]将不久于人世让你浑身不对劲。当[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]一天早上与你共进早餐，[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]脚步轻快，而大大的笑容出现在[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]脸上，你无意识地挺直了脊背。通常你朋友的苍白面容优势甚至让你的好胃口也会消失。可现在[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHim]有什么不一样了……\n\n「医师说我只是感冒而已！」[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]喜气洋洋地说道，加入你的餐桌。「喔，算了吧，[Root.GetFirstName]。你真的以为我会抛弃你，不是吧？谁来照顾这个国家啊？好吧，好吧，但是谁来照顾你呢？」

original:
The two of you haven't spent that much time together recently, so you are a little surprised when [GBC_new_friend.GetTitledName] joins you for breakfast one morning. The expression on [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] face is a mixture of joy and embarrassment and [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] eats [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] food slowly, almost hesitantly, as if [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] is about to say something but is having trouble phrasing [GBC_new_friend.GetHerselfHimself]. 

"I thought I was dying" [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] says finally, making your hand and drink stop mid-air.
"Dying?" you repeat. 
"Nonsense, of course, it was simply a fever" [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] continues, flushing a little. "I'm sorry if I worried you."
translation:
你们两个近来很少一起消磨时间了，所以一天早上你有一点惊讶地看到[GBC_new_friend.GetTitledName]与你共进早餐。[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]脸上的表情是一种快乐和尴尬的混合，[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]慢慢地吃着[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]食物，慢到犹豫不决，似乎[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]正要说一些事情但是没办法组织[GBC_new_friend.GetHerselfHimself]的语言。

「我曾经以为我快死了」[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]终于开口，让你的手和饮料停在半空。
「快死了？」你重复了一遍。
「当然是无稽之谈，只是一次感冒而已。」[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]继续说道，有一点点脸红。「如果让你担心了，我很抱歉。」

original: Oh, please. I was never worried!
translation: 啊算了吧，我从来没有担心过！

original: Oh, dear [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]. I'm glad you're well.
translation: 噢，亲爱的[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]。我真高兴你没事。

original: All is well.
translation: 一切都好。

original: The Rarity of Friendship
translation: 友谊的珍贵

original: For fear of contagion the physician wouldn't let you see [GBC_new_friend.GetTitledName] as [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] lay on [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] deathbed. Maybe it doesn't matter. Even though [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName] must have known that [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] was on your mind, you ordered every choir in [Root.Capital.GetName] to take up residence in the main hall for an indefinite period of time - they were to perform [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]'s favorite hymns until [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] had safely passed over to the next world, knowing that [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] was loved in this one.
translation: 因为担心传染，医师不让你见[GBC_new_friend.GetTitledName]，而[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]正躺在[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]床上，生命垂危。也许这也无所谓。即使[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]必定已经知道[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]在你心里的地位，你命令[Root.Capital.GetName]里的所有乐队在城堡大厅里无限期住下——他们将演奏[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]最喜欢的旋律直到[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]去到下一个世界为止，这个过程中[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]会知道自己是被爱着的。

original: [GBC_new_friend.GetTitledName] did not ask for you as [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] lay on [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] deathbed. Maybe it doesn't matter. [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHeCap] probably knew you had important matters to see to, places and meetings to attend. Yet the work in [Root.Location.GetName] could have waited, couldn't it? After all, you were kin and [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] should have had somebody by [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] side as she ascended into the realm of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].\n\nThe physician says [GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe] went quietly, in [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] sleep, [GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis] last words uttered simply being: "I'm tired. Let me rest."
translation: [GBC_new_friend.GetTitledName]在[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]躺在床上[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]生命垂危的时刻，并没有向你要求任何事情。也许这不重要了。[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHeCap]可能知道你有重要的事情要去亲自处理，要前去重要的地方或是会议。但是[Root.Location.GetName]的工作可以等，不是吗？不论如何，你们是亲人，[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]在升向[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的领域的时刻，应该要有人守在[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]身侧。\n\n医师说[GBC_new_friend.GetSheHe]走得很安详，就在[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]睡梦中，[GBC_new_friend.GetHerHis]遗言仅仅只是：「我很累了，让我休息吧。」

original: May we meet again, [GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName].
translation: 希望我们能再见面，[GBC_new_friend.GetFirstName]。

original: At least you have Hedwig.\n
translation: 至少你有海德薇。\n

original: My magnificent pet owl has finally taken her last breath. Although I have been her guardian for a long time, now when it is time to send her off, I realize that perhaps she has also been watching over me?
translation: 我高贵的宠物猫头鹰最终咽下了她最后一口气。尽管我曾照顾她那么久，现在也是时候放飞她的灵魂。我意识到，或许她过去也是在照顾我？

original: My owl won't wake up. They tell me she has moved on to the next world, but why would she not tell me?
translation: 我的猫头鹰不会再醒来了。他们告诉我她动身前往下一个世界，但为什么她不自己告诉我？

original: I shall light a pyre in her name.
translation: 我要为她举行火葬。

original: You perform a ceremony more official than most would expect for a pet.\n
translation: 你举行了极其正式的仪式，全世界都想不到这是为了一只宠物。\n

original: She was family, and shall be buried next to my ancestors.
translation: 她是我的家人，应当与我的先祖同葬一地。

original: Your pet shall have her name engraved on a rock, for generations to remember.\n
translation: 你宠物的名字将篆刻在石头上，供百代铭记。\n

original: It's no problem, I've already absorbed her soul. Hooo HOOOOO!
translation: 没关系，我已经吸收了她的灵魂。咕咕，咕咕！

original: You seek out the highest balcony in the [Root.Location.GetName] for a midnight flight.\n§Y20%§! chance of: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! dies!\n
translation: 你找到了[Root.Location.GetName]里最高的阳台，准备来一次午夜飞行。\n§Y20%§! 的几率：§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!死亡！\n

original: Birds are mean.
translation: 鸟儿真坏。

original: You wish you had a dog.\n
translation: 你希望养一只狗。\n

original: A servant gasps as I throw myself from the balcony. Wind in my hair, I soar through the air and it feels like it goes on forever. The landing I make is soft - I'm surrounded by hay! A pigeon looks at me skeptically.
translation: 看见我从阳台上摔出去，仆人倒吸一口凉气。风吹过我的头发，我急速穿过空气，感觉这段时间如同永恒。我降落得非常柔和——落进了稻草堆里！一只鸽子怀疑地看着我。

original: A servant gasps as I step off from the balcony. He does not know I can fly! The air caresses my cheek as I am carried forward by the wind, with incredible speed!
translation: 看见我从阳台一步踏进空无，仆人倒吸一口凉气。他不知道我会飞！空气轻抚我的脸颊，同时以惊人的速度将我带向远方。

original: This can't have been the highest tower in [Root.Location.GetName].
translation: 这不可能是[Root.Location.GetName]里最高的塔。

original: Barely spraining an ankle, you survived!\n
translation: 仅仅扭伤了脚踝，你活下来了！\n

original: I always knew I could fl-
translation: 我一直知道自己会ㄟ

original: You fall to your death.\n
translation: 你坠向死亡。\n

original: My magnificent cat curled up in its favorite spot by the window last night. I think now that maybe it knew it did not have long left in this world. At least it went peacefully.\n
translation: 我高贵的爱猫昨夜蜷缩在窗边它最喜欢的位置。现在想来可能它知道自己将不久于世了。至少它走得很平静。\n

original: They tell me my cat left to visit one of my distant aunts. Apparently, this aunt has a nice house in the country and my cat will be very happy there, roaming the wilderness, playing with a bunch of other cats.
translation: 他们告诉我，猫咪动身去拜访我一位远方的阿姨。很明显，这位阿姨在乡下有一件美丽的大屋，我的猫在那里会很快乐，漫步于乡野，与一群其他猫咪嬉戏。

original: The funeral shall be set in the garden, where it loved to play.
translation: 葬礼要在花园举行，它最喜欢在那玩耍。

original: Whenever you stroll by the rose bushes, you shall remember your cat.\n
translation: 每次你散步到那片玫瑰丛，你都将记起你的爱猫。\n

original: I shall invite the whole court to celebrate the adventurous life of my cat.
translation: 我要邀请整个宫廷去庆祝我爱猫那敢于冒险的一生。

original: Your cat would be honored.\n
translation: 你的猫将受尊崇。\n

original: That cat was possessed, always giving me the stink-eye!
translation: 那只猫被附身了，总是用鄙视的眼神看我！

original: You order the remains of the cat to be burned at the stake!\n
translation: 你下令将猫的遗骸挂在木桩上焚烧！\n

original: I'm glad it's in a better place!
translation: 我很高兴它在一个更好的地方！

original: You never see your cat again.\n
translation: 你再也没有见到你的猫。\n

original: The guard nods hesitantly and somewhat sullenly walks away. "Don't argue!" I yell after him, as he disappears down the corridor.\nNow that I think about it, I never smelled any smoke, and later I find a small grave behind the stables!
translation: 守卫迟疑着点头，有点不高兴地离开了。「不准反驳！」我对他的背影大喊，而他消失在走廊尽头。\n现在想来，我从没有闻到烟味，接着我在马厩后面发现了一个小墓！

original: They wouldn't... We all know you can't simply bury cursed creatures.
translation: 他们该不会……我们都知道不能就这么简单地埋掉受诅咒的生物。

original: How odd!
translation: 胆子真大！

original: This bird possesses a natural grace, inspiring good intention and curiosity in anyone who lay eyes on it.
translation: 此鸟拥有大自然的优雅，以善意和好奇启迪所有看见它的人。

original: Set Crown Focus
translation: 设定统治重心

original: Set [Root.Location.GetName] as your Crown Focus. [Root.Location.GetName] will be more likely to Prosper, and may receive special events. Only one County may be Crown Focus at a time.
translation: 设定[Root.Location.GetName]为你的统治重心。[Root.Location.GetName]将会更可能变繁荣，或收到特殊事件。同时只能有一个省份被设为统治重心。

original: of poor physique
translation: 体质虚弱

original: VSync
translation: 垂直同步

original: Adds $VAL|Y0$ holding slots to $NAME|Y$
translation: 增加 $VAL|Y0$ 地产空格给$NAME|Y$

original: Forces a truce between $CHAR|Y$ and $TARGET|Y$ until $DATE|Y$.
translation: 在$CHAR|Y$和$TARGET|Y$之间执行停战协定直到 $DATE|Y$。

original: CK2 Game Book
translation: 《王国风云 II》游戏书

original: Purchase the Game Book for unique content
translation: 购买游戏书可获得独特内容

original: $KEY|Y$\n
translation: $KEY|Y$\n

original: Ruled too long: $VAL|=+0$
translation: 统治过久：$VAL|=+0$

original: Ascending to the throne at age [GetAgeYears] is
translation: 登基于[GetAgeYears]岁时

original: Ascending to the throne at age [GetAgeYears] is
translation: 登基于[GetAgeYears]岁时

original: $HEIR_TITLE$ $HEIR_NAME$ - $HEIR_TRAIT_DESC$. Long live $NEW_TITLE$ $NEW_NAME$!
translation: $HEIR_TITLE$$HEIR_NAME$——$HEIR_TRAIT_DESC$。$NEW_TITLE$$NEW_NAME$万岁！

original: $DEAD_TITLE$ $DEAD_NAME$ $DEAD_RAND_FLAVOR_DESC$ at age [GetAgeYears]. [GetSubjectPronounCap] [GetDeathReason]. $DEATH_TRAIT_DESC$.
translation: $DEAD_TITLE$$DEAD_NAME$$DEAD_RAND_FLAVOR_DESC$，时年[GetAgeYears]岁。[GetSubjectPronounCap][GetDeathReason]。$DEATH_TRAIT_DESC$。

original: While I'm busy fighting, I notice in the corner my eye, a giant man heading straight for me, a huge ax swinging wildly in my direction. Panic begins to rise in my chest when a moment later the giant staggers and falls, hit square in the jaw by the shield of my Shieldmaiden [From.GetFirstName]! What a throw!
translation: 正当我忙于战斗，我眼角注意到一个高大的男人直直向我冲来，朝我挥舞着一把巨大的斧子。巨人突然停止并倒下，他的下巴被飞来的盾牌正正击中，是我的盾女[From.GetFirstName]！此时我的恐慌才从胸腔升起。真是漂亮的投掷！

original: In the midst of the battle I see a giant man heading straight for me, a huge ax swinging wildly in my direction. A moment later the giant staggers and falls, a spear jutting out of his right eye. Rising behind him is my Shieldmaiden [From.GetTitledFirstName], calm triumph in her eyes.
translation: 正当我忙于战斗，我眼角注意到一个高大的男人直直向我冲来，朝我挥舞着一把巨大的斧子。下一刻巨人突然停止并倒下，一个矛头从他的眼中穿出。在他背后出现的是我的盾女[From.GetTitledFirstName]，眼神中是平静的胜利。

original: That was a close one!
translation: 好险啊！

original: What would I do without [From.GetFirstName]?
translation: 如果我没了[From.GetFirstName]会怎样？

original: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! had your back!\n
translation: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!保护了你背后！\n

original: Fighting alongside my Shieldmaiden [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName] is exhilarating. We move together like two arms of one being, an unstoppabl-\nThe roar of pain from behind startles me, and I spin around to see [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName] clutching her side. "My [Root.GetLordLady]... I'm sorry," she says.
translation: 与我的盾女[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]并肩作战非常兴奋且开心。我们共同行动，像同一个人的左右手，一个不可能被停—\n后方痛苦的怒吼让我猛地一颤，我快速回身，看到[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]紧抓着她的身侧。「我的[Root.GetLordLady]……我很抱歉，」她说。

original: NO! You're my right hand! Get up!
translation: 不！你是我的左膀右臂！起来！

original: §Y[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]§! is injured in battle.\n
translation: §Y[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]§!在战斗中负伤。\n

original: Fighting alongside my [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName] is exhilarating. We move together like two arms of one being, an unstoppabl-\nThe sharp pain startles me, and I stagger to my knees. [shieldmaiden_liege.GetFirstName] charges my attacker, almost deliriously, while I feel the world go dark. "My [From.GetLordLady]... I'm sorry," I manage to utter.
translation: 与我的[shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName]并肩作战非常兴奋且开心。我们共同行动，像同一个人的左右手，一个不可能被停—\n剧烈的痛苦让我猛地一颤，我不得不双膝跪地。[shieldmaiden_liege.GetFirstName]冲向攻击我的人，愤怒得几乎神志不清了。「我的[From.GetLordLady]……我很抱歉，」我只成功吐出这几个字。

original: This is... not good...
translation: 这真的……不好……

original: While probably saving the life of your liege, you are severely injured in battle.\n
translation: 或许拯救了你领主的性命，但你也在战斗中严重受伤。\n

original: It's with a heavy heart that I visit my Shieldmaiden [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]. It's been some time since her injury, but the incident has left her maimed and she hasn't shown herself around court lately. I find her in her chambers, staring out the window. "Don't trouble yourself, [Root.GetMasterMistress]," she says. "I did my duty. It's what we do."
translation: 怀着一颗沉重的心我拜访了我的盾女[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]。自她受伤已过了一段日子，但还是造成她残疾，而她最近也没出现在宫廷。我在她卧室找到了她，正盯着窗外发呆。「不用麻烦你了，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」她说。「我是在执行我的职责。这是我们盾女的工作。」

original: Concerned about her absence in the training grounds recently, I visit my Shieldmaiden [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]. The enemy claimed her right eye, but I didn't expect it to get to her... I find her in her chambers, her face turned from me. "Don't trouble yourself, [Root.GetMasterMistress]," she says. "I did my duty. It's what we do."
translation: 担心她最近总是缺席训练场，我去拜访我的盾女[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]。敌人带走了她的右眼，而我在她的卧室找到她，她立刻别过脸不看我。「不用麻烦你了，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」她说。「我是在执行我的职责。这是我们盾女的工作。」

original: After her injury, I made certain that my Shieldmaiden [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName] was fitted with a wooden leg of the finest quality, yet I haven't seen her around much lately. After deciding to pay her a visit, I find her sitting idly by her window. "Don't trouble yourself, [Root.GetMasterMistress]," she says. "I did my duty. It's what we do."
translation: 自她受伤之后，我确保我的盾女[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]配的木头假腿有最好的品质，但我最近还是很少见到她。下定决心去看望她，却发现她懒散地坐在窗边。「不用麻烦你了，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」她说。「我是在执行我的职责。这是我们盾女的工作。」

original: After the battle, they had to amputate my Shieldmaiden's hand. Although a tough blow to any warrior, I didn't expect it to get to her. During my visit, she sits idly by her window. "Don't trouble yourself, [Root.GetMasterMistress]," she says. "I did my duty. It's what we do."
translation: 那场战役之后，他们必须给我的盾女的手截肢。尽管这对于任何战士都是重大的打击，我当时并没料到这能影响到她。在我看望她期间，她懒散地坐在窗边。「不用麻烦你了，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」她说。「我是在执行我的职责。这是我们盾女的工作。」

original: After the battle, the full extent of her injuries became apparent - a blow to the head left the face of the fierce Shieldmaiden a mess. In spite of wearing a mask to cover her misfortune, [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName] has grown more reclusive. I find her one day, sitting alone in a window. "Don't worry, [Root.GetMasterMistress]," she says. "I did my duty. It's what we do."
translation: 那场战役之后，她所受伤害的完全影响变得明朗了——对准头部的重击让这位凶狠盾女的脸部变成一团糟。即使穿戴了面具遮住她的不幸，[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]还是越来越离群索居。一天我找到她独自一人坐在窗边。「不用担心，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」她说。「我是在执行我的职责。这是我们盾女的工作。」

original: It's with a heavy heart that I visit my Shieldmaiden [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]. It's been some time since her injury, but the incident has left her maimed and she hasn't shown herself around court lately. I find her in her chambers, staring out the window. "Don't trouble yourself, [Root.GetMasterMistress]," she says. "I did my duty. It's what we do."
translation: 怀着一颗沉重的心我拜访了我的盾女[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]。自她受伤已过了一段日子，但这还是造成她残疾，而她最近也没出现在宫廷。我在她卧室找到了她，正盯着窗外发呆。「不用麻烦你了，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」她说。「我是在执行我的职责。这是我们盾女的工作。」

original: It's with a heavy heart that I visit my Shieldmaiden [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]. It's been some time since her injury, but the incident has changed her and she appears to have almost removed herself from court. I finally find her in her chambers, staring out the window. "Don't trouble yourself, [Root.GetMasterMistress]," she says. "I did my duty. It's what we do."
translation: 怀着一颗沉重的心我拜访了我的盾女[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]。自她受伤已过了一段日子，但这还是改变了她，并且她好似完全退出了宫廷。我终于在她卧室找到了她，正盯着窗外发呆。「不用麻烦你了，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」她说。「我是在执行我的职责。这是我们盾女的工作。」

original: I can't stand to see you like this! Let my physician see you, please?
translation: 我不能就这么看着你这样！让我的医师看看你，可以吗？

original: You have your physician take a look at §Y[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你让你的医师诊治§Y[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]§!。\n

original: You're truly exceptional. Will you let me visit you more often?
translation: 你真是优秀的盾女。能允许我经常拜访你吗？

original: You offer to stand by §Y[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]'s§! side, at least for the duration of her recovery.\n
translation: 你主动陪伴在§Y[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]的§!身边，至少在她康复的这段期间里。\n

original: Nevertheless, the bards shall compose songs in your name!
translation: 尽管你受伤了，吟游诗人将编排诗歌传送你的美名！

original: You give a small speech to your Shieldmaiden §Y[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]§!, about how she saved your life that ill-fated day.\n
translation: 你对你的盾女§Y[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]§!做了一次小演讲，谈及她如何拯救你的性命并框扶黑暗的时日。\n

original: Lucky To Be Alive
translation: 幸存

original: This person had a brush with death and is grateful to still be around.
translation: 此人与死亡擦肩而过，并对自己仍活在世上心存感激。

original: the Shieldmaiden
translation: 盾女

original: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName] came to see me today. [shieldmaiden_liege.GetSheHeCap] had [shieldmaiden_liege.GetHerHis] physician take a look at me, but after I laid out the details of the story the physician boggled at me: "That's quite the battle!" I suppose I am lucky to be alive?
translation: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName]今天前来看望我。[shieldmaiden_liege.GetSheHeCap]让[shieldmaiden_liege.GetHerHis]医师给我诊治，但我说完故事的细节之后，医师震惊得语无伦次：「这真是一场伟大的战役！」我猜我活下来就已经很幸运了？

original: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName] came to see me today, to check up on my injuries. [shieldmaiden_liege.GetSheHeCap] seems intent on visiting me again. I can't help but wonder whether it's [shieldmaiden_liege.GetHerHis] conscience making [shieldmaiden_liege.GetHerHim] approach me? There's really no need - all I did was my duty.
translation: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName]今天来看望我，检查我的伤口。[shieldmaiden_liege.GetSheHeCap]似乎有意再来拜访我。我无法不猜测是不是[shieldmaiden_liege.GetHerHis]内疚之情让[shieldmaiden_liege.GetHerHim]来看望我的？这真是没有必要——一切都只是执行我的职责。

original: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName] came to see me today, to check up on my injuries. [shieldmaiden_liege.GetSheHeCap] then proceeded to tell me a great many things about how fortunate [shieldmaiden_liege.GetSheHe] is to have me in [shieldmaiden_liege.GetHerHis] service. All in all, I admit I almost blushed at some of the compliments.
translation: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName]今天来看望我，检查我的伤口。[shieldmaiden_liege.GetSheHeCap]接着继续告诉我许多许多事情，关于[shieldmaiden_liege.GetSheHe]有多幸运，能让我为[shieldmaiden_liege.GetHerHis]领地服务。到最后，我承认我对于某些赞扬有些脸红。

original: Today was a good day.
translation: 今天是个好日子。

original: Loyal Shieldmaiden
translation: 忠诚的盾女

original: [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName] and I are in the garden, when the Shieldmaiden draws her dagger. "What?" I whisper, but she motions me to silence. Then I hear it: an unusual rustling in the bushes. I'm shocked! An ambush? In broad daylight? Relief washes over me as a small kitten suddenly jumps out in front of us, purring playfully.
translation: [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]和我在花园里，盾女突然抽出她的匕首。「怎么了？」我悄声道，但她打手势让我安静。接着我才听到：树丛中传来一阵不正常的摩擦声。我震惊了！是伏击吗？在光天化日之下？我终于松了一口气，见到一只小奶猫突然从我们面前窜出，活泼地发出喵叫。

original: My dear [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName] and I are in the garden, when we hear an unusual rustling in the bushes. My Shieldmaiden draws her dagger immediately, her keen senses alert. My heart is pounding. An ambush? In broad daylight? Relief washes over me as a small kitten suddenly jumps out in front of us, purring playfully.
translation: 我亲爱的[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]和我在花园里，我们听到树丛里传来一阵不正常的摩擦声。我的盾女立刻抽出她的匕首，她敏锐的感官发出警报。我的心脏怦怦狂跳。是伏击吗？在光天化日之下？我终于松了一口气，见到一只小奶猫突然从我们面前窜出，活泼地发出喵叫。

original: The vigilant [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName] and I are in the garden, when we hear an unusual rustling in the bushes. The Shieldmaiden draws her dagger and motions me to silence. I hold my breath, my heart pounding. An ambush? In broad daylight? Relief washes over me as a small kitten suddenly jumps out in front of us, purring playfully.
translation: 警觉的[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]和我在花园里，我们听到树丛里传来一阵不正常的摩擦声。盾女抽出她的匕首并作势让我安静。我屏住呼吸，心脏狂跳。是伏击吗？在光天化日之下？我终于松了一口气，见到一只小奶猫突然从我们面前窜出，活泼地发出喵叫。

original: Gave Me A Pet
translation: 送我一只宠物

original: Aaw, I shall name her [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]!
translation: 啊噢，我要命名她为[my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]！

original: It's love at first sight and you bring the kitten home.\n
translation: 第一眼你就爱上了这只小猫并带回了家。\n

original: [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName], I think it likes you!
translation: [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]，我想她喜欢你！

original: You urge your Shieldmaiden to care for the cat.\n
translation: 你要求你的盾女照料这只猫。\n

original: Oh, I know somebody who'd love to care for this creature.
translation: 噢，我认识有人会很乐意照料这个小生命。

original: You take the kitten home, making your child very happy.\n
translation: 你带回家这只小猫，让你的孩子非常开心。\n

original: An animal! How quaint.
translation: 一只动物！真少见。

original: You both laugh, before returning to your conversation about the differences between a javelin and the common spear.\n
translation: 你们都笑了起来，谈话又回到了标枪与普通长矛之间的区别上。\n

original: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName] and I were having a conversation in the gardens today, when we were startled by a little cat making a surprising amount of noise from the bushes. After drawing my weapon, ready to defend my liege, [shieldmaiden_liege.GetFirstName] decided to bring the cat home with [shieldmaiden_liege.GetHerHim]. It was touching.
translation: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName]和我今天在花园里正在谈话，我们被一只小猫从树丛里发出的惊人的大噪声打断了。我甚至都抽出了我的武器，准备保卫我的领主，[shieldmaiden_liege.GetFirstName]决定将这只猫带回家陪伴[shieldmaiden_liege.GetHerHim]。真感动。

original: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName] and I were having a conversation in the gardens today, when we were startled by a little cat making a surprising amount of noise from the bushes. After drawing my weapon, ready to defend my liege, [shieldmaiden_liege.GetFirstName] convinced me to take the cat home with me!
translation: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName]和我今天在花园里正在谈话，我们被一只小猫从树丛里发出的惊人的大噪声打断了。我甚至都抽出了我的武器，准备保卫我的领主，[shieldmaiden_liege.GetFirstName]说服我将这只猫回家陪伴我！

original: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName] and I were having a conversation in the gardens today, when we were startled by an unusual rustling from the bushes. After drawing my weapon, ready to defend my liege, a small cat jumped out in front of us. We had a good laugh about it.
translation: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetTitledFirstName]和我今天在花园里正在谈话，我们被一只小猫从树丛里发出的惊人的大噪声打断了。我甚至都抽出了我的武器，准备保卫我的领主，一只小猫跳到我们的面前。我们大笑了好一阵子。

original: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetSheHe] named the cat after me!
translation: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetSheHe]用我的名字命名这只猫！

original: I could name the creature after [shieldmaiden_liege.GetFirstName]?
translation: 我可以用[shieldmaiden_liege.GetFirstName]命名这只猫吗？

original: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetFirstName] is such a genuine person!
translation: [shieldmaiden_liege.GetFirstName]真是个天才人物！

original: Appoint Shieldmaiden
translation: 任命为盾女

original: A §YShieldmaiden§! is recognized as a woman of remarkable bravery and strength of character. She may also be made a §YCommander§!.
translation: §Y盾女§!被认为是具有超人勇气和人格力量的女性。她也可以成为一名 §Y指挥官§!。

original: Must be neither §Y'Shy'§!, §Y'Content'§!, §Y'Slothful'§!, §Y'Envious'§!, nor §Y'Gluttonous'§!\n
translation: 必须不具有§Y「害羞」§!，§Y「安于现状」§!，§Y「懒惰」§!，§Y「嫉妒」§!或 §Y「暴食」§!\n

original: Must NOT have been recently relieved of (or refused to accept) this duty\n
translation: 最近必须没有被解除（或拒绝接受）这一职责。\n

original: If [Root.GetTitledFirstName] accepts your offer you will lose §R50§! gold, but gain §G50§! prestige.\n[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will gain §G100§! prestige and the trait §Y'Shieldmaiden'§!.\n
translation: 如果[Root.GetTitledFirstName]接受你的提议你将失去 §R50§! 金钱，但会获得 §G50§! 威望。\n[Root.GetTitledFirstName]将获得 §G100§! 威望和§Y「盾女」§!特质。\n

original: I must've been but a child when I was first seen in the training ground, a stick as my sword, rocks and bushes my enemies. While I never stopped honing my skills entirely, I worry now that I've stagnated. The pressure has further increased since I was appointed Shieldmaiden. How should I keep in shape?
translation: 我第一次出现在训练场时必定还只是孩童，一根木棍就是我的长剑，石头和灌木是我的敌人。虽然我从未完全停止磨练我的技艺，现在我担忧自己停滞不前了。而自从我被任命为盾女以来，压力进一步增长。我应该要怎样保持体型？

original: I shall go rowing every morning!
translation: 每天早上我都要去赛艇！

original: I'll go running with my dog! That could be fun!
translation: 和我的狗一起跑步！这会很好玩！

original: Brand new armor is bound to intimidate any foe!
translation: 崭新的盔甲必能吓阻任何敌人！

original: Actually, I've more important things on my mind.
translation: 其实，我心里还有更重要的事情。

original: You're more than a Shieldmaiden. However, nothing happens.
translation: 你不仅仅是一名盾女。不过，什么都没有发生。

original: Fell Into The River
translation: 掉进河里

original: Waters can be dangerous, but this time it was mostly embarrassing.
translation: 水可以很危险。但这一次，水让你难堪。

original: Shiny New Armor
translation: 闪亮的新盔甲

original: State of the art armor always makes a good impression.
translation: 最新工艺打造的盔甲总能留下好印象。

original: A servant surprised me today by bringing my beloved, albeit a little too adventurous, dog back to me! They had found it going through the garbage behind the barracks. Not picky, that thing. Either way, I shrieked with joy!
translation: 仆人今天给了我一个惊喜，将我最爱的，虽然有些太爱冒险的狗带回给我了！他们发现它正在挖掘兵营后面的垃圾堆。真是不挑啊，这个小家伙。不论如何，我高兴地叫了出来！

original: A servant asked if I wanted the missing posters for my dog taken down. He's right, I suppose. I'll never see that creature again and I it is time I came to terms with that.
translation: 仆人询问我要不要把寻狗启事拿下来。我想他是对的。我再也不会见到那个小家伙了，而现在我也该是时候接受这个事实。

original: Reunited at last!
translation: 终会重聚的！

original: Time to let go.
translation: 是时候放手。

original: Missing Dog
translation: 爱狗失踪

original: 'Last seen in the woods' the posters read, after asking for the safe return of this person's beloved dog.
translation: 「最后出现在树林里」，启事最后写道，前文则希望有人能安全送回此人的爱犬。

original: During the battle of [Root.Location.GetName] I spot a man almost the size of a mammoth, lumbering towards my liege [my_liege.GetTitledFirstName]. However, the [my_liege.GetTitle] is busy fighting in the other direction and doesn't seem at all aware of the beast approaching. My mind starts racing. One swing of that ax could easily cut [my_liege.GetFirstName] in half.
translation: 在[Root.Location.GetName]战役中我瞄到一个如猛犸般巨大的男人，轰隆隆地冲向我的领主[my_liege.GetTitledFirstName]。可是，[my_liege.GetTitle]正忙于其他方向上的战斗，并且似乎对于这只野兽在靠近毫无觉察。我的大脑疯狂运转。那把斧头只需要一下就能轻易将[my_liege.GetFirstName]切成两半。

original: I'll throw my shield at the giant!
translation: 我要将自己的盾牌扔向这个巨人！

original: Depending on your combat skills you may or may not be able to strike down your foe.\n
translation: 根据你的实战能力，你或许能也或许不能击倒你的敌人。\n

original: your shield finding its target. You will also Gain §G1§! Martial.\n
translation: 你的盾牌砸中了目标。你也会获得 §G1§! 军事。\n

original: your shield missing its target, injuring your liege.\n
translation: 你的盾牌偏离目标，击中了你的领主。\n

original: My spear will make the beast one-eyed!
translation: 我的长矛会让这只野兽变成独眼龙！

original: Depending on your combat skills you may or may not be able to land a perfect throw.\n
translation: 根据你的实战能力，你或许能也或许不能发出完美一掷。\n

original: your spear hitting its target and you being praised for your skills. You will also Gain §G2§! Martial.\n
translation: 你的长矛击中目标，你会受到你的领主的称赞。你也将获得 §G2§! 军事。\n

original: you having an accident, injuring yourself.\n
translation: 你出了意外，伤到了自己。\n

original: Perhaps this is the time to make myself scarce...
translation: 也许是时候珍惜自己了……

original: Depending on the combat skills of your liege [my_liege.GetSheHe] may or may not get out of this one alive...\n
translation: 根据你的领主的实战能力，[my_liege.GetSheHe]或许能也或许不能逃得性命……\n

original: the [my_liege.GetTitle] being slain on the battlefield!\n
translation: [my_liege.GetTitle]在战场上被杀死了！\n

original: the [my_liege.GetTitle] surviving!\n
translation: [my_liege.GetTitle]活下来了！\n

original: I take aim at the enemy and I cock my arm back. My shield is hurled through the air at incredible speed - it spins like a disc of gold as the sunshine is reflected on the metal. The giant is hit, square in his head, and he drops to his knees. [my_liege.GetTitledFirstName] turns, surprise and awe on [my_liege.GetHerHis] face.
translation: 我瞄准敌人并内转收回我的胳膊。我的盾牌以难以置信的速度被用力掷出——它飞速地旋转，金属在阳光的照耀下如同黄金的圆盘。那个巨人被打到，正中他的头部，而他双膝跪地。[my_liege.GetTitledFirstName]转过身来，震惊和敬畏浮现在[my_liege.GetHerHis]脸上。

original: I cock my arm back and my shield is hurled through the air at incredible speed, spinning like a disc of gold as the sunshine is reflected on its metal. On and on it flies, until I begin to question my aim... Did I miscalculate the direction of the wind? The giant is distracted by the maneuver, however, and [my_liege.GetTitledFirstName] has time to raise [my_liege.GetHerHis] shield.
translation: 我内转收回我的胳膊。我的盾牌以难以置信的速度被用力掷出——它飞速地旋转，金属在阳光的照耀下如同黄金的圆盘。飞呀飞呀它并没有停下，直到我开始怀疑我的准头……刚才我有没有算错了风向？不过，那个巨人还是被这行动分散了注意力，而[my_liege.GetTitledFirstName]现在有时间举起[my_liege.GetHerHis]盾牌。

original: With a loud war cry I hurl my spear over the battlefield. It shoots through the air like dark lightning and soldiers turn their head to stare. By the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] it finds its target, right in the eye of the massive warrior. Of course, there was some skill involved as well.
translation: 一声响亮的战吼，我猛掷出我的长矛，越过整个战场。它如黑色的闪电一般穿透空气，士兵们纷纷转头盯着长矛。凭着[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的意志，它打到了目标，正中巨型战士的眼睛。当然了，我个人能力的功劳也很重要。

original: I scream as I cock my arm back to throw my spear. I fail to notice the soldier behind me though, staggering, I fling my spear in the general direction of my liege. The haphazard hurl does hit the giant in the side however, and my liege nods at me over the battlefield, just before the giant spins and charges at me instead.
translation: 一声嚎叫，我内转收回自己的长矛。我已无法注意到我身后的士兵，蹒跚地全力朝着大概是我领主的方位投掷出自己的长矛。胡乱的投掷居然真的击中了侧边的巨人，我的领主从战场的另一边向我点头，而下一秒那个巨人放弃目标便转身向我冲来。

original: I wasn't made Shieldmaiden for my looks alone.
translation: 我可不是因为外表而被任命为盾女的。

original: It looks like [my_liege.GetSheHe] will live, at least!
translation: 看上去[my_liege.GetSheHe]至少能活下去！

original: This was not your best rescue.\n
translation: 这并不是你的最佳营救表现。\n

original: I love my job.
translation: 我爱我的工作。

original: Your liege is eternally grateful.\n
translation: 你的领主永远感激你。\n

original: Oh crap.
translation: 糟了。

original: By team effort the massive warrior is slain, but you are lucky to walk away with your life.\n
translation: 齐心协力，终于杀死了那个体型巨大的战士，但你也只是侥幸保住自己的性命。\n

original: Favored Shieldmaiden
translation: 受赏识的盾女

original: This is a Shieldmaiden of some renown, instilling both respect and fear on the battlefield.
translation: 这是一位著名的盾女，在战场深受敬畏。

original: Bad Bodyguard
translation: 差劲的侍卫

original: During a moment of truth, this person backed away from the fight.
translation: 在关键的时刻，此人逃脱了战斗。

original: [my_liege.GetTitledFirstName] is cut through like butter. I'm not sure when I'll forget the sight of it all. At least I was far away and nobody blamed me for not stepping in...
translation: [my_liege.GetTitledFirstName]如同黄油一般被切开。我不确定我还会不会完全忘记那个景象。至少我当时离那里很远，而且没人指责我没有介入……

original: My liege [my_liege.GetTitledFirstName] handled the massive man expertly, and [my_liege.GetSheHe] made it look almost effortless! Perhaps I underestimate the [my_liege.GetManWoman]...
translation: 我的领主[my_liege.GetTitledFirstName]专业地料理了那个巨人，而且[my_liege.GetSheHe]非常轻松就做到了！也许我低估了这个[my_liege.GetManWoman]……

original: The poor fool should never have trusted me.
translation: 那个可怜的蠢货就不该信任我。

original: This will not reflect well on me.
translation: 这在我身上没什么效果。

original: People are surprised how slow on your feet you were today.\n
translation: 人们对你今天缓慢的步伐大为诧异。\n

original: Out on the battlefield I'm suddenly face to fa... Face to stomach with a gigantic warrior, his furious cry of war resonating in my very bones. Before I have time to raise my sword I feel a warm liquid soaking through my tunic. When I lower my gaze I see my armor somehow ripped in two, and blood gushing out of me...
translation: 在战场上，我突然面对面……啊不，是脸对着肚子遭遇了一个身形巨大的战士，我每根骨头都在他的愤怒的战吼中共振。我在来得及举剑之前，感到有温暖的液体浸湿了长袍。我往下看，发现盔甲已经被劈成两半，血液正从体内涌出……

original: Out on the battlefield I'm suddenly face to fa... Face to stomach with an impressive warrior - finally a challenge! I thrust my sword into his knee and then I slash wildly at his enormous hands as he reaches for the pain. In the end I am covered in blood, but I feel great. Wonder where [From.GetFirstName] was this whole time?
translation: 在战场上，我突然面对面……啊不，是脸对着肚子遭遇了一个令人难忘的战士——终于有挑战了！我的长剑刺穿了他的膝盖，接着我疯狂劈砍他的一只巨手直到他因痛苦捂住伤口。战到最后我全身是血，但我感觉很棒。很奇怪这整段时间[From.GetFirstName]去哪了？

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], take me...
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，带我走吧……

original: The last thing you see before it all goes dark is your Shieldmaiden §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! in the distance... You try to call out, but you're choking.\n
translation: 一切变黑之前你最后看到的是你的盾女§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!站在很远的地方……你尽力想要呼唤，但你被血呛到了。\n

original: How strange that my Shieldmaiden didn't back me up!
translation: 真奇怪，我的盾女没有支援我！

original: Soldiers say they saw her back away from your fight! Maybe she just had a bad day?\n
translation: 士兵们说他们看见她背对着你远离你的战斗！也许她只是这一天很糟糕？\n

original: During the chaos of the battle I notice something moving fast in the corner of my eye... The shield of [From.GetFirstName] flies past me, and I spin to see a giant warrior just about to cleave down on me with his ax. I raise my shield, but the blow cuts through it like butter. "Soldiers! TO ME!" I yell desperately.
translation: 在战争的混乱中，你注意到有东西在你眼角快速移动……[From.GetFirstName]的盾牌从我身边飞过，而我转身见到一个巨大的战士正要用他的斧头劈开我。我举起我的盾牌，但这一重击像切黄油一样切开了它。「士兵，过来！」我绝望地大叫道。

original: The battle of [Root.Location.GetName] is chaos and there are some intimidating warriors here - one giant of a man was just about to assault me when my Shieldmaiden [From.GetFirstName] distracted him with a seemingly random throw of her spear... I'm not sure it was intentional, but it was a brave sacrifice, I suppose.
translation: [Root.Location.GetName]的战役非常混乱，而且有一些令人胆怯的战士出没于此——一名男人中的巨人要攻击我，而我的盾女[From.GetFirstName]用长矛看似随意的一投分散了他的注意力……我不确定这是计划好的，不过这确实是次勇敢的付出，我认为。

original: By [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I hurt all over!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，我全身上下都在痛。

original: Your Shieldmaiden §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! rushes to your side, but it is too late.\n
translation: 你的盾女§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!赶到你身边，但太迟了。\n

original: What was she thinking?
translation: 她在想什么？

original: Soldiers say they saw her struggling to hold off the massive warrior alone for several minutes, after which it took ten men to take him down.\n
translation: 士兵们说他们看到她奋力拖住了巨型战士好几分钟，直到十个人一拥而上将他击倒。\n

original: Clumsy Shieldmaiden
translation: 笨拙的盾女

original: This Shieldmaiden is not known for elegance nor grace.
translation: 这位盾女并非因高贵或优雅为人所知。

original: Inattentive Soldier
translation: 大意的士兵

original: This warrior should pay closer attention.
translation: 这位战士应该提高注意力。

original:
All of your demesne gets §Y'Religious Tension'§! for one year, giving the following effects:
Local Revolt Risk: §R+10.0%§!
translation:
你的所有直辖领获得§Y「宗教关系紧张」§!一年，有如下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§R+10.0%§!

original: Shieldmaiden
translation: 盾女

original: the Valkyrie
translation: 女武神

original: the Former Shieldmaiden
translation: 前盾女

original: the Clumsy
translation: 笨拙者

original: Relieve Shieldmaiden
translation: 解职盾女

original: If a §YShieldmaiden§! gets injured, sick or old it might be a good idea to relieve her of her duties.
translation: 如果一位§Y盾女§!受伤、生病或者年老，可能还是免除她的职责比较好。

original: I was summoned to the [FromFrom.GetTitle] today. Impressed by my martial skills and combat practice [FromFrom.GetSheHe] wants to appoint me Shieldmaiden! Although a prestigious title, being a member of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] personal guard is likely to on occasion be a dangerous job.
translation: 我今天被[FromFrom.GetTitle]传召。对我的军事能力和战斗水平印象深刻，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]想要任命我为盾女！尽管是一个威名卓著的头衔，成为[FromFrom.GetHerHis]私人卫兵的一员有时可能是一份危险的工作。

original: I would be honored!
translation: 我很荣幸！

original: I'm not really Shieldmaiden material...
translation: 我不是盾女的材料……

original: You respectfully decline.\n
translation: 你有礼貌地拒绝了。\n

original: I knew I was right to trust my gut regarding [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The woman has accepted my proposal and she is now my new Shieldmaiden!
translation: 我就知道将我的后背托付给[From.GetTitledFirstName]是正确的。这位女士接受了我的提议而她现在是我新的盾女！

original: I have a good feeling about this.
translation: 这让我感觉不错。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused my proposal. She curtsied as she conveyed her thoughts on the matter, but made no attempt to explain herself. I admit to feeling a little confused. Who wouldn't be honored to be my Shieldmaiden?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝了我的提议。她向我行屈膝礼，并表达她关于这件事的想法，但一点不想解释原因。我承认自己感到一些迷茫。成为我的盾女，谁不会感到荣幸呢？

original: There's no pleasing some people.
translation: 不是所有人都为此高兴。

original: Shieldmaiden
translation: 盾女

original: This character is a Shieldmaiden, recognized for her remarkable bravery and spirit. She may also be made a Commander.
translation: 这个角色是一名盾女，她的英勇和斗志得到了人们的认可。她同样也可以成为一名指挥官。

original: the Defender
translation: 防御者

original: the Legendary
translation: 传奇

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to relieve me of my duties. I am no longer a Shieldmaiden in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] employ. I suppose it could have something to do with that embarrassing river incident?
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]决定解除我的职责。我不再是[FromFrom.GetHerHis]麾下的盾女了。我猜这是不是与那场在河流中发生的令人尴尬的事故有关？

original: Having proven myself as a Shieldmaiden, I am a bit surprised to be relieved of my duties, but I respect the wishes of my liege. I shall remember my days as Shieldmaiden for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] with pride.
translation: 我已经证明了自己可以成为一名盾女，因此再被解除职责后，我感到了一点惊讶，但我会尊重自己领主的意愿。我会骄傲地记住我作为盾女待在[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]身边的日子。

original: After my blunder on the battlefield I can't blame [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] for deciding to relieve me of my duties as Shieldmaiden... I suppose I have other qualities?
translation: 我在战场上犯下了大错，我实在无颜指责[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]解除了我作为盾女的职责……我认为也许我还有其他的品质等待发现？

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to relieve me of my duties as [FromFrom.GetHerHis] official Shieldmaiden. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] says it's for my own good and while it's not glorious, I could make do with a more quiet life. Maybe I'll pick up harp-playing?
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]已经决定免除我作为[FromFrom.GetHerHis]正式盾女的职责。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]说尽管这并不光荣，但这是为了我好，我以后可以过上更安静的生活。也许我该去学学如何弹竖琴？

original: I can only guess [FromFrom.GetHerHis] reasoning for it, but [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to relieve me of my duties as Shieldmaiden. I suppose it was good while it lasted.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]已经决定解除我作为盾女的职责，我只能猜测[FromFrom.GetHerHis]有合适的理由这么做。我依然认为做盾女的日子是那么的美好。

original: Very well.
translation: 非常好。

original: People will remember your service to the [FromFrom.GetTitle].\n
translation: 人民会感谢你为[FromFrom.GetTitle]做出的贡献。\n

original: Lover's Memento
translation: 情人的纪念品

original: A small keepsake which used to bring luck to the now departed lover.
translation: 一个为阴阳相隔的爱人准备的小纪念品，它会带来好运。

original: Skull Trophy
translation: 颅骨战利品

original: This character owns the skull of a deceased rival.
translation: 这个角色拥有一个已经死去的对手的头盖骨。

original: Graverobber
translation: 盗墓者

original: This character is a known graverobber.
translation: 这个角色是一名广为人知的盗墓者。

original: I cannot believe it... Dearest [rip_dead.GetFirstName], my [GetRootFromCompliment]. You are gone from this world and I am left behind, alone and heartbroken. I will never hold you in my arms again! I do not know what to do with these unbearable feelings...
translation: 我无法相信，最亲爱的[rip_dead.GetFirstName]，我的[GetRootFromCompliment]。你离开了这个世界，将心碎的我孤独地留在这里。我永远无法再将你拥入怀中了！我实在不知道该如何面对这些难以忍受的痛苦……

original: I will seek solace at your grave, my love.
translation: 我会在你的墓中寻找一些东西慰藉自己，我的爱人。

original: Visit the grave of §Y[rip_dead.GetFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 拜访§Y[rip_dead.GetFirstName]§!的坟墓。\n

original: I don't want to see anyone. Leave me alone!
translation: 我不想再见任何人。请让我一个人待着！

original: Lock yourself in your chambers and refuse to see anyone.\n
translation: 将自己锁在房间里，拒绝见任何人。\n

original: Not another tear. No longer shall I let myself be ruled by feelings.
translation: 我不会再流泪。我不会再让感情控制我。

original: Harden your heart and refuse to mourn the death of §Y[rip_dead.GetFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 使自己的心坚硬，拒绝为§Y[rip_dead.GetFirstName]§!的死哀悼。\n

original: I cannot live like this anymore!
translation: 我不能再这样活下去了！

original: Put an end to your suffering.\n
translation: 终结自己的痛苦。\n

original: I am sitting by the grave of my departed [rip_dead.GetHusbandWife] [rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName], contemplating questions of life and death, when a creaking door disturbs the silence. I look up, only to see [From.GetTitledFirstName], who they say was my [rip_dead.GetHusbandWife]'s whore!
translation: 我正坐在我死去[rip_dead.GetHusbandWife][rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]的墓前，思考着生存和死亡的问题，突然一阵嘎吱作响的开门声打破了平静。我抬起头，却只看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]，他们都说这人是我[rip_dead.GetHusbandWife]的姘头！

original: I am not the only one who lost someone. I will let [From.GetHerHim] mourn in peace.
translation: 我并不是唯一失去挚爱的人。我会让[From.GetHerHim]平静地哀悼。

original: How dare you show your face here, you [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: 你怎么敢在这里出现，你这个[GetRootFromInsult]！

original: I am not sure why, but I expected to find solitude at [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s grave. How I was mistaken! Unfortunately I ran into [rip_dead.GetHerHis] old [rip_widow.GetHusbandWife] [rip_widow.GetTitledFirstName]. I had hoped [rip_widow.GetSheHe] would be civil, but instead [rip_widow.GetSheHe] made a scene, screeching so loudly that the [rip_dead.Religion.GetPriestTitle] had to calm [rip_widow.GetHerHim] down!
translation: 我不清楚为什么，但是我想在[rip_dead.GetFirstName]的墓中寻找一些纪念品慰藉自己。但我被误解了！我不幸撞见[rip_dead.GetHerHis]年迈的[rip_widow.GetHusbandWife][rip_widow.GetTitledFirstName]。我曾希望[rip_widow.GetSheHe]会文明一点，但是[rip_widow.GetSheHe]大吵大闹，尖叫的声音如此之大，以至于[rip_dead.Religion.GetPriestTitle]不得不让[rip_widow.GetHerHim]冷静下来！

original: That [GetRootFromInsult] has no heart!
translation: 那个[GetRootFromInsult]是个没良心的家伙！

original: Thanks to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s great mercy, there were no other visitors at [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s grave when I arrived. I spent several hours mere yards from [rip_dead.GetHerHis] cold body, contemplating the fragility of life and love. When I returned to my chambers, as if by a sign sent from [rip_dead.GetFirstName], I found [rip_dead.GetHerHis] lucky charm on the floor!
translation: 感谢[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的仁慈，在我抵达时，[rip_dead.GetFirstName]的墓旁没有其他拜访者。我在[rip_dead.GetHerHis]冰冷的尸体旁逗留了几个小时，几乎寸步不离，我思考着生命和爱情的脆弱。但我回到自己的房间时，似乎是[rip_dead.GetFirstName]指引着我，我在地板上发现了[rip_dead.GetHerHis]幸运符！

original: I will cherish it until the day I die!
translation: 我会好好保存它，直到我死的那一天！

original: I always imagined I would be the first of us to go, but now I am the one mourning the departure of my dear friend. Never again will I hear [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s jolly laugh or receive [rip_dead.GetHerHis] wise council. It is as if I have lost an essential part of myself. I feel so powerless...
translation: 我一直以为自己会是先去世的那个，但是现在我得独自哀悼我亲爱朋友的离去。我再也听不到[rip_dead.GetFirstName]的开怀大笑了，也得不到[rip_dead.GetHerHis]明智的建议。这感觉就像我失去了自己身体里一个必不可少的部分。我感觉好无力……

original: [rip_dead.GetFirstName] wouldn't want me to cry. Let's drink in [rip_dead.GetHerHis] honor!
translation: [rip_dead.GetFirstName]不会希望我哭泣。让我们为[rip_dead.GetHerHis]荣耀干杯吧！

original: Spend an evening getting drunk at the local tavern.\n
translation: 在当地的酒馆喝上一整晚，直至烂醉。\n

original: Leave me alone, I don't want your sympathies!
translation: 走开，我不需要你的同情！

original: Friendship will only hurt you in the end...
translation: 友谊到最后只会伤害你……

original: Distance yourself from all of your friends.\n
translation: 远离你所有的朋友。\n

original: I am at the local tavern, drowning my sorrows over my friend [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s recent passing, when I notice another unhappy patron. Surely it must be [From.GetFirstName], an old companion of [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s? Maybe I should keep [From.GetHerHim] company?
translation: 我待在当地的酒馆，沉浸在我朋友[rip_dead.GetFirstName]最近去世给我带来的痛苦中，这时我看到了另一个不高兴的客人。那肯定是[From.GetFirstName]，他是[rip_dead.GetFirstName]的另一位老伙伴？也许我该找[From.GetHerHim]一起喝一杯？

original: Attempt to make friends with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 试着与§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!交朋友。

original: I think [From.GetSheHe] prefers to be left alone...
translation: 我认为[From.GetSheHe]更希望一个人待着……

original: Leave §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [From.GetHerHis] own devices.
translation: 让§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!继续待在[From.GetHerHis]世界里。

original: I have probably already had one drink too many when I am joined at the table by an equally intoxicated [From.GetManWoman]. It takes me a few minutes to realize, but surely it must be [From.GetTitledFirstName], another old friend of [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s! We spend quite some time reminiscing about our old comrade.
translation: 我大概已经喝的很醉了，但随后我又与另一个和我差不多烂醉的[From.GetManWoman]一起喝了一些。我花了一点时间才确定他是[From.GetTitledFirstName]，[rip_dead.GetFirstName]的又一位老朋友！我们一起花了很长时间来追忆我们的老朋友。

original: I have probably already had one drink too many when I am joined at the table by an equally intoxicated [From.GetManWoman]. It takes me a few minutes to realize, but surely it must be [From.GetTitledFirstName]! We spend quite some time drinking together and sharing our sorrows.
translation: 我大概已经喝的很醉了，但随后我又与另一个和我差不多烂醉的[From.GetManWoman]一起喝了一些。我花了一点时间才确定他是[From.GetTitledFirstName]，我们一起花了很长时间来排解我们的悲伤。

original: Perhaps we can find solace in each other's company?
translation: 也许我们一起能给对方一定的安慰？

original: Perhaps a new friend is just what I need?
translation: 也许我正需要一位新的朋友？

original: No, go away! I want to be left alone...
translation: 不，走开，我只想要一个人待着……

original: Force §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to leave you alone.\n
translation: 强迫§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!离开你。\n

original: Why, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]? How could you be so cruel and take [rip_dead.GetFirstName] from me?! I can find no relief, no escape from the all-consuming sorrow. No matter how many bottles I empty, all I can see before me is [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s pale and lifeless face...
translation: 为什么，[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]？你怎么能如此残酷地把[rip_dead.GetFirstName]带离我的身边！我不知道如何缓解自己的痛苦，不知道如何逃避那吞噬一切的悲伤。不论我喝掉多少瓶酒，我依然会看到[rip_dead.GetFirstName]苍白而毫无生气的脸出现在我眼前……

original: I will never find another friend like you, [rip_dead.GetFirstName]...
translation: 我再也找不到像你这样的朋友了，[rip_dead.GetFirstName]……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I spent all evening reminiscing about [rip_dead.GetFirstName] and indeed, today my heart feels a lot lighter! Hopefully this is the start of a wonderful new friendship.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和我花了整晚来回忆[rip_dead.GetFirstName]，而今天，我感到自己的心情好转了一些！希望这是一份新的伟大友谊的开端。

original: The world isn't such a bad place after all!
translation: 这个世界并不是那么糟！

original: Suit yourself, you stubborn oaf!
translation: 随你的便吧，你这个无脑的蠢货！

original: Haha! [Root.GetSheHeCap] who laughs last laughs longest! Finally that [GetRootFromInsult] [rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName] has left this fine Earth. While everything will definitely be better without [rip_dead.GetHerHim], I have a lot of extra time on my hands now...
translation: 哈哈！笑到最后才是笑得最好的！[GetRootFromInsult][rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]终于离开了这个美好的世界。毫无疑问，没有了[rip_dead.GetHerHim]，一切都会变得更好。我现在有更多的时间做自己的事情了……

original: I do think [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s skull would look fine on my mantelpiece!
translation: 我相信把[rip_dead.GetFirstName]的头骨放在我的壁炉架上会很好看！

original: Attempt to steal the head of §Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§! from [rip_dead.GetHerHis] grave.\n
translation: 试着从[rip_dead.GetHerHis]墓地里偷取§Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§!的头骨。\n

original: The enemy of my enemy is my friend.
translation: 敌人的敌人就是我的朋友。

original: Bond over the death of §Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§! with [rip_dead.GetHerHis] other old enemy, §Y[rip_enemy_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 借助§Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§!的死与[rip_dead.GetHerHis]另一个宿敌§Y[rip_enemy_2.GetTitledFirstName]结为朋友。\n

original: I'm glad [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s gone, but it sure will get boring without [rip_dead.GetHerHim]...
translation: 我很高兴[rip_dead.GetFirstName]已经死了，但是没有[rip_dead.GetHerHim]，我的生活肯定会变得很无聊……

original: Find a new rival to amuse yourself with.\n
translation: 寻找一个新的对手来供你消遣。\n

original: Life is too short for hate. It's about time I'd change my ways.
translation: 生命苦短，不能浪费在仇恨上。是时候改变我自己了。

original: You attempt to become a better person.\n
translation: 你试着去成为一个更好的人。\n

original: [rip_dead.GetFirstName] has taken enough of my time and energy. No more.
translation: [rip_dead.GetFirstName]已经占用了我太多的时间和精力。以后再也不会了。

original: You feel relief over the death of §Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你已经从§Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§!的去世中解脱出来了。\n

original: I am almost at the grave of my deceased [rip_dead.GetHusbandWife] [rip_dead.GetFirstName] when I hear a wet, thudding sound. How strange! I hurry around the corner to discover the source. The scene I am met with is gruesome beyond words – [From.GetTitledFirstName], gore up to [From.GetHerHis] elbows, my [rip_dead.GetHusbandWife]'s severed head in [From.GetHerHis] hands!
translation: 快接近我刚去世的[rip_dead.GetHusbandWife][rip_dead.GetFirstName]的坟墓时，我听到了一声沉闷凝重的声音。真奇怪！我匆忙地赶到发出声音的角落。结果我看到了一幅可怕到无法用言语形容的景象——[From.GetTitledFirstName]，[From.GetHerHis]手臂沾满了黑血，而我[rip_dead.GetHusbandWife]被切下的头颅就落在[From.GetHerHis]手里！

original: You will regret this, [From.GetFirstName]! Guards, throw [From.GetHerHim] in the dungeon!
translation: 你会为此后悔的，[From.GetFirstName]！卫兵，把[From.GetHerHim]扔进地牢里！

original: You sick [GetRootFromInsult]! Get out of my sight!
translation: 你这个变态的[GetRootFromInsult]！滚出我的视线！

original: I have just separated [rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]'s head from [rip_dead.GetHerHis] body when the door is thrown open by [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Before I have a chance to explain myself, [From.GetSheHe] calls for the guards and I am hauled off to the dungeons!
translation: 我刚把[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]的脑袋从[rip_dead.GetHerHis]身体上切下来，[From.GetTitledFirstName]就推开门冲了进来。在我有机会解释自己的行为前，[From.GetSheHe]就喊来了卫兵把我拖进地牢关了起来！

original: Have §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! thrown out.\n
translation: 把§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!赶出去。\n

original: I have just separated [rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]'s head from [rip_dead.GetHerHis] body when the door is thrown open by [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Before I have a chance to explain myself, [From.GetSheHe] calls for the guards and I am thrown out, head first!
translation: 我刚把[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]的脑袋从[rip_dead.GetHerHis]身体上切下来，[From.GetTitledFirstName]就推开门冲了进来。在我有机会解释自己的行为前，[From.GetSheHe]就喊来了卫兵把我扔了出去，头着地的！

original: It's not what it looks like!
translation: 这并不是看起来的那样！

original: Finally, with one last swing of the cleaver, [rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]'s ugly head is severed from [rip_dead.GetHerHis] equally disgusting body! I roll it up in a piece of cloth, stash it in my satchel and escape undetected into the night.
translation: 终于，随着砍刀的最后一切，[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]的丑陋的脑袋终于和[rip_dead.GetHerHis]同样恶心的身体分开了！我用一块布把脑袋包了起来，塞进我的背包里，然后在无人察觉的情况下遁入夜色之中。

original: I almost wish you were alive to see this, [rip_dead.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我几乎希望你能活着看到这个，[rip_dead.GetFirstName]！

original: The guards have brought you some most disturbing news. During the night, someone has broken into [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s grave! As if that was not enough, the sick culprit also severed [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s head from [rip_dead.GetHerHis] body and stole it!
translation: 卫兵向你带来了一些令人不安的消息。在晚上的时候，某个人闯入了[rip_dead.GetFirstName]的坟墓！ 更糟糕的是，这个变态的罪犯还把[rip_dead.GetFirstName]的脑袋从[rip_dead.GetHerHis]身体上切了下来并悄悄带走了！

original: I'm sick to my stomach... Who could do something like this?
translation: 我恶心得想吐……究竟谁会做出这样的事情？

original: Since the death of my dear [rip_dead.GetFirstName] I have been debating matters of life and death with my most trusted [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s. While I refused to accept their arguments at first, they have started to make sense as of late. Perhaps [rip_dead.GetFirstName] is in a better place?
translation: 自从我亲爱的[rip_dead.GetFirstName]死后，我一直与我最信任的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]辩论着生存和死亡的问题。开始我拒绝接受他们的观点，但后来我觉得他们说的也有道理。也许[rip_dead.GetFirstName]现在正待在一个更美好的地方？

original: I put my trust in [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 我信靠[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]。

original: A god who lets the people I love die is no god of mine.
translation: 我将不再信奉让我心爱的人死去的神。

original: After the death of [rip_dead.GetFirstName], people have tried to comfort me, but I never felt that they truly understood. Now I tend to avoid them and their idle chatter. However, there is one soul whose company I have not loathed: a gorgeous black and white cat. It never presumes to know my feelings or pesters me with unwelcome advice.
translation: 在[rip_dead.GetFirstName]死后，大家试着安慰我，但我从未觉得他们真正理解了我。现在我倾向于避开他们，不听他们毫无意义的唠叨。但是，有一个家伙的陪伴从未让我感到厌恶：一只美丽的黑白色小猫。它从未带着令人厌恶的建议来假装理解我的感受。

original: Pretty kitty, you understand me better than anyone.
translation: 可爱的小猫，你比其他人更懂我。

original: I'd actually rather just be alone...
translation: 我还是一个人待着吧……

original: Neglectful Parent
translation: 疏忽大意的父母

original: Ever since the death of [rip_dead.GetFirstName] I have been so very lonely. There is no one quite like [rip_dead.GetHerHim] in my life any more. However, the other day when I was watching the children play, my [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] said something which reminded me so much of [rip_dead.GetFirstName]...
translation: 自从[rip_dead.GetFirstName]去世以来，我一直很孤独。我生命里再没有任何一个人能像[rip_dead.GetHerHim]一样了。不过，有一天我看着孩子们玩耍的时候，我的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]说了一些东西，让我想起了许多关于[rip_dead.GetFirstName]的事情……

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] gives me hope for the future.
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]给了我对于未来的希望。

original: Children know nothing of the hardships of the world...
translation: 小孩子对这个世界的苦难能了解多少呢……

original: Spend some extra time with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 花更多的时间与§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!待在一起。\n

original: Avoid the company of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 避免和§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!待在一起。\n

original: Before my dear friend [rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName] passed from this world, [rip_dead.GetSheHe] made me promise to take care of [rip_dead.GetHerHis] [rip_heir.GetSonDaughter] [rip_heir.GetTitledFirstName]. Today was [rip_dead.GetFirstName]'s funeral. Most mourners have left by this point, but [rip_heir.GetFirstName] is yet kneeling by [rip_heir.GetHerHis] [rip_dead.GetFatherMother]'s grave.
translation: 在我亲爱的朋友[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]离开这个世界之前，[rip_dead.GetSheHe]让我承诺照顾[rip_dead.GetHerHis][rip_heir.GetSonDaughter][rip_heir.GetTitledFirstName]。今天是[rip_dead.GetFirstName]的葬礼。大部分来参加葬礼的人在这个时候已经离开了，但是[rip_heir.GetFirstName]依然跪在[rip_heir.GetHerHis][rip_dead.GetFatherMother]的墓前。

original: I will offer my friendship and protection to [rip_heir.GetFirstName].
translation: 我会为[rip_heir.GetFirstName]提供友谊与保护。

original: Approach §Y[rip_heir.GetTitledFirstName]§! and offer [rip_heir.GetHerHim] your friendship, according to the wishes of §Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 靠近§Y[rip_heir.GetTitledFirstName]§!并向[rip_heir.GetHerHim]表示友好，这是§Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§!的遗愿。\n

original: [rip_heir.GetFirstName] has become quite a fine-looking [rip_heir.GetManWoman]...
translation: [rip_heir.GetFirstName]长成了一个非常好看的[rip_heir.GetManWoman]……

original: Attempt to seduce §Y[rip_heir.GetTitledFirstName]§!. Not quite what §Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§! had in mind...
translation: 试着去引诱§Y[rip_heir.GetTitledFirstName]§!。很难说§Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§!会怎么想……

original: [rip_heir.GetHerHisCap] fate isn't my responsibility.
translation: [rip_heir.GetHerHisCap]命运与我无关。

original: Leave §Y[rip_heir.GetTitledFirstName]§! to fend for [rip_heir.GetHerselfHimself], ignoring the wishes of §Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 让§Y[rip_heir.GetTitledFirstName]§!照料[rip_heir.GetHerselfHimself]，无视§Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§!的遗愿。\n

original: After [rip_dead.GetFatherMother]'s funeral I am approached by [rip_dead.GetHerHis] old friend [From.GetTitledFirstName], who wants to speak to me. Apparently [rip_dead.GetFatherMother] wanted [From.GetFirstName] to look after me. [From.GetSheHeCap] is offering me [From.GetHerHis] friendship and protection.
translation: 在[rip_dead.GetFatherMother]的葬礼后，[rip_dead.GetHerHis]老朋友[From.GetTitledFirstName]靠近了我，他想和我谈谈。看起来[rip_dead.GetFatherMother]想要[From.GetFirstName]照顾我。[From.GetSheHeCap]向我提供了[From.GetHerHis]友谊和保护。

original: Of course, [From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName]. I'd be honored to call you my friend!
translation: 当然，[From.GetFirstName][From.GetLordLady]。我很荣幸能称你为朋友！

original: Thank you, but I am fine, I assure you.
translation: 谢谢你，但是我很好，我向你保证。

original: Dear [From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName] most graciously welcomed my offer. I am sure [From.GetSheHe] and I will become the best of friends!
translation: 亲爱的[From.GetLordLady][From.GetFirstName]非常愉快地接受了我的建议。我肯定[From.GetSheHe]和我会变成最好的朋友！

original: Don't worry, [rip_dead.GetFirstName]. I will keep your [From.GetSonDaughter] safe.
translation: 不要担心，[rip_dead.GetFirstName]。我会保证你的[From.GetSonDaughter]平安无恙。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] turned me down! How could [From.GetSheHe] totally disregard the esteem [From.GetHerHis] [rip_dead.GetFatherMother] held for me? No, I will not ask a second time. [From.GetFirstName] only has [From.GetHerselfHimself] to blame!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝了我！[From.GetSheHe]怎么能完全无视[From.GetHerHis][rip_dead.GetFatherMother]对我的信任与尊重？我不会再问第二次了。[From.GetFirstName]只有去责怪[From.GetHerselfHimself]了！

original: That ungrateful, [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: 那个不知感激的[GetRootFromInsult]！

original: After [rip_dead.GetFatherMother]'s funeral I am approached by [rip_dead.GetHerHis] old friend [From.GetTitledFirstName], who wants to speak to me, in private. As soon as we are alone, [From.GetSheHe] takes my hand and offers to look after me and provide me with anything I need. As if to erase all doubt concerning [From.GetHerHis] intentions, [From.GetFirstName] puts [From.GetHerHis] other hand on my leg!
translation: 在[rip_dead.GetFatherMother]的葬礼后，[rip_dead.GetHerHis]老朋友[From.GetTitledFirstName]靠近了我，他想私下里和我谈谈。当我们离开其他人后，[From.GetSheHe]抓起我的手，向我保证会照顾我并提供我所需要的一切。似乎是要清除我对[From.GetHerHis]意图的疑虑，[From.GetFirstName]把[From.GetHerHis]手放到了我的腿上！

original: Oh, my [From.GetLordLady]... Your kindness brings me to tears!
translation: 噢，我亲爱的[From.GetLordLady]……你的善良让我热泪盈眶了！

original: How dare you? My [rip_dead.GetFatherMother] has barely gotten cold in [rip_dead.GetHerHis] grave!
translation: 你怎么敢这样？我的[rip_dead.GetFatherMother]还躺在[rip_dead.GetHerHis]墓地里，尸骨未寒呢！

original: My dear [From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName] burst into tears when I offered to take care of [From.GetHerHim], and proceeded to throw [From.GetHerselfHimself] into my arms! I cannot believe that such a [GetRootFromCompliment] is mine!
translation: 当我要求照顾[From.GetHerHim]时，我亲爱的[From.GetLordLady][From.GetFirstName]失声痛哭，然后[From.GetHerselfHimself]飞身扑入了我的怀中！我不敢相信这么一位[GetRootFromCompliment]就属于我了！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] turned me down, and most rudely at that! I thought that my offer to take care of [From.GetHerHim] would be met with some appreciation at least, but no. Well, I will not make the offer twice. [From.GetSheHeCap] does not know what [From.GetSheHe] is missing!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝了我，而且是以最粗鲁的方式！我以为由我来照顾[From.GetHerHim]的提议至少能得到一些感谢，但是没有。好吧，我不会再给出第二次提议了。[From.GetSheHeCap]根本不知道[From.GetSheHe]错过了什么！

original: Golden Mask
translation: 黄金面具

original: This character wears an ornate golden mask. Only the most talented artisan could have made such a masterpiece.
translation: 这个角色佩戴着一个华丽的黄金面具。只有最具天赋的工匠才能做出这样杰出的艺术品。

original: Before the incident I had no trouble with men, but now they cringe at my approach. I know that my face is a hideous thing to behold, yet every time it hurts just as badly as the first. I have heard of an artisan mask maker who crafts the most beautiful masks. Maybe [Root.GetSheHe] can help me?
translation: 在这个事故之前，男人看到我的时候不会出现任何问题，但是现在当我靠近时，他们就远远地躲开。我知道我的面孔已经惨不忍睹了，但每一次遇到这种情况，我都会重新体验一遍当初的痛苦。我听说一位面具制作大师可以作出最精美的面具。也许[Root.GetSheHe]能帮助我？

original: Before the incident I had no trouble with women, but now they cringe at my approach. I know that my face is a hideous thing to behold, yet every time it hurts just as badly as the first. I have heard of an artisan mask maker who crafts the most beautiful masks. Maybe [Root.GetSheHe] can help me?
translation: 在这个事故之前，女人看到我的时候不会出现任何问题，但是现在当我靠近她们时，她们就畏缩着躲开。我知道我的脸孔已经让人无法直视了，但是每次遇到这种情况，我都会重新体验一遍当初的痛苦。我听说一位面具制作大师可以作出最精美的面具。也许[Root.GetSheHe]能帮助我？

original: A golden mask will surely impress the lords!
translation: 一个黄金面具无疑会给贵族们留下深刻的印象！

original: A golden mask will surely impress the ladies!
translation: 一个黄金面具无疑会给女士们留下深刻的印象！

original: Order a golden mask from the mask maker.\n
translation: 从面具制作师那里订做一个黄金面具。\n

original: If they can't stand my flaws, they don't deserve me.
translation: 如果他们不能接受我的缺陷，那么他们就不配和我来往。

original: You are fine just the way you are.\n
translation: 我这样也挺好。\n

original: Repulsed by Deformity
translation: 因畸形而被拒绝

original: Last night my [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetFirstName] told me that my face is scaring the children. Apparently my [rip_scared_child.GetSonDaughter] [rip_scared_child.GetFirstName] has been especially frightened. [From.GetFirstName] asked me to stay away from the children, for now.
translation: 昨天晚上[From.GetHusbandWife][From.GetFirstName]告诉我，我的脸吓到了孩子们。显然尤其是我的[rip_scared_child.GetSonDaughter][rip_scared_child.GetFirstName]受到了特别大的惊吓。[From.GetFirstName]要求我暂时远离孩子们。

original: Definitely not! [rip_scared_child.GetFirstName] has no reason to fear [rip_scared_child.GetHerHis] [Root.GetFatherMother]!
translation: 绝不！[rip_scared_child.GetFirstName]没有理由害怕[rip_scared_child.GetHerHis][Root.GetFatherMother]！

original: Insist on socializing with §Y[rip_scared_child.GetFirstName]§! and the other children.\n
translation: 坚持与§Y[rip_scared_child.GetFirstName]§!和其他孩子社交。\n

original: If you think it is for best, dear...
translation: 亲爱的，如果你认为这样最好的话……

original: Refrain from playing with §Y[rip_scared_child.GetFirstName]§! and the other children.\n
translation: 避免与§Y[rip_scared_child.GetFirstName]§!和其他孩子一起玩。\n

original: Martially Ambidextrous
translation: 双手专精

original: This character can wield a weapon in either hand with equal skill.
translation: 这个角色的两个手都能以同样灵巧的技术使用武器。
