original: Ever since I lost my dominant hand in the incident I have been the laughingstock of the sparring ring. Some part of me feels that I should just give up, that my time would be better spent elsewhere. However should not a [Root.GetTitle] such as I be able to defend [Root.GetHerselfHimself]?
translation: 自从我在事故中失去了我惯用的优势手，我就变成了格斗圈子里的笑柄。我有时会很想放弃，把时间花在其他事物上。也许更好。但是像我这样的[Root.GetTitle]无论如何也要有能力保护[Root.GetHerselfHimself]。

original: I will stick to my weapon practice no matter what!
translation: 不管怎样，我要坚持自己的武器训练！

original: Practice fighting with a weapon in your non-dominant hand.\n
translation: 使用你的非惯用手持有武器，进行战斗练习。\n

original: you successfully learning how to wield a weapon with your non-dominant hand.
translation: 你成功地学会了如何使用你的非惯用手来拿着武器进行战斗。

original: you failing at your weapon practice.
translation: 你没能学会如何使用你的非惯用手。

original: you failing horribly and get injured during practice.
translation: 你悲惨地失败了，并且在练习中受了伤。

original: This is useless. At least reading doesn't require two hands...
translation: 这毫无用处。至少阅读不需要使用两只手……

original: Spend your spare time in the library.\n
translation: 将你的业余时间花在图书馆里。\n

original: It has taken many months of hard training, but it was worth it! Thanks to a talented teacher and my own perseverance I can now wield my weapon almost as well in my remaining hand as I could with the one I lost.
translation: 我刻苦训练了好几个月，但是一切都值得！感谢我独具天赋的老师和我自己的坚韧不拔，我现在可以让自己剩下的那只手像我失去的那只手一样使用武器了。

original: Now no one dares to laugh at me!
translation: 现在谁还敢嘲笑我！

original: I kept at it for many months, but the improvements were disappointingly small, especially compared to all the effort I put in. Over time I have visited the sparring ring less and less often. Today it has been over a fortnight since last I practiced.
translation: 我坚持了好几个月，但是进步很小，这很令人失望，尤其是在我投入了如此大精力的情况下。随着时间的过去，我越来越少的参加格斗圈里的事情。今天距离我上次练习已经超过两个星期了。

original: It's about time that I abandoned this foolish venture.
translation: 是时候放弃这个愚蠢的目标了。

original: I am not blind. I could tell that my teacher had started to lose faith in me, but I kept at it, refusing to give up. Today I paid the price for my pigheadedness when I messed up a parry yet again. My dueling partner was not quick enough to save me this time...
translation: 我并没有瞎眼。我可以感觉到我的老师已经开始对我失去信心了，但我依然在坚持，拒绝放弃。今天我为自己的愚蠢和固执付出了代价，我又一次没能完成一次格挡，但是这次我的训练伙伴没能及时收住手……

original: Losing my hand wasn't enough?!
translation: 失去了一只手还不够吗？！

original: I am crossing the courtyard, barely taking notice of the children playing in one corner. Then suddenly I spot a rock flying through the air. Am I in its trajectory? I cannot tell, my depth perception is not what it used to be!
translation: 我穿过庭院，根本没注意到在一个角落里玩耍的孩子们。然后突然间我看到空中飞过来一块石头。我是不是在它的弹道上？我判断不出来，我已经没有以前判断远近的能力了！

original: Attempt to catch the rock
translation: 试着去抓住石头

original: you making a perfect, impressive catch.\n
translation: 你完美地抓住了石头，真令人惊讶。\n

original: you failing at catching the rock and getting hit by it instead.\n
translation: 你没能抓住石头，反而被它砸中了。\n

original: Throw yourself at the ground
translation: 卧倒在地

original: You make a fool of yourself, but at least you avoid the rock.\n
translation: 你让自己看起来很蠢，但是至少你躲开了石头。\n

original: I set my remaining eye on the rock and raise my hand to catch it. Just in time! I close my fingers around the smooth rock and grin widely. The children come running up to me and little [rip_throwing_child.GetFirstName] anxiously begs me for my forgiveness.
translation: 我用我剩下的那个眼睛看着石头，并抬起我的手去抓住它。时机正好！我合上手指，攥着那块光滑的石头，然后咧嘴大笑起来。孩子们向我跑过来，小[rip_throwing_child.GetFirstName]焦急地向我道歉。

original: No harm done, [rip_throwing_child.GetFirstName]!
translation: 没有什么，[rip_throwing_child.GetFirstName]！

original: I set my remaining eye on the rock and raise my arm to catch it, but it seems as if I have misjudged the distance. Before I can open my hand the rock makes impact with a blinding pain. Do you hate me, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]? My OTHER eye?!
translation: 我用我剩下的那个眼睛看着石头，并抬起我的手去抓住它，但似乎我错误地判断了距离。在我张开手之前，石头就打中了我，让我在疼痛中一阵头晕目眩。难道你恨我吗，[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]？我的另一只眼睛？！

original: Where is that cursed child? [rip_throwing_child.GetFirstName]!
translation: 那个该死的小孩在哪？[rip_throwing_child.GetFirstName]！

original: As I make contact with the ground I can hear the thud of the rock landing several yards away. The people present do their best not to laugh, but a few suppressed chortles still reach my ears. I try my best to hide my embarrassment behind an angry scowl as I stumble back onto my feet, but I fear my red ears betray me.
translation: 当我卧倒在地上时，我听到那块石头在几码以外的地方落地了。在场的人尽了最大的努力忍住笑声，但一些没能压抑住的声音还是传到了我的耳朵里。我尽了最大的努力用愤怒的眼神来隐藏我的尴尬，同时蹒跚地站了起来，不过我担心自己发红的耳朵会出卖我的内心。

original: Never do that again, [rip_throwing_child.GetFirstName], you senseless child!
translation: 永远不要再那么做了，[rip_throwing_child.GetFirstName]，你这个愚蠢的小鬼！

original: Scolded
translation: 责骂

original: Whenever I talk to men nowadays, I can tell that they are bothered by my missing eye. It has shaken my confidence and I often feel awkward when interacting with them. However, I have heard of a pioneer who crafts very lifelike prosthetic eyes. Perhaps that is the solution to my problem?
translation: 今天，不论何时我和别的男人说话，我都能感到他们对我失去的那只眼睛感到烦恼。这动摇了我的自信，并且让我在与他们的互动时感到不自在。不过，我听说有个手艺人能够做出栩栩如生的假眼珠。也许这能够解决我的问题？

original: Whenever I talk to women nowadays, I can tell that they are bothered by my missing eye. It has shaken my confidence and I often feel awkward when interacting with them. However, I have heard of a pioneer who crafts very lifelike prosthetic eyes. Perhaps that is the solution to my problem?
translation: 今天，不论何时我和别的女人说话，我都能感到他们对我失去的那只眼睛感到烦恼。这动摇了我的自信，并且让我在与他们的互动时感到不自在。不过，我听说有个手艺人能够做出栩栩如生的假眼珠。也许这能够解决我的问题？

original: A glass eye? It's worth a try!
translation: 一个玻璃眼珠？值得一试！

original: You order a glass eye from the artisan.\n
translation: 你从工匠那里订做了一个玻璃眼珠。\n

original: Glass Eye
translation: 玻璃眼珠

original: This character has a very lifelike glass eye. Only the most talented artisan could have made such a masterpiece.
translation: 这个角色拥有一个栩栩如生的玻璃眼珠。只有最具天赋的工匠才能做出如此杰出的工艺品。

original: Inept Dancer
translation: 笨拙的舞者

original: During the last few months I have developed feelings for [rip_love_interest.GetTitledFirstName]. Tonight we are both present at the same celebration. While my confidence as a dancer has all but evaporated since I lost my leg, asking [rip_love_interest.GetHerHim] to dance might be the only chance I get to talk to [rip_love_interest.GetHerHim] tonight.
translation: 在过去的几个月里，我对[rip_love_interest.GetTitledFirstName]的好感与日俱增。今晚我们都会参加一场庆祝仪式。但是我作为一名舞者的自信已经完全消失了，因为我失去了一条腿，可是邀请[rip_love_interest.GetHerHim]跳舞可能是今晚我唯一的与[rip_love_interest.GetHerHim]交谈的机会。

original: [rip_love_interest.GetFirstName], may I have the honor of this dance?
translation: [rip_love_interest.GetFirstName]，我可以荣幸的和你跳一支舞吗？

original: you impressing §Y[rip_love_interest.GetTitledFirstName]§! with your dancing skills and charms.
translation: 你的舞技和魅力让§Y[rip_love_interest.GetTitledFirstName]§!印象深刻。

original: you clumsily stepping on the toes of §Y[rip_love_interest.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 你笨拙的踩到了§Y[rip_love_interest.GetTitledFirstName]§!的脚趾。

original: [rip_love_interest.GetSheHeCap] would never fall for a cripple like me...
translation: [rip_love_interest.GetSheHeCap]绝对不会爱上我这样一个瘸子……

original: You do not ask §Y[rip_love_interest.GetTitledFirstName]§! to dance.\n
translation: 你没有邀请§Y[rip_love_interest.GetTitledFirstName]§!共同跳舞。\n

original: Why did I ever worry? While I might not be as good a dancer as I once was, [rip_love_interest.GetFirstName] seems to appreciate my effort. More importantly, the conversation is flowing and all of my compliments are met with blushing smiles. This is the beginning of something beautiful, I am sure!
translation: 为什么我一直在担心？尽管我的舞技可能不如以前了，但是[rip_love_interest.GetFirstName]似乎很欣赏我的努力。更重要的是，我们的谈话进行得很好，我所有的恭维都让她脸红地微笑起来。这会是一个美好的开端，我肯定！

original: I'm glad I overcame my fears!
translation: 我很高兴能战胜自己的恐惧！

original: While [rip_love_interest.GetFirstName] seemed to be more than happy when I asked [rip_love_interest.GetHerHim] to dance, [rip_love_interest.GetSheHe] is not smiling any longer. My nerves have made me clumsier than usual and I keep stepping on [rip_love_interest.GetHerHis] toes. It is an evil spiral – the worse I dance, the more awkward I get...
translation: 尽管在我邀请[rip_love_interest.GetHerHim]跳舞时，[rip_love_interest.GetFirstName]看起来很高兴，但[rip_love_interest.GetSheHe]现在已经不再露出笑容了。我的紧张让我比平常更加笨拙，而且我不断踩到[rip_love_interest.GetHerHis]脚趾。这是一个恶性的循环——舞跳得越差，我就变得越笨拙……

original: I should have known better!
translation: 我早该料到的！

original: Phantom Pain
translation: 幻肢痛

original: This character is experiencing painful sensations in [GetHerHis] missing body part.
translation: 这个角色在[GetHerHis]失去的身体部位上感受到痛觉。

original: Lately I have been experiencing a crippling pain where my nose used to be. It distracts me from my duties and leaves me bedridden for entire days. I have never heard of anything like it and I fear that the problem will not go away on its own.
translation: 最近我在我原来鼻子的位置感到了一阵破裂性的痛感。这让我无法完成我的职责，只能整天躺在床上。我从来没有听说过这样的事，而且我担心这个问题不会自行消失。

original: Lately I have been experiencing a crippling pain where my missing leg used to be. It distracts me from my duties and leaves me bedridden for entire days. I have never heard of anything like it and I fear that the problem will not go away on its own.
translation: 最近我在我原来腿的位置上感到了一阵破裂性的痛感。这让我无法完成我的职责，只能整天躺在床上。我从来没有听说过这样的事，而且我担心这个问题不会自行消失。

original: Lately I have been experiencing a crippling pain where my missing hand used to be. It distracts me from my duties and leaves me bedridden for entire days. I have never heard of anything like it and I fear that the problem will not go away on its own.
translation: 最近我在我原来手的位置感到了一阵破裂性的痛感。这让我无法完成我的职责，只能整天躺在床上。我从来没有听说过这样的事，而且我担心这个问题不会自行消失。

original: Lately I have been experiencing a blinding pain where my missing eye used to be. It distracts me from my duties and leaves me bedridden for entire days. I have never heard of anything like it and I fear that the problem will not go away on its own.
translation: 最近我在我原来眼睛的位置上感到了一阵致盲性的痛感。这让我无法完成我的职责，只能整天躺在床上。我从来没有听说过这样的事，而且我担心这个问题不会自行消失。

original: I'll have my court physician [rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName] prioritize this.
translation: 我会让我的宫廷医师[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]优先解决这个问题。

original: [rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName] has gotten back to me with two possible courses of treatment. The first one is a simple concoction with few dangers but a limited effect. [rip_physician.GetFirstName] recommends surgery instead. [rip_physician.GetSheHeCap] says it has a higher chance of success, but I would risk permanent damage to my already impaired nervous system.
translation: [rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]给我带回来两种可能的治疗方式。第一种是简单的混合药剂，只有些许危险，但效果有限。[rip_physician.GetFirstName]则推荐手术。[rip_physician.GetSheHeCap]说这有更高的成功几率，但我的风险是对我已然受损的神经系统造成永久损伤。

original: The risk is too great. I'd better go with the concoction.
translation: 风险太大了，我还是喝药吧。

original: §Y[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]§! giving you a successful treatment.
translation: §Y[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!成功地治疗了你。

original: §Y[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]§! failing to cure you, which will likely result in an upset stomach.
translation: §Y[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!没能治好你，药物可能会导致你肚子痛。

original: I cannot live like this. Let's do the surgery.
translation: 我不能这样活下去，我要做手术。

original: §Y[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]§! failing to cure you, which will likely result in permanent nerve damage.
translation: §Y[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!没能治好你，手术可能会对你的神经造成永久性伤害。

original: I think I will abstain from either course of treatment, [rip_physician.GetFirstName].
translation: 我想这两种治疗方案我都不会接受，[rip_physician.GetFirstName]。

original: Decline the treatments offered by your court physician §Y[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 拒绝你的宫廷医师§Y[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!提出的治疗方案。\n

original: I might have been right to be worried, but everything turned out for the best in the end. [rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]'s treatment has been working wonders and I have been free of my crippling pain – and any other kind of strange sensations – for weeks!
translation: 我的担心可能是正确的，不过所有事情到最后都有了最好的结果。[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]的治疗产生了奇迹，我已经摆脱了我的幻肢痛——以及任何其他的奇怪感觉——好几周都没有了！

original: It's time to get back to my duties!
translation: 是时候重新拾起我的职责了！

original: The concoction which [rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName] provided me with did nothing against my pain. Instead it added another affliction to my life. My guts feel like a pit of snakes and I dare not venture far from the privy...
translation: [rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]提供给我的药物一点都没能解决我的痛苦。相反，它给我的生活带来了另一种苦难。我的肚子就像一个蛇窝一样搅动，我一分钟也不敢离开厕所……

original: If this was the less risky option, I'm glad I didn't opt for the surgery...
translation: 如果这是风险最小的选择，那么我很高兴可以不选择做手术……

original: While the procedure was harrowing to say the least, I was hopeful that things would get better. They did not. The strange pain is still afflicting me, and worse so than ever. Nowadays I spend most of my time in bed and I can rarely focus for long enough to get anything done. My life is ruined!
translation: 尽管过程很痛苦，但我希望事情能有个好结果。可惜没有。奇怪的痛苦依然折磨着我，而且比以往更糟。现在我大部分时间都躺在床上，我很难在足够长的时间内集中精神来做点什么事情。我的生活完蛋了！

original: I will never trust that snake [rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName] again!
translation: 我再也不会相信那个毒蛇一般的医生[rip_physician.GetTitledFirstName]了！

original: Insane Ruler
translation: 疯狂的统治者

original: Great Dancer
translation: 伟大的舞者

original: This character has impressed everyone with [GetHerHis] superior dancing skills.
translation: 这个角色用[GetHerHis]精湛的舞技让每个人赞叹不已。

original: Great Masquerade Ball
translation: 美妙的假面舞会

original: Attending Masquerade Ball
translation: 出席假面舞会

original: Forced to Wear Mask
translation: 被迫戴面具

original: This character's liege has forced all subjects to wear a mask on a permanent basis.
translation: 这个角色的领主迫使他所有的封臣永远戴上面具。

original: While it is certainly better to wear it than not, my mask does make me feel like an outcast. However I recently had a great idea! What if I arranged an extravagant masquerade ball? Then I would not be the only one and perhaps people will forget about my disfigurement for a while!
translation: 尽管戴上面具比不戴要好，但是我的面具让我感觉自己像个局外人。不过，我最近相处了一个极好的主意！如果我办一场奢华的假面舞会呢？那样我就不是唯一带面具的人，也许人们会暂时忘记我被毁掉的容貌！

original: Let's get this celebration started!
translation: 让我们开始这场庆典吧！

original: Arrange a masquerade ball all of your vassals and courtiers.\n
translation: 为你所有的封臣和廷臣安排一场假面舞会。\n

original: I've never been one for grand events, though...
translation: 但是我从来不喜欢大场面……

original: Abandon your idea of a masquerade ball.\n
translation: 放弃假面舞会。\n

original: The masquerade ball is a huge success! Finally I am not an outcast, a freak. Or perhaps we are all freaks, just for one night. A thought strikes me – would it not be great if this was not only for tonight? If we could go on like this... forever?
translation: 假面舞会大获成功！我总算不会被当做一个局外人、一个怪胎了。或者说，我们都是怪胎，只在今晚。一个想法突然冒了出来——如果不只是今夜如此，岂不是很棒棒？如果我们可以保持这样……直到永远？

original: I am [Root.GetTitle], and I decided that the masks shall stay! Ahaha!
translation: 我以[Root.GetTitle]之名下令，面具不得摘下！嘎嘿嘿嘿！哇哈哈哈！

original: Get ready to make the announcement to all of your guests.\n
translation: 准备好向你的来宾公布这一消息。\n

original: It would be nice, surely, but wouldn't it also be a tad... insane?
translation: 嗯，主意不错，但这不会有点……疯狂么？

original: You proceed with the festivities as normal. \nAll attendees' opinion of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! Changes by §G10§! For §Y10§! years. §Y(Great Masquerade Ball)§!\n
translation: 庆典安然结束。\n所有宾客和§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的关系在 §Y10§! 年内改善 §G10§! 点。§Y（假面舞会大获成功）§!\n

original: I demand that everyone be quiet for my announcement. The conversation dies out and everyone turns their attention towards me. First, as I thank them, they are all courtesies and pretty smiles. When I make my decree, however, they look as if I have slapped them across their soft, unscarred faces!
translation: 我要求所有人都安静下来听我宣布公告。交谈逐渐沉寂，所有人朝我看了过来。首先，我感谢他们出席，他们脸上仍挂着客套的漂亮笑容。但当你说出你的命令，他们那柔软无疤的脸蛋好似被你抽了一巴掌。

original: Oh, I am serious! The masks stay on. Forever!
translation: 嗯，我是说真的！不许摘下面具。永远！

original:
You make it known that no one is allowed to take their mask off, ever. 

All attendees' opinion of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! changes by §R-30§! §Y(Insane Ruler)§!

All attendees gets '§YForced to Wear Mask§!', giving the following effects:
Diplomacy: §R-3§!
Sex Appeal: §R-10§!
translation:
你宣布：所有人都不许摘下他们的面具，永远。

所有来宾对§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的好感度 §R-30§! §Y（疯狂的统治者）§!

所有来宾得到「§Y被迫戴面具§!」修正，并受到以下影响：
外交：§R-3§!
性吸引力：§R-10§!

original: The masquerade ball I am attending took a grim turn when our host and liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], decreed that all of us had to keep our masks on. Forever! At first we thought [From.GetSheHe] was only jesting, but it turns out [From.GetSheHe] is quite serious...
translation: 我正在参加的假面舞会出现了一个可怕的转折，我们的东道主及领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，命令我们所有人必须继续戴着面具。永远戴着！一开始我们都觉得[From.GetSheHe]只是开玩笑，结果[From.GetSheHe]非常认真……

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! forces you to wear a mask on a permanent basis.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!强迫你永远戴着假面。\n

original: This is madness!
translation: 这他娘是什么事！

original: The crazy old [rip_masked_ruler.GetTitledFirstName] has died! Now we are finally free to take these masks off and begin our lives anew. Rejoice, friends, rejoice!
translation: 那该死的老疯子[rip_masked_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]总算死了！我们再也不用戴着那鬼面具了！哈哈哈！朋友们！欢呼吧！庆祝吧！

original: I have finally managed to escape the grasp of that lunatic [rip_masked_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]. I never thought I would be free of this darned mask!
translation: 时至今日，我总算脱离了[rip_masked_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]的魔爪。我还当我再也无法摆脱这个鬼面具了！

original: I will never attend another masquerade ball!
translation: 我再也不会去参加假面舞会了！

original: You take the mask off.\n
translation: 你摘下了面具。\n

original: The feeling of being able to blend in with the crowd - at least as well as any [Root.GetTitle] can - is exhilarating! It is as if people have forgotten about the face behind the mask and treat me as they did before. The guests seem most impressed by my elegant dancing. Finally they see me and not my scars!
translation: 能够融入人群中的感觉——至少像任何[Root.GetTitle]都能做到的那样——让人非常兴奋！就好似人们已经忘记了我面具背后的脸庞，跟以前一样的对待我！宾客印象最深的是我优雅的舞姿。终于，他们看着我这个人，而不是我的伤疤！

original: I think I shall dance all night!
translation: 我可以跳一晚上的舞！

original: All attendees' opinion of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! Changes by §G10§! For §Y10§! years. §Y(Great Masquerade Ball)§!\n
translation: 所有出席者对于§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的态度增加 §G10§! 持续 §Y10§! 年。§Y（盛大的假面舞会）§!\n

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has invited me to [From.GetHerHis] grand masquerade ball. [From.GetSheHeCap] will be most disappointed if I do not attend.
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，已邀请我参加[From.GetHerHis]盛大假面舞会。如果我拒绝出席，[From.GetSheHeCap]将非常失望。

original: I am sure it will be pleasant.
translation: 去吧，多半是一个不错的舞会。

original: I don't care what [From.GetSheHe] will think, I am not going.
translation: 我还管[From.GetSheHe]怎么想，不去！

original: The masquerade ball [From.GetTitledFirstName] hosted has been a true joy to attend! [From.GetSheHeCap] finally seemed to be in [From.GetHerHis] right element. We were all very impressed by [From.GetHerHis] charm and excellent dancing!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]主办的假面舞会能让所有参加的人愉快！[From.GetSheHeCap]似乎终于找回了[From.GetHerHis]状态。我们都对[From.GetHerHis]超绝而有魅力的舞姿留下深刻印象。

original: I hope [From.GetTitledFirstName] will arrange another ball soon!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]呀，我已然等不及去参加你下一场舞会了啊！

original: I never could have foreseen the feelings that came over me when I looked at [From.GetFirstName] for the first time. My [From.GetSonDaughter], my firstborn! This world might be a harsh place, but I will look after you. While you will never rule my realm you will always have a special place in my heart.
translation: 我从没预料到当我第一次看见[From.GetFirstName]时充斥我心灵的那种感受。我的[From.GetSonDaughter]，我的第一个孩子！这个世界或许是个严酷的地方，但我绝对会照顾好你。尽管你并不会统治我的领地，你永远在我心中占据一个特殊的位置。

original: I never could have foreseen the feelings that came over me when I looked at [From.GetFirstName] for the first time. The overwhelming joy of holding my firstborn in my arms, intermingled with a bitter disappointment. You will always have a special place in my heart, [From.GetFirstName] but I desperately need a son.
translation: 我从没预料到当我第一次看见[From.GetFirstName]时充斥我心灵的那种感受。在双臂中怀抱着我第一个孩子的压倒一切的狂喜，混杂着苦涩的失望。你将永远在我心中占据一个特殊的位置，[From.GetFirstName]，但我急需一个儿子。

original: I never could have foreseen the feelings that came over me when I looked at [From.GetFirstName] for the first time. My [From.GetSonDaughter], my firstborn! The joy and the relief is overwhelming. I have an heir. The future is safe.
translation: 我从没预料到当我第一次看见[From.GetFirstName]时充斥我心灵的那种感受。我的[From.GetSonDaughter]，我的第一个孩子！欢喜和放心的感觉压倒一切。我有了一个继承人。未来已经安全。

original: I never could have foreseen the feelings that came over me when I looked at [From.GetFirstName] for the first time. My [From.GetSonDaughter], my firstborn! I do not know what the future has in store for you. Perhaps you will rule all of this one day, perhaps not. No matter what happens, however, you will always hold a special place in my heart.
translation: 我从没预料到当我第一次看见[From.GetFirstName]时充斥我心灵的那种感受。我的[From.GetSonDaughter]，我的第一个孩子！我不知道未来等待着你的是什么。也许你有一天能统治者一切，也许不能。但是，无论发生什么，你将永远在我心中占据一个特殊的位置。

original: I am almost ashamed to admit it, but when I first lay eyes on my firstborn [From.GetSonDaughter], I was shocked by what I saw. Never have I witnessed such a hideous child! I have gotten used to [From.GetHerHis] malformed little face, however, and I am sure looks are not everything in this world.
translation: 我几乎耻于承认，但当我第一次见到我的头生[From.GetSonDaughter]时，我震惊于眼前的景象。从没见过如此丑陋的小孩！但是，如今我已习惯[From.GetHerHis]畸形的小脸，而且我很确信这个世界上外貌不代表一切。

original: I am worried about little [From.GetFirstName]. At first everything seemed to be well and we thanked [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] for our good fortune. Alas, it was not to last. Now [From.GetSheHe] appears to be very feeble and the physician is unsure if [From.GetSheHe] will stay with us.
translation: 我很担心小[From.GetFirstName]。一开始一切都很好，并且我们为自己的好运而感谢[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]。呜呼，这状态却不能持久。现在[From.GetSheHe]表现得非常贫弱，连医师也不确定[From.GetSheHe]能否继续陪伴我们。

original: When little [From.GetFirstName] parted [From.GetHerHis] lips in [From.GetHerHis] first scream, I was positively surprised. That child has a set of impressive lungs! In all, [From.GetSheHe] appears to be very robust and healthy for an infant. I am sure [From.GetFirstName] will grow up to be a strong [From.GetManWoman].
translation: 当小[From.GetFirstName]分开[From.GetHerHis]双唇叫出[From.GetHerHis]第一声啼哭，我特别惊喜。这孩子有着一对强壮的肺！总体上，[From.GetSheHe]是一个非常壮实健康的婴儿。我确信[From.GetFirstName]能成长为一名强壮的[From.GetManWoman]。

original: Sweet child, may [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] bless you with a long, good life!
translation: 可爱的孩子，愿[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]赐予你幸福、长久的一生！

original: This is a harsh world for little girls, sweetest [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 对小女孩来说这个世界很残酷，最可爱的[From.GetFirstName]。

original: All of this will be yours to rule one day, little [From.GetFirstName].
translation: [From.GetFirstName]唷——你，终将为王！

original: [From.GetFirstName], you might be blessed in other ways which we are yet to discover.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]呀，别担心，你一定在我们所看不见的方面蒙了祝福。

original: Please, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], don't be cruel! Let [From.GetHerHim] live!
translation: 求求你，[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]！求你不要那么残忍！让[From.GetHerHim]活下来吧！

original: I thank you, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], for giving me a healthy [From.GetSonDaughter].
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]呀！感谢你，赐予我健康的[From.GetSonDaughter]。

original: The joy, but above all, the relief! Finally, a son, an heir! Welcome to the world, little [From.GetFirstName]. You will become a fine ruler one day, my boy, of that I am sure.
translation: 喜悦，但最重要的是，松了一口气！我终于有了一个儿子，一名继承人！欢迎来到这个世界，小[From.GetFirstName]。你将会继承为父的国，小子，成为一个伟大的统治者的。

original: girl
translation: 女孩

original: After many months in the harsh wilderness you have finally reached the glade. Here, the breeze is warm and the sky clear, and the ground is covered in a sea of brightly colored flowers. In the midst of the clearing stands a great old tree, its branches reaching far higher than the surrounding canopy. [From.GetFirstName] points towards the top of the tree where you can see a single apple, shining red like a ruby in the afternoon sun. \n\nYou are about to enter the clearing when you hear a call from behind. It is one of your companions, a reserved fellow with whom you have only exchanged a few words. He questions why you should be the one to eat the apple when everyone has contributed equally on the journey. You can tell by the look on their faces that some of the others feel the same way...
translation: 经历了数个月的荒野求生后，你们终于到达了林中空地。天空风轻云淡，地上则是姹紫嫣红的百花争放。在空地之中，一棵古树高耸入云，超出了周围所有的树。在[From.GetFirstName]的指引之下，你看见了古树顶上的那颗苹果——它在午后的阳光照射下，通透而又耀眼，好似红宝石一般。\n\n就在此时，你听到背后有人在叫你。你一回头，发现叫你的是一个平时极为沉默寡言的家伙——整个旅程中，你只和他聊过寥寥几句。他质疑为何你才是那个吃下这颗苹果的人，而所有人在旅途中都平等地出了力气。你环顾四周，发现其余人也深以为然……

original: Several months have passed since you put out your request regarding knowledge on increased lifespans. However, no one has come forward and your council has grown increasingly indifferent about the issue. You are starting to wonder whether the knowledge exists at all? If it does, is it maybe not meant to be found? You still have trouble sleeping.\n\nYou will return to your normal life, you suppose, cherishing whatever days you have left. The sun sets, and it rises again. Who knows for how long you will rise with it?
translation: 寻找长生不死之术的公告已经贴出数个月了。但是，因为至今还没有人上门来，你的内阁对这一主意是越来越不置可否了。就连你，也都开始怀疑，这世界上究竟是否存在长生不死之术了。就算存在，是不是也注定了我们永远无法得知呢？同时，你的失眠症仍未有任何好转……\n\n你在想，你究竟是否应该放弃这些不切实际的想法，好好过你余下不多的那些日子了。太阳落下又能再起。谁知道你还能随着太阳一同升起几次呢？

original:
In spite of all [From.GetHerHis] efforts [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s search for information on how to prolong the life of [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetMasterMistress] has turned up fruitless. Disappointment is written all over your face as you rise to leave the council meeting. [From.GetSheHeCap] avoids your gaze for months, but [From.GetSheHe]'s not the only one. Whenever you enter the room nowadays people grow quiet. 

The rumor says you're dying. In a sense it is true, but aren't we all? You still have trouble sleeping. 

Was life always this awkward?
translation:
尽管已投入[From.GetHerHis]全部精力，[From.GetTitledFirstName]寻找如何延长[From.GetHerHis][Root.GetMasterMistress]性命的信息的行动最终毫无成果。脸上写满了失望，你起身离开内阁的会议。[From.GetSheHeCap]数周来都在躲避你的视线，但[From.GetSheHe]并不是唯一这样做的人。现在只要你进入房间，人群就会逐渐安静。

有谣言说你快要死了。某种意义上来说这当然是对的，我们所有人都是这样啊？你仍然睡不着。

生命总是这么尴尬吗？

original: Pay §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to train you in the art of pickpocketing.\n
translation: 付钱让§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!训练你的扒窃技艺。\n

original: You die a horrible death, thus failing §Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]'s§! quest. She leaves your court.
translation: 你惨烈地死去，因而没能完成§Y[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]的§!任务。她离开了你的宫廷。

original: The recent epidemics have ravaged my capital [Root.Capital.GetName] and its populace. However, during the last few months, the state of things have been improving – at least according to my ledger. I am certain that I have my ancestors to thank.
translation: 近来瘟疫一直侵袭我的首都[Root.Capital.GetName]及其百姓。不过，这几个月来，情况有些好转——至少在我看来好转了不少。我想这多半是祖先的庇护吧。

original: Blessed be the ancestors!
translation: 赞美祖先！

original: Fulfilled Demands
translation: 达成心愿

original: Ignored Demands
translation: 无视请求

original: Lately I have had reasons to believe that [cat_hater.GetFirstName] has less than warm feelings for my feline companion. Today my suspicions were confirmed as [cat_hater.GetSheHe] threw a fit when the cat drank from [cat_hater.GetHerHis] cup! [cat_hater.GetSheHeCap] demands that I get rid of my pet.
translation: 近来我一直有理由相信[cat_hater.GetFirstName]对我的猫科伙伴少有好感。今天我的怀疑证实了，[cat_hater.GetSheHe]大发脾气，只因为我的猫从[cat_hater.GetHerHis]杯子里喝水！[cat_hater.GetSheHeCap]要求我抛弃我的宠物。

original: I will dispose of the animal, if that is your wish.
translation: 好好好，如你所愿，我会处理那只动物。

original: I am sure someone can take care of the cat.
translation: 好吧，我确信有人能照看好我的猫。

original: Never will I be parted from my precious kitty!
translation: 啊！我永远不会与我的猫咪宝贝分开！

original: Perhaps I should get rid of YOU?
translation: 也许我应该抛弃你？

original: Show §Y[cat_hater.GetTitledFirstName]§! what you think of people who hates cats!\n
translation: 告诉§Y[cat_hater.GetTitledFirstName]§!你对不喜欢猫的人的看法！\n

original: Let me introduce you to my other kitty...
translation: 来，让我给你看看我其他的小猫咪……

original: Things have been tense between [cat_hater.GetFirstName] and I since [cat_hater.GetSheHe] threw the tantrum the other today. [cat_hater.GetSheHeCap] has grown more and more irritated. Today it culminated in a harsh ultimatum – I must make a choice between [cat_hater.GetSheHe] and the cat.
translation: 自从[cat_hater.GetFirstName]那一天突然大发脾气，[cat_hater.GetSheHe]和我的关系变得非常紧张。[cat_hater.GetSheHeCap]越来越易怒。今天情况达到极点，一份严厉的最后通牒——我必须在[cat_hater.GetSheHe]和我的猫之间做出选择。

original: I promise to get rid of the creature if you feel so strongly about it.
translation: 好吧，既然你这么不喜欢它，我保证会放弃这只生物就是了。

original: You get rid of the cat to please §Y[cat_hater.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你为了取悦§Y[cat_hater.GetTitledFirstName]§!，放弃了猫。\n

original: The choice is simple – kitty would never put me in this position!
translation: 哼，答案显而易见——我的猫可不会这么逼我！

original: You choose your beloved companion over the pesky §Y[cat_hater.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你选择你最爱的伙伴，而非烦人的§Y[cat_hater.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: When it is sleeping or cuddling on my lap, my cat is a precious angel. I do not understand how something can be so calm in one moment, only to fly across the room in the next. When it gets these fits it climbs all over my belongings, and it is only a matter of luck if something does not break.
translation: 当猫窝在我的腿上睡觉时，它简直是只天使。这家伙一会儿安静的不行，一会又突然飞跃整个房间，这实在太难以理解了。实话说，我的东西没被它弄坏，真是运气。

original: It's just playing! If something breaks I can easily replace it.
translation: 唉，玩吧玩吧！弄坏了我再换一个新的。

original: Let the cat do whatever it pleases.\n
translation: 让猫为所欲为。\n

original: Come here, kitty! No, no, not that one!
translation: 来来来，小猫咪，过来！不！别碰那个东西！啊！

original: Run after the cat and stop it from ruining anything.\n
translation: 跟着它以防它搞破坏。\n

original: Blasted beast! If you so much as leave a scratch, I'll wring your neck!
translation: 啊！小畜生！你要是敢搞破坏，看老子不掐断你脖子！

original: Punish the cat if it breaks anything.\n
translation: 一犯事就惩罚它。\n

original: The cat abandons you and finds a new home.
translation: 猫离开了你找到了一个新家。

original: [rabbit_parent.GetTitledFirstName] angrily bursts into my throne room. Apparently my beloved cat has killed [rabbit_parent.GetHerHis] [rabbit_child.GetSonDaughter]'s pet rabbit. At least that is what [rabbit_parent.GetFirstName] claims. Now [rabbit_parent.GetSheHe] demands some kind of compensation.
translation: [rabbit_parent.GetTitledFirstName]愤怒地冲进我的王座间。看上去我最爱的猫刚刚杀死了[rabbit_parent.GetHerHis][rabbit_child.GetSonDaughter]的宠物兔子。至少这是[rabbit_parent.GetFirstName]所宣称如此的。现在[rabbit_parent.GetSheHe]要求某种形式的补偿。

original: Calm down [rabbit_parent.GetFirstName], I will buy [rabbit_child.GetFirstName] a new pet.
translation: 冷静下来[rabbit_parent.GetFirstName]，我会给[rabbit_child.GetFirstName]买个新宠物。

original: Replace §Y[rabbit_child.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! dead rabbit to please [rabbit_child.GetHerHis] [rabbit_parent.GetFatherMother].\n
translation: 给§Y[rabbit_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!再买只宠物，以讨好[rabbit_child.GetHerHis][rabbit_parent.GetFatherMother]。\n

original: I am most sorry. My companion will not be a threat any longer.
translation: 我很抱歉，这种事不会再发生了……

original: Put down your pet before it will have the chance to hurt anyone else.\n
translation: 处理掉你的猫，以防同样的事再次发生。\n

original: Impossible. My angel would never hurt a fly!
translation: 开什么玩笑，我的小天使哪会这么做！

original: Refuse to believe §Y[rabbit_parent.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 拒绝相信§Y[rabbit_parent.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: I am sitting by the fire with my precious cat curled up in my lap. I pet it slowly as I stare into the flames. My furry friend enjoys a good life here with me, but what about all the other cats who do not have a home? The ones who no one feeds, or combs, or cuddles? Perhaps I can take care of them!
translation: 我坐在火边，猫咪宝贝在我的膝盖上慵懒的缩着。我轻轻地拍着那小东西，一边望着壁炉里的火定定出神：我的毛茸茸的朋友在我的看护下过着幸福的生活，但其他那些无家可归的猫呢？我是不是也该连它们也一起照顾上呢？

original: I just want to hug all of them!
translation: 我要把它们全部抱住！

original: Adopt some more cats. There is plenty of room in the keep!\n
translation: 收养更多的猫。城堡里还有很多房间！\n

original: But I can't, because that's crazy...
translation: 啊，别闹了，不可能，这是疯了……

original: One is enough. Though you still can't stop thinking about the cats, and how cute they are...\n
translation: 一个就够多的了。虽然你无法停止想那些猫咪，以及它们有多可爱……\n

original: Crazy Cat Lady
translation: 爱猫狂女

original: This character surrounds herself with an alarmingly large amount of cats.
translation: 她养着数量惊人的猫。

original: Crazy Cat Lord
translation: 爱猫狂人

original: This character surrounds himself with an alarmingly large amount of cats.
translation: 他养着数量惊人的猫。

original: Attempt to reason with §Y[This.GetBestName]§!, asking him to clean up his act. There is no guarantee that this will succeed, but having a high Learning, Diplomacy or Intrigue skill will help. However if he owes you a favor, you can force him to do as you ask.
translation: 用理性劝说§Y[This.GetBestName]§!好好反省他的所作所为。这不一定会成功——但如果学识、外交或密谋足够高，成功率会上升。当然，如果他欠你人情，你可以让他这样还人情。

original: It is time to call in that favor.
translation: 是时候该用这个人情了

original: Force §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to give up his vices.\n
translation: 强制§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!改正。\n

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] is not happy with my refusal, but why should I care? Although now [From.GetSheHe] reminds me of the favor I owe [From.GetHerHim]...
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]对我的拒绝表示不满，但我为何要在乎？不过现在[From.GetSheHe]提醒我还欠着[From.GetHerHim]人情……

original: I guess I have no choice. I will try to please [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 唉，没得选了，[From.GetTitledFirstName]高兴就好。

original: Finally my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to listen to reason. [From.GetSheHeCap] will not live a life of vice any longer!
translation: 终于！我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]决定听我话了。[From.GetSheHeCap]将从此好好生活。

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] must surely be pleased.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]必会喜悦。

original: Successful Treatment
translation: 成功的治疗

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] is worried about my newborn [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter]. [sickly_infant.GetFirstName] is a feeble little thing, even compared to other infants. [From.GetFirstName] says [sickly_infant.GetSheHe] might not live to see [sickly_infant.GetHerHis] first birthday.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]担心我新出生的[sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter]。[sickly_infant.GetFirstName]即使与其他婴儿相比，也是一个孱弱的小东西。[From.GetFirstName]说[sickly_infant.GetSheHe]可能无法活着见证[sickly_infant.GetHerHis]第一个生日。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], you must attempt to save my [sickly_infant.GetFirstName]!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]，你必须救救我的小[sickly_infant.GetFirstName]！

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! does [From.GetHerHis] best to treat your [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter] §Y[sickly_infant.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!用[From.GetHerHis]全力去治疗你的[sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter]§Y[sickly_infant.GetTitledFirstName]§!。

original: So be it. Only the strong survive.
translation: 适者生存，此乃天道。

original: §Y[sickly_infant.GetTitledFirstName]§! will not be given any treatment for [sickly_infant.GetHerHis] ailments.
translation: §Y[sickly_infant.GetTitledFirstName]§!将不会因为[sickly_infant.GetHerHis]慢性疾病获得任何治疗。

original: It seems as if whatever treatment [From.GetTitledFirstName] administered worked! Little [sickly_infant.GetFirstName] is much better. Now [sickly_infant.GetSheHe] appears to be no different than other children [sickly_infant.GetHerHis] age.
translation: 好像[From.GetTitledFirstName]作出的任何治疗都会有效果！小[sickly_infant.GetFirstName]已经明显好转。现在[sickly_infant.GetSheHe]表现得与[sickly_infant.GetHerHis]其他同龄小孩没有区别。

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] be praised for our good fortune!
translation: 为我们的幸运赞美[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]！

original: While little [sickly_infant.GetFirstName] still appears slightly weaker than other children [sickly_infant.GetHerHis] age, I swear [sickly_infant.GetSheHe] is much more energetic than [sickly_infant.GetSheHe] was a couple of weeks ago. [sickly_infant.GetSheHeCap] might not be out of the woods quite yet, but the worst has passed.
translation: 尽管小[sickly_infant.GetFirstName]仍然表现得与[sickly_infant.GetHerHis]其他同龄小孩相比有些弱小，我发誓[sickly_infant.GetSheHe]相较起[sickly_infant.GetSheHe]数星期之前已经有了许多活力。[sickly_infant.GetSheHeCap]或许尚未脱离险境，但最困难的时期已经过去。

original: Thank you, [From.GetFirstName], for giving my [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter] a second chance.
translation: 谢谢你，[From.GetFirstName]，给了我的[sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter]第二次机会。

original: Whatever [From.GetTitledFirstName] did, I cannot see any improvements in little [sickly_infant.GetFirstName]. My [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter] still seems worryingly lethargic. [sickly_infant.GetHerHisCap] subdued cries send chills down my spine...
translation: 不论[From.GetTitledFirstName]做了什么，我在[sickly_infant.GetFirstName]身上看不到任何改善。我的[sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter]依然让人担心地无精打采。[sickly_infant.GetHerHisCap]压抑的哭声让我脊柱发凉……

original: Why am I even paying that quack?!
translation: 为什么我还要付钱给这个庸医！

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! treatment of your [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter] §Y[sickly_infant.GetTitledFirstName]§! was unsuccessful.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!对你[sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter]§Y[sickly_infant.GetTitledFirstName]§!的治疗不成功。

original: My [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] was not meant for this world. Today [From.GetSheHe] quietly drew [From.GetHerHis] last breath.
translation: 我的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]并不适应这个世界。今天[From.GetSheHe]安静地呼出[From.GetHerHis]最后一口气。

original: [From.GetFirstName] is with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] now.
translation: 小[From.GetFirstName]已回到[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的身边了。

original: My court physician [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has shared some of [physician.GetHerHis] latest ideas with me. I do not know much of medicine, but perhaps [physician.GetSheHe] is on to something. [physician.GetSheHeCap] has asked for some money to develop [physician.GetHerHis] theory further and write a book on it.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[physician.GetTitledFirstName]对我分享了一些[physician.GetHerHis]最新想法。我不太了解医学，但或许[physician.GetSheHe]有了重大发现。[physician.GetSheHeCap]要求一些资金以进一步发展[physician.GetHerHis]学说并写一本有关于此的书籍。

original: Of course! Advancements in medicine benefits us all.
translation: 这是自然，医学的进步对我等而言至关重要。

original: Offer §Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§! your patronage.\n
translation: 赞助§Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: I'm already paying [physician.GetHerHim], aren't I? Greedy leech...
translation: 我已经在给[physician.GetHerHim]付钱了，不是吗？贪婪的吸血鬼……

original: Do not give §Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§! any more money for research.\n
translation: 不赞助§Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!的研究。\n

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] has most graciously offered me [From.GetHerHis] patronage. I have been given a sum of money to do medical research and [From.GetFirstName] expects me to write a book on my findings.
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]非常和蔼地给予我[From.GetHerHis]赞助。我获得了一笔资金去做医学研究，而且[From.GetFirstName]期望我写一部关于我的发现的书籍。

original: I better get to work then!
translation: 该干活啦！

original: Get your medical research started.\n
translation: 开始你的医学研究。\n

original: [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has published [physician.GetHerHis] work on the four humors. [physician.GetHerHisCap] ideas about black bile, phlegm, blood and yellow bile and how they can be manipulated to treat different ailments have been received with much acclaim by scholars!
translation: [physician.GetTitledFirstName]发表了[physician.GetHerHis]关于四种体液的研究。[physician.GetHerHisCap]关于黑胆汁、血液、黏液和黄胆汁以及如何利用以治愈各种病症的观点获得了好几百个学者一致称赞！

original: [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has published [physician.GetHerHis] work on herbalism and signatures. [physician.GetHerHisCap] ideas about how herbs can be used to treat different ailments, based on their resemblance to the parts of the body, have been received with much acclaim by scholars!
translation: [physician.GetTitledFirstName]发表了[physician.GetHerHis]关于草药与同形的研究。[physician.GetHerHisCap]关于如何根据草药与身体部位的相似程度用来治疗不同病症的观点获得了好几百个学者一致称赞！

original: [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has published [physician.GetHerHis] work on miasma. [physician.GetHerHisCap] ideas about how corrupted air emanates from rotting organic matter and causes different diseases have been received with much acclaim by scholars!
translation: [physician.GetTitledFirstName]发表了[physician.GetHerHis]关于沴气的研究。[physician.GetHerHisCap]关于败坏的气体如何从腐烂的生命物质中散发出来并造成各种疾病的观点获得了好几百个学者一致称赞！

original: [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has published the results from [physician.GetHerHis] medical investigations. The book has not received any notable attention but at least [physician.GetFirstName] has developed [physician.GetHerHis] skills as a physician.
translation: [physician.GetTitledFirstName]发表了来自[physician.GetHerHis]医学调查的结论。这本书没有获得任何显著的关注，但至少[physician.GetFirstName]磨练了[physician.GetHerHis]医师技能。

original: [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has published the results from [physician.GetHerHis] medical investigations. The book has not received any notable attention. It is just gathering dust in my library...
translation: [physician.GetTitledFirstName]发表了[physician.GetHerHis]研究。结果什么反响都没有，那本书只能待在我的图书馆里吃灰……

original: [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has published [physician.GetHerHis] new theory and apparently it has become the laughing stock of the entire medical community! It is being read as entertainment by scholars throughout the realm...
translation: [physician.GetTitledFirstName]发表了[physician.GetHerHis]新理论而且很明显地成为了整个医学共同体的笑柄！整个领地的学者都把这部书当成娱乐来读……

original: I knew this was a good investment.
translation: 我早就知道这是明智之举。

original: §Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§! and you, as [physician.GetHerHis] patron, are celebrated for your contributions to medicine.\n
translation: §Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!和你，作为[physician.GetHerHis]赞助人，因为你们对医学的贡献而为世人称颂。\n

original: What a waste of gold.
translation: 可惜了那些钱呐。

original: That [GetRootFromInsult] has brought me nothing but shame!
translation: 这个[GetRootFromInsult]！就晓得给我丢脸！

original: §Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§! and you, as [physician.GetHerHis] patron, have become the laughing stock of the scholarly community.\n
translation: §Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!和你，作为[physician.GetHerHis]赞助人，成为了学术共同体的笑柄。\n

original: I have published my work on the four humors. My ideas about black bile, phlegm, blood and yellow bile and how they can be manipulated to treat different ailments have been received with much acclaim by scholars!
translation: 我发表了关于四体液学说的研究。我关于黑胆汁、血液、黏液和黄胆汁以及如何利用以治愈各种病症的观点获得了好几百个学者一致称赞！

original: I have published my work on herbalism and signatures. My ideas about how herbs can be used to treat different ailments, based on their resemblance to the parts of the body, have been received with much acclaim by scholars!
translation: 我发表了关于草药和同形的研究。我关于草药可借形补形，用于治疗各种病症的观点获得了好几百个学者一致称赞！

original: I have published my work on miasma. My ideas about how corrupted air emanates from rotting organic matter and causes different diseases have been received with much acclaim by scholars!
translation: 我发表了关于沴气学说的研究。我关于败坏的气体如何从腐烂的生命物质中散发出来并造成各种疾病的观点获得了好几百个学者一致称赞！

original: I have published the results from my medical investigations. Unfortunately the book has not received any notable attention, but I know I am onto something. In any case this work has taught me some valuable new skills.
translation: 我发表了来自我医学调查的结论。可惜这并未引起任何明显的关注，虽然我知道这是个重大发现。不论如何这一研究让我的医术得到了磨炼。

original: After months of frustration the funds supplied by my patron [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] ran out and I was left with nothing of note. Yet I had promised to make a publication, so I did. The book has received close to no attention and is simply gathering dust in [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s library...
translation: 数月的挫败之后，我的赞助人[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]提供的资金用完了，而我没有任何值得一书的发现。不过我已允诺要发表什么，所以我还是写了。这本书几乎没有获得任何关注，仅仅在[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的图书馆里吃灰……

original: Finally I had published the book on my new theories, my gift to the world of medicine, but the other scholars simply laughed in my face! They say people across the realm read my book as entertainment...
translation: 终于，我发表了关于自己理论的书籍，我献给医学世界的礼物，可其他学者都对我的理论不屑一顾、恶语相向！他们说领地内的人们把我的杰作当做笑话来读……

original: Finally I am getting the recognition I deserve!
translation: 我总算得到我所应有的承认了！

original: You and your patron §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! are celebrated for your contributions to medicine.\n
translation: 你与你的赞助者§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!因为你们对医学的贡献而受人称颂。\n

original: At least I am proud of my work.
translation: 至少我是很满意我的作品的。

original: I hope I get to keep my job...
translation: 希望我不会丢掉工作……

original: They are the ones who understand nothing!
translation: 错的不是我，是世界！

original: You and your patron §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! are being ridiculed by scholars across the realm.\n
translation: 你与你的赞助者§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!沦为领地内学者们的笑柄。\n

original: Mother of my Child
translation: 我孩子的母亲

original: My court physician [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has suggested that I buy [physician.GetHerHim] some books on anatomy and herbalism so that [physician.GetSheHe] can improve [physician.GetHerHis] skills.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[physician.GetTitledFirstName]建议我买给[physician.GetHerHim]一些关于解剖学和药草学的书籍，这可以让[physician.GetSheHe]提高[physician.GetHerHis]技能。

original: My court physician [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has suggested that I buy [physician.GetHerHim] some exotic herbs and other rare ingredients so that [physician.GetSheHe] can mix advanced draughts and poultices.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[physician.GetTitledFirstName]建议我买给[physician.GetHerHim]一些异域的草药等珍贵原料，这可以让[physician.GetSheHe]混合出高级的药水和热敷剂。

original: My court physician [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has suggested that I buy [physician.GetHerHim] some better surgical tools so that [physician.GetSheHe] will be able to perform more advanced procedures.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[physician.GetTitledFirstName]建议我买给[physician.GetHerHim]一些更好的手术器具，这可以让[physician.GetSheHe]实施更高级的治疗手段。

original: My court physician [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has suggested that I buy [physician.GetHerHim] some new equipment for [physician.GetHerHis] laboratory so that [physician.GetSheHe] can perform more advanced experiments.
translation: 我的宫廷医生[physician.GetTitledFirstName]建议我买给[physician.GetHerHim]一些新的设备给[physician.GetHerHis]实验室，这可以让[physician.GetSheHe]进行更高级的实验。

original: It'd be in my best interest as well.
translation: 嗯，我觉着不错，准了。

original: Spend some money on new supplies for §Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!. This will probably allow [physician.GetHerHim] to improve [physician.GetHerHis] skills, but there are no guarantees.\n
translation: 花钱买新物资给§Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!。这或许能让[physician.GetHerHim]提高[physician.GetHerHis]技能，但也说不准。\n

original: [physician.GetFirstName] will make do with what [physician.GetSheHe] has.
translation: [physician.GetFirstName]凑合着用[physician.GetSheHe]现有的吧。

original: Do not buy any new supplies for §Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 不买新物资给§Y[physician.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] has bought me some books on anatomy and herbalism. While reading them I have gained several new insights and my mind is full of ideas I cannot wait to put into practice!
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]为我购置了些解剖学和草药学方面的书。阅读的同时我的脑中就已充满了各种新点子！我已经等不及开始付诸实践了！

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] has bought me some exotic herbs and other rare ingredients. It has enabled me to mix more advanced draughts and poultices which I could only dream of before!
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]为我购置了些异域草本和稀有药材。我总算可以尝试调制那些我以前梦寐以求的药剂、药膏了！

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] has bought me some better surgical tools. They have already made a tremendous difference during my procedures and I am a much better physician for it.
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]为我购置了些新手术器材。这极大提高了我做手术的效率！此时的我做手术与之前有天壤之别，我现在是更优秀的医生。

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] has bought me some new equipment for my laboratory. I have already performed some very advanced experiments with great success. I am really challenging myself now and learn so many new things every time!
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]为我的实验室购置些新实验器材。我已经在一些极为复杂的实验中收获了大量成果！我每时每刻都在突破自己、都在不断汲取全新的知识！

original: What a thoughtful gift!
translation: 何等恩惠！

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the new books I bought [From.GetHerHim] were extremely helpful and that [From.GetSheHe] already has a plethora of new ideas [From.GetSheHe] wants to implement.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，我买给[From.GetHerHim]的新书非常有帮助，因此[From.GetSheHe]现在有了海量的新想法，[From.GetSheHe]希望实践。

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the herbs I bought [From.GetHerHim] were extremely useful. [From.GetSheHeCap] tells me of all the advanced treatments which are now a possibility as a result.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，我买给[From.GetHerHim]的新草药非常有用。[From.GetSheHeCap]告诉我因为这些草药，所有的高级治疗方式都有可能实施了。

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the surgical tools I bought [From.GetHerHim] were extremely useful. Apparently all of [From.GetHerHis] latest surgeries have gone much better than expected as a result.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，我买给[From.GetHerHim]的手术器具非常有用。明显因为这个，[From.GetHerHis]最近的所有手术都做得比预想的更好。

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the equipment I bought for [From.GetHerHis] laboratory was extremely helpful. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] has performed some very advanced experiments and learnt a great deal as a result.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，我买给[From.GetHerHis]实验室的设备特别有帮助。显然[From.GetSheHe]因此已完成了一些非常高级的实验并学到了很多东西。

original: Excellent news!
translation: 真是好消息！

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] has bought me some books on anatomy and herbalism. While reading them I have gained some new ideas that I think might be helpful.
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]为我购置了些解剖学和草药学方面的书。我从阅读中得到了些许可能有帮助的新想法。

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] has bought me some exotic herbs and other rare ingredients. It has enabled me to mix a few new draughts and poultices which I think might come in handy.
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]为我购置了些异域草本和稀有药材。这让我能制作些许新的药水和热敷剂，也许能派上用场。

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] has bought me some better surgical tools. They have already made a notable difference during my procedures and I am a better physician for it.
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]为我购置了些新手术器材。这些器材在我手术过程中发挥显著作用，我的医术因此得到了不小的提高。

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] has bought me some new equipment for my laboratory. I have already performed some successful new experiments and picked up a few new tricks along the way.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]大人为我的实验室购置些新实验器材。我成功完成了不少新的实验，在这过程中学到了些许新技巧。

original: I should thank [From.GetTitledFirstName] the next time I meet [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 下次我遇到[From.GetTitledFirstName]我应该好好感谢[From.GetHerHim]。

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the new books I bought [From.GetHerHim] were quite helpful and that [From.GetSheHe] already has a few new ideas [From.GetSheHe] wants to implement.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，我买给[From.GetHerHim]的新书籍很有帮助，因此[From.GetSheHeCap]已有了些许新的想法，[From.GetSheHe]想要实践。

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the herbs I bought [From.GetHerHim] were quite useful. [From.GetSheHeCap] tells me that [From.GetSheHe] has made a few new concoctions which might come in handy.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，我买给[From.GetHerHim]的草药很有用。[From.GetSheHeCap]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]已制作出些许新的混合药水，可能派上用场。

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the surgical tools I bought [From.GetHerHim] were quite useful. Apparently they have made a notable difference during [From.GetHerHis] latest surgeries.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，我买给[From.GetHerHim]的草药很有用。显然它们在[From.GetHerHis]最近的手术中发挥了显著作用。

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the equipment I bought for [From.GetHerHis] laboratory was quite helpful. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] has picked up a few new tricks during [From.GetHerHis] experiments.
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，我买给[From.GetHerHis]实验室的设备很有帮助。显然[From.GetSheHe]已经在[From.GetHerHis]实验中学到了些许新技巧。

original: I am glad to hear it.
translation: 嗯，钱用到实处了就好。

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] thought it would be a nice idea to buy me some books on anatomy and herbalism, however the ones I received seem ancient! I am already familiar with the greater part of the material and the rest seems absurd...
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]觉得为我购置些解剖学和草药学方面的书籍是个好主意，可惜这些书所说都是老黄历了！除了我早就知道的，就是些荒腔走板的奇怪理论……

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] thought it would be a good idea to buy me some herbs, however as soon as I received the package I realized that [From.GetSheHe] had been tricked. It contained nothing but dried common grass.
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]觉得为我购置些草药是个好主意，可是我一拿到包裹我就意识到[From.GetSheHe]被骗了。里面装着的只是普通的干草。

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to award me with some "new" surgical tools, but the ones I received must be ancient. Anything that should be sharp is dull and that which needs to be sturdy is brittle. One tool literally broke in my hand during surgery yesterday!
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定奖励我些「新」手术器材，不过我拿到的都是老古董。应该锋利的都是钝口，应该结实的都很脆弱。一件工具昨天在我手里真的碎掉了！

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to award me with some "new" equipment for my laboratory, but these things are anything but. I can tell with a single glance that some instruments are outright dangerous to use.
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定奖励我的实验室一些「新」实验器材，但绝对不是指这些东西。我看一眼就知道一些工具用起来非常危险。

original: I do not look forward to inform [From.GetTitledFirstName] about this...
translation: 真不忍心和[From.GetTitledFirstName]说……

original: The supplies given to you by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! are totally useless.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!所购置的补给根本不堪一用。

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has reluctantly let me know that the new books I bought [From.GetHerHim] were ancient and contained nothing of value. Apparently some of the methods they describe are outright deadly!
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]不情愿地告诉我我买给[From.GetHerHim]那堆新书其实很旧而且内容一点用处都没有。里面描述的一些方法真用起来显然会致命！

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has reluctantly let me know that the herbs I bought [From.GetHerHim] were nothing but dried common grass. I have been duped!
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]不情愿地告诉我我买给[From.GetHerHim]的药草其实只是普通的干草。我被骗了！

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has reluctantly let me know that the surgical tools I bought [From.GetHerHim] were old, brittle and dull. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] performed a surgery yesterday which ended badly due to a faulty tool!
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]不情愿地告诉我我买给[From.GetHerHim]的手术器具其实都很老旧、脆弱且钝口。[From.GetSheHe]昨天做了一场特别失败的手术，显然就是因为一个有缺陷的工具！

original: My court physician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has reluctantly let me know that the equipment I bought for [From.GetHerHis] laboratory was outright dangerous to use. If [From.GetSheHe] had not noticed, maybe I would have been informed about [From.GetHerHis] demise in a laboratory accident instead...
translation: 我的宫廷医师[From.GetTitledFirstName]不情愿地告诉我我买给[From.GetHerHis]实验室的设备用起来会特别危险。如果不是[From.GetSheHe]注意到了，也许我现在知道的消息就是在实验室里[From.GetHerHis]死亡事故……

original: My research better be more thorough next time.
translation: 我下回最好小心点挑。

original: The supplies you gave your court physician §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! are totally useless.
translation: 你给§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!置办的东西根本不堪一用。

original: Thanks to my liege [physician_liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s generous patronage, I have become a renowned physician. People come from far and wide to seek my assistance and scholars throughout the realm praise my methods!
translation: 得益于我领主[physician_liege.GetTitledFirstName]的慷慨赞助，我现在是一位知名医师了。人们从四面八方远道而来只为寻求我的帮助，而且整个领地内的学者都赞颂我的医疗方法！

original: Practice certainly makes perfect!
translation: 熟方能生巧！

original: Thanks to my generous patronage, my court physician [physician.GetTitledFirstName] has become renowned for [physician.GetHerHis] talents. I hear people come from far and wide to seek [physician.GetHerHis] assistance and scholars throughout the realm praise [physician.GetHerHis] methods!
translation: 得益于我的慷慨赞助，我的宫廷医师[physician.GetTitledFirstName]现在因为[physician.GetHerHis]天赋而闻名于世。人们从四面八方远道而来只为寻求[physician.GetHerHis]帮助，而且整个领地内的学者都赞颂[physician.GetHerHis]医疗方法！

original: And it was all my doing.
translation: 哈哈！吾心甚慰！

original: Non-Aggression Pact Breaker
translation: 互不侵犯条约毁约者

original: This character has broken a Non-Aggression Pact and is considered untrustworthy
translation: 这个角色撕毁了互不侵犯条约，是个不可信任的人。

original: I should invite my [Root.GetTreasurerName], [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我应该邀请我的[Root.GetTreasurerName]，[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: I should invite my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我应该邀请我的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: I demand that you grant me a position on your council, in return for the favor you owe me.
translation: 我要求你授予我一个内阁席位，以偿还你欠我的那个人情。

original: My commander [From.GetTitledFirstName] was cornered and slain by the enemy on the battlefield. [From.GetSheHeCap] fought bravely right until the end.
translation: 我的指挥官，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，陷在乱军之中英勇牺牲了。[From.GetSheHeCap]一直英勇奋战至最后一刻。

original: This Casus Belli can be used by §Y$PRESSER$§! to press §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§! claim on the §Y$TITLE$§!.\nIf §Y$PRESSER$§! holds a higher tier title and is of the same dynasty as §Y$CLAIMANT$§!, or if §Y$PRESSER$§! is de jure liege of §Y$TITLE$§!, §Y$CLAIMANT$§! will also become a vassal of §Y$PRESSER$§!.
translation: 此宣战理由可由§Y$PRESSER$§!使用，要求索取§Y$CLAIMANT$§!对于§Y$TITLE$§!的宣称。\n如果§Y$PRESSER$§!握有任何更高级的头衔并且与§Y$CLAIMANT$§!属于同一家族，或者如果§Y$PRESSER$§!是§Y$TITLE$§!的法理领主，§Y$CLAIMANT$§!也会成为§Y$PRESSER$§!的封臣。

original: Long Live the New Ruler
translation: 新主万岁

original: I introduced [friends_friend.GetTitledName] to [start_friend.GetTitledName] hoping they could get along but apparently [From.GetTitledName] was not interested in making an effort.
translation: 我介绍[friends_friend.GetTitledName]给[start_friend.GetTitledName]认识，希望他们能成为好朋友。但现在看来，[From.GetTitledName]对此毫无兴趣。

original: [From.GetTitledName] frowned upon my suggestion to arrange another meeting, clearly not interested in making new friends.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]一听我说要再约一次，登时脸就垮了下来——看来这家伙是一点都不想交新朋友了。

original: §YYou can Open the Gates§!
translation: §Y你可以打开宫门§!

original: When you feel safe you can reopen your gates and welcome the outside world once again.
translation: 若你感到安全了，你可以重开宫门，再度欢迎外部世界。

original: §YYou can Shut the Gates§!
translation: §Y你可以关上宫门§!

original: When an epidemic is threatening your court, you can shut the gates. Characters in seclusion will have a hard time communicating with the outside world but should avoid infection from outside sources.
translation: 假如有瘟疫威胁你的宫廷，你可以关闭宫门。隔离中的角色很难与外界交流，但应该能避免外界感染。

original: During an Epidemic rulers can §YShut the Gates§! to avoid contact with the commoners and hopefully be safe from infection.
translation: 瘟疫爆发中，统治者可以§Y关上宫门§!，防止与平民接触，以期不被感染。

original: §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! secludes [Root.GetHerselfHimself] with [Root.GetHerHis] courtiers\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!把[Root.GetHerselfHimself]和[Root.GetHerHis]廷臣一起隔离了\n

original: §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! opens up the gates and comes out of seclusion but the common people will remember [Root.GetHerHis] neglect for some time.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!打开宫门，走出隔离，但一段时间内平民会记得[Root.GetHerHis]不管不顾。\n

original: I know [Root.Reincarnation.GetSheHe] kept a diary.
translation: 我知道[Root.Reincarnation.GetSheHe]有记日记的习惯。

original: Make an effort to learn more about [Root.Reincarnation.GetFirstName].
translation: 花更多时间了解[Root.Reincarnation.GetFirstName]。

original: [From.GetFirstName] was delirious at the end.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]最终精神错乱了。

original: Ignore my [GetFromRelation]'s ramblings.
translation: 无视我的[GetFromRelation]的胡扯。

original: [Root.Reincarnation.GetFirstName] wrote about [Root.Reincarnation.GetHerHis] views and experiences, but they sound very different from my own. However, in this diary something 'valuable' is described, along with instructions on how to get to it.
translation: [Root.Reincarnation.GetFirstName]记载了[Root.Reincarnation.GetHerHis]观点和经历，但都与我的大不一样。不过，日记里还描述了一些「有价值」的东西，以及如何获得它的指示。

original: How Intriguing. I'll investigate.
translation: 真有趣，我要调查一下。

original: Go find the 'valuables'
translation: 去寻找「有价值」的东西

original: I have better things to do.
translation: 我还有更重要的事情去做。\n

original: Stop looking into the past.\n
translation: 停止探寻过去。\n

original: In [Root.Reincarnation.GetHerHis] old chambers, underneath the floorboards covered by the bed there is a small box left behind by [Root.Reincarnation.GetFirstName]. As I open it up to see its contents a shiver runs along my spine. The box is empty...
translation: 在[Root.Reincarnation.GetHerHis]旧房间里，床所在的地板下方埋着一个[Root.Reincarnation.GetFirstName]留下的小盒子。我打开查看里面的内容，一股凉意从尾椎骨升上来。盒子是空的……

original: I feel so strange.
translation: 我感觉这太奇怪了。

original: Following the instructions I finally find a locked box with some hidden jewelry of noticeable value.
translation: 按照指示，我终于找到了一个上锁的盒子，里面藏有价值可观的珠宝。

original: Curiosity pays off.
translation: 好奇有了回报。

original: Watching a group of children at play, you suddenly remember another child, little [target_child.GetFirstName], who was yours when you were in the world as [Root.Reincarnation.GetBestName].
translation: 看着一群孩子在玩闹，你突然回想起另一个孩童，小[target_child.GetFirstName]，是你作为[Root.Reincarnation.GetBestName]时所生。

original: Your newborn [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is already starting to show some character during [From.GetHerHis] active hours. [From.GetSheHeCap] has a very strong personality for an infant, and the eyes, those are your [GetFromReincarnationRelation]'s eyes.
translation: 你新出生的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]已经开始显现出[From.GetHerHis]生前的性格特点。[From.GetSheHeCap]作为一名婴儿有太强的个性，而那双眼睛，是你[GetFromReincarnationRelation]的眼睛。

original: My [GetFromReincarnationRelation] reborn!
translation: 我的[GetFromReincarnationRelation]重生了！

original: No, it cannot be.
translation: 不，这不可能。

original: Abandoned the Commoners
translation: 放弃平民

original: Does NOT like $WHO|Y$ better than $THAN|Y$.
translation: 比起$THAN|Y$，不会更喜欢$WHO|Y$。

original: Likes $WHO|Y$ better than $THAN|Y$.
translation: 喜欢$WHO|Y$更胜于$THAN|Y$。

original: Recruit Prisoner
translation: 招募囚犯

original: Offer to release §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§! from prison in return for [Root.GetPossPronoun] service.
translation: 提出释放§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§!，如果[Root.GetPossPronoun]能为我服务。

original: Recruit [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 招募[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been released from prison by the perfidious [FromFrom.GetBestName] in return for [From.GetPossPronoun] services.
translation: 背信弃义的[FromFrom.GetBestName]已经释放了我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，但要求[From.GetPossPronoun]服务。

original: Disappointing but understandable...
translation: 失望但能理解……

original: The Price of Decadence
translation: 腐化的代价

original: Bloated fools...
translation: 傲慢的蠢货……

original: Raise up a suitable lesser courtier or local to govern this Holding as a vassal.
translation: 提拔一名合适的低阶廷臣或当地人作为封臣治理这片地产。

original: All Vassal Opinions lowered by §R-5§! for §Y25§! Months. §Y(Introduced Insane Law)§!\n
translation: §Y25§! 月内，所有封臣好感降低 §R-5§!。§Y（实行荒谬法律）§!\n

original: All Dynasty Member Opinions lowered by §R-5§! for §Y10§! Years. §Y(Disrespects Dynasty)§!\n
translation: §Y10§! 年内，所有家族成员好感降低 §R-5§!。§Y（不敬家族）§!\n

original: Leader Traits fewer than
translation: 领袖特质少于

original: Leader Traits at least
translation: 领袖特质至少

original: Is in Seclusion
translation: 隔离中

original: Is NOT in Seclusion
translation: 不在隔离中

original: Allows additional succession laws\nVassals who refuse liege interference in wars are seen as traitors\n
translation: 允许额外的继承法\n拒绝领主干涉战争的封臣将被视为叛徒\n

original: Disallows additional succession laws\nVassals may refuse liege interference in wars\n
translation: 不允许额外的继承法\n封臣可以拒绝领主干涉战争\n

original: My intense study of warfare has led to an increased understanding of tactics and strategy.
translation: 认真学习战事让我对于战术和战略有了更深的认识。

original: Time for a good war?
translation: 是时候开战了？

original: Through staged wargames and large-scale exercises, I feel confident I can master one of the main military disciplines.
translation: 通过分阶段的战争游戏和大规模的操练，我自信能掌握一门主要的军事学科。

original: In numbers, Light Foot will win any battle
translation: 只要数量够多，轻步兵能打赢任何一场战斗

original: Heavy Foot is key
translation: 重步兵是中流砥柱

original: Mounted warriors, of course
translation: 骑兵才是首选

original: None can stand against Elephants!
translation: 螳臂当象！

original: No, I seek another area of expertise...
translation: 还是算了，我想要其他领域的专长……

original: Terrain is key to winning battles. If I focus my studies, I believe I can master the tactics of one type of terrain...
translation: 地形是打赢战斗的关键。如果我专注于此，我相信能掌握某种地形的战术……

original: Open plains suit my needs best
translation: 开阔平原最适合我

original: Forests and hills are my domain
translation: 森林和丘陵是我的主场

original: Mountainous terrain, of course
translation: 崇山峻岭才对

original: Desert warfare is the natural choice
translation: 沙漠战争是自然之选

original: The cold and snow of winter!
translation: 凛冬将至！

original: My studies and training have taught me the general tactics of flanks and center, but I can hardly master everything...
translation: 我的学习和训练教会我侧翼和中军的一般技巧，但我很难掌控一切……

original: If the Center cannot hold, the battle is over
translation: 中军顶不住，战斗就结束

original: Outflanking the enemy is tried and true
translation: 侧翼包围的战术经受住了历史的考验

original: I must learn to create Choke Points
translation: 一定要学会创造咽喉点

original: The main secret is to be unpredictable
translation: 主要的秘诀是无法预测

original: In my studies of warfare, I've come to realize that clever tactics on the battlefield is only part of the story: There are other disciplines of equal importance.
translation: 学习战事，让我领悟到战场上聪明的战术只是故事的一部分：还有其他学科一样重要。

original: Inspire the men and they will invade Hell for you
translation: 激励士兵，他们能为你入侵地狱

original: It's not glamorous, but wars are won through sieges
translation: 虽然不刺激，但战争最终要靠围攻胜利

original: Armies must move with speed!
translation: 兵贵神速！

original: Men fight, but [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] decides who wins!
translation: 凡人战斗，但[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]决定胜者！

original: Allahu Akbar!
translation: 安拉至大！

original: Offense or defense, that is the question...
translation: 进攻还是防守，这是一个问题……

original: A spirited charge will break any line!
translation: 无畏的冲击将击破任何防线！

original: Dead men do not get to fight another day...
translation: 死人无法再战……

original: A solid rock breaks the best steel. My men will be that rock.
translation: 磐石可碎精钢。我的士兵就是磐石。

original: How can I rely on my generals when their understanding of warfare is so lacking compared to my own? I could teach [my_student.GetTitledFirstName] a thing or two...
translation: 我的将军对于战事的了解与我相去甚远，要我如何信赖他们？我或许可以教导[my_student.GetTitledFirstName]一二……

original: Lecture [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] on Light Foot
translation: 对[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]作关于轻步兵的演讲

original: Lecture [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] on Heavy Foot
translation: 对[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]作关于重步兵的演讲

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] Cavalry tactics
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]骑兵战术

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] to inspire [my_student.GetPossPronoun] men
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]如何激励[my_student.GetPossPronoun]士兵

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] to be a Trickster
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]成为欺诈师

original: Lecture [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] on rapid movement
translation: 对[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]作关于快速移动的演讲

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] Defensive tactics
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]防御战术

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] to lead the Centre
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]带领中军

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] to lead a Flank
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]带领侧翼

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] to be aggressive in combat
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]在战斗中进攻

original: Lecture [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] on Siege warfare
translation: 对[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]作关于围攻战的演讲

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] to be unyielding
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]坚守不屈

original: Lecture [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] on Choke Points
translation: 对[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]作关于咽喉点的演讲

original: Lecture [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] on Flat Terrain
translation: 对[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]作关于平原地形的演讲

original: Lecture [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] on Rough Terrain
translation: 对[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]作关于崎岖地形的演讲

original: Lecture [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] on Mountain Terrain
translation: 对[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]作关于山岭地形的演讲

original: Lecture [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] on Desert Terrain
translation: 对[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]作关于沙漠地形的演讲

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] to crush the Heretic and the Infidel!
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]击溃异端和异教徒

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] the secrets of General Winter
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]冬将军的秘密

original: Teach [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] the proper use of War Elephants
translation: 教导[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]恰当的使用战象

original: Lecture [my_student.GetObjectPronoun] on Jungle warfare
translation: 对[my_student.GetObjectPronoun]作关于丛林战事的演讲

original: No, I'd better keep my wisdom to myself...
translation: 不了，我最好守住自己的智慧……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] gratefully accepted my lessons on the art of war. With more generals like me, who can stand against us?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]感激地聆听关于兵法的课程。有更多像我一样的将军，谁能挡我？

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] unwisely decided to decline my offer to teach [From.GetObjectPronoun] the deeper secrets of warfare.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]愚钝地拒绝了，不让我教导[From.GetObjectPronoun]战事更精深的秘密。

original: The [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: [GetRootFromInsult]！

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me the proper use of Light Foot in battle...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我战斗中轻步兵的正确用法……

original: Gratefully Accept!
translation: 感激地接受！

original: Graciously Decline
translation: 优雅地拒绝

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me the proper use of Heavy Foot in battle...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我战斗中重步兵的正确用法……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me all [From.GetSubjectPronoun] knows about Cavalry Tactics...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我[From.GetSubjectPronoun]全部关于骑兵的所知……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to inspire the troops...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我如何激励部队……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to be a trickster in battle...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我战斗中如何成为欺诈师……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to move armies rapidly...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我如何带领部队快速移动……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me the secrets of defensive battle...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我防守战斗的秘密……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to properly lead the Center in battle...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我战斗中如何正确地带领中军……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to properly lead a Flank in battle...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我战斗中如何正确地带领侧翼……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me the secrets of furious aggression in battle...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我战斗中激烈进攻的秘密……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me the secrets of Siege warfare...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我围攻战事的秘密……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to make my troops unyielding...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我如何让部队坚守不屈……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to exploit Choke Points in battle...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我战斗中如何利用咽喉点……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to best fight in Open terrain...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我如何最好地在开阔地形战斗……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to best fight in Rough terrain...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我如何最好地在崎岖地形战斗……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to best fight in Mountainous terrain...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我如何最好地在山岭地形战斗……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me the secrets of Desert warfare...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我沙漠战事的秘密……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to smite the Heretic and the Infidel in battle!
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我在战斗中如何猛击异端和异教徒！

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me the secrets of General Winter...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我冬将军的秘密……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me the proper use of War Elephants...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我战象的正确使用方式……

original: My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is offering to teach me how to best fight in the Jungle...
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，提出教导我如何最好地在丛林战斗……

original: End Vassal War
translation: 结束封臣战争

original: Peace with [FromFrom.Defender.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
translation: 与[FromFrom.Defender.PrimaryTitle.GetName]和平

original: Demand that §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! end the §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§! against §Y[FromFrom.Defender.GetTitledName]§! and accept a White Peace. [This.GetSubjectPronounCap] might refuse or ask for something in return...
translation: 要求§Y[This.GetTitledName]§!结束§Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!对§Y[FromFrom.Defender.GetTitledName]§!的战争并接受无条件和平。[This.GetSubjectPronounCap]可能拒绝或要求回报……

original: End Vassal War
translation: 结束封臣战争

original: End War with [FromFrom.Defender.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 结束与[FromFrom.Defender.GetTitledFirstName]的战争

original: Demand that §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! end the §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§! against §Y[FromFrom.Defender.GetTitledName]§! and accept a White Peace.
translation: 要求§Y[This.GetTitledName]§!结束§Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!对§Y[FromFrom.Defender.GetTitledName]§!的战争并接受无条件和平。

original: Refused to End War
translation: 拒绝结束战争

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

While I understand your reasons and respect your ambition, I need you to end your destructive war against [target_defender.GetTitledName]. I am sure we could come to some arrangement.

With respect, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

虽我明晓你的原由，尊重你的志向，但我希望结束你与[target_defender.GetTitledName]毁灭性的战争。我确信我们可以达成一致。

充满敬意的，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Ask for Money
translation: 要求金钱

original: [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] will owe me a Favor...
translation: [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]将欠我一个人情……

original: Anything for my liege!
translation: 一切为了领主！

original: Respectfully refuse
translation: 恭敬地拒绝

original: Traitorously Refuse
translation: 叛逆地拒绝

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

While my grievance with [target_defender.GetTitledName] will remain, I would not dream of refusing such a reasonable request by my liege!

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

虽然我与[target_defender.GetTitledName]的怨恨仍将存留，我从不敢妄想拒绝来自领主的如此合理的要求！

你忠心的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I have arranged for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] to end [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] unjust war against you with a White Peace.

With respect, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我已为[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]结束[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]与你之间不义的战争安排了无条件和平。

充满敬意的，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My liege is gracious!
translation: 我竟有如此仁慈的领主！

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am willing to end my war against [target_defender.GetTitledName] in return for a modest sum of money. This affair has been costly, and a white peace means a loss of face.

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我愿意结束与[target_defender.GetTitledName]的战争，但要以适度的金钱作为回报。战事耗费甚多，且无条件和平有损我的脸面。

你忠心的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Very well, this war must end!
translation: 很好，这场战争必须结束！

original: I cannot afford that...
translation: 我付不起……

original:
To my vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am willing to compensate you for your lost prestige in your acceptance of a white peace with [target_defender.GetTitledName]. I am pleased the affair is ended.

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我愿意补偿你损失的威望，因你接受了与[target_defender.GetTitledName]的无条件和平。我很高兴战事将结束。

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

Although I understand you want compensation for your acceptance of a white peace in your war against with [target_defender.GetTitledName], I cannot afford the sum you requested. Good luck on the battlefield!

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

尽管我明晓你想要补偿，方能接受与[target_defender.GetTitledName]战争的无条件和平，但我无法偿付你要求的金额。祝你在战场上好运！

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I will win anyway!
translation: 随便，我会赢的！

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

While it grieves me deeply, I simply cannot end my war with [target_defender.GetTitledName] at this time. The die has been cast.

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我的[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

虽然我悲痛不已，但我此时就是无法结束与[target_defender.GetTitledName]的战争。骰子已经掷出。

你忠心的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Most unfortunate...
translation: 真不幸……

original: The law says this is treason!
translation: 法律绝不允许这种叛国行为！

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
