I am willing to end my war against [target_defender.GetTitledName]. However, the affair has been costly and I would lose face, so you would owe me a comparable Favor...

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我很愿意结束与[target_defender.GetTitledName]的战争。可是，战事耗费甚多而我又将失脸面，所以你将欠我一个相应的人情……

你忠心的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: No, I will not be in debt to [From.GetObjectPronoun]
translation: 不，我不会欠[From.GetObjectPronoun]什么东西

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I realize you will lose prestige in your acceptance of a white peace with [target_defender.GetTitledName]. I am in your debt, and promise to assist you when you ask for a favor.

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我知晓你将损失威望，因你接受了与[target_defender.GetTitledName]的无条件和平。我欠你这个人情，并保证会在你要求时帮助你。

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

Although I understand you seek compensation for your acceptance of a white peace in your war against with [target_defender.GetTitledName], I will not be indebted to you. Good luck on the battlefield!

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

尽管我寻求补偿，方能接受与[target_defender.GetTitledName]战争的无条件和平，但我不会欠你这个人情。祝你在战场上好运！

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am calling in that favor you owe me. I need you to stop your war against [target_defender.GetTitledName] immediately and accept a white peace...

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我要求你偿还欠我的那个人情。我需要你立刻停止与[target_defender.GetTitledName]的战争并接受无条件和平……

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I cannot refuse
translation: 我无法拒绝

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

Of course I will end my war with [target_defender.GetTitledName], but I am no longer in your debt...

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

毫无疑问我将结束与[target_defender.GetTitledName]的战争，但我不再欠你人情了……

你忠心的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Surrender in Vassal War
translation: 在封臣战争中投降

original: Surrender to [FromFrom.Attacker.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
translation: 向[FromFrom.Attacker.PrimaryTitle.GetName]投降

original: Demand that §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! surrender in the §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§! against §Y[FromFrom.Attacker.GetTitledName]§!. [This.GetSubjectPronounCap] might refuse or ask for something in return...
translation: 要求§Y[This.GetTitledName]§!在§Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!对§Y[FromFrom.Attacker.GetTitledName]§!的战争中投降。[This.GetSubjectPronounCap]可能拒绝或要求回报……

original: Surrender in Vassal War
translation: 在封臣战争中投降

original: Surrender to [FromFrom.Attacker.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
translation: 向[FromFrom.Attacker.PrimaryTitle.GetName]投降

original: Demand that §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! surrender in the §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§! against §Y[FromFrom.Attacker.GetTitledName]§!, calling in the Favor [This.GetSubjectPronoun] owes you.
translation: 要求§Y[This.GetTitledName]§!在§Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!对§Y[FromFrom.Attacker.GetTitledName]§!的战争中投降，以偿还[This.GetSubjectPronoun]欠你的人情。

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

You must surrender to [target_attacker.GetTitledName]. [target_attacker.GetPossPronounCap] cause is just. However, I am a reasonable [FromFrom.GetManWoman] and I am sure we could come to some arrangement.

With respect, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

你必须向[target_attacker.GetTitledName]投降。[target_attacker.GetPossPronounCap]的理由是正义的。不过，我是一个讲道理的[FromFrom.GetManWoman]并且我确信我们能达成一致。

充满敬意的，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] will owe me a big Favor for this!
translation: [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]将为此欠我一个大人情！

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I stand to lose much in [target_attacker.GetTitledName]'s war of aggression, but I would never dream of refusing you, my liege!

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我将在[target_attacker.GetTitledName]的侵略战争中损失惨重，但我绝不敢妄想拒绝你，我的领主！

你忠心的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I have arranged for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] to surrender to you and accept the outcome. One day, I might call on you to repay this favor...

With respect, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我已安排[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]向你投降并接受后果。总有一天，我会要求你偿还这个人情。

充满敬意的[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

Though I stand to lose much, I am willing to surrender to [target_attacker.GetTitledName] in return for a large sum of money. I am sure you understand.

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

尽管我将损失惨重，我仍愿意向[target_attacker.GetTitledName]投降以换取一大笔金钱。我相信你能理解。

你忠心的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am willing to compensate you for your lost prestige in your acceptance of a white peace with [target_defender.GetTitledName]. I am pleased the affair is ended.

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我的封臣[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我愿意为你接受与[target_defender.GetTitledName]的无条件和平而损失的威望提供补偿。我乐见此事了结。

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

Your wish for monetary compensation is understandable. One does not surrender easily. However, I cannot afford the sum you requested. Good luck on the battlefield!

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

你期望获得金钱上的补偿，是可以理解的。没人能轻易投降。不过，我付不起你索要的数额。祝你在战场上好运！

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I shall win this war!
translation: 我会打赢这仗！

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I wish I could comply with your desire, but I cannot simply surrender to the dastardly [target_attacker.GetTitledName]. I stand to lose too much!

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我也希望我能遵从你的要求，但我就是无法向卑鄙的[target_attacker.GetTitledName]投降。我已准备好承受最严重的损失！

你的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am willing to surrender to [target_attacker.GetTitledName]. However, the loss would be devastating, so you would owe me a comparable Favor...

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我愿意向[target_attacker.GetTitledName]投降。不过，因此造成惨重的损失，所以你将欠我一个相应的人情……

你忠心的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I know full well what you stand to lose by surrendering to [target_attacker.GetTitledName]. I am in your debt, and promise to assist you when you ask for a favor in return!

Most gratefully, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我完全知晓你因为向[target_attacker.GetTitledName]投降而遭受的损失。这是我欠你的，而且我允诺将帮助你，只要你提出要我偿还人情！

最感激的，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I understand your reluctance to surrender in this war with [target_attacker.GetTitledName], which to you must seem deeply unjust. However, I will not be indebted to you. Good luck on the battlefield!

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

I我理解你不情愿在这场与[target_attacker.GetTitledName]的战争中投降，因其在你看来完全是非正义的。不过，我也不会因此欠你什么。祝你在战场上好运！

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am calling in that favor you owe me. Though I realize what it will cost you, I need you to surrender to [target_attacker.GetTitledName]. Trust me, it is for the best...

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠心的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我要求你偿还欠我的人情。尽管我知道这将让你付出什么，我还是需要你向[target_attacker.GetTitledName]投降。相信我，这是最好的结果……

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

Surrendering to the loathsome [target_attacker.GetTitledName] makes me ill, but I am an honorable [From.GetManWoman] and acknowledge the favor I owe you. The debt has now been repaid.

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

向令人作呕的[target_attacker.GetTitledName]投降让我浑身不舒服，但我是一位有荣誉感的[From.GetManWoman]并承认我欠你的人情。现在债已两清了。

你忠心的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: For a long time now, you have not felt the presence of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] in your thoughts. You are starting to question whether the gods exist at all, or if they are just tales people made up to explain the world...
translation: 长久以来，你都无法在你的思想中感受到[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的存在。你开始质疑神到底是否存在，或者只是人们创作的故事，用来解释这个世界……

original: Perish these blasphemous thoughts!
translation: 清除这些亵渎的想法！

original: I've come to realize that world is a full of mystery and wonder. I am no longer Cynical.
translation: 我最终意识到，世界充满了神秘与奇迹。我不再愤世嫉俗。

original: As I prayed before the altar, I was suddenly filled with an overwhelming sense of love. Crying with joy, I knew that I am never truly alone. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is always with me.
translation: 当我在祭坛前祈祷时，压倒一切的爱之感受突然充满了我。我喜极而泣，知晓自己从不是孤独的。[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]一直与我同在。

original: As I cut the throat of the ram, it suddenly stopped struggling and looked me straight in the eyes. Even as its blood filled the grooves on the altar, I knew that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] was with me!
translation: 当我切开这只公羊的喉咙，它突然停止挣扎，直直地盯着我的眼睛。就在它的血填满祭坛的沟槽时，我知道[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]与我同在！

original: At Isha prayer, my mind was suddenly filled with a vision of the Prophet, riding Al-Buraq through the starry skies with a sword in his hand. It felt more real than waking life...
translation: 在行宵礼时，我的意识突然充满了先知的景象，他骑着布拉克，穿过群星闪耀的天空，手持一把利剑。这景象比清醒的生活还要真实……

original: Deep in meditation, I felt the most intense bliss I have ever experienced as a great energy traveled up my spine, opening my Chakras to my own eternal being. Om Namah Shivaya!
translation: 沉浸于冥想之中，一股强大的能量由下往上行过脊柱，我感受到此生最强烈的幸福，将我的查克拉向我的永恒存在敞开。唵南嘛湿婆耶！

original: I feel energized!
translation: 我感到充满能量！

original: Yet another morning when I wake up feeling as tired as when I went to bed. I should do something about my listless mind... Perhaps I need to spend some time alone.
translation: 但第二天起床，我感到与昨天睡前一样疲惫。我应该整理我无序的思维……或许需要一段独处的时间。

original: Seclude myself in prayer and meditation
translation: 将自己与世隔绝，祈祷与冥想

original: Bah! I'll get over it eventually.
translation: 去他的！我会顶过去的。

original: I have gained a newfound respect for the hermits of old! My time spent fasting and praying in seclusion has done me good. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] has helped me strengthen my mind.
translation: 我获得了对古代隐修士新的敬意！闭关期间的禁食与祈祷对我很有好处。[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]帮助我加强了我的思维。

original: Secluded in my cave, I have subsisted only on the sacred roots and bitter juices favored by the priests. My thoughts are clear: It is by will alone I set my mind in motion.
translation: 与世隔绝在山洞里，我只以神圣的草木根和苦涩的汁液维生，这些都是祭司们钟爱的。我的思想变得清晰：让思维活动的仅有意志。

original: Secluded in my cave, meditating on the teachings of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I have gained better control over my thoughts and desires.
translation: 与世隔绝在山洞里，冥想[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的教导，我能更好的控制自己的思想和欲望。

original: Curled up safely in the badger's den, I've steeled my mind against the ululating shadow men who stalk me outside. I wonder how long I have been holed up in here?
translation: 安全的窝在獾的巢穴里，我的思维已经武装好，可以对付外面那个跟踪我的哀嚎阴影。我疑惑自己在这里呆了多久？

original: Time to cut down on the beer
translation: 是时候戒啤酒了

original: Too much food harms the body and dulls the mind
translation: 太多的食物会伤害身体、迟钝思维

original: I have been idle for too long
translation: 我已经懒散太久了

original: I must curb my lust
translation: 我必须克制我的色欲

original: Praise [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]! I can see again!
translation: 赞美[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]！我又能看见了！

original: My loins are on fire! Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
translation: 我两腰间如同着火！赞美[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]！

original: The pox... It's gone! Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
translation: 疱疹……消失了！赞美[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]！

original: I can feel my face again! My leprosy is healed!
translation: 我又能感受到我的脸了！我的麻风治好了！

original: The accursed wailing... is almost quiet now.
translation: 那可怕的哀嚎……现在几乎安静了。

original: I resolve to be a better [Root.GetManWoman]
translation: 我决定成为一个更好的[Root.GetManWoman]

original: De Jure Assimilation Duration
translation: 法理同化历时

original: Sub-realms take 100 years to integrate into a De Jure Realm.
translation: 次级领地需要 100 年去变为上级法理领地的一部分。

original: Long
translation: 长

original: Sub-realms take 300 years to integrate into a De Jure Realm.
translation: 次级领地需要 300 年去变为上级法理领地的一部分。

original: Short
translation: 短

original: Sub-realms take 50 years to integrate into a De Jure Realm.
translation: 次级领地需要 50 年去变为上级法理领地的一部分。

original: Very Short
translation: 极短

original: Sub-realms take 10 years to integrate into a De Jure Realm.
translation: 次级领地需要 10 年去变为上级法理领地的一部分。

original: From County Modifiers: §Y$AMOUNT$§!
translation: 省份修正：§Y$AMOUNT$§!

original: Military Technology Points
translation: 军事科技点

original: Economy Technology Points
translation: 经济科技点

original: Culture Technology Points
translation: 文化科技点

original: §Y$NAME$§! is in seclusion with their court
translation: §Y$NAME$§!及其宫廷正处于隔离中

original: Game must be played in §YIronman§! mode
translation: 游戏必须运行在§Y铁人§!模式里

original: No §YGame Rule§! must disable achievements
translation: 没有§Y游戏规则§!禁止成就

original: No §YUser Modification§! that change the game's checksum must be active
translation: 没有影响游戏文件校验的§Y用户修改§!正在生效

original: §YSteam§! must be active
translation: §YSteam§!必需运行中

original: $RULE$ : $OPTION$
translation: $RULE$：$OPTION$

original: §YReset Rules§!\nReset all rules to their default values.
translation: §Y重置规则§!\n将全部规则重置为默认值。

original: §RNo Hospital§! in this county!
translation: 这个省份§R没有医院§!！

original: With no §YHospital§! in the county, it has no protection against disease or depopulation. Hospitals are built via the Extended Province View.
translation: 由于没有§Y医院§!，这个省份对疾病和人口减少没有任何防护措施。医院通过省份扩展界面修建。

original: §YLevel $LEVEL$ Hospital§!
translation: §Y$LEVEL$ 级医院§!

original: The local §YHospital§! provides $DISEASE_RESISTANCE$ resistance to disease, and $DEPOPULATION_PROTECTION$.
translation: 本地§Y医院§!提供了 $DISEASE_RESISTANCE$ 的防疫能力，及 $DEPOPULATION_PROTECTION$。

original: Disease Resistance: $VALUE$
translation: 防疫能力：$VALUE$

original: Depopulation Protection: $VALUE|Y$
translation: 人口减少防护等级：$VALUE|Y$

original: a §GMinor§! protection against depopulation
translation: 对人口减少§G低级§!的防护

original: a §GMedium§! protection against depopulation
translation: 对人口减少§G中级§!的防护

original: a §GMajor§! protection against depopulation
translation: 对人口减少§G高级§!的防护

original: §YMinor§!
translation: §Y低级§!

original: §YMedium§!
translation: §Y中级§!

original: §YMajor§!
translation: §Y高级§!

original: Executed my Countrymen
translation: 处决我的同胞

original: The county has a total §YDisease Resistance§! of $VALUE$.\n$SOURCES$\nA higher §YDisease Resistance§! will make epidemic outbreaks less likely to occur in and spread into the county.
translation: 该省份总计拥有 $VALUE$ 的§Y防疫能力§!。\n$SOURCES$\n省份的§Y疾病抵抗力§!越高，传染病在本地爆发及外地传入的可能性越低。

original: Hospital Owner
translation: 医院所有者

original: §YHospitals§!
translation: §Y医院§!

original: Level $LEVEL|Y$
translation: 等级 $LEVEL|Y$

original: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! has a contagious disease
translation: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§!得了传染病

original: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! is sick
translation: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§!生病了

original: Major province modifier lost
translation: 失去主要省份修正

original: The county of $PROVINCE|Y$ lost its modifier '$MODIFIER|Y$'
translation: $PROVINCE|Y$省份失去了修正「$MODIFIER|Y$」

original: Major province modifier gained
translation: 获得主要省份修正

original: The county of $PROVINCE|Y$ gained '$MODIFIER|Y$'
translation: $PROVINCE|Y$省份获得了修正「$MODIFIER|Y$」

original: §YCrown Focus§!
translation: §Y统治重心§!

original: $PROVINCE|Y$ is your current §YCrown Focus§! and, as such, is more likely to prosper and develop
translation: $PROVINCE|Y$是你目前的§Y统治重心§!，并因此更有可能繁荣和发展

original: $PROVINCE|Y$ is the current §YCrown Focus§! of $OWNER|Y$ and, as such, is more likely to prosper and develop
translation: $PROVINCE|Y$是$OWNER|Y$目前的§Y统治重心§!，并因此更有可能繁荣和发展

original: §YMake Crown Focus§!
translation: §Y设置统治重心§!

original: You can make $PROVINCE|Y$ your §YCrown Focus§! to make it more likely to prosper and develop:
translation: 你可以使$PROVINCE|Y$成为你的§Y统治重心§!，以使其更有可能繁荣和发展：

original: From Hospital buildings: $VALUE$
translation: 来自医院建筑：$VALUE$

original: Set Crown Focus in [Root.GetName]
translation: 在[Root.GetName]设置统治重心

original: In a §YDefensive Pact§! together
translation: 同在一个§Y防御协定§!中

original: I can expel the Holy Order to finally be rid of them from my realm! But I must be sure of this. Once expelled, I will not be able to allow them back.
translation: 我可以驱逐骑士团，让他们从我的领地里彻底滚蛋！但是我必须三思而后行，一旦驱逐了他们，就没法再让他们回来。

original: Drive them all out!
translation: 把他们全赶出去！

original: I'll permit them to stay. For now.
translation: 我暂时允许他们留下。

original: Is NOT already considering to expel the Holy Order
translation: 不在考虑驱逐骑士团

original: Expel the Holy Order from the realm.
translation: 将骑士团驱逐出领地。

original: Expel the Holy Order and confiscate any land they have within the realm
translation: 驱逐骑士团，并没收领地内骑士团下属的所有土地

original: Allow the Holy Order to remain within the realm
translation: 允许骑士团继续留在领地内

original: Military Innovations
translation: 军事创新

original: Economic Innovations
translation: 经济创新

original: A eunuch named §Y[eunuch_gift.GetFullName]§! arrives at your court
translation: 一个名叫§Y[eunuch_gift.GetFullName]§!的宦官来到了你的宫廷

original: vanished without a trace
translation: 消失无踪

original: Hospitals can be built in any county you control for a cost of §Y$COST$§!¤. Hospitals are constructed to increase the §YDisease Resistance§! of a county, which reduces the chance of epidemic outbreaks to occur in and spread into the county. It will also provide some protection against §YDepopulation§!.
translation: 医院可以修建在你控制下的任意省份，需要花费 §Y$COST$§!¤。建设医院以增强§Y防疫能力§!，这会减小传染病在省份本地爆发或从外地传入的几率。医院同样会提供防护以对抗§Y人口减少§!。

original: Your precious cat has the ability of always knowing when you are in need of comfort. Appearing as if out of nowhere only to jump up on your lap and purr softly to your gentle stroking.
translation: 你珍爱的猫咪总是知道你什么时候需要安慰。它仿若凭空出现，只为了跳上你的膝盖，在你的轻抚下发出舒服的呼噜声。

original: What greater gift than the love of a cat?
translation: 有什么礼物能比一只猫咪的爱更好呢？

original: Being at sea for a long time has made me feel ill. And it is not a matter of being seasick mind you. I feel very tired, have constant pain in my legs and whenever I wake up, my joints ache all over.
translation: 长时间漂泊在海上让我感觉自己生病了，而这并不是晕船的缘故。我感觉非常疲惫，我的腿一直疼，只要我醒着，我的关节就一直痛个不停。

original: Maybe we should head back to port...
translation: 或许我们应该掉头回港……

original: After being examined by my physician [From.GetFirstName], [From.GetSheHe] told me to take it easy during the coming weeks. I am also instructed to eat a special diet consisting mostly of fruit and vegetables in order to cure my Scurvy.
translation: 在被我的医师[From.GetFirstName]检查过后，[From.GetSheHe]让我在接下来几周里放轻松。为了治好我的坏血病，还要求我吃以蔬菜水果为主要组成的特殊食谱。

original: If you say so.
translation: 既然你这么说。

original: After eating plenty of different fruit and vegetables, I finally feel well. The pain is gone and I am in a much better state! I am sure to avoid scurvy if I eat an orange.
translation: 在吃了一大堆不同的蔬菜水果之后，我终于感觉舒服了些。疼痛都消失了，我状态好多了！我相信只要我吃个橘子就能避免坏血病。

original: Er... door hinge?
translation: 呃……门轴？

original: Scurvy
translation: 坏血病

original: This character has scurvy - fatigue, bleeding, spots on the skin, and if left untreated may cause loss of teeth, fever and eventually death.
translation: 这个角色得了坏血病——疲乏、出血、皮下瘀点，如果继续不采取治疗还可能导致牙齿脱落、发烧，最终甚至死亡。

original: of Scurvy
translation: 坏血病

original: Pilgrims pass through the hospital in [pilgrim_physician_hospital.GetName] all the time. But word has reached you that one of them has stayed at the hospital for several days. Tending to the sick and wounded and assisting anyone who is in need of help. They say that [pilgrim_physician.GetSheHe] is a very skilled physician and might be of good use.
translation: 不断有朝圣者们经过位于[pilgrim_physician_hospital.GetName]的医院。但是你听到传言，有一位朝圣者在医院停留了好几天，照顾那些生病和受伤的人们，并且帮助任何需要帮助的人。他们说[pilgrim_physician.GetSheHe]是一位技术精湛的医生，或许值得被重用。

original: Bring this [pilgrim_physician.GetManWoman] before me.
translation: 把这位[pilgrim_physician.GetManWoman]请过来。

original: I have no need of [pilgrim_physician.GetHerHis] service.
translation: 我并不需要[pilgrim_physician.GetHerHis]服务。

original: I have a physician already.
translation: 我已经有一位医生了。

original: The hospital in [hospital_location.GetName] has seen an increase in the amount of people looking for food and shelter lately. It can barely provide the food required as it is. Perhaps this could be a good opportunity to make an impression?
translation: 在[hospital_location.GetName]的医院发现近期寻求食物和庇护所的人数有所增加。医院几乎不能满足食物需求。也许这是我塑造形象的好机会？

original: I shall make preparations at once.
translation: 我应该马上做好准备。

original: My money is better spent elsewhere.
translation: 我的钱最好花在别的地方。

original: Prepare food and supplies to be handed out as charity\n
translation: 准备食品和物资，作为慈善救济分发出去\n

original: Alms and other supplies have been brought to the hospital. It will make the life much easier for those in need. The question now is how to present this extraordinary gift?
translation: 救济品和其他物资已经运抵医院。这些物资会让那些危难中的人们生活好过些。现在的问题是以什么方式介绍这伟大的馈赠？

original: It is a gift from their [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]!
translation: 这是来自他们[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]的馈赠！

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] made it possible!
translation: 是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]使这馈赠成为可能！

original: The realm provided this offering!
translation: 是我的领地提供了这些物资！

original: I am doing it for the people!
translation: 我为人民做了这一切！

original: The [religious_head_fee.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] has sent an emissary with a peculiar request. The emissary explains that the clergy has been very involved with the hospital in [hospital_location.GetName] as of late. As such, a fair compensation is expected to be payed.
translation: [religious_head_fee.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]派来了一位特使，带来一个特殊的请求。特使解释道，近来神职人员非常积极的参与[hospital_location.GetName]医院的工作。因此，你应该提供一些合理的补偿。

original: If it is the will of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
translation: 如果这是[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的意愿。

original: I think not!
translation: 我不这么认为！

original: A leper named [homeless_leper.GetFirstName] arrived at court today. With the leper colony in [hospital_location.GetName] being crowded already, [homeless_leper.GetSheHe] has nowhere to go and now begs for your aid.
translation: 今天，一位名叫[homeless_leper.GetFirstName]的麻风病人来到了你的宫廷。由于设立在[hospital_location.GetName]的麻风病人隔离区已经拥挤不堪，[homeless_leper.GetSheHe]已无处可去，只能乞求你的帮助。

original: You can stay here for now.
translation: 你可以暂时待在这儿。

original: Get out before you infect someone!
translation: 滚出去！别传染别人！

original: You send [homeless_leper.GetFirstName] away
translation: 你把[homeless_leper.GetFirstName]赶走了

original: The soup kitchen in [kitchen_hospital.GetName] burned down quite recently in an accident. Without it, many of the poor might starve.
translation: 位于[kitchen_hospital.GetName]的施粥场最近意外烧毁了。没有了施粥场，许多穷人将要饿死。

original: I will pay for the repairs.
translation: 我会支付修缮工作的费用。

original: They shall receive both money and food!
translation: 他们应该同时收到钱和食物！

original: Pay only for the base materials.
translation: 只支付基本材料的费用。

original: Who cares about the poor anyway?
translation: 谁在乎那些穷鬼？

original: Your physician [learning_physician.GetFirstName] has been asking for permission to travel to the hospital in [hospital_location.GetName] to study there for a time. [learning_physician.GetSheHeCap] will need some financing to cover the costs for the journey and for staying at the hospital.
translation: 你的医生[learning_physician.GetFirstName]向你请求许可，他想去位于[hospital_location.GetName]的医院学习一段时间。[learning_physician.GetSheHeCap]需要一些资金来支付路上和在那家医院停留期间的花销。

original: Excellent suggestion!
translation: 很好的提议！

original: No. I have more need of you here.
translation: 不，我更需要你留在这里。

original: Your physician [learning_physician.GetFirstName] came back from [learning_physician.GetHerHis] stay at the hospital today. [learning_physician.GetSheHeCap] explained in great detail about various conditions and ailments and the remedies which to use for them. You did not understand half of it. But in short, [learning_physician.GetSheHe] seems to have learned a great deal.
translation: 你的医生[learning_physician.GetFirstName]今天从[learning_physician.GetHerHis]医院进修之旅回来了。[learning_physician.GetSheHeCap]极其详尽的解释了各种各样的健康状况、疾病以及相应的治疗方法。虽然你连一半都没听懂，但是简而言之，[learning_physician.GetSheHe]似乎是学到了不少东西。

original: Having stayed at the hospital in [hospital_location.GetName], your physician [learning_physician.GetFirstName] arrived back at court today. The visit was not as productive as [learning_physician.GetSheHe] would have wished, but was still able to learn a new thing or two.
translation: 在[hospital_location.GetName]的医院停留了一段时间后，你的医师[learning_physician.GetFirstName]今天回到了你的宫廷。这趟进修虽然并没有[learning_physician.GetSheHe]希望的那样富有成效，但是依然学到了一两样新东西。

original: You have received word that your physician [learning_physician.GetFirstName] came back earlier this morning. It would seem that [learning_physician.GetSheHe] spent much of the time outside the hospital. And as such, haven't learned anything [learning_physician.GetSheHe] didn't know already.
translation: 你收到消息说你的医师[learning_physician.GetFirstName]今天一早回来了。看起来[learning_physician.GetSheHe]在医院外花费了很多时间，也因此，没学到任何[learning_physician.GetSheHe]以前不知道的事情。

original: Hospital Damaged
translation: 医院受损

original: Despite the widespread condemnation of the Jews, I am still not sure they are to blame for the recent epidemic. However, as [Root.GetTitle] I need to make a decision.
translation: 尽管犹太人广受责难，我依然不能确定近期的流行病疫情应该怪罪到他们头上。然而，作为[Root.GetTitle]我必须做出决断。

original: Set Crown Focus in [Root.GetName]
translation: 将统治重心设在[Root.GetName]

original: Lindsian
translation: 林德赛

original: Amoundern
translation: 阿芒德

original: Rhinnic
translation: 兰斯

original: Deiran
translation: 德伊勒

original: [From.GetTitledName] has informed me that my recent ailment is in fact Leprosy. [From.GetSheHeCap] was very sorry, but there is nothing [From.GetSheHe] can do.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]告诉我，我最近的病痛其实是麻风病。[From.GetSheHeCap]感到非常抱歉，但是[From.GetSheHe]已经无能为力了。

original: I can no longer bear the revulsion of the faces of the people I meet. Although most try to hide their reaction, I have grown to recognize even the slightest flinch when their gaze tracks over my face.\nNo more! I will accept that I am disfigured and don a mask.
translation: 我已经无法忍受遇到的每个人脸上那厌恶的表情。尽管他们大多数试着隐藏自己的反应，但当他们的目光扫过我的面颊时，我还是能分辨出哪怕最细微的畏缩。\n够了！我会接受我已毁容的事实，戴上这面具。

original: The recent influx of looted treasure has encouraged buying and investment in [Root.Capital.GetName], which in turn has attracted more warriors who are hungry for gold.
translation: 近期涌入市场的劫掠战利品刺激了[Root.Capital.GetName]的消费和投资，这反过来又吸引了更多渴望财富的战士。

original: Influx of Loot
translation: 战利品涌入

original: The additional wealth brought in by raiding has led to an increase in spending and investment here.
translation: 劫掠带来的额外之财使得本地消费和投资都有所增长。

original: [Root.GetBestName] received a crushing blow to the head in battle and suffered terrible injury to [Root.GetPossPronoun] face.
translation: [Root.GetBestName]在战斗中头部受到沉重的打击，[Root.GetPossPronoun]脸部遭受了严重的损伤。

original: One of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s prominent subjects has accused me of beating his daughter while a guest of their house!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的一位显赫的臣民控告我在去他家作客时殴打他的女儿！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to believe the girl's lies about me beating her and made me pay a huge fine!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]相信了那个女孩说的我打了她的谎话，让我付出了一大笔赔款！

original: But I am innocent!
translation: 但我是无辜的！

original: Despite the girl's father demanding my head on a plate, [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to be merciful and 'only' let me rot in the dungeon for who knows how long. The only trouble is, I am innocent of beating her!
translation: 尽管那个女孩的父亲要我人头落地，但[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定仁慈一点，「仅仅」把我扔进了牢里，鬼知道要关多久。唯一的问题是，我是无辜的！我根本没打她！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] believed me when I told [From.GetHerHim] I had never even talked to the girl who accused me of beating her and managed to find evidence that the girl was lying. Apparently, she and her friend had hatched a scheme to blackmail me
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]相信我，而我告诉[From.GetHerHim]，我根本没同那个指控我殴打她的女孩讲过话。并且，我设法找到了那个女孩撒谎的证据。显然，是那女孩和她的朋友策划了这出敲诈我的阴谋。

original: Her black eye wasn't my fault then!
translation: 这下她青肿的眼眶不怪我咯！

original: The heretics falter!
translation: 异端衰退！

original: [From.GetTitledName] will consider your plea.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]会考虑你的请求。

original: As §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! is your prisoner, you may give the order to torture [Root.GetHerHim] as punishment.
translation: 由于§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!是你的囚犯，你可以下令折磨[Root.GetHerHim]作为惩罚。

original: On [GetDateText], rumors began to reach us of a terrible outbreak of Plague in far off lands
translation: 在[GetDateText]，我们听到传言说在远方的土地上爆发了一场可怕的大瘟疫

original: As of [GetDateText], the Plague is no longer a distant rumor. Travelers from neighboring realms are now arriving with firsthand experience of the horrors it brings.
translation: 到了[GetDateText]，大瘟疫不再是遥远的传言。来自临近领地的旅行者们带来了第一手的经历，告诉人们它带来的惨状。

original: On [GetDateText] the Plague arrived at our borders. May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] protect us.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，大瘟疫抵达了我们的边界。愿[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]保护我们。

original: On [GetDateText] word reached us that India has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，消息传来，可怕的大瘟疫已使印度人口大减。

original: On [GetDateText] word reached us that Persia has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，消息传来，可怕的大瘟疫已使波斯人口大减。

original: On [GetDateText] word reached us that the Middle east has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，消息传来，可怕的大瘟疫已使中东人口大减。

original: On [GetDateText] word reached us that Africa has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，消息传来，可怕的大瘟疫已使非洲人口大减。

original: On [GetDateText] word reached us that Asia minor has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，消息传来，可怕的大瘟疫已使小亚细亚人口大减。

original: On [GetDateText] word reached us that eastern Europe has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，消息传来，可怕的大瘟疫已使东欧人口大减。

original: On [GetDateText] word reached us that southern Europe has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，消息传来，可怕的大瘟疫已使南欧人口大减。

original: On [GetDateText] word reached us that western Europe has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，消息传来，可怕的大瘟疫已使西欧人口大减。

original: On [GetDateText] word reached us that northern Europe has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，消息传来，可怕的大瘟疫已使北欧人口大减。

original: On [GetDateText] word reached us that the Steppes have been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
translation: 在[GetDateText]，消息传来，可怕的大瘟疫已使欧亚草原人口大减。

original: Invite to Build Hospital
translation: 邀请建造医院

original: In exchange for land in which to build a castle, the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] will also build a hospital to care for the people of [From.Capital.GetName].
translation: 以一片可供修建城堡的土地作为交换，[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]会修建一所医院照料[From.Capital.GetName]的人民。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has suggested that for a small donation to their holy coffers the hospital in [Root.Capital.GetName] could be expanded.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]提议，只要对他们神圣金库作一点小小的捐赠，位于[Root.Capital.GetName]的医院就可以扩大。

original: Vassals may fight against enemies both within and without the realm so long as Realm Peace is not enforced.
translation: 只要没有全境和平，封臣可以与领地内和领地外的敌人交战。

original: Vassals are forbidden from declaring war on enemies within the realm, but may attack external enemies so long as Realm Peace is not enforced.
translation: 封臣禁止向领地内的敌人宣战，但是可以攻击外部的敌人，只要没有强制全境和平。

original: Vassals are forbidden from declaring war both within and without the realm.
translation: 封臣禁止发动对内或对外战争

original: Taking it Easy
translation: 放松一下

original: This character is taking it easy, trying not to overexert themselves.
translation: 这名角色正在放松，试着不要努力过头。

original: As you are working, Court Physician [physician_target.GetFirstName] bursts into your study. "My [Root.GetTitle], you have been up all night again! It would be in your best interest to not work so hard, lest you shall collapse from exhaustion!"
translation: 当你正在工作时，宫廷医师[physician_target.GetFirstName]闯进了你的书房。「我的[Root.GetTitle]，你又熬了一整夜！为了你好，请别工作的那么卖命，否则你会因为精力衰竭垮掉的！」

original: Perhaps you are right, I will heed your advice
translation: 也许你是对的，我会留心你的建议

original: The realm never rests, so neither shall I!
translation: 领地永不停歇，我也不停！

original: Guide Dog
translation: 导盲犬

original: This blind [GetManWoman] seems to be guided around by a large black dog, most peculiar...
translation: 这位目盲的[GetManWoman]似乎被一只大黑狗四处引导着，真是怪事……

original: As you wake up one morning you are greeted by a dog's wet nose touching your face. The voice of Court Physician [physician_target.GetFirstName] shortly follows, "My [Root.GetTitle], I have personally trained this beast to lead you wherever you need to go! Please, accept her as a gift from me to you."
translation: 当你某天早上醒来时，一只狗用它湿润的鼻子蹭着你的脸，问候着你。耳边紧接着传来宫廷医师[physician_target.GetFirstName]的声音，「我的[Root.GetTitle]，我自己训练了这只野兽，她会引导你去任何你要去的地方！请收下她吧，就当我送你的礼物。」

original: I shall see to is that you are rewarded generously!
translation: 我会让你受到丰厚的奖赏！

original: This is a magnificent gift!
translation: 这是多么了不起的礼物！

original: What? Remove this foul-smelling beast immediately!
translation: 什么？把这臭烘烘的野兽立刻赶开！

original: One day after waking, your loyal guide dog is not there to greet you. You find yourself fumbling down the stairs unassisted in order to reach the spot where you know she sleeps. Sadly, after reaching her, she is not waking up.
translation: 有一天你醒来，你忠诚的导盲犬并没有来问候你。你没有任何帮助，自己跌跌撞撞的摸索下楼，就为了去到她常睡觉的地方。悲痛的是，在摸到她后，你发现她再也不会醒来了。

original: You taught me so much... I will never forget you
translation: 你教会了我那么多……我永远不会忘记你的

original: No... this cannot be happening!
translation: 不……这不可能！

original: You are deep in thought as Court Physician [physician_target.GetFirstName] suddenly interrupts you, "My [Root.GetTitle], I know that both you and the [Root.Spouse.GetTitle] desire an heir for the realm. If you so wish, I could research ways to enhance your virility, all in order to facilitate the creation of a worthy successor!"
translation: 你正在沉思，忽然宫廷医师[physician_target.GetFirstName]打断了你的思绪，「我的[Root.GetTitle]，我知道你和[Root.Spouse.GetTitle]都渴求配得上你们领地的继承人。如果你确有此意，我可以研究出一些方法来加强你的生育能力，这全是为了帮助打造一个最相称的继承人！」

original: Ah, yes, ahem... please go ahead
translation: 啊，好的，呃……你接着说

original: What are you insinuating? I don't need help!
translation: 你在暗示什么？我不需要帮助！

original: Court Physician [physician_target.GetFirstName] firmly pats you on the shoulder as [physician_target.GetSheHe] enters. "I have done some research, and you should not worry! Wait another moon and you shall see that your seed has taken root."
translation: 当宫廷医师[physician_target.GetFirstName]进来时，[physician_target.GetSheHe]坚定的拍了拍你的肩膀。「我已经完成了一些研究，你无需担心！再等一个月你就会发现你的种子已经开始生根了。」

original: Something is not right here...
translation: 这里有点不大对劲……

original: But... you didn't do anything?
translation: 但是……你什么也没做吧？

original: Court Physician [physician_target.GetFirstName] approaches you with a smile on [physician_target.GetHerHis] face. "I have succeeded, my [Root.GetTitle]! If you drink this concoction your potency will magnify tenfold, the royal bloodline is saved!"
translation: 宫廷医师[physician_target.GetFirstName]靠近了你，[physician_target.GetHerHis]脸上挂着笑容。「我已经成功了，我的[Root.GetTitle]！只要你喝下这瓶调制品，你的性能力就会放大十倍，王室的血脉就会得以延续！」

original: Ah, most excellent, give it here!
translation: 啊，非常好，把它给我！

original: I have changed my mind... I have no trust in this
translation: 我改变主意了……我不相信这东西

original: Shortly after drinking the concoction, you feel a pleasant mist clouding your senses. As you emerge from the blur you find yourself in the royal bedchamber, and not alone! It seems as if the concoction might have been a tad TOO effective!
translation: 喝下调制品不一会儿，你感觉一阵令人愉悦的薄雾遮蔽了你的感官。当你从模糊中慢慢清醒，你发现自己在皇家卧室，而且不是孤身一人！看起来这调制品或许有点太强力了！

original: What happened?
translation: 发生了什么？

original: Shortly after drinking the concoction you feel full of energy and vigor! It seems to have worked, the lineage is surely saved now!
translation: 喝下调制品不一会儿，你感到充满了能量和活力！这东西似乎是生效了，血脉现在的确可以延续了！

original: I will reward [physician_target.GetFirstName] handsomely for this!
translation: 冲着这个，我会慷慨地奖励[physician_target.GetFirstName]的！

original: Now, where is the [Root.Spouse.GetTitle]?
translation: 现在，[Root.Spouse.GetTitle]在哪？

original: The concoction was supposed to work in "Three easy steps!" and have an "Instantaneous effect!" according to Court Physician [physician_target.GetFirstName]... but you are not feeling it. In fact, you feel LESS virile than ever before!
translation: 根据宫廷医师[physician_target.GetFirstName]的说法，这调制品本应该经过「三个简单步骤」就起效，并且拥有「立竿见影的效果」……但是你并没有感觉到。事实上，你甚至感觉生育能力不如从前！

original: What did you do to me? This is high treason!
translation: 你对我做了什么？这是叛国罪！

original: Oh well, it was worth a shot...
translation: 哦好吧，这本就值得一试……

original: [physician_target.GetFirstName] begins looking for ways to increase your fertility
translation: [physician_target.GetFirstName]开始寻找增强你生育能力的方法。

original: You drink the concoction [physician_target.GetFirstName] has brewed
translation: 你喝下了[physician_target.GetFirstName]带来的调制品

original: A prolonged period of peace and shrewd management has caused this county to §YProsper§!! \n\n§YProsperity§! will increase with time, but will be hampered by negative province modifiers, war, disease and sieges. Construct §YHospitals§! and keep the province clear of hostile armies to ensure that the county continues to prosper.
translation: 长期的和平和精明的管理使得这个省份§Y繁荣§!！\n\n§Y繁荣度§!会随着时间增加，但也会受到省份负面修正，战争，疾病和围攻的阻碍。建造§Y医院§!并保护省份免遭敌军侵袭，以确保省份持续繁荣昌盛。

original: A prolonged period of peace and shrewd management has caused this county to §YFlourish§!! \n\n§YProsperity§! will increase with time, but will be hampered by negative province modifiers, war, disease and sieges. Construct §YHospitals§! and keep the province clear of hostile armies to ensure that the county continues to prosper.
translation: 长期的和平和精明的管理使得这个省份§Y兴旺§!！\n\n§Y繁荣度§!会随着时间增加，但也会受到省份负面修正，战争，疾病和围攻的阻碍。建造§Y医院§!并保护省份免遭敌军侵袭，以确保省份持续繁荣昌盛。

original: A prolonged period of peace and shrewd management has caused this county to §YBoom§!! \n\n§YProsperity§! will increase with time, but will be hampered by negative province modifiers, war, disease and sieges. Construct §YHospitals§! and keep the province clear of hostile armies to ensure that the county continues to prosper.
translation: 长期的和平和精明的管理使得这个省份§Y昌盛§!！\n\n§Y繁荣度§!会随着时间增加，但也会受到省份负面修正，战争，疾病和围攻的阻碍。建造§Y医院§!并保护省份免遭敌军侵袭，以确保省份持续繁荣昌盛。

original: Logging Company
translation: 伐木团队

original: The prime wood contained within the forests of this county has drawn the attention of an elite group of artisans.
translation: 这个省份内的原木资源引起了了一队精英手工业者的注意。

original: The prime quality wood found in the forests of [Root.GetName] has attracted the attention of a group of elite artisans. These renowned individuals have set up a concern where they offer their services for a hefty price. For the right price you could acquire their services and put them to work for the crown!
translation: 在[Root.GetName]的森林内发现的优质原木资源引起了一队精英手工业者的注意。这些久负盛名的工匠建立起一个商业生产组织，只要给予丰厚的报酬他们就会提供服务。只要价钱合适，你就可以获得他们的服务，让他们为统治者工作！

original: They should work towards the betterment of the realm!
translation: 他们应该努力把我的领地建设的更好！

original: I will banish them and seize their assets.
translation: 我要把他们驱逐出境，攫取他们的财富。

original: [Root.GetName] Prospers!
translation: [Root.GetName]繁荣！

original: Mining Network
translation: 采矿组织

original: The mountains of this county contain a massive network of guilds mining for ore and breaking stone.
translation: 这个省份的群山中聚集了大量的工会组织，他们开山采石、挖掘矿物。

original: For quite some time now, more and more miners have started mining for ore and breaking stone in the mountains of [Root.GetName]. It has come to the point where there is a massive network of them, all organized into various interconnected guilds. For a hefty sum you could bring these guilds into the employ of the crown!
translation: 长期以来，越来越多的矿工开始在[Root.GetName]的群山里开采山石、矿物。现在，这些矿工之间已经形成了巨大而复杂的关系网，他们全部由各种各样互有关联的工会组织起来。只要一笔不菲的支出，他们就可以为统治者所用！

original: They shall serve me and the people of [Root.GetName]!
translation: 他们将为我和[Root.GetName]的民众服务！

original: They are clearly trespassing, get rid of them and seize their tools!
translation: 这毫无疑问是擅闯我的领地，赶走他们，没收工具！

original: Gain §G5.00§! random tech points.\n
translation: 获得 §G5.00§! 随机科技点数。\n

original: Stop Pillaging
translation: 停止劫掠

original: You can choose to stop pillaging this Holding.\n\nYou will not be able to resume pillaging for one year.
translation: 你可以选择停止劫掠此地产。\n\n一年内你无法重新开始劫掠。

original: Has not decided to Stop Pillaging the holding
translation: 尚未决定是否停止劫掠此地产

original: Start Pillaging this Holding.\n\nWhile Pillaging this Holding the revolt risk of the entire Province will be increased significantly, but in exchange you will receive the following every §Y6 months§! until the holding is completely destroyed:
translation: 开始掠夺此地产。\n\n当这块领地遭到掠夺，整个省份的叛乱风险会显著增加。但直到此地产被完全破坏为止，每 §Y6 个月§!你将会得到下列影响：

original: Recently Pillaged
translation: 新近掠夺

original: Ravaged Lands
translation: 被蹂躏的土地

original: Your horde swarms into the holding of [From.GetName] as the walls crumble and fall. They are intent on plundering, but won't go ahead unless you, their [Root.GetTitle], give them permission to do so.
translation: 随着[From.GetName]城墙的轰然倒塌，你的部落蜂拥而入。他们热衷于掠夺，但是不会立刻动手，除非你，他们的[Root.GetTitle]，允许他们这么做。

original: Bring back the spoils to me and we will divide them between us!
translation: 把战利品统统交给我，我们来分东西！

original: Your horde has looted, ravaged, pillaged and plundered [target_location.GetName] to such a degree that a holding in the county has been completely devastated. All that is left is a smattering of rubble among our new grazing lands - our horses will surely like it here!
translation: 你的部落对[target_location.GetName]烧杀掳掠，使得省份中的一块地产被完全夷为平地。我们的牧场将在断壁残垣中重新建立——我们的马儿一定会喜欢这里的！

original: We will use the corpses to fertilize the fields!
translation: 我们将用敌人的血肉浇灌这片田野。

original: Throne of Skulls
translation: 头骨王座

original: The skulls of this county's deceased population has been fashioned into a massive, gruesome throne.
translation: 此省份死去人口的头骨堆砌成了一个巨大而又可怕的王座。

original: I shall have the skulls of the dead fashioned into a throne.
translation: 我要用死者的头骨堆砌成一个王座。

original: We shall feast and sacrifice whoever is left in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
translation: 我们将举办盛宴，并且以[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]的名义献祭任何留下的人！

original: Nomadic Rites
translation: 游牧仪式

original: The Nomads of this county frequently perform war and fertility rites.
translation: 这块土地上的人们经常进行战争与繁衍的仪式。

original: Black Death
translation: 黑死病

original: Annoyed Religious Authorities
translation: 恼怒的宗教当局

original: Meets the prerequisites for building a §YHospital§!
translation: 达成建立一个§Y医院§!的前置条件

original: the Resilient
translation: 百病不侵之人

original: One-Eye
translation: 独眼

original: One-Hand
translation: 独手人

original: the Legless
translation: 独腿人

original: of a Thousand Faces
translation: 千面

original: the Cannibal
translation: 食人魔

original: the Frail
translation: 虚弱者

original: the Weak
translation: 羸弱者

original: the Brute
translation: 野兽

original: the Plaguebearer
translation: 瘟疫传染者

original: the Persevering
translation: 百折不挠者

original: the Repulsive
translation: 恶心之人

original: the Frog
translation: 青蛙

original: the Tenacious
translation: 倔驴

original: the Wealthy
translation: 富人

original: the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
translation: [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[Root.GetLordLady]

original: Twistedbeard
translation: 歪胡子

original: the Faceless
translation: 无面者

original: the Destroyer
translation: 毁灭者

original: the Scourge of [nickname_target.Religion.GetHighGodName]
translation: [nickname_target.Religion.GetHighGodName]之鞭

original: Slayer of the [nickname_target.Culture.GetName]
translation: [nickname_target.Culture.GetName]人屠夫

original: the Terror of [nickname_target.GetName]
translation: [nickname_target.GetName]之恐惧

original: the Butcher
translation: 屠夫

original: [This.GetSonDaughterCap] of [This.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]
translation: [This.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]之子

original: the Cleansing Flame
translation: 净化之火

original: the Witch Hunter
translation: 女巫猎人

original: the Vengeful
translation: 复仇者

original: the Betrayer
translation: 背叛者

original: the Flayer
translation: 剥皮者

original: the Tyrant
translation: 暴君

original: the Oppressor
translation: 压迫者

original: the Evil
translation: 邪魔

original: the Tormentor
translation: 拷打者

original: the Mutilator
translation: 虐杀者

original: the Eastern Wind
translation: 东风

original: the Despoiler
translation: 掠夺者

original: the Bane of [nickname_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
translation: [nickname_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName]之灾星

original: the Depraved
translation: 邪恶者

original: the Monster
translation: 怪物

original: the Abomination
translation: 可憎者

original: the [nickname_receiver.Culture.GetName] Marauder
translation: [nickname_receiver.Culture.GetName]掠夺者

original: the Boar
translation: 野猪

original: the [Root.GetTitle]slayer
translation: 弑君者

original: the [Root.GetWarlockWitch]
translation: [Root.GetWarlockWitch]

original: the Undying
translation: 不死者

original: the Bear
translation: 熊

original: Your friend, Court Physician [physician_target.GetFirstName], is always hard at work researching. Bubbling cauldrons, colorful exotic herbs, sharpened glistening tools and all manner of other interesting things fill [physician_target.GetHerHis] study... It is all rather intriguing, perhaps you could learn something if you were to join [physician_target.GetHerHim] for a while?
translation: 你的朋友，宫廷医师[physician_target.GetFirstName]，总是努力地进行实验研究。沸腾的锅炉、五彩的香草、锋利的各式工具以及各种有趣的东西充满了[physician_target.GetHerHis]研究……这看上去非常有趣，如果你加入[physician_target.GetHerHim]一段时间，或许你能学到不少东西。

original: That sounds interesting!
translation: 听起来很有趣！

original: I'd rather not disturb [physician_target.GetHerHim].
translation: 我还是不要打扰[physician_target.GetHerHim]了。

original: The days pass as you observe and study the work of [physician_target.GetFirstName]. After but a few days YOU are the one teaching [physician_target.GetHerHim] what to do! [physician_target.GetFirstName] doesn't seem upset, but rather seems overjoyed to be able to work with someone of a matching intellect. It doesn't take long before you manage to brew a surprisingly invigoration potion!
translation: 时光飞逝你跟着[physician_target.GetFirstName]进行研究学习。过了几天你变成了指导[physician_target.GetHerHim]的人！[physician_target.GetFirstName]并没有沮丧，甚至十分享受与他智慧匹敌的人一同工作。没多久，你们成功获得了一种威力惊人的滋补药剂。

original: The days pass as you observe and study the work of [physician_target.GetFirstName]. You dissect small animals, brew potions and take endless notes - and have a blast doing so! [physician_target.GetFirstName] enjoyed your presence, and you seem to have learned something to boot.
translation: 时光飞逝你跟着[physician_target.GetFirstName]进行研究学习。你解剖一些小动物，酿造药水，记下无数笔记——尽情做自己想做的！[physician_target.GetFirstName]乐于接受你的存在，而且你似乎也从中学到了不少。

original: You spend a few days observing [physician_target.GetFirstName]'s work. You don't understand much, but [physician_target.GetSheHe] still attempts to show and teach you what [physician_target.GetSheHe]'s doing. It seems as if you learned something after all!
translation: 你花了几天来研究[physician_target.GetFirstName]的工作。你理解的并不多，但是[physician_target.GetSheHe]仍然尝试教导给你展示[physician_target.GetSheHe]的做法。你似乎确实学到了点什么。

original: You attempt to follow [physician_target.GetFirstName] in [physician_target.GetHerHis] work, but it doesn't take long before the intense fumes permeating [physician_target.GetFirstName]'s laboratory gets to you. After only a few hours you have to evacuate, and you have got a splitting headache! At least you learned something.
translation: 你尽量跟随着[physician_target.GetFirstName]与[physician_target.GetHerHis]一同工作，但很快一股臭气在[physician_target.GetFirstName]扩散开来。仅仅几个小时之后你就不得不撤离，而且你觉得头疼欲裂！至少你学到了一点东西。

original: You barely make it into [physician_target.GetFirstName]'s lab before you stumble and tip over an entire table of surgeon's tools! Some of the sharpened blades tear your skin and cause you to bleed. [physician_target.GetFirstName] hurries to patch you up, but the wound won't stop bleeding, perhaps the blade was covered in something foul?
translation: 你刚进入[physician_target.GetFirstName]的实验室，马上跘了一跤，摔倒在摆满了手术器具的桌上！几片锋利的刀片割裂了你的皮肤，导致你不断流血。[physician_target.GetFirstName]赶紧将你的伤口包好，但是鲜血仍然不断渗出。或许是因为刀片上有些脏东西？

original: ...and the taste was divine!
translation: ……而且味道好极了！

original: I thoroughly enjoyed that!
translation: 我很享受这个过程。

original: Very interesting, but now I have a realm to rule.
translation: 很有趣，但现在我该回去管理我的领地了。

original: My poor head!
translation: 我可怜的脑袋！

original: Not what I planned...
translation: 这可不是我计划的……

original: Join [physician_target.GetFirstName] in [physician_target.GetHerHis] lab for a few days
translation: 加入[physician_target.GetFirstName]并在[physician_target.GetHerHis]待上几天。

original: This character has been decently treated by a Court Physician.
translation: 这个角色已受到宫廷医师适当的治疗。

original: This character has been successfully treated by a Court Physician.
translation: 这个角色已受到宫廷医师成功的治疗。

original: This character has been masterfully treated by a Court Physician.
translation: 这个角色已受到宫廷医师精妙的治疗。

original: A Court Physician has failed in treating this characters illness.
translation: 宫廷医师对这个角色疾病的治疗失败了。

original: A Court Physician has completely botched the treatment of this characters illness.
translation: 宫廷医师完全搞砸了对这个角色疾病的治疗。

original: This character has received an esoteric brand of treatment from a Mystic Court Physician.
translation: 这个角色从神秘主义宫廷医师处获得了奥秘式的治疗。

original: This character has received an esoteric brand of treatment from a Mystic Court Physician and does not feel very well.
translation: 这个角色从神秘主义宫廷医师处获得了奥秘式的治疗，然而似乎感觉不佳。

original: This character has received an esoteric brand of treatment from a Mystic Court Physician and is close to death.
translation: 这个角色从神秘主义宫廷医师处获得了奥秘式的治疗，目前濒临死亡。

original: Ask to Leave Court
translation: 要求离开宫廷

original: You are not sure when §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! joined your court or what [Root.GetSheHe]'s doing here.\n\nIf you were to ask §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! to leave, the court would feel less crowded...
translation: 你想不起来什么时候§Y[Root.GetFullName]§!加入了你的宫廷以及[Root.GetSheHe]在这里干什么。\n\nI如果你要求§Y[Root.GetFullName]§!离开，宫廷会变得不那么拥挤……

original: Close Window
translation: 关闭窗口

original: A large Jewish community has settled in this county, their merchants significantly contributing to the commerce of the county.
translation: 庞大的犹太人社区居住于此省份，他们的商人为此省份的商业做出重要贡献。

original: This magnificent structure depicts a local ruler. It is clearly visible by visiting merchants, and stories regarding its greatness travel far and wide.
translation: 这栋宏伟的建筑物描绘了一个当地统治者的事迹。来往的商人节能清晰地观看到此建筑物，因此统治者的伟大事迹远近闻名。

original: A steady influx of merchant ships provide this county with ample opportunity for procuring ships.
translation: 稳定涌入的商船提供给此省份更多征用船只的机会。

original: Scholar's Foundation
translation: 学者研究会

original: This imposing building contains tomes and scrolls of vast knowledge, scholars from far and wide flock to it in order to study the secrets within.
translation: 这栋宏伟的建筑中拥有浩如烟海的书卷和知识。无数的学者为了研究其中的秘密从四面八方远道而来。

original: This county serves as a hub for religious pilgrims from both far and wide.
translation: 此省份是来自五湖四海的宗教朝圣者的聚集中心。

original: A large number of people from a religious minority has petitioned you for permission to settle in [Root.GetName]. This would likely lead to increased tax revenues, but local religious authorities will disapprove.
translation: 大量宗教少数群体请求你允许他们定居在[Root.GetName]里。这很可能增加该地的税收，但本地宗教当局将会不满。

original: Invite them in!
translation: 邀请他们进来！

original: Begone!
translation: 滚！

original: Minority Settlement
translation: 少数派定居点

original: A large community of religious minorities has settled in this county, their merchants significantly contributing to the commerce of the county.
translation: 庞大的宗教少数派社区居住于此省份，他们的商人为此省份的商业做出重要贡献。

original: Renowned Physician
translation: 著名医师

original: This character is a renowned practitioner of medicine and a sought after physician - [GetSheHe] would be a welcome addition to the court of any ruler.
translation: 这个角色是一名著名医学践行者以及受欢迎的医师——[GetSheHe]加入任何统治者宫廷都会受到欢迎。

original: Your Court Physician, [FromFromFrom.GetFullName], has gained widespread reputation after having worked in your court. [FromFromFrom.GetSheHeCap] is now considered a Renowned Physician.
translation: 你的宫廷医师，[FromFromFrom.GetFullName]因为在你宫廷的工作获得了远近闻名的声誉。[FromFromFrom.GetSheHeCap]现在被视为一位著名医师。

original: As you ponder new ways to improve your realm, Court Physician [physician_target.GetFirstName] approaches you with an idea. "My [Root.GetTitle], if you were to institute a system of provincial apothecaries, the health of your subjects would improve significantly! In turn, they are sure to be more productive!"
translation: 正当你思考发展你领地的新方法时，宫廷医师[physician_target.GetFirstName]面见你并提出一个想法。「我的[Root.GetTitle]，如果你建立起省份内的药剂师制度，你臣民建康将会显著地提高！这样一来，他们也肯定会更加多产。」

original: A wise idea! I will make it so.
translation: 真是个好主意！我会去做的。

original: A waste of money, let the peasants suffer.
translation: 浪费钱，让农民忍住病痛就好了。

original: Your §YDemesne Counties§! receive a significant §YProsperity§! boost!
translation: 你的§Y直辖省份§!的§Y繁荣度§!得到显著提升！

original: The §YProsperity§! of the county increases slightly\n
translation: 省份的§Y繁荣度§!些许提升\n

original: The §YProsperity§! of your capital county increases slightly\n
translation: 你首都的§Y繁荣度§!些许提升\n

original: The §YProsperity§! of §Y[prosperity_target.GetName]§! increases!
translation: §Y[prosperity_target.GetName]§!的§Y繁荣度§!提升！

original: Lots of peasants have been moving to the county of [prosperity_target.GetName] lately. Your [Root.GetTreasurerName], [councillor_target.GetFullName], suggests building new roads in order to make it easier for the peasants to reach the central holdings. [councillor_target.GetSheHeCap] insists that in doing so the county would become more prosperous!
translation: 近来大量农民搬迁到[prosperity_target.GetName]省份。你的[Root.GetTreasurerName]，[councillor_target.GetFullName]建议修筑新的道路以帮助农民的到达领地的中心地产。[councillor_target.GetSheHeCap]坚定认为，这会让此省份更加的繁荣！

original: I will let [councillor_target.GetFirstName] oversee the construction!
translation: 我就让[councillor_target.GetFirstName]监督这个工程吧！

original: Sadly, I cannot afford this.
translation: 可悲的是，我出不起钱。

original: The peasants in [prosperity_target.GetName] spend a long time on the road in order to meet with the [prosperity_target.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s, or so your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [councillor_target.GetFirstName] claims. [councillor_target.GetSheHeCap] suggests that it would be in your interests to construct local shrines, in that way the peasants would not have to travel far in order to worship.
translation: 你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，[councillor_target.GetFirstName]声称，[prosperity_target.GetName]的农民要花费大量时间在路途上才能见到[prosperity_target.Religion.GetPriestTitle]们。所以[councillor_target.GetSheHeCap]认为修筑本地的祭坛也符合你的利益，这样农民们就无需远行去进行崇拜活动。

original: Less traveling means more work being done!
translation: 更少的时间花费在路上意味着有更多时间工作！

original: A waste of money.
translation: 浪费钱。

original: According to your [Root.GetMarshalName], [councillor_target.GetFullName], the peasants of [prosperity_target.GetName] are having frequent troubles with highwaymen and wild beasts. [councillor_target.GetSheHeCap] suggests constructing a series of outposts along the roads of [prosperity_target.GetName]. The peasantry would feel much safer, and it might even lead to more peasants moving to the county!
translation: 据你的[Root.GetMarshalName]，[councillor_target.GetFullName]所言，[prosperity_target.GetName]的农民经常受到道路劫匪和野兽的袭扰。[councillor_target.GetSheHeCap]建议沿着[prosperity_target.GetName]的道路修筑一系列堡垒。农民将觉得更加安全，并且甚至可能吸引更多的农民来到此省份！

original: A safe peasant is a productive peasant.
translation: 免于恐惧的农民才是多产的农民。

original: Unfortunately, I have no money to spare.
translation: 不好意思，我没有闲钱。

original: The peasants of [prosperity_target.GetName] are quite far apart and spread out. Your [Root.GetSpymasterName], [councillor_target.GetFullName], suggests investing in a provincial messenger system so that they can communicate with their kin more easily. [councillor_target.GetSheHeCap] claims that doing so would attract more peasants to the county!
translation: [prosperity_target.GetName]的农民散居各处，彼此距离十分遥远。你的[Root.GetSpymasterName]，[councillor_target.GetFullName]建议投资修筑省内邮传制度，让农民们能够更好的互相沟通。[councillor_target.GetSheHeCap]声称，这样可以吸引更多的农民到此省份居住！

original: Ah yes, an excellent idea!
translation: 很好，多么棒的主意！

original: My money is better spent elsewhere.
translation: 我不会把钱花在这种地方。

original: According to [Root.GetChancellorName] [councillor_target.GetFirstName], the peasants of [prosperity_target.GetName] have started a delightful tradition where the peasantry from several villages meet up and dance, feast and pair up for future marriage. By promoting this tradition [councillor_target.GetFirstName] believes that the county will develop a strong local culture that will attract more peasants!
translation: 据[Root.GetChancellorName]，[councillor_target.GetFirstName]所言，[prosperity_target.GetName]的农民向来有着一个良好传统，数个村庄农民们聚会、跳舞、宴饮并为未来的婚姻寻找伴侣。如果促进这一传统，[councillor_target.GetFirstName]认为这个省份会发展出强势的文化，吸引更多的农民！

original: A peculiar tradition, I will support it!
translation: 真是独特的传统，我也支持！

original: I will not waste my money on such nonsense.
translation: 我不想把我的钱浪费在这么无聊的事情上。

original: Being such an industrious ruler you have not gone unnoticed by the population of [prosperity_target.GetName]. By paying the county elders a personal visit, they would surely be inspired and the peasants would feel particularly appreciated. A small donation would also go a long way, of course.
translation: 身为一个勤政的统治者，你并没有忽视[prosperity_target.GetName]的困难群众。亲自拜访省份内的长老，能激励他们并让农民特别感激你。当然了，小小的付出也能有巨大的收获。

original: It is time for me to visit [prosperity_target.GetName]!
translation: 现在就是我访问[prosperity_target.GetName]的时候！

original: I do not have time for this.
translation: 我现在没空去管这些。

original: Messenger Stations
translation: 驿站

original: A network of messengers ease the communication between peasants and their kin.
translation: 邮传网络使得农民与亲属的沟通变得更加方便了。

original: Harvest Festivals
translation: 丰收节庆

original: The harvest festivals of this county are especially large and eventful!
translation: 这个省份的丰收庆祝特别重大

original: Inspired Peasantry
translation: 受到激励的农民

original: The village elders of this county are inspiring the peasants to work even harder!
translation: 村里的长老正在激励农民更加努力地工作！

original: New Roads
translation: 崭新的道路

original: The roads of this county are brand new and well kept.
translation: 这个省份的道路是崭新的，并且养护的很好。

original: Local Shrines
translation: 当地祭坛

original: In this county it seems as if each and every village has its own local shrine for worship.
translation: 此省份内每个村庄似乎都有用于崇拜的本地祭坛

original: All §YRealm Provinces§! receive a significant §YProsperity§! boost!
translation: 所有§Y领地内省份§!出现显著地§Y繁荣度§!提升！

original: See the Realm Prosper
translation: 见证领地繁荣

original:
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to see [This.GetHerHis] realm prosper by staying at peace for §Y5 years§!.

If [This.GetFirstName]'s realm is attacked or [This.GetSheHe] goes to war, this ambition will fail and can't be taken again for §Y5 years§!.

While this ambition is active, §YGlobal Revolt Risk§! is reduced by §Y1%§!.
translation:
[This.GetTitledFirstName]希望见到[This.GetHerHis]领地保持和平发展§Y5年§!。

如果[This.GetFirstName]的领地受到攻击或者[This.GetSheHe]发动战争。那么这个野心将会失败，并在 §Y5 年§!内不能再次选择。

这个野心启用期间，§Y全体叛乱风险§!降低 §Y1%§!。

original: Has ruled the realm in peace for §Y5 years§!
translation: 统治此领地并保持和平 §Y5 年§!

original: Regimental Grounds
translation: 军团训练场

original: This county serves as a training ground for elite regiments, and also houses their lodgings and armories.
translation: 这个省份是一个精英军团的训练场，并设有他们的住房与军械库。

original: For some time now, the county of [Root.GetName] has served as an unofficial training ground for your armies as there is plenty of open space on which to train and abundant food to feed the troops. A group of senior officers are now petitioning you for money in order to erect an official regimental camp in the county!
translation: 一段时间以来，[Root.GetName]省份一直是你的军队的非官方训练场，许多的空地用于操练，军队也消耗了大量食物。而现在一批高级军官向你申请资金，在此省份设立官方的军团营地！

original: That sounds like an excellent suggestion!
translation: 听上去是一个不错的建议！

original: Having it easy would just make them weaker.
translation: 让训练变得简单会让他们更弱小。

original: Historical Plague Exclusion Zone
translation: 历史瘟疫禁区

original: Delayed Dynamic
translation: 动态延迟

original: The Bubonic Plague will appear at the very earliest in the year 1100, and 25 years after the game has started. After one major outbreak the epidemic will become endemic.
translation: 腺鼠疫最早出现在 1100 年，或游戏开始的 25 年后。第一次主要爆发后，瘟疫变为区域流行。

original: The Bubonic Plague will appear at the very earliest 200 years after the game has started, and might reappear 500 years after game start. After one major outbreak the epidemic will become endemic.
translation: 腺鼠疫最早出现在游戏开始 200 年后，并可能会在游戏开始 500 年后重新出现。在第一次主要爆发后，瘟疫将变为区域流行。

original: The Bubonic Plague will appear in the year 1345 and follow its historical route.
translation: 腺鼠疫将出现在 1345 年，并且遵循历史的路径。

original: Does not already have a successful treatment
translation: 并未有成功的治疗

original: Your scouts tell of a Nestorian missionary that just arrived in [Root.Capital.GetName]. The missionary, named [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], has returned after a long mission to far-away Cathay. The locals say [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] knows many remedies, knowledge [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]'s picked up during [recruited_physician_target.GetHersHis] travels. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] would certainly be a worthy addition to your court!
translation: 你的探子回报，一位聂斯脱里派的传教士刚刚来到[Root.Capital.GetName]。这位传教士，名叫[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]，刚刚在遥远的契丹长期传教后归来。本地人都说[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]知晓许多疗法，而这些知识是[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]在[recruited_physician_target.GetHersHis]旅途中学到的。[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap]肯定会成为你宫廷里有价值的助力！

original: Bring this missionary to court!
translation: 把这个传教士带回宫廷！

original: You are told that there resides a Mazdan doctor in a small, nearby, village. The doctor, known in learned circles as [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], is rumored to possess texts from the famous school of Gondishapur! Such a learned [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman] would surely be an asset to your court.
translation: 你收到消息说一个附近的小村庄中居住着一位祆教的医生。这位医生，在学界以[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]之名为人所知，并且谣传拥有著名的贡迪沙普尔学园的文献！如此有学识的[recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman]，一定会是你宫廷中的至宝。

original: A good candidate, pay [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] and bring [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] to court!
translation: 很好的人选，出钱给[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]并且邀请[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]来到宫廷！

original: A silk road merchant recently arrived in [Root.Capital.GetName]. Your guards report that, under the guise of providing free medical examinations, this '[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]' had used the opportunity to preach the Gospel of Mani! The guards locked [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] up for [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] own good, but perhaps [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] could work as your physician?
translation: 一名丝路商人最近来到[Root.Capital.GetName]。你的卫兵报告说，在提供免费医学检查的掩护下，这个「[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]」利用此机会传播摩尼福音！卫兵因为[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis]作死行为把[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]关了起来，但也许[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]可以成为你的医师？

original: Free [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] and bring [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] to court!
translation: 释放[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]并且把[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim]带到宫廷！

original: A man is brought in shackles before you, apparently he is a missionary from [origin_realm_of_missionary_physician_target.Realm.GetName] who has been preaching his heretical faith among your people! He claims to be on a mission from [missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetHighGodName], and has been caring for the sick in nearby villages. What should be done about this misguided [missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetName]?
translation: 一个囚犯被押解到你面前。他显然是个传教士，一直在[origin_realm_of_missionary_physician_target.Realm.GetName]给你的人民传播异端信仰！他声称带着[missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetHighGodName]的使命而来，并且照顾附近村庄的病患。该怎么对待这个误入歧途的[missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetName]信徒？

original: A healer? He shall serve me personally.
translation: 一位治疗者？他可以为我私人服务。

original: We can't allow [missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetName]s in our realm, burn him!
translation: 我们不能允许[missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetName]的人出现在领地里。烧死他！

original: The weeks pass and your [missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetName] court physician keeps talking about his religion. He is even claiming that [missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetRandomGodName] could grant you health and a long life! It almost sounds too good to be true...
translation: 几个星期来你的[missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetName]宫廷医师不停地谈论他的宗教。他甚至声称[missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetRandomGodName]能赐予你健康和长寿！天上掉馅饼的事情听起来不靠谱……

original: I can't, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] would strike me down.
translation: 我不能这么做，[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]会毁灭我。

original: But it's a risk I'm willing to take, praise [missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
translation: 不过这么点风险我还是愿意接受的，赞美[missionary_physician_target.Religion.GetRandomGodName]！

original: Sigh... time to light the fire.
translation: 唉……该把火点起来了。

original: Chapel
translation: 礼拜堂

original: An integral part of any hospital is the chapel. This grand structure can also serve as an infirmary when times are dire.
translation: 任何医院都不可缺少礼拜堂。这一大型建筑在时间紧迫时也可以作为医务室。

original: Pharmacology Laboratory
translation: 药理实验室

original: Physicians and scholars work day and night in the pharmacology laboratory in order to distill new cures for common ailments.
translation: 医生和学者在药理实验室中焚膏继晷地研究常见病的新疗法。

original: Translation House
translation: 译馆

original: By having scholars work with translating the languages of pilgrims and travelers it allows us to communicate more efficiently.
translation: 学者在这里翻译朝圣者和旅行者的语言，可使我们更有效地交流。

original: Library
translation: 图书馆

original: A large library filled with tomes of medicine and the healing arts.
translation: 充斥医学巨著和治疗技艺的大图书馆。

original: Observatory
translation: 天文台

original: The observatory serves to attract scholars to the hospital. With more scholars, more research is being done.
translation: 天文台吸引了学者前来。学者增多，越来越多的研究得以进行

original: Soup Kitchen
translation: 救济粥棚

original: One of the first responsibilities of the hospital is to house and feed the needy. The poor, the traveler, the downtrodden and the outcast - they are all welcome to partake of the hospitals generosity.
translation: 医院的首要职责便是向有需要的人们提供住房和食物，穷人、旅者、流浪汉和受压迫的人——他们都欢迎来分享医院的慷慨。

original: Pilgrim's Inn
translation: 朝圣者客栈

original: By constructing an inn dedicated to housing pilgrims we show the world that we care about their pious pursuits.
translation: 通过建设专门容纳朝圣者的客栈，我们向世界证明我们关心他们虔诚的追求。

original: Medical Academy
translation: 医学院

original: In the medical academy the next generation of scholars is being trained. Who knows, the next generation might be the one to finally cure the common cold?
translation: 下一代学者们正在医学院中接受培训。谁知道呢，下一代人也许就能完全治愈普通感冒？

original: [title_name_target.GetOnlyDynastyName]-[title_name_target.Capital.County.GetName]
translation: [title_name_target.GetOnlyDynastyName]－[title_name_target.Capital.County.GetName]

original: §YOpen the Extended Province View§!
translation: §Y打开拓展省份界面§!

original: Extend the interface to show additional Holdings and the local terrain.
translation: 拓展界面以显示额外的地产与本地地形。

original: An enigma even to those who know [GetHerHim], [GetHerHis] rule may doom or save us all
translation: 即使对于认识[GetHerHim]的人来说也是一个谜团，[GetHerHis]可能毁灭或者拯救我们

original: Merely [GetAgeYears] years old, the realm is left in the capable hands of the regent and council
translation: 仅有[GetAgeYears]岁，领地因而交由具备能力的摄政和内阁管理

original: Having no skills with which to keep the realm together, [GetHerHis] rule may be doomed to fail
translation: 无力统合领地，[GetHerHis]统治恐怕注定会失败

original: Possessing a mighty physique and an exceptionally astute mind, [GetFirstName]'s rule is sure to spawn both song and tale
translation: 拥有强壮的体魄与精明的头脑，[GetFirstName]的统治必将获得传颂

original: Blessed with neither a sharp mind nor a warrior's physique, [GetFirstName]'s rule will surely be arduous
translation: 既没有敏锐的头脑也没有战士的体魄，[GetFirstName]的统治注定是艰巨的。

original: Being the child of [Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], [GetFirstName]'s rule is sure to usher in a new age of terror and despair
translation: 作为[Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的子嗣，[GetFirstName]必然会迎来恐怖与绝望的新时代

original: Being a talented military tactician, we expect [GetHerHim] to lead us to many victories on the field of battle
translation: 作为天才的军事战略家，我们期待[GetHerHim]在战场上带领我们走向胜利

original: A wise and learned [GetManWoman], progress and innovation is expected under [GetHerHis] rule
translation: 博学而智慧的[GetManWoman]，在[GetHerHis]统治下人们可以期待进步与创新

original: Being both thrifty and frugal, the realm will surely prosper under [GetHerHis] rule
translation: 勤俭而质朴，领地在[GetHerHis]统治下必将繁荣

original: A crafty and perceptive [GetManWoman], [GetSheHe] will have no problem gaining leverage where needed
translation: 狡猾而又敏锐的[GetManWoman]，[GetSheHe]将会毫无问题地获得需要的影响力

original: An accomplished diplomat, vassals and foreign rulers alike are sure to respect [GetHerHim]
translation: 一位老道的外交官，封臣和外国统治者都将尊敬[GetHerHim]

original: A rotund and selfish [GetManWoman], we are hoping [GetSheHe] will not eat the realm out of house and home
translation: 一个圆胖自私的[GetManWoman]，我们希望[GetSheHe]不会吃光领地内的房屋和家园

original: A prolific writer of prose, [GetFirstName] will likely be able to charm anyone with [GetHerHis] words
translation: 一个创作丰富的文学作者，[GetFirstName]使用[GetHerHis]语言或许能感染任何人的情绪

original: Not fearing [Religion.GetHighGodName], [GetSheHe] never lets religion get in the way of justice
translation: 毫不畏惧[Religion.GetHighGodName]，[GetSheHe]决不会让宗教妨碍正义

original: A carefree [GetManWoman], [GetSheHe] is perfectly fine with letting things stay as they are
translation: 作为一个无忧无虑的[GetManWoman]，[GetSheHe]满足于让事物保持原状

original: Preferring to lead troops from the safety of [GetHerHis] home, [GetFirstName] will have a hard time inspiring the troops
translation: [GetFirstName]倾向于带领着军队离开[GetHerHis]安全的家园，恐怕难以鼓舞士气

original: A reclusive [GetManWoman], [GetSheHe] is perfectly fine letting the council do most of [GetHerHis] work - for better or for worse
translation: 一个孤僻的[GetManWoman]，[GetSheHe]对于[GetHerHis]工作都交由内阁决定完全没有意见——不论好坏

original: Seeing the agents of [Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] around every corner, heretics and heathens alike should beware [GetHerHis] rule
translation: 看到[Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的仆人已然遍及世间的各个角落，任何异端及异教徒都应当担心[GetHerHis]统治

original: Both pious and generous, the [Religion.GetPriestTitle]s are likely to grow rich under [GetHerHis] rule
translation: [Religion.GetPriestTitle]在[GetHerHis]虔诚而慷慨的统治下很可能变得富有

original: Decadent and indulgent, [GetSheHe] brings shame upon the [GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty - an ill spell for the future of the realm
translation: 腐化且放纵，[GetSheHe]给[GetOnlyDynastyName]家族带来了耻辱——对于领地的未来是一个不祥的诅咒

original: Always clad in glistening and splendid armor, [GetFirstName] wants everyone to see [GetHerHim] as [GetSheHe] charges into battle
translation: [GetFirstName]总穿着闪耀华丽的盔甲，想要每个人在[GetSheHe]冲进战场时都看见[GetHerHim]

original: Never fearing the wrath of [Religion.GetHighGodName], [GetFirstName] is unlikely to spare any subject the punishments [GetSheHe] sees fit
translation: 从不畏惧[Religion.GetHighGodName]的怒火，只要[GetSheHe]觉得合适，[GetFirstName]不太可能饶恕任何臣民的刑罚

original: Adamant in [GetHerHis] ways of worship, faith and tradition is likely to be favored under [GetHerHis] rule
translation: 坚持以[GetHerHis]方式做礼拜，在[GetHerHis]统治下，信仰和传统或将得到促进

original: A devious and discontent soul, [GetHerHis] rule is likely to be filled with spite and intrigue
translation: 拥有一个狡猾且不满足的灵魂，[GetHerHis]统治很可能充满怨恨和阴谋

original: A confiding and patient [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] is convinced that good things will eventually come to [GetHerHim]
translation: 作为一个信任他人而有耐心的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]确信好事终将降临到[GetHerHim]身上

original: Plagued by seeing shadows around every corner, [GetSheHe] is likely to be ruled by fear
translation: 被无处不在的黑影折磨着，[GetSheHe]很可能被恐惧击垮

original: A godly [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] is sure to impress the [Religion.GetPriestTitle]s with [GetHerHis] extensive knowledge of the [Religion.GetScriptureName]
translation: 作为一个虔诚的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]凭借[GetHerHis]对[Religion.GetScriptureName]的深入了解，肯定可以给[Religion.GetPriestTitle]们留下深刻印象

original: A renowned [GetManWoman], dignitaries from far and wide will surely bow before [GetHerHim]
translation: 作为一个闻名于世的[GetManWoman]，世界各处来此的贵族都会在[GetHerHim]面前鞠躬

original: Blessed with an abundance of friends, [GetFirstName] is likely to find strong support for [GetHerHis] rule
translation: 受到大量好友的祝福，[GetFirstName]可能找到了维护[GetHerHis]统治的有力支持

original: Already a feared tyrant, the realm trembles before [GetHerHis] rule
translation: 已然是一位恐怖的暴君，整个领地在[GetHerHis]统治面前瑟瑟发抖

original: In possession of fabulous riches, only time will tell if [GetSheHe] will make the realm thrive or roost on the gold like a dragon
translation: 拥有了传说般的财富，只有时间才能告诉我们[GetSheHe]会让领地走向繁荣，抑或是如恶龙一般守护自己的黄金

original: A prolific [GetManWoman], [GetSheHe] has already produced numerous potential heirs for the realm
translation: 因这个[GetManWoman]高产似母猪，[GetSheHe]早已为领地生出众多继承人

original: Surrounded by enemies and rivals, we hope that [GetFirstName]'s rule is not struck short by means of a dagger in the back
translation: 在敌人和仇人包围之下，我们希望[GetFirstName]的统治不会因身后的匕首而短暂

original: A formidable duelist, we expect [GetHerHim] to excel in tournaments and personal combat alike
translation: 我们期望[GetHerHim]作为强大的决斗者能够在骑马比武和个人决斗中都脱颖而出

original: A frail and sickly [GetManWoman], the realm wishes for good health to return to [GetHerHim]
translation: 虚弱而苍白的[GetManWoman]，领地盼望健康回到[GetHerHim]身上

original: Being an illegitimate child, [GetFirstName] will surely set out to make [GetHerHis] mark on destiny
translation: 作为私生子，[GetFirstName]必将奋力在[GetHerHis]命运上留下自己的印记

original: Having led numerous raids, [GetFirstName]'s name is known and feared across the world
translation: 已然带领大量劫掠行动，[GetFirstName]的名字传扬开来并为世界恐惧

original: Having led men against the infidel, [GetFirstName]'s name is surely beloved in the eyes of [Religion.GetHighGodName]
translation: 带领着人们对抗异教徒，[GetFirstName]的名字受到了[Religion.GetHighGodName]宠爱的注视

original: An adventurous [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName]'s life is likely to be filled with glory and excitement
translation: 作为一个热爱冒险的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]的生活或将充满荣耀和刺激

original: Graceful in [GetHerHis] handling of birds of prey, [GetFirstName] is sure to skillfully impress both visiting vassals and foreign dignitaries
translation: [GetHerHis]如此优美地操控猛禽，[GetFirstName]必将给来访的封臣和外国显贵留下了深刻印象

original: Being a stark raving lunatic and deranged mad[GetManWoman], the only one who can help [GetFirstName]'s rule is [Religion.GetHighGodName]
translation: [GetManWoman]变得胡言乱语并精神错乱，只有[Religion.GetHighGodName]才能帮助[GetFirstName]维持统治了

original: Suspected to be possessed by a demon sent by [Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], the [Religion.GetPriestTitle]s will do their best to reign [GetHerHim] in
translation: 被怀疑受到由[Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]派遣恶魔附体，[Religion.GetPriestTitle]们将会竭尽所能约束[GetHerHim]

original: Beautiful beyond words, [GetFirstName]'s appearance will have foreign dignitaries groveling at [GetHerHis] feet
translation: 拥有难以言表美丽，[GetFirstName]的外貌将使众多外国显贵拜倒在[GetHerHis]脚下

original: Tolerant of those of other faiths, [GetFirstName]'s curiosity will surely find [GetHerHim] many friends
translation: 由于对其他信仰的容忍，[GetFirstName]的好奇心会为[GetHerHim]带来许多朋友

original: With a soul as wretched as [GetHerHis] face, we expect nothing but deception and vengeance from [GetHerHim]
translation: 其灵魂如同[GetHerHis]面容一样丑恶，我们只能从[GetHerHim]那里获得欺骗和仇恨

original: A gentle and compassionate soul, the vassals will surely thrive under [GetFirstName]'s reign
translation: 一个温和慈悲的人，封臣将会在[GetFirstName]的统治下繁荣昌盛

original: Ever confident in [GetHerselfHimself], [GetFirstName]'s rule may bring glory or shame to the [GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty - only time will tell
translation: [GetHerselfHimself]是那么的自信，[GetFirstName]的统治究竟会给[GetOnlyDynastyName]家族带来荣耀还是耻辱——只有时间才能告诉我们

original: Never caring for the word of the [Religion.GetPriestTitle], many fear [GetFirstName]'s rule will come to an early end as [Religion.GetHighGodName] smites [GetHerHim]
translation: 从不在乎[Religion.GetPriestTitle]的话，很多人担忧[GetFirstName]的统治会因[Religion.GetHighGodName]惩罚[GetHerHim]而早早结束

original: Well-spoken and outgoing, we expect [GetFirstName] to have no problem charming the court to [GetHerHis] side
translation: 我们期待善于表达且外向的[GetFirstName]可以毫无阻碍地获得整个宫廷的爱戴并站在[GetHerHis]一方

original: Spending long hours in prayer as to not upset [Religion.GetHighGodName], we are confident that [GetFirstName]'s reign will be a blessing to the realm
translation: 其花费大量时间在祷告上，以免触怒[Religion.GetHighGodName]，我们相信[GetFirstName]的统治将会使领地得到祝福

original: Being an ambitious [GetManWoman], we expect the realm to grow and prosper under [GetHerHis] rule
translation: 作为一个野心勃勃的[GetManWoman]，我们期望领地在[GetHerHis]统治下扩张并繁荣

original: Energetic and collected, [GetFirstName] will surely improve the realm under [GetHerHis] rule
translation: 精力充沛而镇静的[GetFirstName]将会使领地在[GetHerHis]统治下得到改善

original: Devious and deceptive, [GetFirstName]'s feud with truth itself may also be [GetHerHis] undoing
translation: 狡猾虚伪的[GetFirstName]，其与真相的冲突可能也会导致[GetHerHis]毁灭

original: A silent [GetManWoman], we do not expect [GetHerHim] to do well in diplomatic matters
translation: 作为一个沉默的[GetManWoman]，我们并不对[GetHerHim]在外交事务上抱有期待

original: A pious and humble [GetManWoman], we fear that [GetFirstName] may have been better suited for a temple rather than the [PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]'s throne
translation: [GetManWoman]虔诚而谦逊，我们恐怕[GetFirstName]更适合待在神殿里而非[PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]的宝座上

original: A corrupt and unjust [GetManWoman], we do not expect [GetHerHis] vassals to sit idly by if the realm starts crumbling
translation: 腐败而不公正的[GetManWoman]，我们并不认为[GetHerHis]封臣会在领地开始摇摇欲坠时还无动于衷

original: A modest and temperate [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName]'s passive nature may also be [GetHerHis] undoing
translation: 这位[GetManWoman]谦逊而节制，[GetFirstName]消极的本性可能也会导致[GetHerHis]毁灭

original: Loyal to [GetHerHis] spouse and family, [GetFirstName]'s dynasty, [GetOnlyDynastyName], is likely to view [GetHerHim] with fond eyes
translation: 忠诚于[GetHerHis]配偶和家庭，[GetFirstName]的家族，[GetOnlyDynastyName]很可能用善意的眼神看待[GetHerHim]
