original: [GetHerHis] eyes always set upon the next target, the vassals of the realm do well in locking up their [GetHusbandWifeOpp]s
translation: [GetHerHis]总是关注着下一个目标，领地内封臣们要善于看管好他们的[GetHusbandWifeOpp]

original: Content with [GetHerHis] lot, [GetFirstName]'s vassals may ridicule [GetHerHim] for [GetHerHis] passive nature
translation: 满足于[GetHerHis]命运，[GetFirstName]的封臣可能因[GetHerHis]消极本性而嘲笑[GetHerHim]

original: Being a [GetManWoman] willing to wait for a plan to come together, we expect great change to come to the realm - albeit slowly
translation: 其作为一名愿意去等待计划生效的[GetManWoman]，我们期盼领地会产生巨大的改变——即便过程缓慢

original: Courageous and willing to rush to action, we hope that [GetFirstName]'s bravery will not see the realm fall into reckless ruin
translation: 他是一个勇敢而乐意行动的人，我们希望[GetFirstName]的勇敢不会让领地变为废墟

original: Fair and just in all things, we hope that [GetSheHe] will handle any conflicts with grace
translation: 在每件事上都公平正义，我们希望[GetSheHe]将带着慈悲处理任何冲突

original: A large [GetManWoman], we hope that [GetSheHe] puts the realm before [GetHerHis] own hunger
translation: 体型庞大的[GetManWoman]，我们希望[GetSheHe]首先处理领地的事务而非[GetHerHis]饥饿

original: Being an envious and distrustful [GetManWoman], the vassals of the realm will have a hard time gaining [GetHerHis] trust
translation: 作为一个嫉妒怀疑的[GetManWoman]，领地内的封臣恐怕难以得到[GetHerHis]信任

original: A craven coward, it is unlikely that [GetHerHis] subjects will respect [GetHerHim]
translation: 作为一个懦夫，[GetHerHis]臣民不大可能尊重[GetHerHim]

original: A greedy [GetManWoman], the poor peasantry of the realm is likely to disapprove
translation: 这个[GetManWoman]如此的贪婪，王国的穷苦农民很可能不满

original: A mean-spirited [GetManWoman], we expect [GetFirstName]'s court to live in fear of [GetHerHim]
translation: 作为心胸狭窄的[GetManWoman]，我们担心[GetFirstName]的宫廷将生活在[GetHerHim]恐怖之中

original: Trusting and complacent, [GetFirstName]'s council may have more power over [GetHerHim] than what is right
translation: [GetFirstName]的内阁可能比轻信且自满的[GetHerHim]拥有更大的权力，即使不应如此

original: Unable to tell a lie, we fear that there may be those who despise [GetHerHis] honesty
translation: 由于没能力去撒谎，我们担心有人会轻视[GetHerHis]诚实

original: Being an idle [GetManWoman], we fear that nothing will come of [GetFirstName]'s reign
translation: 作为一个懒惰的[GetManWoman]，我们担心没有事会在[GetFirstName]的治下发生

original: A generous [GetManWoman], we hope that not all the wealth of the realm end up in the pockets of the [Religion.GetPriestTitle]s
translation: 这个[GetManWoman]慷慨大方，我们希望领地所有的财富最后不会都落到[Religion.GetPriestTitle]们的口袋里

original: Prone to rage, [GetFirstName]'s enemies and vassals alike are likely to live in fear of [GetHerHim]
translation: [GetFirstName]极易发怒，敌人和封臣都生活在对[GetHerHim]的恐惧之中

original: A suspicious [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName]'s paranoia might not sit well with [GetHerHis] subjects
translation: 疑神疑鬼的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]的偏执可能不太适合[GetHerHis]臣民

original: A bookish and scholarly [GetManWoman], we fear the [Religion.GetPriestTitle]s will thrive while the Burghers suffer
translation: [GetManWoman]好学有才，我们担心[Religion.GetPriestTitle]将会繁荣但商人们受到损害

original: A bullheaded [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName]'s subjects may have a hard time getting a word in after [GetSheHe] makes up [GetHerHis] mind
translation: 作为一个顽固的[GetManWoman]，[GetFirstName]的臣民在[GetSheHe]定下[GetHerHis]决定后或许要费尽力气才能令其听进意见

original: Having mastered many skills, [GetSheHe] is sure to be admired by [GetHerHis] subjects
translation: [GetSheHe]已然掌握了多门技巧，必将受到[GetHerHis]臣民钦佩

original: Blessed with awesome knowledge of all things between heaven and earth, [GetFirstName]'s rule is sure to be legendary
translation: 对天地之间所有事物的惊人知识肯定会使得[GetFirstName]的统治成为一段传奇

original: Having served in distant Miklagard, [GetFirstName]'s adventurous spirit is likely to inspire [GetHerHis] subjects
translation: 曾经在遥远的「伟大之城」米克拉加尔兹任职，[GetFirstName]的冒险精神很可能激励[GetHerHis]臣民

original: Convinced that everyone should be shown kindness regardless of worth, we fear that [GetFirstName]'s enemies may use this to their advantage
translation: 其确信对每个人都应该展现善良而无论是否值得，我们担心[GetFirstName]的敌人可能会利用这一点

original: Towering over [GetHerHis] enemies on the battlefield, [GetFirstName] will have no problem inspiring [GetHerHis] troops
translation: 在战场上俯视着[GetHerHis]敌人，[GetFirstName]能毫无问题地鼓舞[GetHerHis]军队

original: Ever willing to entertain [GetHerHis] spouse, we expect the royal family to grow and prosper
translation: 向来愿意与[GetHerHis]配偶行周公之礼，我们期待统治家族繁荣昌盛

original: An equitable [GetManWoman], we expect [GetHerHim] to ascertain that everyone gets their fair share
translation: 作为公平公正的[GetManWoman]，我们期待[GetHerHim]确保每个人都得到他们应得的

original: An industrious [GetManWoman], the realm will either be brought to riches or ruin under [GetHerHim]
translation: 作为一个勤政的[GetManWoman]，在[GetHerHim]的统治下王国可能变得富裕，也可能被毁灭

original: Ever willing to admit [GetHerHis] weaknesses of which there are many, it is with great doubt if the realm will confide in their new [PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]
translation: 总是愿意承认[GetHerHis]缺点有很多，使得领地是否会信任他们的新[PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]成为了疑问

original: A naive [GetManWoman], [GetHerHis] reluctant nature may stop [GetHerHim] from taking charge
translation: 作为一个幼稚的[GetManWoman]，[GetHerHis]犹豫不决的本性可能使[GetHerHim]失去控制权

original: Never afraid to speak [GetHerHis] mind, [GetSheHe] will surely charm the realm with [GetHerHis] astute honesty
translation: 从不怯于表达[GetHerHis]想法，[GetSheHe]定会用[GetHerHis]机敏诚实得到整个领地的爱戴

original: Lacking a moral compass, [GetHerHis] subjects will have to learn whether they should fear or respect [GetHerHim]
translation: 由于缺失道德上的指导，[GetHerHis]臣民将不得不学习他们究竟应该害怕还是尊敬[GetHerHim]

original: A true sadist, we fear for what the realm will turn into under [GetHerHis] rule
translation: 作为一个真正的虐待狂，我们担忧领地会在[GetHerHis]统治下变成什么样子

original: Blinded by religious fervor, heathens and heretics alike will come to fear [GetHerHis] righteous fury
translation: 其被宗教热情所蒙蔽，异端和异教徒都害怕[GetHerHis]正义之怒

original: A devious and distrustful character, we expect [GetHerHim] to have daggers with each of our names on
translation: 一个狡猾多疑的角色，我们担心[GetHerHim]会用匕首把我们每个人的名字上从名单上划去

original: Province Embellishment
translation: 省份细节

original: My Dynasty
translation: 我的家族

original: §ROut of Diplomatic Range§!
translation: §R超出外交范围§!

original: Prevents $CHAR|Y$ from declaring war on others of the same realm until $DATE|Y$.
translation: 防止$CHAR|Y$向同一领地内的其他人宣战，直到 $DATE|Y$。

original: Not pacified by liege (expires $DATE|Y$)
translation: 未受领主安抚（有效期至 $DATE|Y$）

original: $CHARACTER$ does not own mercenary units
translation: $CHARACTER$没有拥有雇佣兵单位

original: Has looted at least $NEED|Y$¤
translation: 劫掠了至少 $NEED|Y$¤

original: Has looted less than $NEED|Y$¤
translation: 劫掠了少于 $NEED|Y$¤

original: Has regiments raised
translation: 已经组建军团

original: Does not have regiments raised
translation: 未组建军团

original: Liege is in the process of enforcing realm peace
translation: 领主在强制全境和平的进程中

original: Liege is not in the process of enforcing realm peace
translation: 领主未在强制全境和平的进程中

original: Has newly acquired titles
translation: 新近取得头衔

original: Does not have newly acquired titles
translation: 新近未取得头衔

original: Not allowed to play this character without the §Y$DLC$§! DLC!
translation: 没有§Y$DLC$§!DLC，不能选择这个角色进行游戏！

original: See the Realm Prosper
translation: 见证领地繁荣

original: $WHO1|Y$ is returning a favor to $WHO2|Y$, but is voting their conscience as $WHO2|Y$ is abstaining.
translation: $WHO1|Y$想还人情给$WHO2|Y$，但目前按照本心投票，因为$WHO2|Y$弃权了

original: §YEmpty seat§!
translation: §Y空席位§!

original: Empty seats are considered to be voting no.
translation: 空的席位视为反对票。

original: You are using the Release D executable! This is slow due to extensive logging!
translation: 你正在使用释放D执行档！因其需要大量记录所以速度缓慢！

original: $WHO|Y$ has assigned the honorary title $TITLE|Y$
translation: $WHO|Y$已经授予荣誉头衔$TITLE|Y$

original: $WHO|Y$ has not assigned the honorary title $TITLE|Y$
translation: $WHO|Y$未授予荣誉头衔$TITLE|Y$

original: At this rate it will take $MONTHS|Y$ months to decay to §Y0%§!
translation: 按照此速率，需要 $MONTHS|Y$ 个月衰减到 §Y0%§!

original: Preferred War Target: $TARGET|Y$
translation: 首选战争目标：$TARGET|Y$

original: This character owes you a favor
translation: 这个角色欠你一个人情

original: Has children
translation: 有孩子

original: Has no children
translation: 没有孩子

original: Has living children
translation: 有活着的孩子

original: Has no living children
translation: 没有活着的孩子

original: Holds a minor title
translation: 拥有荣誉头衔

original: Does not hold a minor title
translation: 没有荣誉头衔

original: $BACKER$ is now backing $FACTIONLEADER$'s faction: §Y$FACTION$§!.
translation: $BACKER$现在支持$FACTIONLEADER$的派系：§Y$FACTION$§!。

original: $BACKER$ stops backing the §Y$FACTION$§! faction.
translation: $BACKER$停止支持§Y$FACTION$§!派系。

original: $BACKER$ stops backing all currently backed factions.
translation: $BACKER$停止支持所有现正支持的派系。

original: Has vassals forming opposition under the $FACTION|Y$ faction.
translation: 有封臣在$FACTION|Y$派系之下成立反对派。

original: Has vassals forming opposition under the $FACTION|Y$ faction for $TITLE|Y$.
translation: 有封臣在$FACTION|Y$派系之下为了$TITLE|Y$成立反对派。

original: Has vassals forming opposition under the $FACTION|Y$ faction for the interest of $THIRDPARTY|Y$ in $TITLE|Y$.
translation: 有封臣为了在$TITLE|Y$中的$THIRDPARTY|Y$的利益在$FACTION|Y$派系之下成立反对派。

original: Does NOT have vassals forming opposition under the $FACTION|Y$ faction.
translation: 没有封臣在$FACTION|Y$派系之下成立反对派。

original: Does NOT have vassals forming opposition under the $FACTION|Y$ faction for $TITLE|Y$.
translation: 没有封臣在$FACTION|Y$派系之下为了$TITLE|Y$成立反对派。

original: Does NOT have vassals forming opposition under the $FACTION|Y$ faction for the interest of $THIRDPARTY|Y$ in $TITLE|Y$.
translation: 没有封臣为了在$TITLE|Y$中$THIRDPARTY|Y$的利益在$FACTION|Y$派系之下成立反对派。

original: Starts forming the faction $FACTION|Y$.
translation: 开始创建派系$FACTION|Y$。

original: Starts forming the faction $FACTION|Y$ for $TITLE|Y$.
translation: 开始为了$TITLE|Y$创建派系$FACTION|Y$。

original: Starts forming the faction $FACTION|Y$ for the interest of $THIRDPARTY|Y$ in $TITLE|Y$.
translation: 开始为了在$TITLE|Y$中$THIRDPARTY|Y$的利益创建派系$FACTION|Y$。

original: Any Courtier or Vassal
translation: 任何廷臣或封臣

original: All Courtiers and Vassals
translation: 所有廷臣和封臣

original: Any Player
translation: 任何玩家

original: All Players
translation: 所有玩家

original: was killed by a rampaging bear
translation: 死于暴熊

original: died in a drowning accident
translation: 死于意外溺水

original: was tragically killed by a stray arrow
translation: 死于流矢

original: died from an accidental fall
translation: 死于意外坠落

original: died from a venomous snake bite
translation: 死于毒蛇咬伤

original: was killed by a man-eating tiger
translation: 死于食人虎

original: The County of §Y[From.Location.GetName]§! has been converted to the §Y[From.Religion.GetName]§! faith.
translation: §Y[From.Location.GetName]§!省份已转化为§Y[From.Religion.GetName]§!信仰

original: Demand Gavelkind
translation: 要求均分继承法

original: Demand that §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! institute Gavelkind Succession Law. [This.GetSubjectPronounCap] might refuse or ask for something in return...
translation: 要求§Y[This.GetTitledName]§!制定均分继承法。[This.GetSubjectPronounCap]可能拒绝或要求回报……

original: Demand Gavelkind
translation: 要求均分继承法

original: Demand that §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! institute Gavelkind Succession Law. [This.GetSubjectPronounCap] owes me a favor, and thus cannot refuse.
translation: 要求§Y[This.GetTitledName]§!制定均分继承法。[This.GetSubjectPronounCap]欠我一个人情，所以不能拒绝。

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

For the long-term good of the realm, I must ask you to change succession law to Gavelkind.

With respect, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠诚的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

为了王国的未来，我必须要求你更改继承法为均分继承法。

致敬，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] will owe me a big Favor for this!
translation: [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]将为此欠我一个大人情！

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am not keen on Gavelkind Law, but I would never dream of refusing you, my liege!

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

虽然我对均分继承法不感兴趣，但我从不敢妄想去拒绝你，我的领主！

你忠诚的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am not thrilled at instituting Gavelkind law, but I will comply in return for a large sum of money. I am sure you understand.

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我并不为制定均分继承法而感到兴奋，但如果有一大笔钱作为回报的话我会顺从的。我知道你明白我的意思。

你忠诚的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Very well...
translation: 那好吧……

original:
To my vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am willing to compensate you fairly in return for your institution of Gavelkind law. Your wisdom serves your people well.

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

我愿意公正地给你补偿作为制定均分继承法的回报。你的智慧惠及你的民众。

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

Your wish for monetary compensation in return for Gavelkind law is understandable. However, I cannot afford the sum you requested.

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

你期盼为制定均分继承法获得货币性补偿是可以理解的。但是，我支付不起你的要求。

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My realm shall not be divided!
translation: 我的领地不应该被分裂！

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I wish I could comply with your desire, but Gavelkind law will not serve my descendants well. I am afraid I must refuse.

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

我希望我能够顺从你的渴望，但是均分继承法对于我的后代而言不是好事。我恐怕得拒绝了。

你忠诚的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am willing to institute Gavelkind law. However, it would clearly not be in my best interests, so you would owe me a comparable Favor...

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

我愿意制定均分继承法。然而，这很明显不能使我获得最大利益，所以你应该欠我一个相应的人情……

你忠诚的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

Thank you for instituting Gavelkind law. I am in your debt, and promise to assist you when you ask for a favor in return!

Most gratefully, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠诚的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

感谢你制定了均分继承法。我欠你一个人情，我保证在你需要的时候还给你！

最心怀感激的，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I do understand your reluctance to change to Gavelkind succession. However, I will not be indebted to you. With some disappointment.

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

我能理解你对于均分继承法的不情愿。然而，我并不想欠你什么。而且我有些失望。

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

I am calling in that favor you owe me. I need you to change succession law to Gavelkind. Trust me, it is for the best...

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致我忠诚的封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

因为你欠我一个人情，我需要你把继承法改成均分继承法。相信我，这是最好的结果……

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

Gavelkind is a divisive law that will cause problems for my descendants, but I am an honorable [From.GetManWoman] and acknowledge the favor I owe you. The debt has now been repaid.

Your loyal vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

均分继承法是一种分裂的法律，会给我的后代造成许多问题，但是我是一个高贵的[From.GetManWoman]，而且知道我欠你人情。现在人情还清了。

你忠诚的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Convert Religion
translation: 改信宗教

original: Convert to [Root.GetPossPronoun] [Root.Religion.GetName] Faith
translation: 皈依[Root.GetPossPronoun][Root.Religion.GetName]信仰

original: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. I can convert to §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!'s faith and become a §Y[Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]§!...
translation: 配偶或妾室的枕边风非常具有说服力。我会皈依§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!的信仰并成为一名§Y[Root.Religion.GetName][Root.Religion.GetGroupName]信徒§!……

original: Funded Buildings in my Demesne
translation: 资助直辖领的建筑

original: - $DISEASE|Y$, with an infection weight of $VALUE|R$ ($UNDEFENDED$)
translation: - $DISEASE|Y$，感染率为 $VALUE|R$（$UNDEFENDED$）

original: $VALUE$ before §YDisease Resistance§! of $DISEASE_RESISTANCE$
translation: $VALUE$ 在 $DISEASE_RESISTANCE$ 的§Y防疫能力§!之前

original: County is owned by you or your vassal
translation: 省份由你或你的封臣拥有

original: The game was started on $DATE|Y$
translation: 游戏开始于 $DATE|Y$

original: The game has been going for $LENGTH|Y$ years
translation: 游戏已经运行了 $LENGTH|Y$ 年

original: Suspected Impaler
translation: 嫌疑拷打爱好者

original: Change Childhood Focus to Heritage
translation: 变更童年焦点为传统

original: Mild Illness
translation: 轻微病症

original: While this character is feeling unwell, it doesn't seem to be as bad as expected.
translation: 这个人感觉不舒服，不过并不如想象中的严重。

original: Severe Illness
translation: 严重病症

original: This character is suffering far more than expected from their illness.
translation: 这个人病得比想象中的严重。

original: Bedridden
translation: 卧床不起

original: This character has been struck down by illness and is barely conscious. It is not certain they will survive.
translation: 这个人病倒了并且几乎失去意识，不确定他是否能活下来。

original: §BThe Reaper's Due:§! Minor Epidemics
translation: §B「死神索命」：§!小型瘟疫

original: Minor Epidemics will appear at the default rate. Small and Normal outbreaks will appear frequently, Large outbreaks will be very rare.
translation: 小型瘟疫会以默认概率出现。小型和普通的爆发会经常出现，大爆发很罕见。

original: Fewer
translation: 更少

original: Minor Epidemics will appear at a reduced rate, and the chance for a Large outbreak is eliminated entirely.

original: Desires a better Alliance
translation: 寻求更好的盟友

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] insisted that you should abstain from food in order to feel better and prescribed a three day fast.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]坚持要求你远离饭食，以求好转，总共禁食三天。

original: Allow the kitten to follow you home
translation: 允许小猫跟着你回家

original: Iron Hand
translation: 铁手

original: This character possesses a mechanical prosthetic hand made of iron.
translation: 这名角色拥有一只铁制的机械假手。

original: Golden Hand
translation: 金手

original: This character possesses a gilded prosthetic hand decorated with elaborate engravings.
translation: 这名角色拥有一只镀金的义手，饰以繁复的雕纹。

original: Every morning since my injury, I have been startled by the stump where my hand used to be. The people around me have not been able to get used to it, either. Lately I have considered having a prosthetic hand crafted. Perhaps that would make me look, and feel, more like my old self?
translation: 受伤后每个早上，我都被断手留下的残肢吓到。我周围的人也无法适应这种状况。不久我就考虑要不要打造一个义手。也许能让我看起来、感觉起来，更像之前的自己？

original: Find me the best goldsmith in the realm!
translation: 给我找来境内最好的金匠！

original: Have a golden hand made to impress everyone with your wealth good taste.\n
translation: 打造一只金手，让所有人知道你的财富和品位。\n

original: I want something made to compensate for my missing fingers.
translation: 只想做一个代替我失去的手指的东西。

original: Have a mechanical hand made which will allow you to hold objects such as quills and swords.\n
translation: 打造一只机械手，让你可以握住羽毛笔和长剑等物品。\n

original: I still have one good hand. I should focus on that.
translation: 我还有一只正常的手。我应该专注于此。

original: Do not have a prosthetic hand made.
translation: 不造义手。

original: Iron Hand
translation: 铁手

original: I never considered how lucky I was to have two healthy legs! Oh, the freedom to go wherever and do whatever I pleased... I am a [Root.GetTitle], yet now I am limited by these darned crutches! It is below me to hobble around like this. Some days I feel more ridiculous than a jester...
translation: 我从未想过拥有健康的双腿是多么幸运的事！啊，自由，去任何想去的地方，做任何想做的事……我是一位[Root.GetTitle]，现在却受困于这双拐杖！我不得不像现在这样跛行四处。有些天我觉得自己比小丑还可笑……

original: I never thought about how lucky I was to have two healthy legs! Oh, the freedom to go wherever and do whatever I pleased... I am a [Root.GetTitle], yet now I am limited by these darned crutches! It is below me to hobble around like this. Some days I feel more ridiculous than my jester [jester.GetTitledFirstName]...
translation: 我从未想过拥有健康的双腿是多么幸运的事！啊，自由，去任何想去的地方，做任何想做的事……我是一位[Root.GetTitle]，现在却受困于这双拐杖！我不得不像现在这样跛行四处。有些天我觉得自己比宫廷小丑[jester.GetTitledFirstName]还可笑……

original: Surely we can find someone to craft a lifelike replacement.
translation: 我们一定能找到人打造出如有生命的代替品。

original: Have a lifelike leg prosthesis made to make up for your missing leg.
translation: 打造一条如有生命的腿，替代你失去的腿。

original: I don't care what they think, I just want some of my freedom back.
translation: 我不在乎别人怎么想，我只想要回自己的部分自由。

original: Have a peg leg made to make up for your missing leg.
translation: 打造一条木制假腿，替代你失去的腿。

original: This chair is comfortable enough. I have deserved some rest.
translation: 这张椅子已经够舒服的了。休息是我应得的。

original: Do not have a prosthesis made.
translation: 不造义肢。

original: Prosthetic Leg
translation: 义腿

original: This character possesses a very lifelike prosthetic leg. The only evidence of a missing leg is a slight limp.
translation: 这名角色拥有一条如有生命的义腿。失去一条腿的唯一迹象只是些许的跛脚。

original: Peg Leg
translation: 木腿

original: This character has one limb ending in a peg leg.
translation: 这名角色的一肢是木制假腿。

original: Peg Leg
translation: 木腿

original: Refused Council Position
translation: 内阁席位被拒

original: You are more than confident in your abilities, yet your liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to be oblivious to your accomplishments. [From.GetSheHeCap] puts [From.GetHerHis] trust in lesser minds, for the sole reason that they were born as men. It is simply not fair...
translation: 你对自己的能力非一般的自信，可你的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]似乎毫不在乎你的成就。[From.GetSheHeCap]将[From.GetHerHis]信任托付给了一些弱小的心灵，似乎仅因为他们天生是男人。太不公平了……

original: I'll demand that [From.GetFirstName] makes me [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetChancellorName].
translation: 我将要求[From.GetFirstName]任命我为[From.GetHerHis][Root.GetChancellorName]。

original: Request that you will be given the position of [Root.GetChancellorName] on the council of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 要求获得§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!内阁中[Root.GetChancellorName]的位置。

original: I'll let [From.GetFirstName] know I'm the only reasonable candidate to become [Root.GetMarshalName].
translation: 我将让[From.GetFirstName]知道我是[Root.GetMarshalName]唯一合适的候选人。

original: Request that you will be given the position of [Root.GetMarshalName] on the council of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 要求获得§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!内阁中[Root.GetMarshalName]的位置。

original: I'm sure [From.GetFirstName] agrees I would make an excellent [Root.GetTreasurerName].
translation: 我确信[From.GetFirstName]认同我会成为出色的[Root.GetTreasurerName]。

original: Request that you will be given the position of [Root.GetTreasurerName] on the council of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 要求获得§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!内阁中[Root.GetTreasurerName]的位置。

original: No one on [From.GetFirstName]'s council can challenge my cunning.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]的内阁中没人能挑战我的诡诈。

original: Request that you will be given the position of [Root.GetSpymasterName] on the council of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 要求获得§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!内阁中[Root.GetSpymasterName]的位置。

original: It is no use. [From.GetFirstName] will never put me on the council.
translation: 没用的。[From.GetFirstName]绝不会让我进入内阁。

original: Abandon your ambition to get a position on the council of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 放弃你获得§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的内阁席位的野心。\n

original: Your vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName] has expressed her dissatisfaction with your choice of advisors. She claims that she is more qualified than the majority of your council and that she would make an excellent [Root.GetChancellorName]. She would be a controversial choice, however...
translation: 你的封臣[From.GetTitledFirstName]对于你顾问的人选表达了她的不满。她声称她比你内阁中大部分人都要胜任，并将成为一位优秀的[Root.GetChancellorName]。不过，[From.GetSheHe]会是一个充满争议的选择……

original: Your vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName] has expressed her dissatisfaction with your choice of advisors. She claims that she is more qualified than the majority of your council and that she would make an excellent [Root.GetMarshalName]. She would be a controversial choice, however...
translation: 你的封臣[From.GetTitledFirstName]对于你顾问的人选表达了她的不满。她声称她比你内阁中大部分人都要胜任，并将成为一位优秀的[Root.GetMarshalName]。不过，[From.GetSheHe]会是一个充满争议的选择……

original: Your vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName] has expressed her dissatisfaction with your choice of advisors. She claims that she is more qualified than the majority of your council and that she would make an excellent [Root.GetTreasurerName]. She would be a controversial choice, however...
translation: 你的封臣[From.GetTitledFirstName]对于你顾问的人选表达了她的不满。她声称她比你内阁中大部分人都要胜任，并将成为一位优秀的[Root.GetTreasurerName]。不过，[From.GetSheHe]会是一个充满争议的选择……

original: Your vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName] has expressed her dissatisfaction with your choice of advisors. She claims that she is more qualified than the majority of your council and that she would make an excellent [Root.GetSpymasterName]. She would be a controversial choice, however...
translation: 你的封臣[From.GetTitledFirstName]对于你顾问的人选表达了她的不满。她声称她比你内阁中大部分人都要胜任，并将成为一位优秀的[Root.GetSpymasterName]。不过，[From.GetSheHe]会是一个充满争议的选择……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] took my advice and put me on the council. I am sure I have more than impressed [From.GetHerHim] with my work thus far. I really am the right woman for the job!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]接受了我的建议，让我进入内阁。我确信，目前为止我的工作不仅仅只是给[From.GetHerHim]留下印象而已。我绝对是最适合这份工作的女人！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is certainly a most [GetRootFromCompliment]!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]必然是最[GetRootFromCompliment]！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to give me a position on the council. Apparently it would be too 'controversial'. What a coward!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝授予我内阁的席位。很明显这太「充满争议」了。真是个懦夫！

original: I always knew [From.GetTitledFirstName] was a [GetRootFromInsult]...
translation: 我早就知道[From.GetTitledFirstName]是个[GetRootFromInsult]……

original: Appreciated Abilities
translation: 能力受肯定

original: Good Care
translation: 良好的照顾

original: This character has received good care after an injury or an illness.
translation: 这名角色在受伤或疾病后受到了良好的照顾。

original: Bad Care
translation: 差劲的照顾

original: This character has received bad care after an injury or an illness.
translation: 这名角色在受伤或疾病后受到了差劲的照顾。

original: Neglected
translation: 受忽视

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has recently endured a serious injury and we are unsure whether [From.GetSheHe] will survive it. When [From.GetSheHe] is not sleeping, [From.GetSheHe] is tossing and turning in [From.GetHerHis] bed, moaning in agony.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，最近在经受一次严重的伤痛，我们不确定[From.GetSheHe]能否活下来。当[From.GetSheHe]醒着的时候，[From.GetSheHe]就在[From.GetHerHis]床上不安的翻来覆去，因痛苦而呻吟。

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], is suffering from a serious disease. It has left [From.GetHerHim] bedridden and the physicians fear for [From.GetHerHis] life. When [From.GetSheHe] is not sleeping, [From.GetSheHe] is tossing and turning in [From.GetHerHis] bed, moaning in agony.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，最近受难于一次严重的疾病。[From.GetHerHim]被迫卧床不起，医生也担心[From.GetHerHis]生命。当[From.GetSheHe]醒着的时候，[From.GetSheHe]就在[From.GetHerHis]床上不安的翻来覆去，因痛苦而呻吟。

original: I will do my best to care for [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我将尽我所能照顾[From.GetFirstName]。

original: Take care of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, trying to ease [From.GetHerHis] pains and improve [From.GetHerHis] health.
translation: 照看§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!，尝试减轻[From.GetHerHis]苦痛，改善[From.GetHerHis]健康。

original: [From.GetFirstName] is weak, this is my chance!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]正是虚弱的时候，我的机会来了！

original: Offered to take care of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, using it as an cover while attempting to sabotage [From.GetHerHis] treatment.
translation: 主动提出照看§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!，作为尝试破坏[From.GetHerHis]治疗的掩护。

original: This is no business of mine.
translation: 跟我没关系。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], my [GetFromRelation], has come to visit my bedside. [From.GetHerHisCap] eyes are full of concern as [From.GetSheHe] offers to take care of me and nurse me back to health.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]，我的[GetFromRelation]，来到床边探望我。[From.GetHerHisCap]双眼中满是担忧，并且[From.GetSheHe]提出照看我，看护我直到我恢复健康。

original: Oh, [From.GetFirstName], your kindness humbles me. I accept.
translation: 啊，[From.GetFirstName]，你的善良让我自惭形愧。我接受。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will take care of you.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将照看你。

original: I am fine! I do not need you to fuss over me.
translation: 我很好！我不需要你对我上下其手。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been a most attentive caretaker. Each time I have waken, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] has been there at my bedside. My every need has been seen to and [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has administered my treatment expertly. I do feel as if my health has been improving in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] gentle hands...
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]是最用心的照看人。每次我醒来，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]必已在我床边等候。我的每个需求都能处理好，而且[FromFrom.GetFirstName]很专业地管理着我的治疗。我确实感到自己的健康似乎在[FromFrom.GetHerHis]温柔的双手中一天天变好……

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] must have sent me [FromFrom.GetFirstName].
translation: 一定是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]为我送来了[FromFrom.GetFirstName]。

original: During the time I have been looking after [From.GetFirstName], [From.GetHerHis] health and mood seem to have been steadily improving. More than once [From.GetSheHe] has expressed [From.GetHerHis] sincere gratitude towards me.
translation: 在我照料[From.GetFirstName]期间，[From.GetHerHis]健康和心情似乎稳步改善。[From.GetSheHe]对我不止一次表达了[From.GetHerHis]诚挚谢意。

original: I am relieved [From.GetFirstName] is feeling better.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]逐渐好转，我的担忧也落了地。

original: But... but... This is not what I intended!
translation: 但是……但是……这并不是我想要的结果！

original: I never thought that [FromFrom.GetFirstName] was a bad person, but these last few days have shown me a great deal regarding [FromFrom.GetHerHis] character. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has been rough, clumsy and inattentive. I am also haunted by a creeping suspicion that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] has botched my treatment, because I feel worse than ever...
translation: 我从未想过[FromFrom.GetFirstName]是一个坏人，但这几天我看清了[FromFrom.GetHerHis]性格中许多方面。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]一直都粗鲁、愚笨、漫不经心。我心中还萦绕着一个可怕的猜测：[FromFrom.GetSheHe]搞砸了我的治疗，因为我感觉比任何时候更糟。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] is a [GetRootFromFromInsult], mark my words!
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]是个[GetRootFromFromInsult]，记住我的话！

original: During the time I have been looking after [From.GetFirstName], [From.GetHerHis] health and mood have been declining. More than once [From.GetSheHe] has cursed me for my 'feeble mind' and 'rough hands'.
translation: 在我照料[From.GetFirstName]期间，[From.GetHerHis]健康和心情都在走下坡路。不止一次，[From.GetSheHe]诅咒我孱弱的心灵和粗鲁的双手。

original: [From.GetFirstName] can hardly blame me for this!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]不能为此责怪我！

original: Excellent. Everything is going according to plan.
translation: 太好了，一切按计划进行。

original: Ungrateful
translation: 不感激

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes a place on your council.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!在你的内阁中获得一席之地。

original: These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been growing weaker and weaker over the last few weeks and I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed consumption.
translation: 黑暗的时日。我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，过去两个星期中身体变得越发虚弱，而我刚刚得知[From.GetHerHis]痛苦竟源自肺结核。

original: These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been beset by a high fever for several days and I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed slow fever.
translation: 黑暗的时日。我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，过去几天中高烧不退，而我刚刚得知[From.GetHerHis]痛苦竟源自慢性热。

original: These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been beset by strange rashes and episodes of delirium over the last few weeks. I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed camp fever.
translation: 黑暗的时日。我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，过去数个星期中苦于奇怪的红疹和不时出现的谵妄，而我刚刚得知[From.GetHerHis]痛苦竟源自露营热。

original: These are dark days. When my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], was beset by a high fever and could not stop vomiting, we feared the worst. The suspicions are now confirmed. [From.GetHerHisCap] affliction is indeed the dreaded plague.
translation: 黑暗的时日。我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，一直苦于高烧和呕吐不停，我们已经做了最坏的打算。猜疑终究还是证实了，[From.GetHerHis]痛苦竟源自那受人恐惧的大瘟疫。

original: These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been beset by strange rashes and a high fever. I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed measles.
translation: 黑暗的时日。我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，一直苦于奇怪的红疹和高烧，而我刚刚得知[From.GetHerHis]痛苦竟源自麻疹。

original: These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been beset by oozing lesions and a high fever. I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed smallpox.
translation: 黑暗的时日。我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，一直苦于不停渗液的体表皮损和高烧，而我刚刚得知[From.GetHerHis]痛苦竟源自天花。

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has not been quite [From.GetHerselfHimself] lately. For a while now, I have noticed [From.GetHerHim] looking tired and thin. I have just been informed of the cause - [From.GetFirstName] has contracted syphilis!
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，最近不太像[From.GetHerselfHimself]。这段时间，我注意到[From.GetHerHim]看起来疲惫且消瘦。我刚刚得知了原因——[From.GetFirstName]染上了阿兹特克梅毒！

original: Recently I have noticed the pitiful state of my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName]. I have just been informed that the cause of [From.GetHerHis] aches and fatigue is a case of the flu.
translation: 最近我注意到我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]令人可怜的健康状态。我刚刚得知[From.GetHerHis]疼痛和疲乏的原因是一种流感。

original: During the last few days my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been clutching at [From.GetHerHis] stomach and made frequent visits to the privy. I have now been informed that [From.GetSheHe] is suffering from dysentery.
translation: 最近这几天我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，总是紧搂着[From.GetHerHis]腹部而且常常如厕。我现在得知[From.GetSheHe]正苦于痢疾。

original: For some time now, my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been complaining about [From.GetHerHis] painful joints. Apparently they frequently swell up, becoming hot and aching for several hours.
translation: 一段时间以来，我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，都在抱怨[From.GetHerHis]关节疼。关节很明显地肿胀起来，发热并持续疼痛数个小时。

original: During the last few days my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has not been able to keep any drink or food down. It seems as if [From.GetSheHe] is suffering from food poisoning.
translation: 最近几天我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，都无法吃喝任何东西。似乎[From.GetSheHe]正苦于食物中毒。

original: During the last few days, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been acting strangely indeed! I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] aggressive behaviour and episodes of extreme anxiety have been caused by rabies.
translation: 最近几天，我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，行为举止确实非常怪异！我刚刚得知[From.GetHerHis]攻击行为和不时出现的极端焦虑是由狂犬病引起的。

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has not been [From.GetHerselfHimself] lately. I have noticed how [From.GetSheHe] has lost weight and been overcome by episodes of intense fatigue. Apparently the underlying cause is cancerous growth which is sucking the life out of [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，最近不太像[From.GetHerselfHimself]。我注意到[From.GetSheHe]不断消瘦且被强烈的疲乏击垮。最根本的原因很明显是癌症的扩大在吸取[From.GetHerHim]的生命。

original: For some time now my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been overcome with fatigue and troubled by a persistent cough. I have now been informed that the symptoms are due to pneumonia.
translation: 一段时间以来我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，被疲乏击垮且困于持续的咳嗽。我现在得知这些症状是由于肺炎。

original: Sickness and death awaits us all. Stop pestering me.
translation: 疾病和死亡是我们的宿命。别再烦我了。

original: I must find a court physician!
translation: 我必须找一个宫廷医师！

original: For some time now, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been avoiding me. [From.GetSheHeCap] has not visited my bedchamber for several weeks. When I have demanded to know why [From.GetSheHe] has given me nothing but feeble excuses. Today I overheard a couple of [From.GetHerHis] servants gossiping. They said [From.GetFirstName] has contracted syphilis!
translation: 一段时间以来，我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]都在躲着我。[From.GetSheHeCap]好几个星期没进入我的卧室了。当我想要知道原因时[From.GetSheHe]只能给出一些毫不成立的理由。今天我偷听到[From.GetHerHis]一些仆人在八卦。他们说[From.GetFirstName]染上了梅毒！

original: So [From.GetSheHe] is the one who brought this upon me! What a [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: 所以[From.GetSheHe]就是把梅毒传染给我的人！真是个[GetRootFromInsult]！

original: I will show that [GetRootFromInsult] what I do with traitors!
translation: 我会让[GetRootFromInsult]知道我是怎么对待叛徒的！

original: Imprison §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[syphilis_lover.GetTitledFirstName]§!, whom your spies believe is [From.GetHerHis] lover.\n
translation: 监禁§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!和§Y[syphilis_lover.GetTitledFirstName]§!，即你的密探确信的[From.GetHerHis]情人。\n

original: Imprison §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 监禁 §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], am I to blame? I will not give up until [From.GetSheHe] is well again!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，这是我的错吗？直到[From.GetSheHe]再次痊愈，我绝不会放弃！

original: The poor thing! I will do what I can for [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 可怜的人！我会尽我所能帮助[From.GetHerHim]。

original: Take care of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, attempting to nurse [From.GetHerHim] back to health.\n
translation: 照看§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!，希望看护[From.GetHerHim]直到恢复健康。\n

original: You shouldn't believe everything you hear. Surely there's another reason.
translation: 你不应该相信你听说的所有东西。肯定是有别的原因。

original: Harsh Punishment
translation: 严酷的惩罚

original: Over demesne size limit
translation: 超出直辖领上限

original: New EULA
translation: 新的最终用户许可协议

original: The EULA has been updated. Please accept the new version in order to play the game.
translation: 最终用户许可协议已更新。请接受最新的版本后再进行游戏。

original: Accept
translation: 接受

original: Quit game
translation: 退出游戏

original: Ten Years
translation: 十年

original: Twenty-five Years
translation: 二十五年

original: Fifty Years
translation: 五十年

original: Hundred Years
translation: 百年

original: $WHO|Y$ has a war participation less than $VALUE|%Y0$
translation: $WHO|Y$的战争分数少于$VALUE|%Y0$

original: $WHO|Y$ has a war participation of at least $VALUE|%Y0$
translation: $WHO|Y$的战争分数至少有$VALUE|%Y0$

original: §RCannot customize characters in saves§!
translation: §R不可更改存档中的角色§!

original: Can create the title $TITLE|Y$
translation: 可以创造头衔$TITLE|Y$

original: Can't create the title $TITLE|Y$
translation: 无法创造头衔$TITLE|Y$

original:
The Council of $LIEGE|Y$ has declared that peace shall rein in all the realm! 
All internal wars waged between vassals of $LIEGE|Y$ will end with a §YWhite Peace§! in $DAYS|Y$ days!

If you are on the Council you can call in a §YFavor§! from $LIEGE|Y$ to prevent the §YRealm Peace§! from being enforced.
translation:
$LIEGE|Y$的内阁已宣布和平应统治全境！
所有$LIEGE|Y$封臣间的内部战争都将在 $DAYS|Y$ 天内以§Y无条件和平§!结束！

如果你在内阁中，你可以以$LIEGE|Y$的§Y人情§!为交换防止§Y全境和平§!生效。

original: The Council of $LIEGE|Y$ has declared that peace shall rein in all the realm! \nVassals of $LIEGE|Y$ are unable to wage war on each other for another $DAYS|Y$ days!
translation: $LIEGE|Y$的内阁已宣布和平应统治全境！\n$DAYS|Y$ 天内$LIEGE|Y$的封臣无法互相发动战争！

original: Your Council has declared that peace shall rule the realm! \nAll internal wars waged between your vassals will end with a §YWhite Peace§! in $DAYS|Y$ days!
translation: 你的内阁已宣布和平应统治全境！\n你封臣间的所有内部战争都将在 $DAYS|Y$ 天内以§Y无条件和平§!结束！

original: Your Council has declared that peace shall rule the realm! \nYour vassals are unable to wage war on each other for another $DAYS|Y$ days!
translation: 你的内阁已宣布和平应统治全境！\n$DAYS|Y$ 天内你的封臣无法互相发动战争！

original: Either not a matrilineal union, or $TARGET|Y$ is a woman
translation: 不是入赘婚姻，或者$TARGET|Y$是一名女性

original: Is NOT de facto liege title
translation: 不是实际领主头衔

original: Is de facto liege title
translation: 是实际领主头衔

original: Is NOT immortal
translation: 不是永生的

original: Is immortal
translation: 是永生的

original: Is NOT incapable
translation: 不是无能的

original: Is incapable
translation: 是无能的

original: Is NOT a pilgrim
translation: 不是朝圣者

original: Is a pilgrim
translation: 是朝圣者

original: Same regnal name as $WHO|Y$
translation: 与$WHO|Y$的尊号相同

original: Different regnal name from $WHO|Y$
translation: 与$WHO|Y$的尊号不相同

original: Has an inheritance blocking trait
translation: 拥有导致失去继承权的特质

original: Does NOT have an inheritance blocking trait
translation: 没有会导致失去继承权的特质

original: Has Dynastic Prestige of at least
translation: 家族威望至少有

original: Has lower Dynastic Prestige than
translation: 家族威望低于

original: Move preferred capital to $CAPITAL|Y$
translation: 移动首选首都至$CAPITAL|Y$

original: Net Monthly Population Growth
translation: 每月人口净增长

original: Net Monthly Population Decline
translation: 每月人口净衰减

original: $RULER$ cannot change another crown Law in $TITLE$ until $DATE$
translation: $RULER$不能在$DATE$之前再次变更$TITLE$的王权法

original: Population going to Manpower

original: Continue failed!
translation: 无法继续！

original:
Continuing from the latest save failed. This could be for the following reasons:
* The save is broken
* The save requires DLC that isn't active
* The save doesn't work with the current version of the game
*You're playing a mod that uses its own save folder
* The save is an ironman save, and your game is modified, preventing achievements

If the cause was ironman, you can load the game regardless via the Load Game menu
translation:
无法载入最新的存档。这可能是如下原因造成的：
* 存档损坏
* 存档所需的DLC未被激活
* 存档与当前版本不兼容
* 你正在玩一个mod，该mod使用自己设定的文件地址。
* 存档是铁人模式存档，而你的游戏已经改过了，无法获取成就。

如果原因是铁人模式，你依然可以通过加载游戏菜单加载游戏。

original: Your liege, [Root.Liege.GetBestName], has decided to seclude [Root.Liege.GetHerselfHimself] and [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] court from the outside world in order to avoid the ongoing epidemic. The gates of [gates_closed_target.GetName] have been shut and any landed councillors have been sent back to their homes.
translation: 你的领主，[Root.Liege.GetBestName]，已经决定隔离[Root.Liege.GetHerselfHimself]和[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]宫廷与外部世界的联系，以躲避正在流行的瘟疫。[gates_closed_target.GetName]已经封闭，任何拥有土地的内阁成员已被打发回他们自己的领地。

original: [Root.Liege.GetSheHeCap] is only doing what is necessary, who can blame [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]?

original: Before you have even time to react the snake bares its fangs. Heading straight for you, seemingly flying, it bites you in your neck. The creature hisses, slithers around you and moves upwards. "Nooo, not the face!" you yell, flailing your arms wildly. "[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName], help me!"\n\nAfter what seems like an eternity [eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName] rises from her spot and steps in to grab the snake by its neck, her voice soothing it as it obediently pours back into the jar.
translation: 甚至在你没有反应之前，蛇就露出了尖牙。它直奔向你，就像飞行一样，它咬住了你的脖子！这生物嘶嘶的叫着，滑行在你身上，并不断向上移动。「不要，不要咬脸！」你大喊，疯狂挥舞你的手臂。「[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]，帮帮我！」\n\n在一段近乎永恒的时间之后，[eternal_life_mystic.GetFirstName]从她的位置上站起，抓住了蛇的脖子，她用声音抚慰它让它回到了罐子里。
